date_attribute.weather: Clear skies, gentle breeze, warm winter sun.
date_attribute.holiday: New Year's Day

2025-01.daily_overview: On the first day of the New Year, Song Yajing and her family enjoyed a peaceful and heartwarming time together at home. She meticulously prepared a family meal featuring Southern Fujian cuisine and made simple yet hopeful plans with her family for the New Year holiday.

events.name: New Year's Family Breakfast
events.description: On New Year's morning, Song Yajing and her husband Chen Zhiqiang prepared a simple breakfast together in the kitchen, such as fried eggs, milk, and bread. Their daughter Xuanxuan excitedly helped set the tableware nearby. The family gathered around the dining table, enjoying the first meal of the new year in a relaxed and cheerful atmosphere. The couple asked their daughter about her New Year's wishes and had a preliminary discussion about possible places to visit during the holiday, such as the children's park or shopping mall near their home, creating a warm and cozy atmosphere.

events.name: Family Park Stroll
events.description: After lunch, Song Yajing and her family of three went for a walk at the nearby Egret Island Park. Their daughter, Xuanxuan, ran and played on the grass, picking up fallen leaves. The couple strolled side by side, enjoying the warm winter afternoon sun and the fresh air. They chatted about the store's performance last year, their daughter's growth, and some small plans for the new year, while also taking some warm family photos with their mobile phone.

events.name: Preparing a Family Dinner
events.description: As evening fell, Song Yajing began bustling in the kitchen, preparing the family's favorite Minnan-style satay noodles and baking a tiramisu cake for dessert. Her husband, Chen Zhiqiang, helped by handling seafood ingredients such as shrimp and squid while keeping an eye on their daughter, who was drawing nearby. The kitchen was filled with the rich aroma of satay sauce and the sweet scent of the cake, creating a warm and orderly atmosphere.

events.name: New Year Family Banquet
events.description: During dinner, the family gathered around the dining table, enjoying the satay noodles and tiramisu cake meticulously prepared by Song Yajing. As they ate, they chatted—Song Yajing shared the hardships and rewards of opening her shop last year, Chen Zhiqiang recounted amusing anecdotes from work, and Xuanxuan excitedly described her experiences in the park. The table was filled with gratitude for the past year and anticipation for the new year, creating a warm and harmonious atmosphere.

events.name: Home Cinema Time
events.description: After dinner, the family moved to the living room and chose a lighthearted animated film to watch together. Their daughter, Xuanxuan, snuggled in her mother’s arms, occasionally bursting into laughter at the funny scenes. Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang chatted softly while watching the movie, savoring this rare and completely relaxed family time together. It was not until their daughter grew sleepy that they all prepared to rest.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, joyful, and filled with anticipation for the new year.

结束状态.心情: Satisfaction, tranquility, and a sense of warmth from family.

state.今日运动: Approximately one hour of walking in the park.

2025-01.daily_overview: On the second day of the New Year's Day holiday, Song Yajing continued to enjoy family life in the morning. In the afternoon, she began preparing for the upcoming resumption of her store's operations, handling some online tasks and engaging in simple parent-child activities.

events.name: Prepare the store for business.
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing, thinking that the store would resume business the next day, used her free time to remotely check the store surveillance via her phone and confirmed that everything was in order. She then sent a WeChat message to the shop assistant, Xiaomei, to confirm the work schedule for the next day and the items that needed to be organized, thus getting into work mode ahead of time.

events.name: Online casual chat with my best friend
events.description: During the lunch break, Song Yajing shared photos of her family's New Year's Day gathering in the "Three Golden Flowers" best friends group chat. Li Meiling and Wang Jia promptly liked and commented on the posts, and everyone chatted about their respective holiday plans. Wang Jia sent some links from Shenzhen about spring fashion trends she had come across, which Song Yajing carefully browsed and saved.

events.name: Parent-Child Picture Book Reading
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing accompanied her daughter Xuanxuan in reading the picture book brought back from kindergarten at home. She patiently explained the story to her daughter and imitated the sounds of small animals, which made Xuanxuan giggle with delight. This was a cherished moment of parent-child bonding amid her busy shop management.

events.name: Plan the First Baking Attempt of the New Year
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing recalled her goal of "learning to make more complex French pastries within a year." She searched online for a recipe for "madeleines" and found that she had most of the ingredients at home. She decided to try making them over the weekend and noted the required butter and lemon on her shopping list.

events.name: Impromptu Family Dinner
events.description: In the evening, neighbor Aunt Zhang brought over some homemade Minnan-style pastries. Song Yajing invited her to have some fruit tea and chat. Her daughter Xuanxuan also joined in, creating a relaxed and pleasant atmosphere. Song Yajing went to bed slightly later than usual due to the social activity.

起始状态.心情: Leisurely, with a slight sense of preparation for the upcoming work.

结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled and looking forward to the weekend baking attempts.

2025-01.daily_overview: On the first workday after the holiday, Song Yajing focused on the annual review and planning. She spent the entire day systematically organizing the financial data for both the store and the household, setting clear goals for the new year, and had an in-depth discussion with her husband in the evening.

events.name: Organize annual financial data
events.description: In the small office above the shop, Song Yajing meticulously organized and verified the boutique clothing store's annual turnover, procurement costs, daily operational expenses, and profit data for 2024, as well as the family's savings, daily consumption, and other income and expenditure records. She cross-referenced paper documents with electronic spreadsheets to ensure the accuracy of the foundational data, laying a solid groundwork for the annual analysis.

events.name: Analyzing Operational Performance and Setting New Year Objectives
events.description: Based on the organized data, Song Yajing carefully analyzed the business performance over the past year. She identified a downward trend in turnover during the fourth quarter. In line with her personal goals, she set specific monthly sales targets and annual profit goals for 2025, and clarified key operational directions such as controlling procurement costs, optimizing inventory structure, and strengthening customer retention.

events.name: Develop the Annual Family Financial Budget
events.description: Song Yajing has formulated a family financial budget plan for 2025. She has set aside a family emergency fund, established a dedicated savings sub-account for her daughter's education expenses, and, considering the advancing age of both sets of parents, has also allocated a potential health and medical reserve fund.

events.name: Discussing Financial Planning with Your Husband
events.description: After dinner, Song Yajing and her husband Chen Zhiqiang had a detailed discussion in the living room regarding the preliminary 2025 store operation goals and family financial budget plan. She presented the data and analysis to her husband, explaining the details and considerations behind each plan. Chen Zhiqiang listened attentively and expressed strong support for setting aside a health fund for their parents.

events.name: Archive Annual Planning Documents
events.description: After the communication concluded, Song Yajing compiled the finalized 2025 financial plan and objectives into a clear electronic document, printed a copy, and placed it in a prominent location in the office. She properly archived the document and set up a monthly review reminder for the end of each month.

events.name: Working late into the night to handle details
events.description: Due to meticulous planning work, Song Yajing completed the document organization slightly later, resulting in a delayed sleep schedule.

起始状态.心情: Serious and methodical

结束状态.心情: Though weary, the goal is clear, and the heart feels grounded and purposeful.

2025-01.daily_overview: On Saturday, the store experienced a high volume of customer traffic. Amidst her busy sales duties, Song Yajing took a moment to search for courses aimed at enhancing her professional skills. In the evening, she attended a Bible study group at church, which brought her a sense of inner peace.

events.name: Daily Store Operations and Sales
events.description: On Saturday, Zhongshan Road Pedestrian Street was bustling with activity. Song Yajing and Xiaomei were busy attending to customers in the shop. Drawing on her years of sales experience, Song Yajing recommended suitable clothing for customers of different body types and skillfully provided styling suggestions, successfully closing several transactions.

events.name: Search Professional Enhancement Courses
events.description: During the lunch hour when customer traffic was low, Song Yajing used her phone behind the cashier counter to search for online courses related to fashion coordination and store visual merchandising. She browsed multiple platforms, carefully comparing the content, instructors, pricing, and student reviews of different courses.

events.name: Church Bible Study Group Activity
events.description: After closing the shop in the evening, Song Yajing went to a nearby church to attend the weekly Bible study group. Aunt Lin Xiuying, a fellow church member, was also there. Everyone studied a passage of scripture together and shared insights from their lives. Song Yajing offered a brief prayer for her parents and the operation of her shop.

events.name: Simple Family Dinner
events.description: After returning home from the event, her husband Chen Zhiqiang had already prepared a simple dinner. The family chatted while eating, with Song Yajing sharing insights gained from the Bible study group, and Chen Zhiqiang recounting an amusing incident from helping a colleague resolve a computer issue earlier that day.

events.name: Temporary Shopping Needs
events.description: After dinner, Song Yajing noticed that the ingredients for fruit tea at home were used up, so she walked to a nearby supermarket to purchase them, taking the opportunity to relax with a stroll.

起始状态.心情: Maintain a calm mindset and prepare for the busy weekend ahead.

结束状态.心情: Calm and fulfilling, religious activities bring spiritual satisfaction.

state.今日运动: It takes about 20 minutes to walk to and from the church, and about 15 minutes to walk to the supermarket for shopping.

2025-01.daily_overview: On Sunday, Song Yajing mainly rested at home and attended to household matters. The routine evening video call with her parents turned somber as she noticed potential health concerns with her father, sparking deep worries about her parents' aging and reflections on future caregiving.

events.name: Preparing for a video call with parents
events.description: After dinner, Song Yajing tidied up the kitchen, helped her daughter take a bath, and then adjusted the phone stand in the living room to ensure comfortable lighting and background, preparing for the weekly routine video call with her parents in her hometown of Quanzhou.

events.name: Video Calls Detect Health Concerns
events.description: After the video call connected, Song Yajing greeted her parents Song Minghui and Lin Xiuying as usual, sharing anecdotes about Xuanxuan and updates about the shop. However, during the conversation, she keenly noticed that her father's voice sounded lower than usual, appearing somewhat fatigued. Her mother inadvertently mentioned that her father had recently been complaining of occasional knee pain when going up and down the stairs and was frequently forgetting things.

events.name: Profound Concern and Emotional Exchange
events.description: Song Yajing immediately put away her smile and inquired in detail about her father's knee pain, including its specific condition, duration, and any changes in his memory. She reminded her parents to stay warm and maintain proper nutrition, and proactively suggested taking them for a medical check-up when she returns home for the Spring Festival.

events.name: Concerns and Preliminary Reflections After the Call
events.description: After the video call ended, Song Yajing remained unsettled for a long time. Sitting alone on the sofa, she recalled her father's weary voice and her mother's worried expression, and truly realized that her parents were indeed growing old. She began to seriously consider persuading them to undergo a medical checkup when she returns home for the Spring Festival.

events.name: Prepare for the next day's inventory count.
events.description: To temporarily divert her anxiety and avoid affecting the next day's work, Song Yajing forced herself to calm down. She entered the study, organized the store's inventory list and account books, and briefly communicated with the shop assistant Xiaomei via WeChat about the process and division of labor for the inventory count starting the following day.

events.name: Emotional Eating of Desserts
events.description: Concerned about her parents' health, Song Yajing ate an extra piece of tiramisu cake in the evening to relieve her emotions, resulting in a slight weight gain.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, looking forward to talking with my parents.

结束状态.心情: Worried, heavy-hearted, filled with concern for parents' health and a sense of responsibility.

2025-01.daily_overview: The new week began with drizzling rain and concerns. Song Yajing channeled her worries into action, enrolling in an online course to enhance her skills in the morning. In the afternoon, she consulted professionals regarding her parents' health issues, shared her concerns with her husband, and sought mutual support.

events.name: Identify and enroll in online fashion courses.
events.description: In the shop that morning, Song Yajing ultimately selected an online course spanning two months, which covered color theory, body shape analysis, occasion-based outfit coordination, and store visual merchandising. She found the course highly practical and closely aligned with her goal of increasing sales revenue. Consequently, using the shop's Wi-Fi, she completed the registration and tuition payment on the training platform.

events.name: Schedule an Annual Physical Examination
events.description: Thinking of her parents' health issues, Song Yajing also realized that she had not undergone a systematic physical examination in nearly three years. She contacted her family doctor, Wang Mingyuan, via WeChat to schedule a comprehensive annual health check-up for the afternoon of January 8th. She carefully noted down the precautions, such as fasting, required before the examination.

events.name: Expressing Concerns About Parents' Health to Husband
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing recounted in detail to her husband Chen Zhiqiang the health concerns of her father mentioned during last night's video call, as well as her deep worries. Her voice choked slightly: "Zhiqiang, I suddenly feel that Mom and Dad are getting old and need us." Chen Zhiqiang put down his phone, took her hand, and expressed his complete understanding and support.

events.name: Jointly Discuss Preliminary Plan for Parental Care
events.description: Comforted by her husband, Song Yajing proposed her ideas: the primary task for returning home during the Spring Festival would be to take her parents for a medical check-up; in the future, they could invite their parents to stay in Xiamen more often for easier care; at the same time, they should also start paying attention to relevant medical and elderly care information. Chen Zhiqiang agreed with these ideas.

events.name: Develop a store inventory plan
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing updated the inventory spreadsheet template on her computer and printed out a detailed checklist for the autumn and winter clothing inventory. She sent Xiaomei the specific division of tasks for the next day via WeChat.

events.name: Temporary Customer Inquiry
events.description: In the afternoon, regular customer Vivian inquired via WeChat about the arrival time of new stock. Song Yajing took the time to reply and recommended several items, enhancing online interaction.

起始状态.心情: Slightly fatigued and persistently worried

结束状态.心情: Her worries eased slightly, feeling somewhat reassured by having a clear course of action and the support of her husband.

2025-01.daily_overview: Today marks the first day of the store's inventory count, a task of considerable magnitude. Amidst the busy schedule, Song Yajing began her online course studies and continued gathering information regarding her parents' health issues. Her life is filled with practical duties and heartfelt concerns.

events.name: Lesson One of the Fashion Course
events.description: Utilizing fragmented time in the early morning and after breakfast, Song Yajing watched the first module of the course she enrolled in last night, "Fundamentals of Color Matching," on her tablet in the home study. She listened attentively as the instructor explained the color wheel and warm and cool tones, carefully taking notes on key points in her notebook.

events.name: Autumn and Winter Upper Garment Inventory
events.description: Throughout the day, Song Yajing and Xiaomei conducted an intensive inventory check at the store, focusing on all autumn and winter tops. Xiaomei climbed up and down, meticulously counting the actual quantities of each sweater, hoodie, and shirt on the shelves and in the warehouse. Meanwhile, Song Yajing sat in front of the computer, cross-referencing the thick purchase orders and sales records to verify the book quantities in the spreadsheet.

events.name: Collecting Health Information for Parents
events.description: During the midday break and inventory check intervals, Song Yajing used her mobile phone to search online for authoritative popular science articles on knee osteoarthritis and memory decline in the elderly. She also took the opportunity to look up the reviews and appointment methods for several tertiary hospitals' geriatric departments or physical examination centers in Quanzhou.

events.name: Temporary physical discomfort
events.description: Due to prolonged bending while counting goods, Song Yajing experienced slight soreness in her shoulders and neck in the afternoon and decided to rest early in the evening to alleviate the discomfort.

起始状态.心情: Focus, with a dual sense of mission for both learning and work.

结束状态.心情: Physically exhausted, yet learning new knowledge brings a hint of fulfillment, while concerns about my parents' health linger in my heart.

state.今日运动: Frequent walking and bending to count goods within the store result in significant physical exertion.

2025-01.daily_overview: On this day, Song Yajing experienced a shift from focusing on others' health to examining her own. She completed her annual physical examination in the morning, continued with her work inventory in the afternoon, and in the evening, the doctor's recommendations prompted her to reflect on her lifestyle.

events.name: Annual Health Check-up
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing entrusted the shop to Xiaomei for supervision and proceeded to the Huli District Community Health Service Center according to her scheduled appointment. Under the arrangement of Dr. Wang Mingyuan, she underwent a comprehensive physical examination, which included measurements of height and weight, blood pressure, internal medicine, surgery, ophthalmology, stomatology, complete blood count, blood lipids, blood glucose, liver function, kidney function, and gynecological ultrasound. She felt a bit nervous during the blood draw, but the entire process proceeded smoothly.

events.name: Receive preliminary physical examination feedback
events.description: After the physical examination, Dr. Wang Mingyuan had a brief discussion with Song Yajing based on some immediate test results and the consultation. Dr. Wang pointed out that although her body mass index was normal, her core muscle strength might be relatively weak, and she showed a tendency toward mild fatty liver, primarily related to prolonged sitting and a lack of regular exercise. The doctor provided specific recommendations, including engaging in at least 150 minutes of moderate-intensity exercise per week, maintaining a balanced diet, and reducing late nights.

events.name: Continue the store inventory work.
events.description: Returning to the store in the afternoon, Song Yajing immediately began the inventory check. The focus today was on autumn and winter pants, skirts, and dresses. She and Xiaomei worked in a coordinated manner, making smooth progress, but inventory discrepancies necessitated additional verification.

events.name: Reflect on Health and Plan for Exercise
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Song Yajing reflected on the doctor's advice and decided to start exercising regularly. She searched for information about the Yundang Lake Trail in Xiamen and planned to begin morning brisk walks starting this Sunday to improve her health.

events.name: Video discussion with sister
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing had a video call with her elder sister Song Yawen, sharing her physical examination results and concerns about their parents' health. Her sister encouraged her and suggested they research health insurance options together.

起始状态.心情: Nervous, awaiting the physical examination results.

结束状态.心情: Alert and aware of personal health issues, determined to change lifestyle.

state.今日运动: It takes about 30 minutes to walk to and from the medical examination center.

2025-01.daily_overview: Song Yajing continued to handle the final tasks of inventory and began adjusting her diet in response to health recommendations. Meanwhile, she communicated with suppliers about new spring merchandise to inject fresh vitality into the store's operations.

events.name: Complete the inventory and analyze the discrepancies.
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing and Xiao Mei completed the inventory of all autumn and winter clothing, discovering minor stock discrepancies. She spent time analyzing the causes, updated the spreadsheet, and formulated improvement measures to prevent future errors.

events.name: Communicate with supplier Susan regarding spring merchandise
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing discussed the 2025 spring fashion trends and procurement plans with supplier Susan via WeChat. Susan recommended several popular dresses, and Song Yajing placed orders cautiously based on the store's sales data.

events.name: Adjust diet to reduce sugar intake.
events.description: In response to her doctor's advice, Song Yajing opted for a light salad during lunch and reduced her dessert intake at dinner, drinking only fruit tea instead. She felt slightly hungry but remained determined to stick to the plan.

events.name: Learning Fashion Course Lesson Two
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing studied the second module of the online course, "Body Shape Analysis and Clothing Selection," at home and attempted to apply the knowledge by recommending outfits for her regular customer Vivian.

events.name: Interim Church Activity Notice
events.description: Upon receiving a WeChat message from fellow church member Lin Xiuying, notifying of a special prayer event over the weekend, Song Yajing plans to adjust her schedule to attend.

起始状态.心情: Be pragmatic and focus on improving work

结束状态.心情: Enriched, with full confidence in health improvement.

state.今日运动: Walked around the store for about one hour.

2025-01.daily_overview: On Friday, Song Yajing handled daily sales at the shop. In the evening, she met up with her close friend Li Meiling to enjoy some social time, but she rested slightly later than usual due to their pleasant conversation.

events.name: Store Sales and Customer Service
events.description: During the day, Song Yajing received customers in the shop, applying her newly acquired knowledge of color theory to coordinate a professional outfit for a middle-aged woman. This effort received positive feedback and successfully facilitated a sale.

events.name: Weekend gathering with my best friend Li Meiling
events.description: After closing the shop in the evening, Song Yajing met Li Meiling at a café on Zhongshan Road. They chatted about parenting, fashion, and health topics. Li Meiling shared her recent yoga experience and encouraged Song Yajing to maintain a regular exercise routine.

events.name: Failed attempt at a new baking recipe
events.description: After returning home, Song Yajing attempted to make madeleine cakes, but improper temperature control of the oven caused the cakes to burn. She decided to try again over the weekend and seek advice from Master Chen, the baking instructor.

events.name: Discussing family travel plans with my husband.
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang preliminarily discussed the goal of "taking the family on an overseas trip within three years," considering Japan or South Korea for next summer vacation and starting to save money.

起始状态.心情: Feeling relaxed and looking forward to weekend socializing.

结束状态.心情: Pleasant, feeling relaxed due to social interaction but slightly fatigued.

2025-01.daily_overview: The store was busy on Saturday. Song Yajing managed her online course studies during sales intervals and attended a special prayer service at church in the evening to pray for her parents' health.

events.name: Busy Store Operation
events.description: During the peak customer flow on Saturday, Song Yajing and Xiaomei were busy from morning till night, successfully selling multiple pieces of the spring new collection. Song Yajing utilized her knowledge from the training course to provide outfit recommendations, which helped increase the average transaction value.

events.name: Online Course Study Lesson Three
events.description: During the lunch break, Song Yajing used a tablet in the store to study the third module of the course, "Occasion Dressing Techniques," and took notes on how to apply it to store displays.

events.name: Church Special Prayer Service
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing went to the church to attend a special event praying for the health of the elderly. She prayed together with fellow church member Lin Xiuying, feeling a sense of peace and support in her heart.

events.name: Family Dinner and Interaction with Daughter
events.description: After returning home from the event, her husband prepared dinner. Song Yajing spent quality time with her daughter Xuanxuan playing jigsaw puzzles, enjoying the parent-child bonding and relieving work stress.

events.name: Temporary Neck and Shoulder Massage
events.description: Due to prolonged standing during sales, Song Yajing experienced discomfort in her shoulders and neck in the evening, and her husband gave her a simple massage to relieve it.

2025-01.daily_overview: On Sunday, Song Yajing began implementing her morning brisk walking plan. She exercised on the Yundang Lake trail in the morning, attended the Sunday Mass at church in the afternoon, and planned her work for the following week in the evening, demonstrating a significant improvement in her health awareness.

events.name: First Morning Brisk Walk
events.description: At 7:00 a.m., Song Yajing went to the Yundang Lake Trail for a 30-minute brisk walk. She used a mobile app to track her step count and heart rate, initially finding it strenuous but persevering to complete the workout. After exercising, she felt invigorated and resolved to make it a regular routine every Monday, Wednesday, and Friday.

events.name: Sunday Mass of the Church
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing and her family attended the Sunday Mass at the church, presided over by Father Wang Mingde. She prayed for her parents' health and the operation of their shop, and exchanged insights on brisk walking with fellow parishioners.

events.name: Successful Home Baking
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing attempted to make madeleine cakes again, and this time she successfully baked golden-brown cakes, which were highly praised by the whole family after tasting. She took photos and shared them in the baking enthusiasts' group, receiving a like from Mrs. Liu.

events.name: Plan next week's work and exercise.
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing updated the shop's work plan and set reminders for brisk walking on Wednesdays and Fridays. She chatted with her regular customer Vivian on WeChat, inviting her for a lakeside walk over the weekend.

events.name: Follow-up Video Call with Parents
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing video-called her parents, once again reminding them of health precautions and confirming the arrangements for their Spring Festival medical check-up, which brought her some peace of mind.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied, feeling positive due to completion of exercise and family time.

2025-01.daily_overview: A typical winter workday. Song Yajing advanced the spring planning for the store with a pragmatic and forward-looking approach, addressing core business decisions while also reserving time for personal growth and family activities, maintaining a tight yet orderly pace.

events.name: Morning brisk walking exercise
events.description: According to the plan, Song Yajing completed a 30-minute brisk walk on the Yundang Lake Trail, using a fitness app to record her heart rate and step count to enhance her cardiovascular function.

events.name: Finalize the spring procurement order
events.description: In the office area at the back of the store, Song Yajing finalized the plan for the spring main collection while facing her computer screen. She spent nearly an hour communicating with Susan, the supplier in Guangzhou, via WeChat voice messages, carefully confirming the specific details of the first batch of orders. These included five styles of dresses, three styles of shirts, and two styles of outerwear, covering aspects such as fabric, color and size ratios, unit prices, and shipping terms. After confirming that everything was correct, she completed the deposit payment via online banking, settling a major task on her mind.

events.name: Arrange store matters for tomorrow
events.description: Considering she had a pottery experience class to attend tomorrow afternoon, Song Yajing communicated with the shop assistant Xiaomei during a work break. She briefed Xiaomei on the afternoon tasks, including following up on appointments with regular clients, signing for several pre-ordered goods, and handling routine sales receptions. She also reminded Xiaomei to contact her by phone in case of any emergencies. Xiaomei readily agreed and assured Song Yajing that she could go to her class without worry.

events.name: Inquire about short-term financial planning options
events.description: As the end of the month approached, Song Yajing calculated that there would be a short-term idle fund in the shop's account after tax filing. She sent a message via WeChat to Lin Xiaofeng, the account manager at ICBC, briefly explaining the situation and expressing her interest in learning about low-risk, flexible-term wealth management products. Manager Lin promptly replied, recommending a money market fund and a short-term wealth management product, and scheduled an in-person detailed explanation for Friday afternoon.

events.name: Online Course on Color Coordination
events.description: At 8:30 p.m., after putting her daughter to sleep, Song Yajing opened her tablet in the study and began her first online fashion course since enrollment. She diligently studied the basic theories of color, focusing on how to use warm and cool tones to enhance the complexion of customers with different skin tones, as well as the application of complementary colors and monochromatic schemes in window displays. While watching, she took notes in her notebook, jotting down, "In spring, try more combinations of colors like goose yellow, grass green, and light purple." She also reflected on how to style the items she had just ordered.

events.name: Accompanying my daughter in making small desserts
events.description: Before starting the course, at her daughter Chen Lexuan's request, Song Yajing used ingredients from the refrigerator to prepare a simple yogurt fruit cup. She involved her daughter in mixing and plating, enjoying a relaxed parent-child baking moment together.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with plans for the day's work

结束状态.心情: Fulfilled and slightly expectant (for tomorrow's pottery class).

2025-01.daily_overview: Weekdays are interspersed with novel experiences. Mornings proceed with business as usual, while afternoons offer a temporary departure from the familiar shop environment, immersing in a brand-new hands-on activity that infuses a touch of creativity and tranquility into the routine. However, the evening was spent staying up late due to unexpected work.

events.name: Learn Customer Body Shape Analysis Course
events.description: During the lull in customer traffic in the morning, Song Yajing used the computer behind the cash register to study the second module of an online course. She focused on learning the dressing principles for common body shapes such as pear-shaped, apple-shaped, and hourglass-shaped figures. Referring to her notes, she recalled the physical characteristics of several regular customers and contemplated how to provide more targeted recommendations.

events.name: Experience pottery making at a ceramic studio
events.description: At two o'clock in the afternoon, Song Yajing handed over the shop to Xiaomei and drove to the pottery studio located in Huli District. Along the way, she felt a mix of curiosity and anticipation, as this was her first time trying such a hands-on activity. The studio had an elegant and serene atmosphere, with a faint scent of clay lingering in the air.

events.name: First Encounter with Wheel Throwing and Hand Building
events.description: Under the patient guidance of the teacher, Song Yajing put on an apron and began to learn wheel throwing. It was not easy to control the clay sliding on the turntable, and it took her several attempts to barely shape the rough form of a cup. She then tried the hand-pinching technique to create the cup handle. The entire process required immense patience and concentration, and she gradually immersed herself in it, feeling as if time had slowed down.

events.name: Complete the first piece and deliver it for firing.
events.description: After more than two hours of repeated adjustments, a somewhat rustic and even slightly crooked mug body finally took shape. Though imperfect, Song Yajing felt a unique sense of satisfaction as she looked at the piece she had personally shaped from clay. She handed the work over to the studio for subsequent drying, glazing, and firing, paid the fee, and arranged to collect the finished product four weeks later.

events.name: Share Experience and Feedback
events.description: On her way home, Song Yajing was in a cheerful mood. She sent several on-site photos and pictures of the finished clay pieces to her baking teacher, Master Chen, via WeChat, writing: "Master Chen, thank you for the recommendation! I tried pottery today. Although I didn’t do it well, the process was particularly calming and felt completely different from baking."

events.name: Confirming Weekend Gathering with Best Friend
events.description: After dinner, Song Yajing remembered her weekend appointment and sent a WeChat message to her close friend Li Meiling to confirm. The two quickly decided to meet at the newly opened "Slow Time Cafe" on Zhongshan Road on Sunday afternoon, with plans to go shopping afterward.

events.name: Temporarily handling customer complaints while staying up late
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing received a WeChat complaint from a regular customer, stating that the purchased sweater had slight pilling. She immediately contacted the supplier Susan to verify the issue and reassured the customer, promising to handle it the next day. By the time she finished dealing with the matter, it was almost midnight, causing her to stay up late.

起始状态.心情: Ordinary, yet with a hint of anticipation for the afternoon's activities.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied yet somewhat fatigued, feeling slightly anxious due to work pressure.

2025-01.daily_overview: A rest day centered around family relationship management. The morning was dedicated to parent-child bonding, while the evening revitalized the marital relationship with a deep conversation and a warm agreement, infusing it with renewed energy and a sense of ritual. However, the exercise plan was adjusted due to rainy weather.

events.name: Family Morning Time and Indoor Exercise
events.description: On Saturday morning, Song Yajing was unable to go for an outdoor brisk walk due to the rainy weather, so she switched to doing 20 minutes of yoga stretches at home to maintain her exercise routine. When she returned home, her husband Chen Zhiqiang had already prepared breakfast, and their daughter Xuanxuan had just woken up. The family enjoyed a cheerful breakfast together. In the morning, Song Yajing took her daughter to the children's playground near their residential area for half an hour of play.

events.name: Couple's in-depth conversation
events.description: In the evening, after their daughter had fallen asleep, Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang had a candid conversation in the living room. Song Yajing spoke first, admitting that she had recently felt both of them were too preoccupied with work and their child, leaving less and less time for just the two of them to talk. Chen Zhiqiang expressed similar feelings. Together, they analyzed the reasons, mainly attributing it to the demands of managing the shop, which consumed much of Song Yajing’s energy, while Chen Zhiqiang’s occasional overtime work and business trips disrupted their routine.

events.name: Institutionalize the establishment of a "Monthly Couple Date Day"
events.description: To address this issue, Song Yajing proposed establishing a fixed "couple's date night." Chen Zhiqiang strongly agreed. After discussing, they decided to designate the third Saturday evening of each month as their exclusive date time, taking turns to arrange activities. They immediately marked the schedule for the upcoming months in their phone calendars.

events.name: First Date: Home Theater Night
events.description: After reaching the agreement, Song Yajing proactively suggested, "Then let's start our first date tonight!" She took charge of the preparations, brewing a pot of fruit tea and cutting some fruit. They turned off the main lights, nestled on the sofa, and used a projector to rewatch an old movie they had seen during their courtship. Without the noise of children or the stress of work, they chatted freely, sharing their thoughts on the film, as if they had returned to their dating days.

events.name: Sharing workout progress with close friends
events.description: In the afternoon, while chatting casually on WeChat with Li Meiling, Song Yajing proactively mentioned that she had started morning brisk walking for a week and felt much more energetic in the mornings, though she occasionally felt lazy. Li Meiling expressed strong support and suggested, "When the weather gets warmer, we can arrange to walk a section of the Island Ring Road together on weekend mornings, chatting as we go!" This suggestion gave Song Yajing even more motivation to stick with her exercise routine.

起始状态.心情: Relax and enjoy the slow pace of a weekend morning.

结束状态.心情: Warm, sweet, with a significant enhancement in the emotional bond between husband and wife.

2025-01.daily_overview: A typical social and leisurely Sunday. An afternoon tea gathering with close girlfriends serves as a crucial occasion for emotional release and information exchange. The subsequent relaxed shopping not only satisfies the desire to shop but also provides inspiration for work. However, the evening ended with a late return due to a gathering with friends.

events.name: Afternoon Tea Gathering with Best Friend Li Meiling
events.description: At three o'clock on Sunday afternoon, Song Yajing and Li Meiling met at the "Slow Time Café." They ordered lattes and the café's signature tiramisu. Song Yajing expressed her subtle concerns about the health of her parents, who live far away in Quanzhou, particularly her father's recent fatigue. Li Meiling, speaking from her dual roles as a teacher and a daughter, offered comfort and advice. Song Yajing also shared her idea of signing up for an online baking course. Li Meiling, in turn, shared amusing anecdotes from her teaching experiences and the challenges of her own child's growth. The two encouraged each other throughout their conversation.

events.name: Shopping and Market Observation on Zhongshan Road
events.description: After finishing their coffee, the two strolled along Zhongshan Road Pedestrian Street. They not only looked at clothes but also observed the window displays and promotional techniques of the shops along the street. Song Yajing paid special attention to the new arrivals in several boutiques with similar styles, using her phone to take photos of some distinctive outfit combinations and display methods as references for the spring adjustments in her own store. Li Meiling also helped her select a few new spring outfits that suited her personal style.

events.name: Returned late from an impromptu gathering with friends
events.description: After an evening stroll, they unexpectedly ran into another friend, and the three decided to have dinner together. Song Yajing sent a message to her husband, informing him that they would be dining at a restaurant and chatting late into the evening, which led to her returning home later than usual.

events.name: Announcing the "Date Day" Decision to Family
events.description: After returning home, Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang explained their decision to establish a "monthly couple date day" to their daughter Xuanxuan and their mother Lin Xiuying, who was connected via video call (and had been assisted by their neighbor Aunt Zhang in looking after the child during the day). They emphasized that this was to strengthen their relationship as parents and enhance family happiness, promising to arrange care for Xuanxuan on the evenings of their dates (with help from the husband, the mother, or neighbors). Their daughter nodded in innocent understanding, while their mother smiled and expressed her full support.

起始状态.心情: Feeling relaxed and joyful, looking forward to the gathering with my best friend.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied and content, but slightly fatigued due to returning late.

2025-01.daily_overview: The new week begins with health management and work planning. Personal health awareness has expanded from oneself to parents, with increased initiative in action. Meanwhile, the spring business strategy for the store is gradually taking shape through data analysis and trend research, although exercise has been temporarily suspended due to fatigue.

events.name: Consultation on Gynecological Specialized Examinations
events.description: During the quiet morning hours at the shop, Song Yajing contacted her family doctor, Wang Mingyuan, via WeChat to inquire about the necessity of an annual gynecological checkup for women. Dr. Wang patiently explained the importance of breast ultrasound and TCT screening, especially for someone like her with family health concerns. Following his advice, Song Yajing scheduled an appointment for the morning of February 10. After hanging up the phone, she felt she had accomplished an important task of taking responsibility for her own health.

events.name: Develop and launch a morning exercise program
events.description: After closing up shop and returning home in the evening, Song Yajing seriously considered making exercise a regular part of her routine. Taking into account that her store opens at 10 a.m., she developed a more specific plan: on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays, she would go for a brisk walk at Lakeside Park from 7:15 a.m. for 30–40 minutes, while on Tuesdays and Thursdays, she would do 15 minutes of stretching at home. She placed her sports shoes and quick-dry clothes by the bedside and set the alarm for the next morning.

events.name: Analyzing Sales Data and Studying Spring Trends
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing opened the sales report from last spring on her computer in the office area at the back of the store, carefully comparing the sales volume, inventory turnover rate, and customer feedback for various categories of clothing. At the same time, she browsed the digital editions of Vogue and Harper's Bazaar, as well as the social media accounts of several local fashion bloggers in Xiamen. Her notes listed keywords for the spring of 2025, such as "new Chinese elements," "soft pastels," and "lightweight knits," which she cross-referenced with the orders she had already placed.

events.name: Follow-up Communication with Supplier Susan
events.description: Based on the preliminary spring trend analysis, Song Yajing sent Susan a voice message, inquiring whether there were more options for "New Chinese Style" designs on her end and if more breathable and eco-friendly fabrics were recommended. Susan replied that she would take note and include some new fabric samples in the next shipment.

events.name: Due to fatigue from returning late yesterday, I went to bed early.
events.description: Song Yajing felt fatigued and decided to rest early, canceling her evening study session to regain energy.

起始状态.心情: Monday work status, a slight sense of busyness.

结束状态.心情: Having gained a clearer direction for both health and work, yet feeling somewhat fatigued.

2025-01.daily_overview: A steady workday primarily focused on daily store operations and customer relationship management. The study of online courses has begun to integrate with practical business issues, showing a tendency toward applying knowledge to practice, but exercise was postponed due to temporary work adjustments.

events.name: Learn Online Store Management Courses
events.description: At nine in the evening, after her daughter had fallen asleep, Song Yajing turned on her computer in the study and began the first unit of the online course "Small Retail Store Operations." The video explained basic inventory management methods (such as the ABC classification method), simple cost-profit calculation models, and how to motivate small team employees through non-monetary means. As she listened, Song Yajing compared the content to her own store: inventory management was relatively rough, cost accounting relied mainly on intuition, and her motivation for Xiaomei consisted primarily of year-end bonuses and daily care. In her notebook, she wrote: "Need to establish a clearer inventory ledger; prepare a simple profit and loss statement monthly; consider what growth support, besides bonuses, can be provided for Xiaomei?"

events.name: Receive regular customer Vivian and practice outfit coordination
events.description: In the afternoon, regular customer Vivian came to the store. Utilizing the body shape analysis knowledge she had recently learned, Song Yajing observed that Vivian had a standard hourglass figure. She proactively recommended a waist-cinching knit dress and an H-line coat, explaining how this combination would highlight Vivian's strengths. After trying them on, Vivian was very satisfied and purchased both items. This successful recommendation gave Song Yajing a more direct appreciation of the value of the online course.

events.name: Handle daily procurement and accounting matters
events.description: In the morning, she received a batch of replenished winter accessories and updated the inventory records together with Xiaomei. In the afternoon, she took time to verify the sales transactions and expense documents from the previous week, ensuring clear and accurate accounts.

events.name: Daily Phone Call with Mother
events.description: During dinner, Song Yajing had a video call with her mother, Lin Xiuying, and they chatted about everyday matters. She subtly inquired about her father's recent sleep and diet, and her mother said everything was fine, telling her not to worry. Song Yajing mentally planned to observe carefully when she returned home for the Spring Festival.

events.name: Temporary Handling of Inventory Issues Puts Campaign on Hold
events.description: Due to the discovery of a batch of goods with incorrect labels, Song Yajing spent time verifying them, resulting in her not performing the planned stretching exercises.

起始状态.心情: Steady and methodical

结束状态.心情: Calm, with a slight sense of fulfillment after studying, but feeling a bit pressured.

2025-01.daily_overview: The weather impacted the exercise plan, but flexible adjustments demonstrated a commitment to perseverance. The focus of work shifted from analysis to specific action plans, with the outline of spring procurement becoming clearer through communication with suppliers, and cross-day baking trials have commenced.

events.name: Complete Archiving of Stage Work
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing organized the recent inventory report, the Spring Festival promotion plan, and the order confirmation forms for spring product selections, placing them into a designated folder for archiving. She briefly informed Xiaomei that the focus of their work for the upcoming week would shift to pre-holiday clearance sales and preparations for the business closure.

events.name: Adjusting Exercise Plans for Rainy Days
events.description: Waking up to find a light drizzle outside, Song Yajing realized her brisk walking plan at Lakeside Park couldn't be carried out. Undeterred, she followed her backup plan by laying out a yoga mat in her living room and completing 20 minutes of indoor aerobic exercise and stretching guided by a mobile app. After working out, she was slightly sweaty and logged "Rainy day indoor alternative completed" in the app, recognizing the importance of having a Plan B prepared in advance.

events.name: Draft a Detailed Spring Procurement List
events.description: During the afternoon when store traffic was relatively low, Song Yajing sat at her desk and neatly handwrote a detailed spring procurement list in her notebook, based on previous trend analysis and sales data. The list was organized by category (tops, bottoms, dresses, outerwear), style (workwear, casual, date night), color, and estimated purchase quantity, with notes on budget limits and priority levels added alongside.

events.name: Communicate with suppliers regarding the ordering conference matters
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing contacted the supplier Susan via WeChat voice call. She discussed her procurement list ideas with Susan, who provided professional suggestions, such as recommending adding a trendy color to certain styles and noting that the unit price of certain fabrics might exceed the budget. Meanwhile, Susan formally informed her that the Guangzhou Spring Large-Scale Order Fair is scheduled for February 5th to 7th, encouraging her to personally view the sample garments and fabrics if time permits. Song Yajing noted the dates and decided to arrange her itinerary as soon as possible.

events.name: First attempt at a new baking recipe (Day 1)
events.description: To refine her baking skills, Song Yajing attempted to make French macarons in the evening, but her first try failed as the batter was too thin. She decided to continue adjusting the recipe tomorrow.

起始状态.心情: Slightly lazy due to the rainy weather, but determined in will.

结束状态.心情: The procurement plan has made substantial progress in an orderly manner, while there is a slight sense of frustration regarding the baking challenge.

state.今日运动: 20 minutes of indoor aerobic exercise and stretching (as an alternative to morning brisk walking)

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy day, temperature 12-15 degrees Celsius, with a relatively strong north wind.

2025-01.daily_overview: In the winter days with cold winds blowing, life continues to progress at its own pace. The habit of exercise solidifies through persistence, online learning enters a phase of deepening and practical application, and the warm interactions among neighbors add a touch of warmth to daily life, though exercise has led to mild discomfort.

events.name: Adhere to morning brisk walking.
events.description: Despite the overcast and windy weather, Song Yajing arrived at Lakeside Park as planned at 7:15 a.m. She tightened her coat and completed a 35-minute brisk walk against the wind. After the exercise, her body warmed up, which helped fend off the cold and left her feeling refreshed. However, she experienced slight soreness in the sole of her left foot.

events.name: Complete online course assignments
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing completed the homework for the first unit as required by the course. She roughly calculated the inventory turnover rate of her store over the past six months and found that the proportion of slow-selling items was relatively high. In her assignment, she proposed optimization suggestions: establishing a quarterly clearance mechanism for unsold products and setting up safety stock alerts for best-selling items. After submitting the assignment, she felt a sense of fulfillment from applying knowledge into practice.

events.name: Learning Customer Body Shape Analysis and Recommendation Scripts
events.description: After the store closed, Song Yajing used her phone to watch the remaining part of the second module of the course, focusing on the recommended sales pitches and taboos for customers with different body types. She reviewed her experience with an apple-shaped customer she had served that day (who ultimately did not make a purchase), reflecting on whether the outcome would have been different if she had applied the styling approach suggested in the course, which emphasized "highlighting the collarbone and leg lines."

events.name: Try new desserts and share them with your neighbors.
events.description: Using ingredients available at home, Song Yajing attempted to make a modified version of the Southern Fujian peanut cake taught by her mother, with reduced sugar content. After baking, the cake turned out fragrant and glutinous. She packed a small box and asked her daughter to deliver it to Aunt Zhang next door. In return, Aunt Zhang gifted some of her homemade pickled vegetables.

events.name: Adjusting Baking Recipes (Day 2)
events.description: Based on yesterday's failure, Song Yajing consulted materials, adjusted the macaron recipe, and tried again, resulting in slight improvement but still with cracks. She decided to take a day off before trying once more.

起始状态.心情: Clear-minded, with the determination to persist in completing plans.

结束状态.心情: The days are fulfilling, with rewarding learning experiences and warm neighborhood relationships, though slight foot discomfort slightly affects the mood.

state.今日运动: A 35-minute brisk morning walk (Lakeside Park) resulted in mild plantar fasciitis discomfort.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with temperatures rising to 14-19°C and bright sunshine.

2025-01.daily_overview: Friday's work focused on "people" and "goods." On one hand, efforts were made to deepen the understanding of customers to enhance service quality; on the other hand, keeping up with trends was prioritized to ensure the competitiveness of merchandise, all in preparation for weekend promotions and the upcoming Spring Festival holiday. Physical exercise was temporarily suspended due to discomfort.

events.name: Review customer cases and formulate communication scripts
events.description: During her free time in the morning, Song Yajing took out her notebook and reviewed several memorable customers from the week. She particularly analyzed a young office worker with a pear-shaped body who had tried on a pair of tight-fitting pants with unsatisfactory results. Drawing on her knowledge, Song Yajing drafted recommended talking points in her notebook for such customers: "You could try this A-line skirt, which does a great job of flattering the hips. Paired with this fitted top, it will create a very sleek and upright overall look." She planned to try using these suggestions the next time she encountered a similar situation.

events.name: In-depth Course on Learning Spring Fashion Trends
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing continued her fashion trend course, where the module provided an in-depth analysis of specific fabrics popular for Spring 2025 (such as recycled fibers and sheer yarns), representative styles (like utility-style dresses and cape-like cardigans), and patterns (abstract florals and geometric lines). She compared these with her own procurement list, marked the items already covered, and considered whether any fine-tuning was necessary.

events.name: Discussing Spring Display Adjustments with Sales Associate Xiaomei
events.description: Before leaving work, Song Yajing and Xiaomei tidied up the display window together. Drawing on the color theory she had recently studied, Song Yajing suggested arranging a set of spring outfits in pale yellow and lavender together to create an early spring atmosphere. Xiaomei thought the effect was excellent, and the two discussed plans to comprehensively adjust the store's displays after the Spring Festival.

events.name: Pay monthly rent for the store
events.description: Through mobile banking, Song Yajing promptly transferred the January shop rent to her landlord, Sister Li's account. After completing the transfer, she sent a polite text message to inform Sister Li. Sister Li replied, "Received, thank you," and wished her an early Happy Spring Festival.

events.name: Resting from exercise due to plantar discomfort
events.description: Song Yajing heeded her body's signals, canceling her morning brisk walk and opting for a gentle stroll instead to alleviate the discomfort.

起始状态.心情: The relaxed feeling on Friday, looking forward to the weekend, but slightly worried about foot discomfort.

结束状态.心情: The satisfaction of professional advancement, a clear weekend schedule, and a slight alleviation of discomfort.

state.今日运动: Light walking for 15 minutes (as an alternative to strenuous exercise)

2025-01.daily_overview: The last Saturday before the Spring Festival holiday was busy yet filled with a festive pre-holiday atmosphere. The focus at work was on pre-holiday clearance and preparations for business closure, while the family priority was planning the return home for reunion. Public and private affairs intertwined, accompanied by the resumption of physical activities.

events.name: Pre-Spring Festival Inventory Clearance and Promotional Arrangements
events.description: Song Yajing and Xiaomei spent the entire morning conducting a thorough pre-holiday inventory check of all the store's stock to ensure that the records matched the actual items. They gathered the remaining winter clothing clearance items, organized them, and attached prominent tags reading "Spring Festival Clearance, Up to 50% Off." Additionally, they set up a dedicated promotional display cart at the store entrance, adorned with red decorations, creating a strong festive promotional atmosphere.

events.name: Prepare Year-End Rewards for Store Staff
events.description: At noon, Song Yajing went to the bank to withdraw cash and placed Xiao Mei’s year-end bonus in an exquisite red envelope. She also made a special trip to a well-known Western-style pastry shop to purchase a New Year dessert gift box and handwrote a card: "To Xiao Mei: Thank you for your hard work and companionship throughout the year! Wishing you a happy New Year and growing more beautiful with each passing day! — Sister Yajing"

events.name: Finalizing the Spring Festival homecoming travel itinerary with my husband.
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang sat on the sofa, using their mobile phone calendars and navigation apps to plan their trip back to Quanzhou. They ultimately decided to depart on the morning of February 1st (the 29th day of the twelfth lunar month) and return to Xiamen on the afternoon of February 3rd (the second day of the Lunar New Year). They then began discussing the list of gifts to bring for their parents and relatives in Quanzhou, including Xiamen-style pastries, dried seafood, and new clothes for their parents.

events.name: Select Spring Featured Styles
events.description: Taking advantage of the quiet time after the shop closed, Song Yajing reviewed the existing spring inventory samples (mainly sample garments sent by Susan) based on the latest trends learned from online courses. Considering the acceptance level of local customers in Xiamen, she preliminarily selected several styles as the main promotional and display focus after the Spring Festival and marked them accordingly.

events.name: Family Movie Night
events.description: To unwind from the busy days, the family of three watched an animated movie together in the evening, enjoying a simple moment of family entertainment.

events.name: Resume morning brisk walking
events.description: The discomfort in the soles of the feet has largely subsided. Song Yajing engaged in a 25-minute brisk walk in the community this morning and felt well.

起始状态.心情: A sense of relaxation on the weekend, yet accompanied by the busy awareness of pre-holiday preparations.

结束状态.心情: The fulfillment after busyness, filled with anticipation for the Spring Festival reunion.

state.今日运动: 25-minute brisk morning walk, in-store organizing and moving (light physical labor)

2025-01.daily_overview: A Sunday that integrates faith life, family responsibilities, and business activities. The morning is spent in church, finding spiritual tranquility and strength, while the afternoon is dedicated to the final sales push before the holiday, maintaining a balanced rhythm of life. However, the night is marked by staying up late for study.

events.name: Sunday Mass and New Year Blessing
events.description: On Sunday morning, Song Yajing carefully selected appropriate and elegant outfits for her daughter and herself before heading to Siming Catholic Church together. During the homily at Mass, Father Wang Mingde specifically connected the upcoming Lunar New Year, encouraging the congregation to give thanks for the blessings of the past year, care for their families, and welcome the new year with hearts full of peace and joy. In her prayers, Song Yajing earnestly offered supplications for her parents' health, the prosperity of her shop in the coming year, and harmony within her family. After Mass, she encountered fellow parishioner Aunt Lin Xiuying, and the two exchanged brief New Year's greetings.

events.name: Conversations on Faith Initiation with My Daughter
events.description: On the bus home, daughter Xuanxuan asked her mother why people sing and stay quiet. Song Yajing explained in simple terms: "We are saying thank you to God, and we also hope He will bless Grandpa, Grandma, Mom, Dad, and Xuanxuan to be healthy and happy." The daughter nodded, seeming to understand yet not fully grasping the meaning.

events.name: Spring Festival Clearance Sale Officially Launched
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing and Xiaomei actively conducted a Spring Festival clearance sale in the store. Due to the significant discounts and the high weekend foot traffic, they attracted many customers. They efficiently handled customer service, made recommendations, and managed cashier duties, successfully selling multiple winter clothing clearance items. This helped recover some funds and made room for new stock after the Lunar New Year. Song Yajing was satisfied with the promotional results.

events.name: Family Dinner and Sharing
events.description: During the evening family dinner, Song Yajing shared the priest's sermon on caring for the family in the new year and led the family in a brief prayer before the meal. Although Chen Zhiqiang does not often attend church, he respected and participated in the activity. The family enjoyed their meal in a warm and harmonious atmosphere.

events.name: Staying up late to complete baking course assignments.
events.description: To complete the online baking course module before the Spring Festival, Song Yajing studied late into the night, submitted her assignments, and consequently went to bed late.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, prepare to enter a state of worship.

结束状态.心情: spiritually refreshed and practically satisfied, but tired from late study

state.今日运动: Walking to and from the church and working in the shop, the total step count is approximately 7,000 steps.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with temperatures ranging from 17 to 22 degrees Celsius, as warm as a spring day.
