2025-01.daily_overview: The last workday before the Spring Festival holiday is a moment for reflection, gratitude, and transition. With the annual wrap-up of the store completed, gratitude expressed to colleagues, key post-holiday tasks planned, and final preparations made for the upcoming family reunion journey, exercise was temporarily paused due to the busy schedule.

events.name: Settle the store accounts for January
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing carefully settled all the January operating revenues and various expenditures (rent, utilities, goods payments, employee salaries, etc.) using the cash register system and manual ledgers, and calculated the approximate profit for the month. She entered the data into a simple spreadsheet on her computer to accumulate information for the annual financial analysis.

events.name: Distribute year-end bonuses and have heart-to-heart talks with store staff.
events.description: During the afternoon when customer traffic was sparse, Song Yajing called Xiao Mei over and personally presented her with a red envelope containing a bonus and a dessert gift box, expressing sincere gratitude. She then invited Xiao Mei to a nearby quiet tea restaurant for an in-depth conversation. Song Yajing acknowledged Xiao Mei's meticulousness and responsibility in tasks such as off-season inventory checks, inquired about her personal plans for the new year, and proactively offered, "If you are interested in learning short-term courses on clothing coordination or display, the store can cover part of the expenses." Deeply moved, Xiao Mei shared her gains from work and occasional confusion when dealing with difficult customers. The two conversed like friends.

events.name: Conduct pre-Spring Festival store cleaning and safety inspection
events.description: After their heart-to-heart talk, Song Yajing and Xiaomei thoroughly cleaned the shop together, wiping the shelves, mopping the floor, and tidying up the warehouse. Finally, Song Yajing carefully checked all power outlets and water faucets, confirmed that both the front and back doors and windows were securely locked, and posted a notice on the door that read, "Closed for Spring Festival holiday, reopening on the sixth day of the lunar new year."

events.name: Book the Guangzhou Order Fair Itinerary
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Song Yajing operated on a travel app to book round-trip tickets for a flight to Guangzhou on February 4 and a return to Xiamen on February 7, as well as an economical hotel with a good reputation and convenient transportation in Liwan District. She shared the itinerary information with her husband and the supplier, Susan.

events.name: Final check of luggage and vehicle before returning home.
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang made a final check of the gifts and luggage they were bringing back to Quanzhou to ensure nothing was left behind. Chen Zhiqiang inspected the vehicle's fuel level, tires, and spare tools, confirming that everything was ready.

events.name: Neglecting morning exercise due to busyness
events.description: Song Yajing focused on wrapping up tasks and did not go for her morning brisk walk, planning to resume it during the holiday.

起始状态.心情: The Busyness and Sense of Closure on the Last Workday Before the Holiday

结束状态.心情: A sense of relief and ease, filled with anticipation for the long holiday and contentment with team relationships.

state.今日运动: Store deep cleaning (moderate physical labor), no dedicated exercise.

date_attribute.holiday: Chinese New Year's Eve

2025-01.daily_overview: The scene of life shifts from Xiamen to Quanzhou, and the pace transitions from busy work to warm reunions. The journey home on New Year's Eve is filled with anticipation, and the reunion with parents along with the sumptuous New Year's Eve dinner marks a traditional and heartwarming conclusion to the year, with weight beginning to increase due to the festive gatherings.

events.name: Drive back to parents' home in Quanzhou.
events.description: Early in the morning, Song Yajing and her family of three set off from their home in Xiamen, driving to Licheng District in Quanzhou with their luggage and gifts. The traffic on the highway was smooth, and their daughter Xuanxuan, seated in her car seat, excitedly gazed out the window, occasionally asking, "Are we almost there?" They took a break at a service area along the way, during which Song Yajing sent her parents an estimated time of arrival.

events.name: Arrival for Reunion and Observation of Parents' Condition
events.description: Arrived at the parents' home around eleven in the morning. Mother Lin Xiuying had already been watching at the door, and father Song Minghui also came out with a cheerful smile to greet them. Song Yajing carefully observed her parents: her father's complexion looked quite good, but his movements seemed a bit slower than she remembered; her mother remained spirited and energetic. The family busily moved the luggage, and Xuanxuan rushed to hug her grandparents.

events.name: Sumptuous Family Feast and Gift Sharing
events.description: For lunch, Mother prepared a table full of hearty Minnan home-style dishes, including Song Yajing's favorite satay noodles and rice dumplings. During the meal, Song Yajing took out the gifts she had brought one by one, helping her parents try on the new clothes. Her father repeatedly said, "You didn't have to spend so much," but his face was full of smiles. The family chatted while eating, with topics ranging from the shop's operations to Xuanxuan's kindergarten life, creating a warm and joyful atmosphere.

events.name: Preparing the New Year's Eve dinner together
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing and her mother were busy together in the kitchen, preparing a more sumptuous New Year's Eve dinner. Song Yajing assisted as an apprentice, learning to cook several traditional New Year dishes by following her mother's methods. The aroma wafting from the kitchen and the cheerful conversations between mother and daughter filled the air with the festive spirit of the New Year. Meanwhile, Chen Zhiqiang kept his father-in-law company by playing chess and chatting with him.

events.name: The Warm Family Reunion Dinner and Staying Up Late on New Year's Eve
events.description: In the evening, the sumptuous New Year's Eve dinner was served, and the whole family gathered around the table. The father offered a few words of blessing and reflection. After the meal, the family watched the Spring Festival Gala together. Song Yajing noticed that her father would occasionally lose focus or doze off while watching TV. As midnight approached, they observed the traditional custom of staying up late in a simple manner, exchanged New Year's greetings, and then settled their excited daughter, who had been energetic all day, to sleep.

起始状态.心情: Excitement, anticipation, mixed with a slight weariness from getting up early for the journey.

结束状态.心情: Happiness and warmth, immersed in the strong atmosphere of family reunion.

state.今日运动: Self-driving (sedentary), household assistance (light activity)

date_attribute.holiday: Spring Festival

2025-01.daily_overview: On the first day of the Lunar New Year, I was fully immersed in the relaxation and festive atmosphere of the Spring Festival holiday. The morning was dedicated to the traditional New Year greetings and family interactions, the afternoon was spent enjoying leisurely moments, and the evening featured an important family conversation, where care was translated into concrete action plans, accompanied by a continuous increase in weight.

events.name: Family New Year's Greetings and Breakfast on the First Day of the Lunar New Year
events.description: In the morning, the Song Yajing family dressed neatly and first paid New Year's greetings to the parents. Their daughter Xuanxuan said in a childish voice, "Happy New Year to Grandpa and Grandma, wishing you good health!" This delighted the elderly, who then gave her red envelopes. Breakfast consisted of sweet soup and rice cakes prepared by the mother, symbolizing sweetness and advancement.

events.name: Leisurely Morning Family Time
events.description: No outings were scheduled for the morning to visit relatives for New Year greetings (main relatives have arranged a gathering tomorrow). Father was sunbathing on the balcony while reading the newspaper, while Mother and Song Yajing were in the living room watching reruns of the Spring Festival Gala on TV, peeling pomelos, cracking sunflower seeds, and chatting. Chen Zhiqiang took Xuanxuan out to play in the residential area for a while. Song Yajing thoroughly enjoyed this slow-paced, completely relaxed atmosphere, free from any concerns about shop affairs.

events.name: Afternoon Family Walk and Shopping
events.description: The afternoon sun was just right, so the whole family went for a walk in a nearby park. On the way, they met their neighbors and exchanged New Year's greetings. After the walk, they went to the market together to buy some fresh fruits and snacks for entertaining relatives the next day.

events.name: Discussing Health Care Plans with Parents
events.description: In the evening, after Xuanxuan had fallen asleep, Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang sat in the living room with their parents for a gentle yet in-depth conversation. Instead of directly voicing her concerns, Song Yajing began by saying, "As your children, we are now in a better position and would like to arrange more comprehensive care for you." She then put forward several suggestions: first, inviting their parents to stay in Xiamen for a short period after the Lunar New Year and undergo a comprehensive health check-up; second, installing some simple safety handrails in their home in Quanzhou; and third, considering hiring a part-time cleaner to help with housework once a week. Initially, their father thought it was a waste of money, but with the persuasion of Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang, as well as the support of their mother, he eventually agreed to the health check-up and the consideration of hiring a part-time cleaner.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed and festive, enjoying the holiday laziness.

结束状态.心情: Feeling reassured and comforted, as a beneficial joint decision has been reached with the parents.

state.今日运动: Family park walk for approximately one hour.

date_attribute.holiday: Spring Festival

2025-01.daily_overview: The social day of the Spring Festival holiday. Gatherings with relatives are lively and heartwarming, serving as an important occasion for family bonding and emotional exchange. Meanwhile, individuals begin to make subtle psychological preparations for the work rhythm after the holiday ends, while their weight continues to increase.

events.name: Family Gathering with Relatives in Quanzhou
events.description: At noon, several close relatives of Song Yajing, including her aunt and uncle from Quanzhou, gathered at her parents' home, creating a lively atmosphere. The adults sat together chatting, with topics ranging from work and children to health and wellness. As the "entrepreneurship representative" who had returned from Xiamen, Song Yajing was naturally asked about the operation of her shop. She modestly shared some insights and also gained valuable life experiences from the elders. Meanwhile, the children played nearby.

events.name: A Sumptuous Family Feast and Heartfelt Conversations
events.description: Mother and aunts prepared two large tables of sumptuous hometown dishes. The gathering was filled with laughter and the clinking of glasses. Song Yajing felt the warmth of the big family reunion, an atmosphere that differed from her experience of living in a nuclear family in Xiamen. She specifically sent photos and videos of the gathering to her sister Song Yawen.

events.name: Afternoon Leisure and Organization
events.description: The relatives gradually left around three or four in the afternoon. After seeing off the guests, Song Yajing helped her mother clear the dishes and tidy up the living room. After that, she had little else to do, so she curled up on the sofa, browsing her phone and replying to New Year’s greetings from friends on WeChat, including Li Meiling, Wang Jia, and Vivian, a regular customer at her shop.

events.name: Make a simple plan for post-return matters.
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing briefly discussed with her husband the arrangements for their return trip the next day, as well as matters they would face immediately upon returning to Xiamen, such as the gynecological examination scheduled for early February and preparations for the business trip to Guangzhou. They only touched upon these topics lightly without delving into details, so as not to spoil the holiday mood.

events.name: Try a Morning Stroll in Quanzhou Park
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing took a 20-minute brisk walk in the park near her parents' home to maintain her exercise routine and adapt to the holiday environment.

起始状态.心情: The bustling anticipation of meeting relatives

结束状态.心情: Contentment and slight fatigue after the hustle and bustle, family affection fully recharged.

state.今日运动: Morning brisk walk for 20 minutes (Quanzhou Park), light household assistance.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with scattered light rain, temperature 14-18°C.
date_attribute.holiday: Spring Festival

2025-01.daily_overview: The last day of the Spring Festival holiday was spent in a faint sense of parting sorrow and drizzling rain. The morning was filled with companionship and packing before departure, while the afternoon saw the return to Xiamen. The scene and rhythm of life shifted back once again, preparing for the imminent resumption of normal work and daily routines, and reinforcing exercise habits.

events.name: Morning Brisk Walking in Quanzhou Park
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing took a 30-minute brisk walk in the park near her parents' home, incorporating intermittent speed intervals to solidify her exercise routine and enhance her cardiorespiratory endurance.

events.name: Family Breakfast and Companionship Before Departure
events.description: At breakfast, Mother got up early and prepared a lavish meal. The atmosphere during the meal was not as cheerful as in previous days, tinged with a sense of parting. Mother repeatedly reminded them to drive carefully on the road and to send a message upon arrival. Father didn’t say much but kept serving Xuanxuan with dishes. Song Yajing felt a pang of sadness in her heart, but she still smiled and agreed on the surface.

events.name: Packing and Farewell
events.description: After breakfast, Song Yajing and her husband began packing their luggage. Her mother insisted on stuffing some homemade rice cakes, fried snacks, and other food into their car. Before getting into the car, Song Yajing hugged her parents, reminded them once again to take care of their health, and promised to arrange their medical check-ups after the Spring Festival. As the car started, she watched from the rearview mirror as her parents stood at the doorway, waving, their figures gradually growing smaller.

events.name: Drive back to Xiamen.
events.description: On the way back, the weather turned cloudy and later a light rain began to fall. Since she had woken up early, Xuanxuan fell asleep shortly after getting in the car. Song Yajing and her husband chatted about their experiences in Quanzhou over the past few days, both feeling that this trip had been meaningful as they had engaged in in-depth conversations with their parents about health issues. She also sent a message in the family WeChat group to let everyone know they had arrived safely.

events.name: Arriving in Xiamen, Organizing and Transitioning
events.description: Arrived home safely in Xiamen in the afternoon. The family moved the luggage inside and organized the food brought back from Quanzhou into the refrigerator. With no one having stayed at home for several days, the house felt somewhat chilly. Song Yajing did a quick cleaning and changed the bedsheets. For dinner, they had a simple meal consisting of the food brought back from Quanzhou.

events.name: Preparation for Resuming Normal Routine
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing checked her phone's memo and confirmed there were no urgent matters scheduled for the next day (February 1st), with the main focus being rest and adjustment. She thought about her upcoming hospital checkup the day after tomorrow and her flight to Guangzhou the following day. The holiday had truly come to an end, and a new work cycle was about to begin.

起始状态.心情: A faint sense of parting sorrow and reluctance, yet feeling energetic after exercise.

结束状态.心情: Calm, slightly weary, having shifted back to the rhythm of daily family life, with a heart full of warm memories of reunion, and exercise habits now firmly established.

2025-02.daily_overview: On the fourth day of the first lunar month, Song Yajing's family enjoyed their Spring Festival reunion at her parents' home in Quanzhou. They celebrated the New Year in the morning, and in the afternoon, she engaged in a heartfelt conversation with her mother. Through this exchange, she became acutely aware of the tangible reality of her parents' aging, which intensified her sense of responsibility.

events.name: Family Reunion and In-depth Conversations During the Spring Festival
events.description: In the morning, I spent the Spring Festival with my parents, enjoying hometown dishes and sharing updates on our lives. In the afternoon, noticing my father's slow movements and hearing my mother express the hardships of caregiving, Song Yajing proposed the idea of inviting them to stay in Xiamen for a while. A sense of comfort and relief was visible in their eyes.

events.name: Preparing to bring back hometown specialties to Xiamen
events.description: In the evening, she helped her mother pack specialty foods such as Quanzhou rice dumplings and pastries. As they chatted, her mother repeatedly reminded her of various things, leaving Song Yajing with a mix of warmth and sorrow in her heart.

events.name: Family Outdoor Walk
events.description: After dinner, the whole family took a 30-minute walk in a nearby park, enjoying light exercise and family time. Song Yajing noticed her father walking slower than usual, which added to her concerns.

起始状态.心情: Warm and looking forward to spending the holiday with parents.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom in Parents' Home in Quanzhou (Licheng District)
结束状态.心情: Warm yet weighty, with a concrete awareness of parental aging and an intensifying sense of responsibility.

2025-02.daily_overview: On the last day of the Spring Festival holiday, I helped my parents with household chores, bid them farewell, and returned to Xiamen. During the journey back, I discussed the issue of my parents' elderly care with my husband and received preliminary support.

events.name: Bidding farewell to my parents and returning to Xiamen.
events.description: In the morning, I helped my parents with the thorough cleaning and once again noticed my father's declining strength. After the reunion lunch, I bid farewell as I drove away. My parents, reluctant to see me go, offered repeated words of caution. Song Yajing watched their figures grow smaller in the rearview mirror, her heart filled with concern.

events.name: Family Discussion on the Return Journey
events.description: On the highway, while confiding to her husband about her parents' changes and her mother's worries, Chen Zhiqiang expressed his support and suggested researching elderly care resources after returning to Xiamen. The two of them began to preliminarily discuss caregiving plans.

events.name: Contact store staff for store information.
events.description: During the break on the journey, I contacted the shop assistant Xiaomei via WeChat to confirm that the store was safe and would resume business tomorrow, briefly switching back to work mode.

events.name: Video call with parents to report being safe and sound.
events.description: After arriving home in the evening, Song Yajing video-called her parents to inform them of her safe arrival. Her mother reminded her to get enough rest, while her father offered a brief greeting. Song Yajing felt somewhat relieved, but her thoughts continued to linger on the issue of elderly care.

起始状态.心情: Reluctance, mingled with concern for parents' health

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Xiamen residence (No. 128, Hubin South Road, Siming District)
结束状态.心情: Fatigued, feeling somewhat relieved after reaching a consensus with my husband, yet still concerned about my parents.

The issue of my parents' elderly care was temporarily set aside but remained a constant background concern. I attempted a morning brisk walk but gave up due to fatigue.

events.name: Store Resumption of Business and Organization
events.description: In the morning, Xiao Mei and I opened the shop, cleaned, took inventory, handled customer inquiries, and shared Quanzhou pastries. The shop was filled with a fresh atmosphere after the New Year.

events.name: Plan Spring Procurement and Guangzhou Business Trip
events.description: During periods of low customer traffic in the afternoon, I reviewed fashion information, drafted a procurement list, decided to attend the Guangzhou trade fair, and communicated preliminary travel arrangements with supplier Susan via WeChat.

events.name: Attempted morning brisk walking but gave up.
events.description: I planned to go for a brisk walk in the morning, but due to fatigue and muscle soreness from the Spring Festival holiday, I gave up after only 10 minutes. Instead, I switched to doing light stretching exercises at home, feeling slightly discouraged.

events.name: Pay the shop rent for February
events.description: Paid rent to Landlady Sister Li via mobile banking before going to bed, a routine financial expenditure.

2025-02.daily_overview: Flew to Guangzhou for spring sourcing, conducted intensive sample viewing and screening throughout the day, collaborated efficiently with supplier Susan, engaged in informal discussions over dinner, and had a video call with family in the evening.

events.name: Arrived in Guangzhou to attend the spring ordering conference
events.description: Arriving in Guangzhou on an early morning flight, I met Susan at Baima Market. We moved through the exhibition halls to review sample garments, quickly exchanging ideas on styles and fabrics, and selected the first batch of spring new arrivals for photography and documentation.

events.name: Informal Business Networking Dinner
events.description: We had dinner together at a Cantonese restaurant in the evening, and the conversation extended from merchandise to spring trends, the impact of online platforms, and recent life updates. Susan shared customer feedback, which provided valuable insights.

events.name: Video call with family
events.description: After returning to the hotel, she had a video call with her husband and daughter. Their daughter showed her new drawing, while her husband inquired about the smoothness of her business trip. Song Yajing briefly shared her experiences and felt the warmth of family.

events.name: Handling Urgent Inquiries for the Store
events.description: Before dinner, Song Yajing received a WeChat message from her regular customer Vivian, inquiring about the arrival time of the new products. Song Yajing promptly replied and promised to notify her upon arrival, thereby maintaining the customer relationship.

起始状态.心情: Focus, with a procurement objective

结束状态.心情: Tired but fulfilled, with an excited mind pondering over the styles.

I happened to meet family doctor Wang Mingyuan, who offered words of comfort.

events.name: Decided to start morning brisk walking
events.description: Reviewing the day in the evening, I take proactive control of my life and decide to start a 30-minute brisk walk every Monday, Wednesday, and Friday morning from tomorrow. My husband supports family walks on weekends.

2025-02.daily_overview: The morning church volunteer service brought a sense of calm and fulfillment. In the afternoon, my husband and I had a deep conversation during our date, discussing our parents' elderly care and financial planning. We reached a consensus and clarified our tasks, turning family matters into a shared project.

events.name: Church Volunteer Service
events.description: Arrived at the church punctually in the morning, worked with other parishioners to organize the library and inventory Mass supplies. Focused on the tasks with inner peace and fulfillment. Upon completion, encountered Father Wang Mingde, who extended greetings and gratitude.

events.name: A date night with my husband.
events.description: In the evening, I entrusted my daughter to our neighbor Aunt Zhang and headed to an exquisite Minnan cuisine restaurant. Over a delightful meal, we discussed the recent situation of the shop, delved into the trial stay arrangements for our parents, conducted a financial assessment, and reached a consensus to form a task list.

events.name: Picking Up My Daughter and Bedtime Sharing
events.description: After the date, I picked up my daughter and thanked Auntie Zhang. After settling my daughter to sleep, we shared our thoughts on the date in the living room. I felt the burden was shared and the family bond strengthened. We agreed to maintain a monthly date.

events.name: Preliminary Organization of Assessment Considerations for Parents' Relocation
events.description: Before bed, create a new phone memo titled "Family Planning - Parents Co-living," documenting trial stay transition, detailed financial assessment, and key points for evaluating community environment, with clear direction.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, ready to serve and looking forward to the appointment.

结束状态.心情: Being pragmatic, steadfast, and full of direction, she feels supported through deep communication with her husband. Major family matters have transformed into joint planning, filling her heart with strength.

2025-02.daily_overview: On the last day of the Spring Festival holiday, Song Yajing's family was still immersed in the familial atmosphere of Quanzhou. In the morning, the entire family attended a heartwarming Mass, and in the afternoon, the couple engaged in a reflective conversation about their family "date" system. In the evening, she confirmed her willingness to participate in regular volunteer services with Aunt Lin from the church via WeChat. At the same time, observing her parents' advancing age, she quietly began to consider the idea of bringing them to live together in Xiamen. Before bed, she had a preliminary discussion with her husband, which turned intense and led to a slightly later bedtime.

events.name: Attend Sunday Mass
events.description: As a devout Catholic, Song Yajing, along with her parents, her husband Chen Zhiqiang, and their daughter Chen Lexuan, attended Sunday Mass at a church in their hometown of Quanzhou. They expressed gratitude for the peace and joy of the Spring Festival and prayed for blessings in the new year.

events.name: Reflecting on the 'Couple Date' System
events.description: After lunch, taking advantage of the quiet time while their parents accompanied their daughter for a nap, Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang brewed a pot of tea in the living room and had a brief conversation. They shared their feelings about the few "dates" they had before the New Year, both agreeing that this arrangement had indeed enhanced their mutual attention and emotional connection. Song Yajing suggested that after returning to Xiamen, they could try diversifying the forms of their dates, such as attending an online concert together or jointly exploring a new dessert recipe. Chen Zhiqiang expressed his agreement and made plans to implement these ideas upon their return.

events.name: Confirm Participation Willingness for Church Volunteer Service
events.description: After her first volunteer service experience before the Spring Festival, Song Yajing felt that regular service not only allowed her to practice her faith but also strengthened community connections. She expressed her desire to participate regularly in the monthly volunteer service to Aunt Lin (a church member) from the Xiamen Church via WeChat. Aunt Lin quickly replied, expressing a warm welcome and indicating that she would add Song Yajing’s name to the volunteer list.

events.name: The idea of having parents live together emerged.
events.description: The close interaction during the Spring Festival made Song Yajing more clearly aware of her parents' advancing age. While helping her mother tidy up the kitchen in the evening, she watched her mother's no-longer-upright figure and thought about how, although her parents had relatives and friends in Quanzhou, she would be unable to provide timely care in case of an emergency due to her distance in Xiamen. A strong sense of concern welled up in her heart. Before going to bed, she discussed this initial idea with her husband, Chen Zhiqiang. After listening, Chen Zhiqiang pondered for a moment, expressed understanding of her concerns, and suggested they could slowly learn more and make plans.

events.name: Staying up late due to family discussions.
events.description: While discussing the matter of my parents' relocation with my husband, I became emotionally agitated, which resulted in going to bed about half an hour later than usual and disrupted my sleep rhythm.

起始状态.所处地点: Parents' Home in Quanzhou (No. 45 North Xinhua Road, Licheng District)
起始状态.心情: Relaxed, warm, with a hint of reluctance as the holiday draws to a close.

结束状态.所处地点: Parents' Home in Quanzhou (45 North Xinhua Road, Licheng District)
结束状态.心情: Fulfilled and grateful, yet with an added layer of profound concern and slight anxiety about my parents' future.

2025-02.daily_overview: On the first day back in Xiamen, Song Yajing quickly shifted her life rhythm from holiday mode. In the morning, her gynecological examination results came back normal, which greatly encouraged her. She maintained her morning brisk walk and felt more energetic. In the afternoon, she organized spring clothing at the store to prepare for tomorrow's meeting with her regular customer Vivian. In the evening, she went to bed slightly earlier as part of her plan for a healthier diet.

events.name: Check and confirm gynecological examination results
events.description: Before the store opened in the morning, Song Yajing logged into the online service platform of Xiamen Community Hospital on her phone and anxiously checked the gynecological examination report from a week ago. Upon seeing that all indicators were normal, she breathed a sigh of relief, reviewed the results several times, and only then exited the platform with reassurance.

events.name: Sharing Good News with Mother
events.description: After receiving the results, Song Yajing immediately called her mother, Lin Xiuying, to share the good news that all the examination results were normal. Upon hearing this, her mother was greatly relieved, repeatedly saying "Thank the Lord for His protection," and reminded her daughter to prioritize regular health check-ups.

events.name: Schedule Annual Physical Examinations
events.description: Encouraged by the positive results of this examination, Song Yajing opened her phone calendar and added a reminder for an "annual gynecological check-up" in early February of the following year. She also began considering scheduling comprehensive health check-ups for the entire family.

events.name: Experience the Positive Changes of Morning Brisk Walking
events.description: Today is the day for her morning brisk walking routine. While walking briskly in the residential community, her steps were light and energetic, allowing her to easily complete the 30-minute session. She noticed increased energy levels and reduced anxiety during her morning work.

events.name: Preparing for New Customer Relationship Maintenance
events.description: When there were few customers in the shop in the afternoon, Song Yajing began organizing the newly arrived spring collection. She paid special attention to several dresses and blouses that suited the style of her regular customer Vivian, contemplating how to naturally initiate a conversation.

events.name: Preliminary Understanding of Long-Term Care Insurance
events.description: Before going to bed at night, Song Yajing was browsing a webpage on her phone when she came across an article about family financial planning in an aging society. She became interested in long-term care insurance and began searching for related information.

events.name: Daily Store Operations and Inventory Management
events.description: I was at the shop all day for routine operations, received several regular customers who had returned to work after the Spring Festival, and conducted a brief inventory of the sales accounts during the holiday period.

events.name: Plan a Healthy Dinner
events.description: Encouraged by the examination results, Song Yajing began planning a healthy dinner for the evening, deciding to prepare steamed fish and vegetables to reduce dining out.

起始状态.所处地点: Home (No. 128, South Hubin Road, Siming District, Xiamen City)
起始状态.心情: Slightly nervous (concerned about the test results), while also somewhat busy due to returning to daily routines.

结束状态.所处地点: Home (No. 128, South Hubin Road, Siming District, Xiamen City)
结束状态.心情: Feeling at ease and joyful, brimming with positive motivation for health management and career planning.

state.今日运动: 30-minute brisk walk in the morning

In the afternoon, she engaged in a deep conversation with her important regular client, Vivian, which went beyond mere business transactions and provided her with valuable customer insights. In the evening, she organized her new ideas, feeling that her career had gained another potential direction, though she returned home late due to a gathering with friends.

events.name: Attempt to bake a new recipe.
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing tried the modified tiramisu recipe recommended by her mother, which had reduced sugar content, and her family still enthusiastically finished it all.

events.name: Meeting with my best friend Li Meiling
events.description: I made a last-minute coffee appointment with my close friend Li Meiling in the evening to discuss parenting and fashion topics. The gathering lasted until quite late, resulting in a late night.

2025-02.daily_overview: A Wednesday centered on family care and practical actions. Song Yajing shared health updates with her husband and personally prepared a wholesome dinner. Meanwhile, she took a substantive step in long-term planning for her parents’ retirement—consulting a relative in the insurance industry. The morning brisk walk was slightly affected by rain.

events.name: Sharing the joyful news of the examination results with her husband
events.description: During breakfast, Song Yajing formally informed her husband Chen Zhiqiang that her gynecological examination results were completely normal. Upon hearing this, Chen Zhiqiang breathed a sigh of relief, smiled, and gently held her hand, suggesting they share the news with his mother over the weekend.

events.name: Procure ingredients for a healthy dinner.
events.description: In the late afternoon, shortly before closing time, Song Yajing went to the Zhongshan Road Fresh Market near the shop, carefully selecting fresh sea bass, broccoli, garlic, and brown rice.

events.name: Cooking Healthy Family Dinners
events.description: Returning home in the evening, Song Yajing tied on her apron and focused on preparing steamed sea bass, garlic broccoli, and brown rice, aiming for minimal oil and salt.

events.name: Enjoy and affirm healthy eating.
events.description: During dinner time, the family gathered around the dining table. Their daughter praised the steamed fish highly, Chen Zhiqiang found the garlic broccoli refreshing, and Song Yajing felt deeply satisfied.

events.name: Decision to Implement Regular Healthy Meals
events.description: After dinner, Song Yajing decided to incorporate healthy eating into her family's lifestyle, planning to arrange at least two nutritionally balanced meals per week.

events.name: Contact relatives in the insurance industry for consultation.

events.name: Adhere to morning brisk walking.
events.description: Today is Wednesday. As usual, I went for a brisk morning walk, but due to light rain, I completed 25 minutes on the indoor treadmill and felt steady in my pace.

events.name: Informing Family of Safety
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing sent WeChat messages to her husband Chen Zhiqiang and her mother Lin Xiuying respectively, informing them that she had safely arrived in Guangzhou and asking them not to worry.

events.name: Staying up late to organize procurement ideas
events.description: Due to contemplating tomorrow's procurement strategy and reviewing market information, I went to bed later than planned and feel slightly fatigued.

events.description: During the day at the store, I shared my experiences in Guangzhou with Xiaomei, began clearing out winter clothing inventory to make space for new spring arrivals, and informed customers that the spring collection would be launching soon.

events.description: To better monitor exercise effectiveness, I researched online and ordered a cost-effective fitness tracker.

events.name: Mild ankle sprain
events.description: While power walking on the Yundang Lake trail, I was distracted by my thoughts and accidentally stepped into a slight depression on the pavement, causing a mild sprain in my right ankle. There was brief pain and slight swelling. I immediately stopped exercising. After returning home, I applied ice and elevated the injured limb.

2025-02.daily_overview: The planning work shifted from online information gathering to offline field visits. Song Yajing braved the rain to personally visit potential rental properties near her home, using her footsteps to measure the future living environment for her parents. In the evening, she discussed the findings with her husband. Due to an ankle injury, she paused her morning brisk walks and switched to light activities.

events.name: Create a Financial Assessment Plan Form for Relocation
events.description: In the morning, I created a spreadsheet on the computer, designed three financial evaluation plans, input previously collected estimated data such as rent and living expenses, and established a preliminary financial model framework.

events.name: On-site inspection of rental properties
events.description: After closing the shop in the afternoon, I conducted on-site inspections of two properties with an umbrella: one was a second-floor unit without an elevator in an old residential complex, while the other was a newly built elevator apartment. I carefully examined the interior, lighting, and ventilation of each property and took detailed photographs.

events.name: Investigate surrounding living facilities
events.description: After viewing the property, take a walk around the surrounding area to confirm the locations and walking distances to places such as the grocery market, pharmacy, and bus stops, and assess the convenience for your parents' daily life.

events.name: Organizing Survey Materials and Preliminary Analysis
events.description: After returning home, I imported the photos and notes into the computer for organization, comparing the advantages and disadvantages of the two properties in terms of accessibility facilities, safety, and other aspects. I initially leaned toward the elevator apartment.

events.name: Discuss the inspection findings with the husband.
events.description: In the evening, the investigation materials and analysis were presented to her husband Chen Zhiqiang. The two engaged in an in-depth discussion regarding the rental budget and the comfort of the parents' living arrangements. Chen Zhiqiang placed greater emphasis on safety and leaned toward the option of an elevator apartment.

events.name: Design a Spring Season Display Adjustment Plan for the Store
events.description: Utilize fragmented time to integrate online course learnings and Guangzhou inspirations, developing a detailed spring display adjustment plan for the store, including window themes and color zoning.

events.name: Adjusting Exercise Due to Ankle Injury
events.description: The ankle sprain is still in the recovery phase. Fast walking is temporarily suspended and replaced with light stretching exercises at home to avoid aggravating the injury.

起始状态.所处地点: Home (No. 128, South Hubin Road, Siming District, Xiamen City)
起始状态.心情: Pragmatic, adopting the mindset of a "scout" preparing for an on-site inspection.

结束状态.所处地点: Home (No. 128, South Hubin Road, Siming District, Xiamen City)
结束状态.心情: The completion of the field survey brings a sense of solidity, and the plan has become more concrete. However, this is accompanied by a sober awareness of the financial pressure.

2025-02.daily_overview: The financial assessment has entered a critical stage. Song Yajing filled the forms with real data for stress testing; discussed retirement planning with her husband; began implementing the store display renovation; and had a video call with her sister to seek advice. She stayed up late due to intensive mental activities.

events.name: Conduct a Financial Stress Test for Relocation
events.description: Enter the store's revenue turnover for the past six months and the husband's salary income into the financial spreadsheet, calculate the family's average monthly net cash flow, simulate and evaluate the impact of new expenses on savings goals, and identify economic challenges.

events.name: Implement spring display renovation for the store.
events.description: Before the morning opening, I worked together with the staff member Xiaomei to rearrange the store display according to the plan: changing the window background, hanging clothes by color scheme, adjusting accessories and lighting, giving the store a fresh new look.

events.name: Organize key points of insurance consultation and discuss them in depth with the husband.
events.description: In the evening, I organized key points from insurance consultation information and conducted a strategic discussion with my husband Chen Zhiqiang regarding parental elderly care and long-term care insurance, reaching a consensus to incorporate it into long-term planning.

events.name: Video call with sister Song Yawen to seek advice.
events.description: Video called sister Song Yawen in Shenzhen to share relocation plans and financial test results. Sister suggested a 'phased implementation' approach and offered financial support, which made Song Yajing feel deeply warmed.

events.name: Due to the discussion about staying up late.
events.description: The in-depth communication with my husband and sister lasted until late, resulting in going to bed later than usual. I feel slightly fatigued but my thinking remains clear.

2025-02.daily_overview: The last day of February is a time for summarization, planning, and looking ahead. Song Yajing completed the financial assessment report for relocation, systematically summarized the insights gained from course studies, and planned the store operations for March. Morning brisk walks resumed, and the target weight was achieved. Sleep schedules were adjusted to align with healthy habits.

events.name: Prepare a Detailed Financial Assessment Report for Relocation
events.description: Based on data collection, investigation, and analysis, prepare a detailed financial evaluation report for internal family use, including an overview of the plan, a list of expenses, cash flow comparison, impact assessment, and feasibility conclusion.

events.name: Present the core content of the report to the husband.
events.description: In the evening, the core content of the report was presented to her husband Chen Zhiqiang. Chen Zhiqiang raised questions regarding the data assumptions, and the two agreed to engage in an in-depth discussion over the weekend to form a preliminary direction for a family resolution.

events.name: Determined to persist and expand healthy habits
events.description: After the morning brisk walk, I reflected on the positive changes brought by this habit, decided to maintain it long-term, and considered inviting my husband to join me for walks, integrating the concept of health into our family life.

events.name: Imparting new knowledge to the sales assistant Xiaomei
events.description: During the lunch break, share the dressing and styling techniques as well as display concepts learned from the course with Xiaomei, and encourage her to apply them when serving customers.

events.name: Organize Course Learning Summary and Practical Planning
events.description: Systematically organize course notes, test results, and practical insights, summarizing core takeaways such as data-driven product selection, planning and standardizing new displays, and collecting customer feedback.

events.name: Report the investigation findings to parents and solicit their feedback.
events.description: Reported the on-site inspection situation to parents via video call, showing photos of the property and videos of the surrounding environment. The parents indicated that the information was useful and would carefully consider it.

events.name: Schedule Professional Skin Care
events.description: Book a skin examination and consultation at a professional skincare center in Siming District, Xiamen through an online platform as a caring gift ahead of International Women's Day.

events.name: Learn about the new community waste sorting regulations
events.description: I saw a community notice in the neighborhood owners' WeChat group stating that Xiamen City will strengthen garbage classification enforcement starting March 1. I carefully read the guidelines and added it to my to-do list.

events.name: Plan the store operations for March
events.description: Formulate a preliminary plan for store operations in March: set sales targets, develop strategies for serving regular customers, and outline the initial concept for the "Member Spring Tea Party" event.

events.name: Resume morning brisk walking
events.description: The ankle has basically recovered. Today, I engaged in a light 20-minute brisk morning walk, focusing on warm-up and stretching, and felt good.

2025-03.daily_overview: Saturday was a day filled with a sense of accomplishment and family warmth. Song Yajing first completed her online fashion course, adding another building block to her professional knowledge base. In the afternoon and evening, her focus shifted entirely to family life, as she meticulously prepared for and welcomed her parents visiting from Quanzhou. The family shared the joy of a long-awaited reunion, basking in the warmth of togetherness and happiness.

events.name: Completion of Fashion History Course
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing completed the final module and assessment of her online fashion history course in her home study. She carefully summarized the key points of the course, paying particular attention to the section on the connection between the liberation of women's clothing in modern times and contemporary trends, finding it highly enlightening for guiding the product selection direction of her store. She downloaded the electronic certificate of completion from the platform, feeling a sense of fulfillment and satisfaction.

events.name: Plan the procurement list for the Guangzhou ordering conference
events.description: Taking advantage of the quiet afternoon at the shop, Song Yajing pulled up the sales data from the past few months on the computer behind the cash register. Combining her newly acquired knowledge of fashion history with the spring trend report, she began to organize the procurement list. She highlighted categories that needed replenishment, such as dresses, lightweight knitwear, and brightly colored accessories, and marked key contacts like Susan on the supplier list, planning to prioritize visits and in-depth discussions with them during the ordering meeting.

events.name: Preparing for Parents' Visit
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing and her husband Chen Zhiqiang drove to Xiamen North Railway Station to pick up her parents, Song Minghui and Lin Xiuying, who had arrived by high-speed train from Quanzhou. Upon returning to their home on Hubin South Road, Song Yajing had already tidied up the guest room and prepared a table of hearty Southern Fujian home-style dishes, including satay noodles, which her father loved, and steamed fish, a favorite of her mother. After dinner, the family gathered in the living room. The parents brought out specialties from Quanzhou, such as rice dumplings and thin noodles, as well as a new toy for their granddaughter, Lexuan. Everyone shared updates on their lives, filling the house with laughter and joy. Taking the opportunity, Song Yajing also mentioned to her parents that she was looking for nearby housing options to make it easier to care for them, an idea that was met with their understanding and support.

events.name: Slightly stayed up later due to excitement over the reunion.
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing went to bed later than usual due to the excitement of reuniting with her parents and their conversations, immersed in the warmth of family.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, with anticipation for the new day of learning and family reunion

结束状态.心情: Warm, content, and happy due to family reunions and the successful completion of learning goals.

state.今日运动: Accompanied my parents for an evening walk in the residential community for approximately 20 minutes.

2025-03.daily_overview: Sunday is a day dedicated to balancing faith, personal care, and family time. In the morning, attending church activities brings Song Yajing inner peace. In the afternoon, professional skincare sparks her new focus on self-image management. The evening spent with family remains as warm and comforting as always.

events.name: Attend Sunday Mass
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing went to church as usual to attend the Sunday Mass. Father Wang Mingde's sermon provided her with a moment of tranquility amidst her busy life. After the Mass, she had a brief conversation with fellow parishioner Auntie Lin, who inquired with concern about her parents' well-being.

events.name: Receive Professional Skin Examination and Care
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing arrived at the skincare center as scheduled. The consultant conducted a detailed skin analysis using professional equipment, pointing out that due to her long-term busy schedule between the shop and household responsibilities, her skin exhibited mild dryness and early signs of texture issues. Subsequently, she received a targeted deep cleansing and moisturizing treatment, during which she felt thoroughly relaxed.

events.name: Customize and initiate a personal skincare regimen.
events.description: After the treatment, the consultant tailored a regimen for Song Yajing, which included at-home products and regular in-store treatments, based on her skin condition and her identity as a shop owner (requiring long hours of wearing makeup). Recognizing the importance of self-care, Song Yajing immediately purchased the recommended anti-aging serum and high-performance moisturizing cream, committing to follow the plan diligently.

events.name: Initiate the home skincare routine
events.description: During her evening skincare routine, Song Yajing used her newly purchased products in the order of cleanser, essence, and moisturizer for the first time, finding her skin feeling moisturized and smooth. She incorporated this new step into her nightly fixed regimen.

events.name: Browsing fashion and beauty information before bedtime.
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing browsed fashion information on her phone and specifically searched for content related to [basic skincare steps] and [spring skincare for sensitive skin]. This deepened her understanding of scientific skincare, and she bookmarked several useful articles.

events.name: Due to relaxation and early bedtime
events.description: Due to the day off on Sunday and the sense of relaxation after skincare, Song Yajing decided to rest early to regain energy.

起始状态.心情: Anning, prepare to embrace a fulfilling day of rest.

结束状态.心情: Pleasant and full of anticipation, feeling fresh and positive about the newly started skincare plan.

state.今日运动: It takes about 15 minutes to walk home from the church.

2025-03.daily_overview: Monday marked a return to the work routine, with the core task being to ensure the smooth operation of the store during the Guangzhou trip. Song Yajing meticulously handed over work duties to Xiaomei, continued advancing the implementation of the new waste sorting regulations at home, and monitored the initial effects of the new skincare products, maintaining a tight yet orderly schedule.

events.name: Weekly Store Inventory and Planning at the Beginning of the Week
events.description: Upon arriving at the store in the morning, Song Yajing first reviewed the weekend sales records with Xiaomei and conducted a brief inventory check. Based on the sales data, she repositioned several well-received spring outfits to prominent spots in the store and outlined the key promotional focus for the week.

events.name: Handover of Work Arrangements During Business Trip
events.description: During the lunch break, Song Yajing and Xiaomei sat in the store's rest area to discuss in detail her three-day absence arrangements. She clearly assigned daily sales, VIP client maintenance, inventory management, and even simple account reconciliation tasks to Xiaomei. She also provided emergency contact information and repeatedly emphasized several key matters to ensure Xiaomei could handle responsibilities independently.

events.name: Observe the initial effects of skincare and learn
events.description: While washing up in the morning, Song Yajing specifically observed her skin condition and felt it was more moisturized than before. In the evening, she watched a video by a beauty blogger to learn massage techniques for applying essence and cream, aiming to enhance the absorption of her skincare products.

events.name: Learn the new regulations on garbage classification
events.description: After dinner, Song Yajing carefully read the community-issued waste sorting guide, paying special attention to items that are easily confused, such as palm leaves and large bones, which belong to other waste. She also consulted the electronic version of the regulations through the [Xiamen Municipal Affairs] WeChat public account to deepen her understanding.

events.name: Planning Household Implementation of Waste Sorting
events.description: Building on her learning, Song Yajing began planning the types and quantities of trash bins needed for her home, and considered how to explain these new rules to her husband and daughter, aiming to complete the hardware preparations by this weekend.

events.name: Slight insomnia due to travel anxiety
events.description: Due to concerns about the Guangzhou trip and a multitude of affairs, Song Yajing found it difficult to fall asleep at night, with her mind in disarray, which affected the quality of her sleep.

起始状态.心情: Awake, with the drive of a new week and thoughts about the business trip arrangements.

结束状态.心情: Slightly fatigued and anxious, the work handover has been completed, but personal stress has increased.

2025-03.daily_overview: Tuesday revolved around parenting, social engagements, and family matters. Conversations with close friends led to new attempts at introducing English to her daughter, while discussions with neighbors deepened her understanding of the community's new regulations. At the same time, she began detailed planning for her parents' relocation and procurement needs, showcasing Song Yajing's multifaceted roles as a mother, friend, and daughter.

events.name: Sharing Parenting Experiences with Close Friends
events.description: During the lunch break, Song Yajing chatted with her close friend Li Meiling, an elementary school teacher, on WeChat. Li Meiling shared her experience of using an English story app to introduce children to English learning and recommended an app she considered to have high-quality content and strong interactivity.

events.name: Research and download children's English learning apps.
events.description: With few customers in the store before closing time, Song Yajing searched for the app recommended by her close friend in the mobile application store. She carefully reviewed its ratings, user feedback, and content description, and after confirming its suitability for children around five years old, she decided to download it for a trial, hoping to enhance her daughter's interest in English.

events.name: Launch the Parent-Child English Story Co-listening Program
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing communicated with her daughter Le Xuan and suggested listening to English stories together every night before bedtime. Her daughter found the idea novel and happily agreed. Song Yajing opened the app, and together with her daughter, they selected "Charlotte's Web" as the first series and set a listening duration of 15 minutes.

events.name: Deepen knowledge of waste sorting and enhance community interaction
events.description: After dinner, Song Yajing watched a local news report on the new waste sorting regulations via her phone. Later, she saw a question from her neighbor Aunt Zhang in the community WeChat group. The two discussed how to classify [used pet pee pads] and together found the answer in the official guidelines.

events.name: Simulated Waste Sorting Practice
events.description: Taking advantage of the opportunity to clear the table, Song Yajing brought her daughter along, holding items such as orange peels, yogurt containers, and used tissues. They referred to the guidelines to simulate sorting, allowing her daughter to participate in this upcoming new family habit.

events.name: Planning a Relocation Shopping List for Parents
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing called her mother to inquire in detail about the furniture, appliances, and living habits in their newly rented home. Based on her observations, she began listing items to purchase for her parents in her phone's memo, such as an electric rice cooker and warm homewear, and made a preliminary budget estimate.

events.name: Adjusting the schedule due to the daughter's mild cold.
events.description: When her daughter Lexuan showed mild cold symptoms, Song Yajing arranged for her to rest early and also prepared to go to bed earlier herself in order to care for her daughter.

起始状态.心情: Calmly contemplating the day's schedule.

结束状态.心情: Full of substance and hope, yet tinged with concern for the daughter's health.

2025-03.daily_overview: The focus of Wednesday's work was to make final preparations for the upcoming trip to Guangzhou. Song Yajing refined the procurement list and booked flight tickets and a hotel. Meanwhile, she also took the time to purchase basic skincare products, completing the final piece of her personal care routine.

events.name: Refine the procurement strategy for the Guangzhou ordering conference
events.description: After the shop closed, Song Yajing sat in her home study, carefully reviewing the procurement list on her computer. Based on the best-selling data from Monday's inventory check, she categorized and labeled the list into [Essential Restock], [New Product Trials], and [Accessory Supplements]. She also prepared specific talking points for the key suppliers she planned to visit, particularly Susan.

events.name: Book Guangzhou travel itinerary, flights, and hotels.
events.description: After finalizing the list, Song Yajing began comparing flights to Guangzhou using a mobile app. Considering the trade fair schedule and the need to pick up her children, she ultimately booked flights departing on the afternoon of Monday, March 10 and returning on the evening of March 12. Following that, she made an online reservation at a business hotel in Liwan District, close to the wholesale market, opting for a room type with free cancellation.

events.name: Procurement of Basic Skincare Products
events.description: Taking advantage of the low customer flow in the afternoon, Song Yajing asked her assistant Xiaomei to look after the shop and quickly walked to the cosmetics counter on Zhongshan Road. Based on her skin type and prior research, she purchased a gentle amino acid cleanser and a daily sunscreen with an appropriate SPF, completing her daytime skincare routine of [cleansing-moisturizing-sun protection].

events.name: Staying up late to check the list due to work pressure.
events.description: To ensure nothing went wrong, Song Yajing stayed up late at night to double-check the procurement list and itinerary, which delayed her bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Focused, with thoughts of various pending tasks before the business trip running through the mind.

结束状态.心情: Relieved but weary, the main pre-departure preparations are now complete.

2025-03.daily_overview: Thursday was spent on the daily operations of the shop, the consolidation of new habits, and the progress of household affairs. Song Yajing successfully completed several sales, initiated her daughter's English learning app, strictly adhered to her evening skincare routine, and made material preparations for household waste sorting.

events.name: Daily Store Sales and Customer Maintenance
events.description: In the morning, regular customer Vivian visited the store, and Song Yajing enthusiastically recommended several newly arrived spring outfits to her. The two also chatted about baking recipes they had recently tried. In the afternoon, Song Yajing sent pictures of new products and greetings to several VIP customers via WeChat to maintain good client relationships.

events.name: Successful Recommendations for Interview Attire
events.description: A young girl who appeared somewhat nervous entered the store and asked what would be appropriate to wear for an interview. Song Yajing patiently inquired about the company and position she was interviewing for, then put together a suitable yet vibrant outfit consisting of a light-colored blouse and a matching suit skirt. She also explained the techniques for selecting colors and styles. The girl was very satisfied and purchased the outfit on the spot.

events.name: Officially Commence Parent-Child English Listening Together
events.description: Song Yajing downloaded and registered the Children's English Story App on her phone. In the evening, she kept her promise and accompanied her daughter Lexuan in listening to the first story, "The Very Hungry Caterpillar." She provided simple explanations in Chinese while her daughter was captivated by the vibrant illustrations and engaging plot.

events.name: Adhere to the evening skincare routine.
events.description: During her evening cleansing routine, Song Yajing meticulously completed the full process of removing makeup, cleansing her face, applying serum, and moisturizing with cream. She felt that the new skincare products absorbed quickly, leaving her skin soft to the touch, which further motivated her to maintain her skincare regimen.

events.name: Purchase of household waste sorting bins
events.description: During the lunch break, Song Yajing went to a nearby home goods store, where she selected and purchased a four-category pedal-operated trash bin (kitchen waste, recyclable, hazardous, and other) in accordance with the new regulations, along with differently colored label stickers.

events.name: Design and Post Household Sorting Guidelines
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing designed and printed a simple, clear, and illustrated guide for garbage classification on her computer, following the official guidelines. She posted the guide on the side of the refrigerator in the kitchen and placed new garbage bins in their corresponding positions, preparing to conduct a formal "training" session for her family over the weekend.

events.name: Managing Emotional Fluctuations in Handling Minor Customer Complaints
events.description: In the afternoon, a customer expressed slight dissatisfaction due to size issues. After patiently resolving the matter, Song Yajing experienced a slight emotional fluctuation and felt the pressure of managing the business.

结束状态.心情: A sense of accomplishment tinged with slight fatigue, sales proceeding smoothly, new habits initiated.

2025-03.daily_overview: Friday was the final preparation day before the Women's Day promotion and also the day for purchasing supplies for her parents' relocation. Song Yajing was spinning like a top between store arrangements and supply procurement. In the evening, she still had to explain garbage classification to her family, which consumed a great deal of both physical and mental energy.

events.name: Final preparations for the Women's Day promotion
events.description: In the morning when customer traffic was low, Song Yajing and Xiaomei worked together to set up the shop. They changed the window mannequins, hung up posters for "Spring Renewal" and "Women's Day Special Offers," checked and ensured sufficient stock for all promotional styles, creating a strong festive shopping atmosphere.

events.name: Centralized procurement of relocation supplies for parents
events.description: After finishing the store setup, Song Yajing immediately headed to a nearby large supermarket. Following her list, she purchased a series of daily necessities such as an electric rice cooker, a thermal flask, cotton slippers, and kitchen cleaning tools, filling her shopping cart to the brim.

events.name: Explaining the rules of garbage classification to family members
events.description: After dinner, Song Yajing gathered her husband and daughter, took out the printed classification guide and the newly purchased trash bins, and held a brief "family meeting." She explained in detail the distinctions between the four categories of waste, specifically pointing out commonly mistaken items in their household. Her husband, Chen Zhiqiang, expressed his willingness to cooperate, while their daughter felt it was like playing a game.

events.name: Review the content of the Fashion History course.
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing took a moment to review the characteristics of Italian Renaissance clothing from her fashion history course. She was deeply impressed by the luxurious fabrics and the concept of showcasing the natural beauty of the human body, and she contemplated how to apply this idea of "ornate simplicity" to the spring display in her store.

events.name: Neglecting morning walks due to busyness.
events.description: Due to the numerous promotional preparations and procurement tasks, Song Yajing did not go for her morning brisk walk today, temporarily setting aside her exercise routine.

起始状态.心情: Busy and somewhat stressed, preoccupied with the two major tasks of promotion and procurement.

结束状态.心情: Physically exhausted but mentally relaxed, the main task is completed.

state.今日运动: Supermarket procurement and item transportation involve significant physical exertion.

date_attribute.weather: The sun is shining brightly, and the spring breeze is gentle—a perfect spring day.

2025-03.daily_overview: Saturday witnessed the peak sales of Women's Day, with the store exceptionally busy. Song Yajing spent the entire day immersed in the fast-paced rhythm of receiving customers and completing sales. In the evening, parent-child English listening became her most heartwarming moment of relaxation after a tiring day, as the new habit quietly solidified.

events.name: Coping with the Sales Peak on Women's Day
events.description: On International Women's Day, Zhongshan Road Pedestrian Street was bustling with crowds. Song Yajing's shop had a steady stream of customers from the moment it opened in the morning. She and Xiaomei were extremely busy, warmly greeting customers, recommending outfits, assisting with fittings, and handling payments. Song Yajing noticed that brightly colored knitwear and dresses were particularly popular. While making sales, she quietly took note of this market feedback.

events.name: Observe the effect of new spring displays
events.description: Despite her busy schedule, Song Yajing still found time to observe customers' reactions to the renewed window display and in-store arrangements from the previous day. She noticed that many passersby paused in front of the shop window, and upon entering the store, they often lingered in the new themed display area. Several regular customers praised the shop for looking more vibrant with the spirit of spring, which brought her a sense of satisfaction.

events.name: Adhere to parent-child English listening and sharing.
events.description: In the evening, despite feeling very tired, Song Yajing still insisted on accompanying her daughter Lexuan in listening to an English story. Today, they chose the "Brown Bear" series, and her daughter happily imitated the sounds of the animals. Before going to bed, Song Yajing shared her initial experience of using the app with her close friend Li Meiling on WeChat, thanking her for the recommendation and sharing her daughter's positive reaction.

events.name: Exchanging parenting experiences with my husband
events.description: During a break, Song Yajing mentioned to her husband Chen Zhiqiang about English language initiation, believing that this parent-child listening approach was excellent as it not only facilitated learning but also strengthened their bond. Chen Zhiqiang expressed his support and agreed to join in when he had time on the weekends.

events.name: Celebrated late into the night with friends due to a successful promotion.
events.description: After the sales event concluded, Song Yajing called her close friend Li Meiling to celebrate their success. They chatted late into the night, which caused her bedtime to be delayed.

起始状态.心情: Filled with fighting spirit, ready to embrace a busy and challenging day.

结束状态.心情: Physically exhausted to the extreme, yet filled with a sense of accomplishment and satisfaction in the heart.

state.今日运动: Constantly moving and standing throughout the day in the store, with almost no rest.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with higher temperatures in the afternoon.

2025-03.daily_overview: Sunday is a family day and also a coordination day before a business trip. Song Yajing accompanied her parents to familiarize themselves with the community environment, had detailed discussions with her husband about family responsibilities during her absence, and taught her daughter how to sort waste through games. The fulfilling yet trivial household affairs made her feel the weight of responsibility on her shoulders.

events.name: Accompany parents to familiarize themselves with the community environment.
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing and her mother Lin Xiuying took their daughter Lexuan to accompany her father Song Minghui for a walk around the residential area and its surroundings. They familiarized themselves with the locations of the food market, convenience store, community activity center, and nearby small park. On the way, they encountered their enthusiastic neighbor Aunt Zhang, who got along well with Song Yajing’s mother and shared many interesting stories about the community.

events.name: Communicating with Husband about Household Responsibilities During Business Trip
events.description: After dinner, Song Yajing and her husband Chen Zhiqiang sat down to discuss in detail the arrangements for her three-day business trip. It was decided that Chen Zhiqiang would be responsible for taking their daughter to and from kindergarten, and preparing simple dinners or bringing meals from his parents' home. Song Yajing would check in daily via video call to stay updated on the situation at home.

events.name: Selecting Safe and Warm Supplies for Parents
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing took some time to visit a home goods store, carefully selecting a non-slip bath mat and handrails to enhance safety for her parents' new home. She also chose a vibrant pot of pothos, hoping to bring a touch of greenery to the new environment.

events.name: Playing a garbage sorting game with my daughter.
events.description: Song Yajing designed a simple sorting game using cards with images of various types of trash and new trash bins at home. She taught her five-year-old daughter, Lexuan, to identify which colored bin to put [banana peels], [plastic water bottles], and [used batteries] into. Her daughter enjoyed the game immensely and memorized the basic rules through play.

events.name: Explaining the New Waste Sorting Regulations to Parents
events.description: While her parents were present, Song Yajing patiently explained to them in the Minnan dialect the upcoming strict waste sorting regulations in Xiamen. She also referred to the diagram posted in the kitchen to detail the disposal requirements for different types of waste, ensuring her parents could adapt as quickly as possible.

events.name: Organize and mail the items purchased for parents.
events.description: Song Yajing carefully packed all the items purchased for her parents and arranged for a courier service to send them to Quanzhou. She sent the tracking number to her mother via WeChat and reminded them to check whether the electrical appliances were intact upon receipt.

events.name: Weight gain due to family gatherings
events.description: The whole family went out for dinner, and Song Yajing consumed a high amount of high-calorie food, resulting in a slight increase in weight.

起始状态.心情: Relax and enjoy the leisurely weekend morning and family time.

结束状态.心情: At ease yet with a slight sense of concern, family affairs are properly arranged.

state.今日运动: Accompanied family members for a walk for approximately one hour in total during the morning and afternoon.

date_attribute.weather: Xiamen: Sunny; Guangzhou: Warm and humid

2025-03.daily_overview: On Monday, Song Yajing embarked on her spring procurement trip to Guangzhou. In the morning, she made final preparations at her home in Xiamen before flying to Guangzhou in the afternoon and checking into a hotel. This day marked a shift in space and context, transitioning from her roles as a homemaker and shop owner to that of a focused buyer.

events.name: Packing luggage and materials for a business trip
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing carefully packed her luggage at home. In addition to personal clothing and a toiletry bag, she deliberately placed the organized procurement list, supplier business cards, printed sales data analysis reports for the stores, a laptop, and a power bank into her carry-on backpack, ensuring all work materials were complete.

events.name: First Day of Guiding Households to Practice Waste Sorting
events.description: After breakfast while handling kitchen waste, Song Yajing specifically involved her daughter Le Xuan, teaching her to discard eggshells into the green kitchen waste bin and to rinse milk cartons before placing them in the blue recycling bin. She encouraged her daughter to be a "little supervisor," checking whether her father sorted the waste correctly.

events.name: Arrived in Guangzhou and checked in.
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing flew from Xiamen Gaoqi Airport to Guangzhou Baiyun Airport, and then took a taxi to her reserved hotel. After settling into her hotel room, she reviewed the procurement materials once again, charged her phone and computer, and prepared herself for the procurement meeting that would begin in the afternoon.

events.name: Relax by reading fashion magazines on the plane.
events.description: During the flight, Song Yajing browsed through the fashion magazines provided on the plane, both relaxing her mind and gathering industry information.

起始状态.心情: Slightly excited and nervous, about to embark on an important procurement trip.

结束状态.心情: The journey was tiring but the goal is clear, and I have now switched to work mode.

state.今日运动: Walking within the airport and handling luggage involve a certain level of physical activity.

2025-03.daily_overview: Immersed in the Guangzhou Spring Garment Order Fair throughout the day, Song Yajing successfully met with her key supplier, Susan. They navigated the vast exhibition hall, using their professional expertise to select styles, compare prices, and record information, all in search of the best sources for the store's spring inventory. Their minds remained in a state of high-speed operation.

events.name: First Day of the Ordering Conference: Meeting with Key Suppliers and Preliminary Screening
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing arrived at the main exhibition hall of the order fair and successfully met with Susan, her pre-arranged main supplier. Susan warmly guided her through the exhibition. As they viewed the new collections, they exchanged views on this year's spring fashion colors (such as lilac purple and mint green) and market trends. Song Yajing took photos of the styles that interested her with her phone and noted down the preliminary item numbers and prices in her notebook.

events.name: Remote Monitoring of Household Waste Sorting Practices
events.description: During the lunch break, Song Yajing inquired about the household waste sorting situation via the WeChat family group. Her husband, Chen Zhiqiang, sent a photo showing that the trash bins were mostly correct, but a plastic yogurt lid had been misplaced. Song Yajing corrected the mistake with a smile and reiterated that clean plastics belong to recyclable waste.

events.name: Evening Review Courses Integrated with Business Operations
events.description: Returning to the hotel in the evening, Song Yajing felt somewhat tired but quite rewarded. She opened her computer, reviewed the styles she had seen during the day, and connected them with the previously studied course content on member management and improving repurchase rates. She then contemplated how to integrate the newly purchased products with the shop's customer retention activities.

events.name: Meeting with former colleagues for communication at the order fair.
events.description: At the exhibition hall, I unexpectedly ran into my former colleague Sun Li. We briefly exchanged views on industry trends, and Song Yajing gained some new insights.

起始状态.心情: Energetic and eager, ready to showcase their capabilities at the order meeting.

结束状态.心情: Physically exhausted but mentally exhilarated, I saw many excellent styles.

state.今日运动: Walking through the vast exhibition hall of the order fair for over six hours resulted in an astonishing number of steps.
