2025-03.daily_overview: On the second and final day of the ordering conference, Song Yajing conducted more in-depth style comparisons and price negotiations, ultimately finalizing orders with suppliers such as Susan. In the evening, she shared a warm video call with her daughter before bedtime, achieving a balance between career and family from thousands of miles away.

events.name: The Day After the Order Meeting: In-Depth Comparison and Negotiations
events.description: Song Yajing spent the entire day at the exhibition hall, meticulously exploring each major exhibition area. She compared the fabrics, craftsmanship, and prices of similar styles from different suppliers, carefully calculating costs and expected profits using a calculator. For the styles of interest, she engaged in multiple rounds of communication and price negotiations with several suppliers.

events.name: Sign the Spring Procurement Order
events.description: Before the evening order meeting concluded, Song Yajing held final negotiations with several key suppliers, including Susan. Based on two days of inspections and data analysis, she finalized the procurement styles, quantities, prices, and the initial delivery schedule. The order contracts were signed on the spot, allowing her to finally feel a weight lifted off her shoulders.

events.name: Video Parent-Child Listening
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing contacted her family via WeChat video. Her daughter Lexuan excitedly showed her the drawing she had made that day. Before bedtime, Song Yajing remotely accompanied her daughter in listening to the English story "Panda Bear, Panda Bear, What Do You See?" from an app by sharing her phone screen. Although she could not be physically present, hearing her daughter's laughter brought her great comfort.

events.name: Irregular eating habits due to negotiation pressure
events.description: Engaged in negotiations, Song Yajing had a simple lunch, which led to hunger in the evening and the consumption of extra snacks.

起始状态.心情: Calm and focused, with the determination to accomplish the procurement objectives.

结束状态.心情: A great sense of accomplishment and relief, but with a slight feeling of fatigue.

2025-03.daily_overview: After completing the procurement tasks in Guangzhou, Song Yajing returned to Xiamen with a sense of fulfillment and exhaustion. In the afternoon, she went back to the shop, promptly updated Xiaomei on the information, and dealt with the backlog of work. The feedback from her parents also made her feel that her efforts were worthwhile.

events.name: Returning to Xiamen from Guangzhou
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing flew back to Xiamen from Guangzhou. On the plane, she took a short nap to make up for the sleep deprivation she had experienced over the past few days. Upon arriving in Xiamen, she was eager to return home and took a taxi directly back to her shop on Zhongshan Road.

events.name: Communicate the Gains from the Order Fair to Store Staff
events.description: In the afternoon, upon returning to the store, Song Yajing showed Xiao Mei the new catalogs and samples she had brought, enthusiastically sharing her experiences from the recent ordering conference, the key styles she had purchased, and the estimated arrival times. She also handled the backlog of inventory entry forms and customer messages that had accumulated during her days away.

events.name: Follow up on parents' usage of new items.
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing received a video call from her mother, Lin Xiuying, who was in Quanzhou. Her mother happily told her that the package had arrived, the rice cooker was working well, the pothos plant had been placed on the balcony, and the bathroom handrail had made her father feel much more at ease. Hearing her parents' approval, Song Yajing felt a warm glow in her heart.

events.name: Relax and go to bed early after returning home.
events.description: Due to travel fatigue, Song Yajing decided to rest early to regain her energy.

起始状态.心情: Eager to return home, carrying the relaxation after completing the task and a hint of travel weariness.

结束状态.心情: The sense of reassurance upon finally returning to a familiar environment, mingled with exhaustion.

state.今日运动: Airports, the hustle and bustle of travel.

2025-03.daily_overview: Friday's rhythm returned to daily operations and family life. Song Yajing restocked based on sales data, reserved new products for VIP clients, and in the evening, she enjoyed the therapeutic moments brought by baking in the kitchen, sharing the joy of success with friends in the baking community.

events.name: Supplement orders based on sales data.
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing reviewed the detailed sales data from Women's Day to the present. Noticing that several styles of knitwear and skirts were almost sold out, she immediately contacted Susan, the supplier in Guangzhou, via WeChat to place a replenishment order and reconfirmed the shipping schedule for the previous large order.

events.name: Reserve new arrivals for regular customers.
events.description: Song Yajing remembered that her regular customer Vivian preferred French minimalist style. She selected several styles suitable for Vivian from the new catalog she brought back from Guangzhou, took photos, and sent them to her via WeChat with the message, "I've reserved your size. Come try them on when you have time," to maintain the client relationship.

events.name: Preparing for a weekend family picnic
events.description: Song Yajing planned to have a picnic with her family in the park over the weekend. In the evening, she prepared food in the kitchen, making sandwiches, washing strawberries and blueberries, and attempting to bake a tiramisu cake. Her husband, Chen Zhiqiang, helped prepare the picnic mat and utensils.

events.name: Attempt to bake a French lemon tart.
events.description: In addition to picnic cakes, Song Yajing also wanted to challenge herself with more complex desserts. Following the recipe shared by her baking instructor, Master Chen, she checked the ingredients at home and found that fresh lemons and almond flour were missing. She then took some time in the afternoon to go to the supermarket and purchase all the necessary items.

events.name: Bake and share online with fellow enthusiasts.
events.description: After gathering all the ingredients, Song Yajing began making lemon tarts in the kitchen. It took her over two hours, from preparing the tart crust to cooking the lemon curd. Once the finished product was out of the oven, she carefully arranged it on a plate, took photos, and shared them in the baking WeChat group with Master Chen, Mrs. Liu, and others. She received many likes and compliments, which made her very happy.

events.name: Elated by the success of baking
events.description: The success of the lemon tart left Song Yajing in a joyful mood, and she went to bed later than usual, immersed in a sense of accomplishment.

起始状态.心情: Having rested well and regained some energy, I am ready to tackle the backlog of work and enjoy the eve of the weekend.

结束状态.心情: Feeling joyful and accomplished, the work progresses smoothly, and the successful baking brings immense satisfaction.

state.今日运动: Supermarket procurement, standing in the kitchen for approximately 2.5 hours to prepare baked goods.

2025-03.daily_overview: Saturday was the perfect day for family and personal affairs. In the morning, three generations of the family enjoyed a pleasant picnic in the park. In the afternoon, Song Yajing efficiently completed her annual personal income tax settlement. In the evening, her daughter's progress in English listening practice made her feel that all the efforts were worthwhile.

events.name: Family Picnic at Egret Islet Park
events.description: In the morning, the family of three, Song Yajing and her parents, drove to Egret Island Park. They found a sunny patch of lawn, spread out a picnic mat, and enjoyed the food they had prepared. Song Yajing specifically called her parents, who live in the same neighborhood, inviting them to join for a walk. The parents arrived quickly, bringing their homemade pickled vegetables. The three generations chatted while eating, creating a joyful and harmonious atmosphere. After the picnic, the whole family took a walk in the park to engage in light physical activity.

events.name: Complete the annual individual income tax final settlement.
events.description: After returning home from the picnic, Song Yajing logged into the Individual Income Tax APP during her lunch break. She carefully reviewed the pre-filled income data in the system and entered the special additional deduction information item by item, including children's education, support for elderly parents (both over 60 years old), and housing loan interest. The system calculated that a small amount of tax needed to be paid. After verifying the information, she confirmed the declaration, completed the online payment, and then sent a screenshot of the electronic receipt to her husband.

events.name: Enjoy Parent-Child Listening Together and Witnessing Daughter's Progress
events.description: During their nightly English story session before bed, Song Yajing was pleasantly surprised to find that her daughter could follow the rhythm of the story and vaguely mimic simple words like "bear" and "bird." She immediately encouraged her daughter and shared this joy with her husband, feeling that their daily persistence was beginning to show results.

events.name: Launch of Monthly Store Operations Review
events.description: Late at night, after her family had gone to sleep, Song Yajing turned on her computer in the study. She began organizing the sales data, expenditure records, and new purchase orders from March onward. This was her routine at the end of each month—reviewing the details to identify issues, plan for the upcoming month, and lay the groundwork for achieving the goal of increasing turnover.

events.name: Staying up late due to contemplating and reflecting.
events.description: Contemplating the management of her shop and the relocation of her parents, Song Yajing fell asleep later than usual, reflecting a departure from her previously healthy sleep pattern.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed and happy, looking forward to outdoor time with family.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilled, tranquil, and hopeful, with a happy family and personal affairs all settled.

state.今日运动: In the morning, we had a picnic in the park, took a walk, and spent time playing with the children, with a moderate level of physical activity.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy turning to clear, with temperatures rising, typical spring weather in Xiamen.

2025-03.daily_overview: This Sunday was dedicated to making final preparations for her parents' relocation while maintaining a balance in her personal life. Song Yajing enjoyed quality family time while methodically advancing the online sales of her store and managing her personal health.

events.name: Parent-Child English Enlightenment and Personal Relaxation
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing fulfilled her nightly parent-child ritual by listening to the English version of *Cinderella* with her daughter, Chen Lexuan. This activity served not only as an introduction to English for her daughter but also allowed Song herself to immerse in the classic tale. For about fifteen minutes, she temporarily set aside the trivial matters of her shop and the busy preparations for relocation, enjoying a peaceful moment of parent-child bonding.

events.name: Instructional Guide for Household Hazardous Waste Disposal
events.description: While tidying up at home over the weekend, Song Yajing discovered some expired medications and old batteries while organizing the family medicine cabinet and miscellaneous items. She called her daughter over and demonstrated how to place these items separately into sealed bags before solemnly depositing them into the red [hazardous waste] bin. At the same time, she explained to her daughter the potential harm to the environment and health from discarding such items carelessly, thereby fostering her daughter's environmental awareness from a young age.

events.name: Official Launch Ceremony for Household Waste Classification
events.description: After dinner, Song Yajing gathered her husband Chen Zhiqiang and their daughter for a brief [family meeting] in the living room. She presented a printed copy of the Xiamen Municipal Waste Sorting Guide, explaining the distinctions and disposal requirements for the four categories of waste in simple and understandable language. She announced that the family would officially begin implementing waste sorting starting next week and called for everyone's joint efforts. Her husband expressed his support, while their daughter excitedly declared that she would serve as the [little supervisor].

events.name: Processing Online Orders
events.description: As the shop owner, Song Yajing keeps an eye on the store's online channels even on her days off. In the morning, she responded to several product inquiries in the WeChat customer group via her phone and packaged two orders that were pre-booked through WeChat, planning to have her husband help mail them out on Monday.

events.name: Personal Skincare and Morning Brisk Walking
events.description: Following the systematic skincare regimen that began in early March, Song Yajing diligently completed her skincare routine of cleansing, applying serum, and moisturizing both after waking up and before going to bed. In the morning, taking advantage of the fine weather, she wore her fitness tracker and went for a 30-minute brisk walk on the greenway in her residential area. She felt refreshed and invigorated, though her heart rate was slightly elevated, reminding her to adjust the intensity.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with anticipation for the weekend and the upcoming new phase of family life, yet tinged with a sense of weariness.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilled and with a slight sense of accomplishment, the new family rules have gained support, and my daughter is also happy to participate. However, thoughts about the details of my parents' relocation have led to slightly later bedtimes.

state.今日运动: 30-minute brisk walk in the morning

2025-03.daily_overview: On the first workday of the week, Song Yajing energetically immersed herself in the deep cleaning of the shop and the planning of spring purchases. Meanwhile, she began implementing the family resolutions made over the weekend and preparing for her parents' upcoming stay, though unexpected client demands disrupted the plan.

events.name: Best friend invites to a weekend gathering.
events.description: In the morning, during the break before opening the store, Song Yajing contacted her close friend Li Meiling, who was also in Xiamen, via WeChat. She shared the news that her parents would be moving in soon and suggested meeting for coffee over the weekend to have a good chat. The two quickly agreed to meet at a quiet café on Zhongshan Road on Saturday afternoon. They briefly exchanged updates on their recent lives, setting the stage for a deeper conversation.

events.name: Spring Cleaning and Inventory Organization for the Store
events.description: On Monday morning when customer traffic was light, Song Yajing and the shop assistant Xiao Mei conducted a thorough cleaning of the store. They carefully wiped down the shelves, organized the displays, and sorted out some out-of-season winter clothing and thick spring styles, archiving them to make room for the upcoming lightweight spring collection. The entire store appeared more tidy and bright.

events.name: Communicate with suppliers regarding spring collection selection.
events.description: During the relatively quiet afternoon hours at the shop, Song Yajing contacted Susan, a supplier in Guangzhou, via WeChat video call. She presented Susan with her preliminary selection preferences based on market observations, detailed the procurement budget for the season, and emphasized the target customers' (young white-collar workers in Xiamen) requirements for fabric comfort and silhouette design. Susan, from a professional standpoint, provided feedback on market trends and suggestions regarding cost-effectiveness.

events.name: Purchase of Household Classified Trash Bins
events.description: After work, Song Yajing and her husband Chen Zhiqiang went to a nearby home goods store together. They purchased four different colored sorting bins (red, blue, green, and gray) and labeled them with [Hazardous Waste], [Recyclables], [Kitchen Waste], and [Other Waste] respectively. After returning home, the couple placed these bins in designated spots in the kitchen and living room, marking the official setup of the hardware facilities for household waste sorting.

events.name: Overtime handling for temporary customer customization requests
events.description: After closing the shop in the evening, a regular customer urgently contacted Song Yajing via WeChat, requesting a custom-made dress in a special size and hoping for a quick completion. To maintain the customer relationship, Song Yajing decided to work overtime to discuss fabric and production timelines with the supplier Susan, which resulted in her staying up about an hour later than usual.

起始状态.心情: Full of drive, with the day's schedule planned out, but feeling a slight time pressure.

结束状态.心情: Steady and methodical, both work and family matters are progressing smoothly, though there is a slight sense of fatigue after working overtime.

state.今日运动: Daily commute is on foot, taking about 20 minutes; morning walks have been put aside due to busyness.

2025-03.daily_overview: On Tuesday, Song Yajing focused on the daily operations of the shop and in-depth customer service, while continuing to reinforce household waste sorting practices in the evening. Meanwhile, spring procurement entered a critical decision-making phase, though her mood fluctuated due to work-related stress.

events.name: Handling Online Inquiries and Pre-sale Shipments
events.description: Before opening in the morning and during the lunch break, Song Yajing focused on handling inquiries from WeChat customer groups in the shop's backend. She patiently answered questions about the size, color, and washing instructions of a particular dress, packaged and shipped three pre-order parcels, and promptly filled in the logistics tracking numbers.

events.name: In-depth Customer Communication Facilitates Sales
events.description: In the afternoon, a middle-aged female customer hesitated over the price of a silk blouse. Drawing on years of sales experience, Song Yajing not only elaborated on the advantages of silk fabric and its care methods but also personally demonstrated various styling options for different occasions. Ultimately, with professional service and genuine sincerity, she dispelled the customer’s doubts and successfully closed the slightly higher-priced sale, though she felt a bit of pressure during the process.

events.name: Receive and study the supplier's new catalog
events.description: After closing in the evening, Song Yajing received the electronic catalog of spring new arrivals and a detailed quotation from her supplier Susan at [Fengshangyuan Trading Co., Ltd.]. Without stopping for dinner, she carefully reviewed the materials in the store, noting down the styles, materials, prices, and preliminary purchase quantities she favored in an Excel spreadsheet. She worked until after 8 p.m. before heading home.

events.name: Practice of Dinner Waste Sorting
events.description: After dinner, Song Yajing took the initiative to clear the dining table. She poured the leftovers into the green food waste bin, washed the empty beverage bottles and cans, and placed them in the blue recycling bin. Her daughter, Chen Lexuan, supervised nearby, reminding her father not to throw used tissues in the wrong bin. On the first day of practicing household waste sorting, the family encountered minor challenges, but the process was filled with fun.

events.name: Due to emotional fluctuations caused by stress, had a brief exchange with my husband.
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing confided in her husband Chen Zhiqiang about the pressure from work and her concerns regarding her parents' relocation. Her husband offered comfort and support, helping her ease her emotions, but she still went to sleep later than usual.

起始状态.心情: Focused, contemplating today's sales tasks and procurement matters, yet with a hint of anxiety.

结束状态.心情: Feeling somewhat fatigued but with productive work outcomes, gradually adapting to new family routines, and emotions have been soothed through communication.

2025-03.daily_overview: Wednesday's schedule was relatively diverse. In addition to her work, Song Yajing applied the outcomes of her online learning, actively responded to an invitation from a fellow church member, and decided to enrich her spiritual life with new content. Meanwhile, she adjusted her daily routine due to a mild cold.

events.name: Draw a sketch of the spring window display.
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing began to draw detailed sketches for the spring-themed window display, building upon what she had learned from previous online courses. She defined the theme as "Spring Garden," planned the placement of the key styles, developed a color scheme, and identified the props needed for procurement, such as artificial flowers and wicker baskets. This preparation laid the groundwork for the visual marketing of the upcoming new arrivals.

events.name: Organize design history study notes and sketch conceptual ideas
events.description: In the afternoon when she had a moment of leisure, Song Yajing took out her notebook from behind the cashier counter to organize and review her study notes from the first phase of [History of Western Fashion Design]. She contemplated certain patterns and silhouette elements from the Classical and Renaissance periods, sketched a few simplified drafts, and pondered how to incorporate these classical aesthetic elements into the design of modern everyday women's wear.

events.name: Decided to join the church's Easter choir.
events.description: Before closing the shop in the evening, Song Yajing received a WeChat message from fellow church member Lin Xiuying (Aunt Lin), who once again warmly invited her to join the temporary choir organized by the church for Easter. Considering her love for music and recognizing this as a potential way to relieve the stress from her recent high-pressure life, Song Yajing made up her mind. She replied to Aunt Lin and Father Wang Mingde, expressing her willingness to join and inquiring about the specific rehearsal schedule (every Wednesday evening).

events.name: Personal Health Management Record
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing checked the data on her fitness tracker, recording her daily step count and sleep estimate. Meanwhile, she completed her daily skincare routine, feeling that sticking to a systematic skincare regimen for over half a month had made her skin condition more stable.

events.name: Rest early due to a mild cold.
events.description: Song Yajing experienced throat discomfort and mild headache, likely due to recent fatigue leading to decreased immunity. She decided to rest early, cancel her evening plans, drink more water, and go to bed early to regain her strength.

起始状态.心情: Calm, feeling somewhat curious about the transformation of learning and unknown invitations for the new day, but experiencing slight physical discomfort.

结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled and with something to look forward to, I have clarified new social engagement plans, but the symptoms of a cold have left my mood slightly subdued.

2025-03.daily_overview: This was a pivotal turning point of the month. Song Yajing and her husband paused their work and life in Xiamen, drove back to their hometown in Quanzhou, and formally began the substantive work of assisting their parents with relocation. While her cold symptoms had eased, her fatigue had intensified.

events.name: Departing for Quanzhou and Family Lunch
events.description: Song Yajing and her husband Chen Zhiqiang set out early from their home in Xiamen and drove to her parents' house in Quanzhou. Upon arrival, her mother Lin Xiuying had already prepared a table full of hearty hometown dishes, including Quanzhou rice dumplings and Minnan satay noodles, both of which are Song Yajing's favorites. The family gathered around the table for lunch, enjoying a warm atmosphere tinged with the complex emotions of bidding farewell to the old residence.

events.name: Relocation and Consolidation Work Commences
events.description: After lunch, the relocation and sorting work officially began. Song Yajing was primarily responsible for organizing her mother Lin Xiuying's clothing, as well as the pots, pans, dishes, and various seasonings in the kitchen. She needed to constantly consult with her mother about which items to take and which to dispose of. Chen Zhiqiang assisted his father Song Minghui in sorting through the mountains of books, teaching notes, and documents piled up in the study. As they sorted, everyone reminisced and discussed the fate of each item, making the progress slow but meticulous.

events.name: Temporarily altering the dietary plan to consume high-calorie foods.
events.description: Due to the exhaustion from moving, Song Yajing ate more fried food and desserts during dinner as emotional compensation, but realized this might affect her weight.

起始状态.心情: Feeling slightly nervous and a sense of mission, aware of the heavy workload in the coming days, and the cold has improved.

结束状态.心情: Physically exhausted, yet seeing my parents begin to face the reality of relocation, I feel a mix of emotions—sadness over the impending farewell and anticipation for a new beginning. After the meal, I feel a slight sense of self-reproach.

state.今日运动: Moving and organizing items involves significant physical exertion.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy to overcast, the weather in Quanzhou is similar to that in Xiamen.

2025-03.daily_overview: On the second day of the move, the work entered its most demanding and decisive stage. The entire family mobilized to systematically categorize and handle the massive amount of sorted items, with the exhaustion leading to weight loss.

events.name: Item Classification and Screening Decision
events.description: The entire day was dedicated to sorting items. The living room was filled with belongings cleared out from various rooms. The whole family worked together to categorize them into four main groups: [to bring to the new home in Xiamen], [to donate to charity], [to sell or recycle], and [to discard directly]. This process was filled with decision-making and letting go, especially for the parents, who often needed their children's persuasion and assistance in making decisions about old items that had accompanied them for many years.

events.name: Contact external resources for item processing
events.description: While sorting the items, Song Yajing was responsible for contacting local charity organizations in Quanzhou to schedule a pickup of donated clothing and bedding for the next day. Chen Zhiqiang, on the other hand, contacted waste recycling personnel and arranged for them to handle the piles of old newspapers, cardboard boxes, and discarded appliances the following day. Meanwhile, their father, Song Minghui, went out alone to handle the transfer or cancellation procedures for the water, electricity, and gas accounts of the old house.

events.name: Decreased appetite and irregular eating patterns due to fatigue.
events.description: High-intensity work led Song Yajing to have simple lunches and dinners with low calorie intake, resulting in weight loss.

起始状态.心情: Tired but determined, knowing today is the day to tackle the tough challenges.

结束状态.心情: Extremely exhausted, but seeing that the tidying work has produced clear results brings a sense of relief.

state.今日运动: High-intensity organizing, moving, and cleaning

2025-03.daily_overview: On the final day of the relocation, the finishing touches intertwined with emotional farewells. After completing all the cleaning, the family formally bid farewell to the old house and returned to Xiamen, carrying their parents' memories and hopes for the future, while their weight continued to decline.

events.name: Final packaging and external handover
events.description: In the morning, the entire family carefully packed and sealed the items to be taken to Xiamen, labeling each box with its contents. In the afternoon, representatives from the charity organization and the recycling service arrived as scheduled to collect the donations and recyclables, respectively. As the old house grew noticeably emptier, a sense of melancholy settled over my parents.

events.name: Farewell Ceremony for the Old Residence
events.description: After all items were dealt with, the family conducted a final cleaning. Then, Song Minghui suggested taking a family photo in the living room. The family stood in front of the familiar old furniture (which had been decided to be left for the next homeowner) and took a group photo. Mother Lin Xiuying gently touched the doorframe, tears welling up in her eyes. In the evening, Song Yajing and her husband drove away from Quanzhou toward Xiamen, carrying their parents and several boxes of the most important belongings.

events.name: Weekend Gathering Communication with Close Friend Li Meiling
events.description: In the afternoon, amidst her busy schedule in Quanzhou, Song Yajing took a moment to send a WeChat message to Li Meiling. She explained that she was unable to make their appointment due to handling her parents' relocation in Quanzhou, expressed her apologies, and briefly shared her exhaustion and reflections on the moving process. Li Meiling quickly replied, expressing full understanding, advising her to rest well, and suggesting they meet up again after she returns to Xiamen.

起始状态.心情: With the determination to accomplish the mission and a faint sense of parting sorrow

结束状态.所处地点: Xiamen, underground garage of my residential community
结束状态.心情: A sense of weary relief, a strong feeling of completion, and concern for the parents about to embark on a new life.

2025-03.daily_overview: On the first day after the relocation, the focus shifted entirely to helping my parents settle down in Xiamen. Song Yajing and her husband were as busy as spinning tops, ensuring that her parents moved in smoothly and became initially familiar with the environment. The resumption of regular meals led to a slight increase in weight.

events.name: Assisting parents with moving into their new residence in Xiamen
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing and her husband moved the luggage they had brought back the previous day from the car into the apartment they had rented for her parents, located on a lower floor of the same building. They helped her parents carry the luggage inside and assisted with the most basic unpacking tasks, such as making the beds and arranging the toiletries. Though tired, Song Yajing felt reassured seeing her parents settled into their own new space.

events.name: Familiarize parents with the surrounding environment.
events.description: After settling the luggage, Song Yajing took her parents for a walk in the residential complex, providing detailed explanations about the locations of the entrances and exits, the property management center, the garden, and the fitness facilities. She then took them to the nearby wet market, supermarket, community health service center, and bus stop, ensuring they knew how to meet their basic daily needs. Her father, Song Minghui, spoke little but listened attentively.

events.name: The first reunion dinner after moving to a new home
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing did not cook but ordered takeout from a nearby restaurant. The entire family—including Song Yajing and her husband, their daughter, and her parents—gathered at her parents' new home for their first reunion meal after the move. The meal was simple yet profoundly meaningful, symbolizing the official start of a new chapter of multi-generational living together. Though her parents appeared somewhat reserved and weary, their faces were graced with relieved smiles.

起始状态.心情: Physically aching, yet filled with motivation to help my parents settle in.

结束状态.心情: Physically and mentally exhausted, but seeing my parents basically settled, my heart is filled with a sense of accomplishment and comfort.

state.今日运动: Frequently moving items up and down stairs, and accompanying parents on walks to familiarize them with the surroundings.

2025-03.daily_overview: On the first workday after her parents moved in, Song Yajing's life officially entered a new rhythm of "three points and one line." She strived to balance managing her shop with daily visits to assist her parents, while keenly noticing changes in her father's mood and consulting the family doctor.

events.name: Daily visits and assistance after work
events.description: At six in the evening after the shop closed, Song Yajing did not go directly home but first went to her parents’ apartment downstairs. She helped her mother continue unpacking luggage, tidying up the kitchen, and fixed a minor issue with a bathroom faucet that wouldn’t close tightly. Her mother, Lin Xiuying, was already able to go grocery shopping alone at the market and excitedly told her daughter that she had met a warm-hearted neighbor, Aunt Zhang, in the residential garden that morning. The two had agreed to visit the morning market together the next day.

events.name: Observe the father's emotions and consider countermeasures
events.description: During her stay at her parents' home, Song Yajing noticed that her father, Song Minghui, spent most of his time sitting on the sofa flipping through photo albums he had brought from Quanzhou, showing little interaction with the new environment and appearing less talkative than he had been in their hometown. She realized that her father might be feeling lost and uncomfortable due to the disruption of his social circle and the drastic change in his living environment, and she began to think about how to help him integrate more quickly.

events.name: Discussing Spring Procurement with Store Clerk Xiaomei
events.description: During the afternoon when customer traffic was sparse, Song Yajing printed out the preliminary selection of spring new arrivals from the previous day and discussed them with the shop assistant, Xiaomei. She specifically sought Xiaomei’s intuitive perspective as a young woman, evaluating which styles and colors were more likely to appeal to young customers like Vivian. Based on Xiaomei’s feedback, she adjusted the order quantities for several overly avant-garde designs.

events.name: Mother-Daughter Baking Time
events.description: After returning from her parents' home in the evening, Lin Xiuying went upstairs to see her granddaughter. Noticing the baking ingredients Song Yajing had purchased, she enthusiastically guided her daughter in the kitchen to attempt making a more complex French mille-feuille cake. As they worked, mother and daughter chatted about new observations from Xiamen, with Lin Xiuying sharing some tips for making the pastry layers thinner and more even. The sweet aroma wafted from the kitchen, creating a warm family atmosphere.

events.name: Consult family doctor Wang Mingyuan regarding father's emotional issues.
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing briefly consulted family doctor Wang Mingyuan via WeChat about the possible reasons for her father's low mood and suggestions for coping with it. Dr. Wang recommended spending more time with him and encouraging him to participate in community activities, which gave her a clear direction.

起始状态.心情: Feeling a sense of responsibility for the new day, yet slightly pressed for time.

结束状态.心情: Filled with a touch of concern, I am gladdened by my mother's swift adaptation yet troubled by my father's silence, though I feel somewhat reassured after consulting the doctor.

state.今日运动: Working in the shop and visiting parents upstairs and downstairs; no additional exercise due to busy schedule.

2025-03.daily_overview: On Tuesday, while efficiently advancing store procurement and enrollment in learning activities, Song Yajing proactively took the first concrete action to help her father adapt to his new life and reinforced the family's new habits, with her weight slightly decreasing due to a healthy diet.

events.name: Finalize the spring procurement order and pay the deposit.
events.description: After synthesizing market trends, supplier recommendations, and feedback from store staff, Song Yajing finalized the procurement list for the new spring collection. She sent the final order—including styles, colors, sizes, and quantities—to Susan via WeChat, and both parties confirmed the pricing, payment method, and logistics details. Subsequently, Song Yajing transferred the deposit to Susan’s company account via online banking, completing this crucial quarterly procurement.

events.name: Proposing a fixed evening walk for father
events.description: Before dinner, Song Yajing went downstairs to her parents' home. She specifically said to her father: "Dad, the weather in Xiamen is lovely in the spring evenings, and the small park outside our residential area is quite peaceful. Starting from now, every Tuesday and Thursday after work, I’ll accompany you for a walk. We can treat it as exercise and also get to know the neighborhood better." Her father, Song Minghui, was taken aback for a moment, then happily agreed. Thus, the first scheduled walk for the father and daughter began promptly at 6:30 p.m. that evening, lasting about half an hour. Along the way, Song Yajing mainly introduced the shops and facilities they passed, while her father listened quietly.

events.name: Register for the Individual Business Tax Course
events.description: While browsing an online learning platform, Song Yajing discovered a course on tax planning and compliance for individual business owners. Recalling the confusion she experienced during month-end account reconciliation and considering the need for standardized operations in the future, she carefully read the course outline and found it highly practical. She then completed the registration and payment through the mobile app, planning to start the course in April.

events.name: Strengthen household waste sorting
events.description: While checking the trash bin after dinner, Song Yajing noticed that the garbage her husband Chen Zhiqiang had thrown away that day was mostly correctly sorted. She made a point to praise him in front of both her husband and their daughter. Her husband humorously replied, "With the two of you keeping an eye on me every day, it’s hard to make a mistake." The relaxed atmosphere indicated that this new rule was gradually becoming a part of their family habits.

events.name: Adhere to parent-child English story time.
events.description: Before bedtime, her daughter Xuanxuan took out the tablet on her own initiative and asked to continue listening to English stories. Seeing that her daughter had developed this habit, Song Yajing felt a sense of accomplishment and praised her daughter's enthusiasm. These brief fifteen minutes also became a precious moment of relaxation for her after a busy day.

起始状态.心情: With clear objectives, the tasks to be completed today have been planned.

结束状态.心情: There is a strong sense of achievement, with procurement being successfully implemented, progress made in father's matter, and a harmonious family atmosphere.

state.今日运动: Accompanying my father for a 30-minute walk in the evening.

2025-03.daily_overview: Wednesday evening took on a special significance. Song Yajing attended church choir rehearsal for the first time, opening up a new dimension in her spiritual life. Meanwhile, her parents continued to adapt to life in Xiamen, with their weight remaining stable.

events.name: First rehearsal with the church choir.
events.description: At half past seven in the evening, Song Yajing arrived at the church as scheduled. Introduced by fellow church member Aunt Lin, she joined the temporary choir preparing for Easter. During the rehearsal, she learned basic vocal coordination and simple bell-ringing techniques. Amidst the melody of the hymns, she felt a long-lost sense of peace and focus, temporarily setting aside the trivial matters of her shop and family, and began to engage in preliminary conversations with other church members.

events.name: Assist parents with community registration and procurement
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing took half a day off to accompany her parents to the community health service center, where they completed the registration process to associate with their family doctor, Dr. Wang Mingyuan. She then took them to a large supermarket to purchase daily necessities and patiently taught them how to use mobile payment for checkout. At the supermarket, her mother, Lin Xiuying, once again ran into their neighbor, Aunt Zhang. The two chatted for a long time in the fresh produce section and made plans to learn square dancing together over the weekend.

events.name: The Second Fixed Walk with My Father
events.description: Since we had already met with the parents in the afternoon and there was a choir rehearsal in the evening, the originally planned walk was rescheduled to after returning home from the supermarket in the afternoon. In the residential community, Song Minghui, the father, was more talkative than yesterday, taking the initiative to ask about the educational resources and weather characteristics of Xiamen, and briefly sharing an update about an old colleague from Quanzhou. The atmosphere during the walk was more relaxed and natural compared to the first time.

events.name: Track the logistics status of new goods.
events.description: During the day, Song Yajing received the logistics tracking number from the supplier, Susan. She took a moment to confirm on WeChat that Susan had received the deposit, and began periodically checking the shipping status of the spring clothing shipment from Guangzhou to Xiamen. In her mind, she was already planning the display and promotional strategies for the new arrivals once they arrived.

events.name: Online exchange with fellow baking enthusiast Mrs. Liu regarding new recipes
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing shared photos of the mille-feuille cake she made today with Mrs. Liu, a baking enthusiast from Hangzhou, via WeChat. They discussed improvements to the low-sugar recipe, and Mrs. Liu recommended a new recipe, agreeing to try it over the weekend.

起始状态.心情: I feel both anticipation and a slight nervousness about the new event tonight.

结束状态.心情: Pleasant and calm, the music and group activities brought a unique sense of relaxation, and her father's condition also put her somewhat at ease.

2025-03.daily_overview: On the fourth day of their stay, the daily care routine had stabilized. During her third walk with her father, Song Yajing noticed a marked cheerfulness in him, which brought her great comfort. The weekly management of the shop was also proceeding in an orderly manner, and her weight had slightly decreased due to healthy habits.

events.name: The Third Father-Daughter Walk, with Deeper Communication
events.description: The last scheduled walk of the week. In the evening, the father and daughter strolled through the small park once again. Father Song Minghui was noticeably more relaxed and talkative, proactively sharing more stories from his teaching days in Quanzhou, recounting several amusing incidents, and expressing admiration for the clean environment and convenient facilities in the Xiamen community. Listening to him, Song Yajing finally felt the weight lifted from her heart, and the communication between father and daughter grew deeper and more natural.

events.name: Routine Visits and Issue Resolution
events.description: After work, I visited my parents as usual. My mother, Lin Xiuying, has become proficient in using the washing machine in their new home and shared with Song Yajing the affordable and fresh vegetables she bought at the morning market with Aunt Zhang. Song Yajing helped adjust the TV's channel search function, resolving the minor issue my parents had encountered.

events.name: Hold a weekly sales briefing with staff member Xiaomei.
events.description: Before leaving work on Friday, as customer flow decreased, Song Yajing and Xiao Mei held a brief weekly meeting. They reviewed this week’s sales performance (the pre-sale feedback for spring clothing was positive), shared experiences from serving different types of customers, and preliminarily discussed the shelving plan for the new arrivals next week along with potential promotional ideas.

events.name: Confirm the weekend family dinner arrangements
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing formally invited her parents living downstairs to a family dinner at their home on Saturday night via the WeChat family group, to celebrate their successful move-in. After discussing with her husband Chen Zhiqiang, they decided that Song Yajing would take charge of cooking her mother's favorite Minnan-style satay noodles, while Chen Zhiqiang would be responsible for preparing some barbecue ingredients. The menu received an enthusiastic response from the parents.

起始状态.心情: Stable, having adapted to the new pace of life.

结束状态.心情: Comforted and satisfied, my father's transformation is today's greatest consolation, with family affairs in perfect order.

state.今日运动: Accompanied my father for a 30-minute walk in the evening.

2025-03.daily_overview: Friday was a day for wrapping things up and planning ahead. Song Yajing completed the learning phase of her online course, officially established a stable routine for visiting her parents, and began preparing for weekend relaxation and family gatherings, with a slight weight gain due to celebrations.

events.name: Complete the first phase of the online course and obtain the certificate.
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing completed the video learning and online quizzes for all courses in the first phase of [Fashion Aesthetics and Store Operations] on a mobile app, successfully passed them, and obtained an electronic version of the course completion certificate. She shared her joy by sending a screenshot of the certificate to her husband and her close friend Zhao Min.

events.name: Establish a fixed pattern for visiting parents.
events.description: After several days of intensive assistance, the parents' lives have largely returned to a normal routine. During dinner, Song Yajing discussed with her parents and agreed on a more sustainable visitation schedule moving forward: she would visit regularly after work on Tuesdays and Thursdays, spend the entire day together on Sundays, and remain available by phone for any urgent matters on weekdays. The parents expressed full understanding and agreement with this arrangement.

events.name: Plan a Romantic Date by Purchasing Movie Tickets Online
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing and her husband Chen Zhiqiang leaned on the sofa and browsed recently released movies using a mobile app. To enjoy a bit of quality time together amidst their busy schedules, they ultimately selected a lighthearted romantic comedy. They booked tickets online for a suitable Saturday evening screening and contacted their parents in advance, asking them to come over on Saturday evening to help take care of their daughter.

events.name: Handling Complex Waste Sorting Examples
events.description: While ordering takeout for dinner, I encountered confusion when disposing of the meal packaging (plastic containers, food scraps, and oil-stained napkins). Song Yajing took out her phone to consult official guidelines and discussed with her husband before finally deciding: wash the plastic containers and place them in recyclables, discard the food scraps into kitchen waste, and put the oil-soaked napkins into other waste. This process made her realize that waste classification requires continuous learning and practice.

events.name: Celebrating the completion of the course by consuming dessert.
events.description: To celebrate the completion of the course, Song Yajing had a tiramisu cake after dinner, which led to a slight weight gain but left her in a cheerful mood.

起始状态.心情: As the weekend approaches, the mood becomes slightly more relaxed, accompanied by a sense of fulfillment from completing tasks.

结束状态.心情: Feeling relaxed and with anticipation, having completed the study phase and planned weekend leisure and family time.

state.今日运动: No; no exercise was conducted due to celebration and planning.

date_attribute.weather: It was sunny, and Zhongshan Road in Xiamen was bustling with activity on Saturday.

2025-03.daily_overview: A typical and fulfilling Saturday. The morning was spent on store and household purchases, the afternoon enjoyed a rare heart-to-heart chat with close friends, the evening successfully hosted a significant first-ever three-generation family dinner, followed by a stolen moment for a movie date with my husband, with weight gain due to the dinner.

events.name: Purchase ingredients for family dinner
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing went to the vegetable market near her home and carefully purchased fresh ingredients such as shrimp, squid, and bean sprouts needed for making satay noodles, as well as meat and vegetables for barbecue. The market was bustling with people, filled with the lively atmosphere of the weekend.

events.name: An In-Depth Afternoon Tea with My Best Friend Li Meiling
events.description: At three o'clock in the afternoon, Song Yajing finally met with Li Meiling at the quiet café on Zhongshan Road. She confided in her close friend in detail about the busyness and stress surrounding her parents' relocation, as well as her father's transformation from being reserved to becoming more cheerful. She also shared amusing anecdotes about her daughter's early English learning. As a teacher and a long-time friend, Li Meiling offered full emotional support, shared insights on parent-child interaction from an educational perspective, and proactively offered to help keep an eye out for information about senior university courses near her parents' home. This in-depth conversation left Song Yajing feeling understood and empowered.

events.name: Preparing a Three-Generation Weekend Dinner
events.description: After returning home from the gathering, Song Yajing immediately got busy in the kitchen with Chen Zhiqiang. She prepared the satay broth and handled the seafood, while Chen Zhiqiang marinated the ingredients for grilling. Their daughter Xuanxuan excitedly ran in and out of the room. In the evening, her parents came upstairs, and the daughter rushed to her grandparents. The whole family enjoyed a warm and joyful time together.

events.name: Successfully held the first family gathering
events.description: The dinner table was laden with delicacies: Song Yajing's signature Fujianese satay noodles, Chen Zhiqiang's grilled chicken wings and vegetables, and a cold dish prepared by the mother. Everyone gathered around the table, with the parents expressing their satisfaction with their new life in Xiamen, particularly praising the neighborhood relationships within the community. Laughter filled the room as the warm and harmonious family atmosphere made the first formal family gathering since the move a resounding success.

events.name: Movie Date with Husband
events.description: After dinner, entrusting their daughter to her grandparents' care, Song Yajing and her husband went to the cinema to watch a pre-booked romantic comedy. The film was lighthearted and entertaining, allowing the couple to share a rare moment of quality time together in the theater. After the movie, they ordered drinks at a nearby quiet bar, discussing their thoughts on the film and recent family plans, as if they had returned to their dating days.

起始状态.心情: Feeling lighthearted and looking forward to today's multiple arrangements.

结束状态.心情: Happy and content, with social life, family, and love all nourished—tired but joyful.

state.今日运动: Walking for shopping, purchasing, and commuting; no regular exercise.

2025-03.daily_overview: A Sunday focused on summarization, planning, and slight adjustments. Song Yajing reviewed her studies and new family rules from the past month, and began planning the key business priorities for the next month. Life is steadily moving forward in a new balance, with a slight weight loss due to dietary adjustments.

events.name: Summarize Online Course Learning Outcomes
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing organized her notes and takeaways from the entire [Fashion Aesthetics and Store Operations] online course in the study. She shared her learning outcomes with her husband, Chen Zhiqiang, particularly the planning of window display designs, and discussed some feasible store improvement proposals. She evaluated the effectiveness of the learning, believing it was very helpful for business operations, and considered enrolling in more advanced marketing courses in the future.

events.name: Provide Feedback and Express Gratitude to a Close Friend
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing provided feedback to Li Meiling via WeChat regarding the communication with her parents after yesterday's gathering. She conveyed her mother's interest in the courses offered by the university for the elderly and once again expressed gratitude for Li Meiling's attentive listening and suggestions. The two had a brief exchange and agreed to go shopping together once her parents have fully adapted.

events.name: Monthly Summary of Parent-Child Reading
events.description: During the bedtime story session, Song Yajing and her daughter reviewed several English stories they had listened to in March, and asked her daughter to choose her favorite one (her daughter selected "Cinderella"). Song Yajing decided to continue this habit in April and plans to incorporate some simple English nursery rhymes to increase interactivity.

events.name: Monthly Summary of Household Waste Sorting
events.description: After dinner, Song Yajing summarized the family's nearly ten-day practice of garbage sorting. She praised her daughter's active supervision and her husband's progress, while also pointing out that complex situations like last night's takeout containers require continued learning from the whole family. Everyone agreed to persist in April and strive for greater accuracy.

events.name: Start contacting local lifestyle bloggers for store promotion.
events.description: Based on yesterday's review, Song Yajing preliminarily contacted two local Xiamen fashion and lifestyle bloggers via social media to inquire about the possibility of collaboration for store visits, in preparation for the online promotion in April.

起始状态.心情: Relax, with the leisurely feeling of wrapping up the weekend.

结束状态.心情: Calm and methodical, the summary has been completed, and a clear direction for the next month has been established.

2025-03.daily_overview: On the last day of March, Song Yajing fully focused her efforts on the monthly review of the store. Through meticulous account verification and data analysis, she not only gained a clear understanding of the business performance for the month but, more importantly, identified areas for future improvement. This laid the groundwork for the work in April while strictly concluding the health status.

events.name: Morning brisk walking returns to a stable routine.
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing, following her restored and stable routine, took a 40-minute brisk walk along the Yundang Lake trail. She thoroughly warmed up and stretched, keeping her heart rate within a reasonable range, and enjoyed this peaceful time for herself.

events.name: Organize monthly financial documents
events.description: After closing time, Song Yajing did not go home immediately but stayed in the shop. She first organized and printed out all financial documents for March, including sales receipts, purchase invoices, rent and utility payment records, and employee payroll slips. She spread them out on the desk to ensure all data was complete and accurate.

events.name: Verify Sales Records and Calculate Costs
events.description: She meticulously cross-checked the daily sales records exported from the cash register system against the deposit entries in the bank account to ensure there were no errors or omissions. Subsequently, she calculated the total procurement cost for the month based on the purchase orders and verified the payment vouchers for various fixed expenses, including rent, utilities, and Xiaomei's salary.

events.name: Calculate profits and conduct year-on-year analysis
events.description: Based on the verified data, Song Yajing calculated the gross profit and net profit for March in the Excel spreadsheet. She retrieved the financial statements from March of the previous year for comparison and found that the sales revenue for March this year showed significant growth (thanks to the launch of the spring collection), while the profit margin experienced slight fluctuations due to procurement costs and promotional activities.

events.name: Business Review and Problem Identification
events.description: In reviewing the operations throughout March, Song Yajing realized that although the sales of spring clothing had driven customer traffic, the store's online promotion (WeChat Moments, Xiaohongshu, etc.) was almost stagnant, relying solely on the existing customer base. This resulted in missed opportunities to attract new customers, which was identified as the most critical issue discovered during this month's review.

events.name: Develop the April Improvement Plan
events.description: Based on the review, Song Yajing detailed the key work priorities for April in her notebook: 1. Increase online promotional investment and plan 2-3 social media posts per week (outfit sharing, new product photography); 2. Contact one or two local lifestyle bloggers to explore small-scale collaboration opportunities for store visits; 3. Replenish best-selling styles based on sales data.

events.name: Archive Monthly Financial Documents
events.description: After completing all tasks, Song Yajing organized all the verified documents, printed reports, and handwritten review notes for the month in chronological order. She then sealed them in a dedicated financial archive folder labeled [March 2025] for future reference and quarterly tax filing purposes.

起始状态.心情: Focused, aware that today is an important review day, but feeling energetic after exercise.

结束状态.心情: With a clear mind and a strong sense of direction, although shortcomings have been identified, the next steps have been clarified, leading to greater strategy and confidence in achieving the annual revenue target.

2025-04.daily_overview: On the first day of April, Song Yajing stood at a new starting point for learning and growth. She officially began her online courses, seeking fresh inspiration from the visual dimension of store operations. At the same time, she methodically prepared for household affairs and upcoming holidays, continuing the good family habits established in March and starting to plan a new rhythm of life. On this day, she was both a busy shop owner and a family manager with a strong sense of planning.

events.name: Continue the habit of parent-child English learning
events.description: Before sending her daughter to school in the morning, Song Yajing reviewed the [Parent-Child Listening Plan] for March, during which she had consistently listened to English nursery rhymes with her daughter every day, feeling pleased with the sense of accomplishment from sticking to it. She made an agreement with her daughter to continue this habit and began searching on her phone for some English picture book animations or simple dialogue audio, planning to use them as more engaging learning materials for the next phase.

events.name: Start online course learning
events.description: During the lunch break, when customer traffic in the store was relatively low, Song Yajing took advantage of this time to open her phone in the store's rest area and logged into the online course platform for [Visual Merchandising and Color Theory], which she had just enrolled in. With curiosity and anticipation, she watched the first part of the videos for [Introduction to Visual Merchandising] and [Fundamentals of Color Psychology]. She also took notes in her notebook on key concepts such as [Color Emotion] and [Visual Appeal], contemplating how to apply them to her store's window displays.

events.name: An Evening Stroll with My Father
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing followed her regular routine by accompanying her father, Song Minghui, for a 30-minute walk in the residential garden. They discussed the recent situation of the shop and family matters, which serves as an important way for her to relax and engage in light aerobic exercise.

events.name: Evening Family Monthly Review Sharing
events.description: In the evening, after their daughter had fallen asleep, Song Yajing sat down with her husband Chen Zhiqiang in the living room to share a review of the store’s performance in March. She particularly highlighted the weaknesses in online promotion and expressed hope that her husband, who is skilled in technology, could help review the store’s social media accounts. The two also briefly discussed the family’s recent expenses and the upcoming family gathering for the Qingming Festival. Chen Zhiqiang indicated that he would adjust his weekend schedule to fully cooperate.

events.name: Browsing Fashion Information and Procurement Lists
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing habitually browsed several fashion blogger accounts and industry information websites she frequently follows on her phone, where she spotted a few lightweight shirts and floral dresses suitable for spring. She promptly saved the images and inspiration, planning to use them as reference for product selection during her subsequent communication with supplier Susan.

起始状态.心情: Full of anticipation, ready to welcome the new month.

结束状态.心情: Substantive and with a clear plan for the next month

2025-04.daily_overview: This day was filled with the intertwining of learning, faith, and new family plans. During the day, Song Yajing absorbed professional knowledge, while in the evening, she sought inner peace through the hymns at the church and initiated a meaningful environmental project within her family. The rhythm was intense yet well-prioritized, reflecting her ability to balance career, faith, and family.

events.name: Morning Brisk Walk Initiation
events.description: To improve her exercise habits, Song Yajing began her first morning power walk in April. She walked continuously for 35 minutes in the residential garden, listening to her favorite English songs on her phone while using a health app to track her steps and heart rate. The fresh air left her feeling refreshed and invigorated.

events.name: Studying the History of Costume: Baroque Style
events.description: After returning home from closing the shop, Song Yajing opened her computer in the study and took an online course on the Baroque period (17th century) within the module of fashion history. She focused on documenting the period's iconic exaggerated silhouettes, luxurious fabrics such as velvet and brocade, as well as the extensive use of lace and ribbon decorations. She also drew comparisons with some of the vintage court-style dresses available in her store.

events.name: Attend Easter choir rehearsal at the church
events.description: Wednesday evening marked the first rehearsal of the church choir. Song Yajing arrived on time, and under the guidance of Father Wang and the music director, everyone began practicing the main hymns for the Easter Mass. During a break in the rehearsal, she encountered a familiar church member, Auntie Lin. The two chatted about recent happenings, with Song Yajing sharing updates about her shop’s spring collection and her child, creating a relaxed and pleasant atmosphere.

events.name: Announcement of Household Waste Sorting Plan
events.description: After dinner, Song Yajing gathered her husband and daughter to formally announce the launch of the household waste sorting plan. She presented the prepared sorting bins and printed Xiamen City classification guidelines, explaining in detail the distinctions between the four categories of waste. Emphasizing the importance of developing habits for environmental protection, she received the family's support.

events.name: First Garbage Sorting Supervision
events.description: Shortly after the plan was announced, when her daughter Chen Lexuan was discarding the yogurt container from breakfast, she casually threw it into the food waste bin. Song Yajing patiently retrieved it, crouched down to explain to her daughter that the plastic packaging belonged to recyclable waste, and together they washed the yogurt container, demonstrating the correct disposal method. Her daughter nodded earnestly.

起始状态.心情: Awake, determined to start new habits.

结束状态.心情: Calmness, stemming from a sense of fulfillment through participation in meaningful activities.

2025-04.daily_overview: On the eve of the Qingming Festival, the pace of life became more intense. Song Yajing was advancing her online tax course studies to enhance her business compliance, while meticulously preparing for the next day's family reunion and the holiday arrangements for her shop. Under her careful coordination, multiple tasks—such as ensuring her parents' well-being, managing shop operations, and organizing family gatherings—proceeded smoothly in parallel.

events.name: Attend the First Lesson of Online Tax Training
events.description: At 7 p.m., Song Yajing logged into the online classroom on time and began the first session of the three-night training on [Financial and Tax Compliance for Individual Industrial and Commercial Households]. The topic of the session was [Preferential Policies and Filing Procedures for Small-Scale VAT Taxpayers]. She listened attentively and took detailed notes, gaining a clearer understanding of the tax issues that had previously been unclear to her. After the class, she adjusted her originally scheduled family activities for the evening to prioritize her studies.

events.name: Video Communication with Parents Regarding Physical Examination Matters
events.description: During her lunch break, Song Yajing made a video call to her parents in Quanzhou. She once again persuaded them to undergo systematic health check-ups after their arrival in Xiamen, and carefully recorded their ID information, as well as any history of hypertension, to prepare for scheduling the medical examinations.

events.name: Store Arrangements and Procurement Before Qingming Festival
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing notified her regular customer group and the shop assistant, Xiao Mei, in advance that the store would be closed on Tomb-Sweeping Day. After closing, she carefully checked the inventory, cleaned the storefront, and settled the day's sales. She then went to a supermarket near her home to purchase ingredients needed for tomorrow's preparation of Minnan-style satay noodles, meat-stuffed rice dumplings, and tiramisu, filling her shopping cart to the brim.

events.name: Strengthen household waste sorting
events.description: In daily life, family members have begun to consciously practice waste sorting. Mother Lin Xiuying (as learned through a video) expressed her support over the phone, stating that she would definitely comply when she comes to Xiamen. When disposing of waste paper, husband Chen Zhiqiang also checks first to confirm whether it is recyclable.

events.name: Overtime work to handle store accounts
events.description: Inspired by tax training, Song Yajing spent an extra hour in the evening reviewing the shop's accounts from the previous month, discovered some oversights, and ended up staying up late, but she felt it was worthwhile.

起始状态.所处地点: Preparing breakfast in the home kitchen
起始状态.心情: Making preparations for the festival in an orderly manner

结束状态.心情: Slightly fatigued but with substantial gains, I have gained new insights into tax knowledge.

2025-04.daily_overview: Today is Qingming Festival. Song Yajing set aside all her work and immersed herself wholeheartedly in the traditional activities of family reunion and commemorating ancestors. From morning exercise and prayer, to meeting her parents at the station, to tomb sweeping, cooking, and sharing quality family time, the entire day was filled with warmth, gratitude, and deep familial affection—a full reflection of the family-oriented traits characteristic of her ESFJ personality.

events.name: Morning Brisk Walking and Silent Prayer
events.description: While her family was still asleep, Song Yajing went to the nearby Egret Island Park for a 40-minute brisk walk. As she monitored her heart rate data on a mobile app, she silently recited prayers in the fresh morning air, dedicating the start of her day to faith and health, her heart filled with tranquility and gratitude.

events.name: Bringing Parents to Xiamen for a Family Reunion
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing and her husband Chen Zhiqiang drove to Xiamen North Railway Station to pick up her parents, Song Minghui and Lin Xiuying, who had arrived by high-speed train from Quanzhou. Seeing her parents emerge from the station in high spirits, she happily stepped forward to embrace them. The family then returned home on Hubin South Road, filled with laughter and joy.

events.name: Family Tomb Sweeping
events.description: The entire family went to a cemetery in Xiamen to pay respects at the graves. In front of their ancestors' tombs, they offered flowers and performed a simple cleaning. As a Catholic, Song Yajing led the family in a brief prayer to commemorate their departed loved ones, creating a solemn yet warm atmosphere.

events.name: Prepare a sumptuous Qingming family feast
events.description: After returning from tomb sweeping, the kitchen became a stage for the mother and daughter. Lin Xiuying, the mother, took charge of preparing her specialty Fujianese home-style dishes, while Song Yajing baked her signature tiramisu cake nearby. Her husband, Chen Zhiqiang, assisted by handling ingredients and supporting tasks. The aroma wafting from the kitchen was filled with the warmth of domestic life and collaborative harmony.

events.name: Multi-Generational Family Lunch Sharing
events.description: At noon, the whole family gathered around the dining table to enjoy a carefully prepared lunch: authentic Minnan-style satay noodles, fragrant Quanzhou rice dumplings, soft tiramisu, and several side dishes made by mother. Everyone chatted while eating, sharing updates on each other's lives. Father Song Minghui also inquired about the store's operations with concern and offered several practical suggestions.

events.name: Afternoon Family Leisure Time
events.description: After lunch, everyone stayed indoors, enjoying a leisurely afternoon at home. The grandparents played with their granddaughter Chen Lexuan and read picture books with her. Meanwhile, Song Yajing sat on the balcony with her father, sipping tea while delving deeper into topics such as store inventory management and customer retention. She gained valuable insights and advice from her father's experience.

events.name: Seeing Off Parents Returning to Quanzhou
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing and her husband drove her parents to the station for their return to Quanzhou. Before parting, her mother reminded her to take care of her health, while her father once again encouraged her to manage the shop well. After seeing off her parents, the family of three returned home, where they tidied up the dishes and cleaned the rooms together. Though somewhat tired, their hearts were filled with the warmth of having reunited.

起始状态.心情: Serene, filled with anticipation for family reunion

结束状态.心情: Warm, content, with a hint of reluctance at parting.

2025-04.daily_overview: On the first rest day after Qingming Festival, Song Yajing's life returned to a balance between study, family, and business management. She integrated the knowledge of fashion history she had learned the previous night with the physical items in her shop, planned detailed health check-ups for her parents, and properly handled family matters related to her daughter's school. Throughout the day, she not only internalized knowledge but also demonstrated meticulous care for her family.

events.name: Confirm the dates for my parents' short stay in Xiamen.
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing had a video call with her parents in Quanzhou and finalized their plan to visit Xiamen for a month from April 10 to May 10. Together, they discussed the parks they would like to visit and the community activities they might participate in during their stay. Her parents were very much looking forward to the trip.

events.name: Applying Knowledge to Practice: Analyzing Vintage Clothing in Stores
events.description: During a lull in customer traffic in the afternoon, Song Yajing took out two spring dresses featuring puff sleeves and lace decorations, comparing them with the notes on Baroque style she had studied the day before. She explained to the sales assistant, Xiaomei, "Look at these exaggerated sleeve designs and intricate decorations—they draw inspiration from the opulence of the Baroque period, but modern design simplifies them, making them more suitable for everyday wear." Xiaomei nodded repeatedly upon hearing this, finding it quite interesting.

events.name: Design a Household Waste Sorting Game
events.description: To reinforce her daughter's knowledge of garbage classification, Song Yajing designed a simple matching card game during her break. In the evening, she played the game with her daughter and husband, dropping cards depicting various types of waste into corresponding [trash bin] paper boxes. Her daughter, Chen Lexuan, enjoyed the game immensely and effortlessly memorized more classification knowledge while playing.

events.name: Schedule a health check-up in Xiamen for parents
events.description: Through an online consultation with family physician Wang Mingyuan, Song Yajing successfully booked the [Senior Comprehensive Health Check-up Package] for her parents at the Huli District Community Health Service Center on April 10 via a mobile app and completed the payment online. She sent a screenshot of the successful appointment confirmation to her parents, reminding them to keep this in mind when they come to Xiamen.

events.name: Processing Spring New Arrivals
events.description: A batch of new spring clothing arrived at the store, and Song Yajing and Xiaomei unpacked and inspected the goods together. She carefully examined the craftsmanship, fabric, and sizing of each garment, cross-checked the quantities against the order form, and then sorted the new arrivals by style and color for preliminary categorization, preparing them for subsequent shelving.

events.name: Received and scheduled parent open day
events.description: Song Yajing received the Spring Parent Open Day notice from her daughter's kindergarten, scheduled for next week. She immediately marked the event prominently in her phone calendar and contacted the shop assistant Xiaomei to discuss adjusting the morning shift on the day of the open day, ensuring she could participate fully. In the evening, she also shared the information with her husband Chen Zhiqiang. After discussing, they decided that Song Yajing would attend as the primary representative.

events.name: Complete color course assignments and preliminary practice
events.description: After closing for the night, Song Yajing completed her homework for the color psychology module at home and shared her understanding of [how warm tones can create a sense of approachability and appeal in spring fashion window displays] on the course forum. The next day before opening the shop, she applied what she had learned by replacing the cool-toned decorative fabrics in the window with warmer shades of beige and light pink, achieving an immediate effect.

起始状态.心情: Relax and enjoy the lazy weekend morning.

结束状态.心情: A sense of fulfillment from accomplishing multiple planned tasks.
