2025-04.daily_overview: Sunday is a day for family and church. Song Yajing conducted a successful visual renovation practice at her shop in the morning, while in the afternoon, she devoted herself entirely to her family. She helped her parents, who were staying in Xiamen for the first time, familiarize themselves with the surroundings and organized a pleasant spring picnic. Faith, family, and small achievements in her career harmoniously blended together on this day.

events.name: Implement spring-themed store displays
events.description: Before the morning opening, Song Yajing led Xiao Mei in completely revamping the window display based on the color knowledge they had learned in previous days and the planned concept. Using new backdrops, green plant props, and warm-toned lighting, they highlighted the freshness and vitality of the spring collection. The store shelves were also adjusted accordingly, giving the entire shop a refreshed look filled with the essence of spring.

events.name: Preparing for the Parent Open Day for My Daughter
events.description: Song Yajing prepared a beautiful little dress for her daughter to wear on the open day in advance, and gently told her, "Mom will come to the kindergarten tomorrow to watch you in class. You need to be as wonderful as usual!" Her daughter Xuanxuan nodded excitedly in agreement.

events.name: Organize Tax Training Notes
events.description: During her free time in the afternoon, Song Yajing organized the notes from the three-day tax training session, summarizing key information such as value-added tax incentives, key points of individual income tax accounting, and invoice management standards into a clear checklist. She began cross-referencing the checklist to conduct a preliminary review of the shop's past accounts, identifying several areas for improvement, which she noted in her to-do list.

events.name: Familiarize parents with the community environment.
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing and her husband took their parents for a walk around the neighborhood, visiting nearby supermarkets, a vegetable market, the community health service center (Dr. Wang’s workplace), and the entrance to Egret Island Park. As they walked, she provided explanations, giving her parents a clear understanding of their future daily routines.

events.name: Spring Family Picnic
events.description: Taking advantage of the fine weather, the whole family decided to have a picnic at Egret Island Park. Chen Zhiqiang prepared the picnic mat and toys, while Song Yajing and her mother prepared fruits, sandwiches, and homemade cakes. Father Song Minghui used a camera to capture the joyful moments of the family. The daughter ran and played on the lawn, while the parents enjoyed the sunshine and the pleasure of doting on their grandchild, creating a very heartwarming scene.

events.name: Attend Sunday Mass
events.description: As a devout Catholic, Song Yajing attended Sunday Mass at Siming Catholic Church before the picnic. She found peace and strength in the familiar rituals.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, ready to embrace a fulfilling Sunday.

结束状态.心情: Happiness, relaxation, and immense satisfaction derived from family joy.

state.今日运动: Accompanied family members for a walk for approximately one hour.

2025-04.daily_overview: As the new week began, Song Yajing shifted from weekend family mode back to learning and planning mode. She resumed her personal morning exercise routine and engaged in an in-depth financial discussion with her husband, translating tax knowledge into actionable family plans. Simultaneously, she actively built social bridges for her parents' arrival, demonstrating exceptional organizational skills.

events.name: Resume morning brisk walking
events.description: After resting over the weekend, Song Yajing resumed her morning brisk walking routine. She completed a 30-minute workout within the residential community, recorded the time and distance using her mobile phone, and felt her body reawakened.

events.name: Sharing Tax Learning Outcomes with Husband
events.description: After dinner, Song Yajing showed her husband Chen Zhiqiang the electronic completion certificate for the tax training and shared the key learning points. She emphasized that tax optimization could be achieved through standardized bookkeeping. Chen Zhiqiang expressed agreement and proactively offered to help her design a more convenient electronic bookkeeping template over the weekend.

events.name: Review tax knowledge and prepare materials.
events.description: Before formally organizing the finances, Song Yajing carefully reviewed her tax training notes in the study. She then sorted out the previous month's shop transaction records, household expense logs, bank statements, and other materials to prepare for the upcoming family financial meeting.

events.name: Hold a family monthly financial planning meeting
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang held a detailed family financial meeting in the living room. They reviewed their income and expenses item by item, analyzed specific directions for optimizing the shop's accounts (such as establishing a tax withholding account), assessed the budget for their daughter's education fund and their parents' medical check-up expenses, and jointly set a savings goal for the month. This was the first time they had conducted financial planning in such a systematic manner.

events.name: Introduce parents to the neighbors
events.description: Considering that her parents would be staying long-term, Song Yajing invited the warm-hearted neighbor, Aunt Zhang, over for tea to help them integrate into the community more quickly. She formally introduced her parents to Aunt Zhang, and they all had a pleasant conversation. Aunt Zhang enthusiastically introduced the activities and some useful information in the community, and her parents expressed their willingness to participate more in community life.

events.name: Had a temporary video chat with my best friend Li Meiling.
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing had a brief video call with her close friend Li Meiling due to the pressure from her shop. She confided about her recent busy schedule and received emotional support, which led to her going to bed slightly later than usual.

起始状态.心情: Energetic and ready to tackle the new week.

结束状态.心情: Feeling grounded, I have greater confidence in the future through in-depth communication with my husband.

state.今日运动: 30-minute brisk walk in the morning

2025-04.daily_overview: The focus of the day's work was on systematically organizing the shop's finances. Song Yajing began putting theory into practice by establishing a standardized accounting system. Meanwhile, the family's environmental plan entered the stage of refining details and reinforcing habits, with the entire family collaborating more seamlessly than ever.

events.name: Handling Household Hazardous Waste
events.description: During a home cleanup, some expired medications and used batteries were sorted out. Song Yajing, with guidance from her mother over the phone, located the hazardous waste collection point in their residential community. On her way out, she conveniently dropped these waste items into the designated red collection bin, ensuring safe and environmentally friendly disposal.

events.name: Preliminary organization of store financial documents
events.description: After closing the shop, Song Yajing did not rush home. Instead, she stayed inside the store, retrieving all the original financial documents from the past few months, including purchase receipts, rent and utility payment slips, and handwritten cash journals. She then carried out preliminary categorization and basic verification on the table, organizing them by month—a task that involved considerable effort.

events.name: Correcting Minor Errors in Waste Sorting
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing noticed that her husband Chen Zhiqiang had accidentally thrown a used battery into the regular trash bag. Instead of blaming him, she patiently explained that batteries are classified as hazardous waste and should be disposed of separately. Afterwards, the two of them found an unused small metal box to temporarily store hazardous waste at home and placed it in a prominent spot in the kitchen.

events.name: Update the Family Financial Implementation Plan
events.description: Following the consensus reached at the financial meeting the night before, Song Yajing updated the newly established monthly budget targets and savings plan into the family's shared electronic spreadsheet. She set up several simple reminders to ensure that subsequent expense records would be categorized according to the new accounts.

events.name: Listen to English music to relax.
events.description: In between doing household chores and organizing documents, Song Yajing played her curated playlist of English songs through a Bluetooth speaker. The familiar melodies helped her relax while also creating a bit of a language environment for her daughter.

events.name: Mild sprain of the left ankle
events.description: While moving spring new arrivals in the store, Song Yajing accidentally sprained her left ankle, resulting in mild pain and swelling. She immediately rested, canceled her scheduled exercise plan for the evening, and planned to adjust her workout intensity accordingly.

起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to handle daily affairs

结束状态.心情: Slightly fatigued but progressing smoothly, seeing the chaotic documents being sorted out with some order, though ankle discomfort brings a hint of irritation.

state.今日运动: Out (due to sprain)

2025-04.daily_overview: Wednesday nights belong to the hymns of the church. Song Yajing found more joy and a sense of belonging during the second choir rehearsal. During the day, she continues to deepen her expertise in fashion, steadily advancing the digital transformation of the store's financial system, with learning and practice progressing hand in hand.

events.name: Learning Fashion History: Rococo Style
events.description: Song Yajing continued her online study of fashion history, with this week's theme focusing on the [Rococo period (18th century)]. She emphasized research on the iconic corsets, large hoop skirts (panniers), as well as the soft pastel tones and delicate floral patterns on fabrics in women's clothing of that era, while also reflecting on their evolutionary relationship with Baroque style.

events.name: Second Church Choir Rehearsal
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing went to the church again to attend choir rehearsal. After one practice session, everyone coordinated more seamlessly. During the break, she chatted with several fellow churchgoers who also enjoyed baking, sharing tips on making small cookies and agreeing to bring some homemade pastries for everyone to taste next time. The music brought her pure joy.

events.name: Create Electronic Accounting Accounts for Stores
events.description: Under the remote guidance of her husband Chen Zhiqiang, Song Yajing used spreadsheet software on her computer to establish a preliminary chart of accounts, including [Sales Revenue], [Cost of Goods Purchased], [Shop Rent], [Employee Salaries], [Utilities and Miscellaneous Expenses], and [Tax Provisions]. She began entering the data she had organized the previous day into the corresponding accounts, categorizing them accordingly.

events.name: Implementing Financial Meeting Resolutions: Fund Operations
events.description: According to the family financial plan, Song Yajing performed an operation via mobile banking, transferring a sum of money into a dedicated education savings account established for her daughter. She felt a sense of reassurance from taking responsibility for the future.

events.name: Taking Parents to Experience Xiamen's Public Transportation
events.description: The parents had arrived the night before (providing context for the events of April 10). During the day, Song Yajing took advantage of the lunchtime lull at her shop to take her parents on a ride on the local bus, getting off at Zhongshan Road Station. She showed them her store and introduced them to the surrounding commercial environment. Her parents felt very proud of their daughter’s [career].

events.name: Adjusting Exercise Due to Ankle Sprain
events.description: Due to an unhealed ankle sprain, Song Yajing canceled her morning brisk walk, engaging only in light activities and ensuring adequate rest.

起始状态.所处地点: Guest room at home (parents have moved in)
起始状态.心情: Warmth, a sense of security derived from having parents by one's side.

结束状态.心情: Feeling joyful, being immersed in the music and harmonious team atmosphere, but with slight discomfort in the ankle.

2025-04.daily_overview: On the first day of my parents' official move-in, the rhythm of life revolved around [settling in] and [adapting]. Song Yajing warmly welcomed her parents and skillfully integrated the new household rule (waste sorting) into their routine. At the same time, she balanced her personal health habits, shop financial management, and began planning ahead for her parents' health concerns, demonstrating her multitasking abilities.

events.name: Morning Walk Encounter with a Neighbor
events.description: During her morning power walk in the residential community, Song Yajing happened to meet her neighbor, Aunt Zhang, who was also taking a stroll. After exchanging brief greetings, Aunt Zhang kindly inquired about whether her parents had settled in properly. Song Yajing expressed gratitude for her concern and then continued with the remaining 20 minutes of her exercise, though she slowed her pace to accommodate her ankle.

events.name: Settling the Parents and Introducing the House Rules
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing helped her parents settle their luggage in the guest room and provided a detailed introduction to the layout of the house and the use of household appliances. She particularly guided her parents through the kitchen and living room, familiarizing them with the waste sorting bins and explaining the household sorting rules. Her mother, Lin Xiuying, demonstrated strong learning ability, quickly grasped the concepts, and expressed her commitment to taking the lead in proper implementation.

events.name: Improve the store's financial system
events.description: During her parents' lunch break, Song Yajing continued refining her electronic ledger in the study. She added two special accounts: [Tax Withholding] and [Shop Development Fund], and set up simple formulas. She plans to automatically calculate the retained amount each month in the future based on a certain proportion of the estimated profit, laying the foundation for standardized operations and future development.

events.name: Research on Parents' Medical Examination Reports and Healthy Recipes
events.description: Song Yajing received the electronic version of her parents' last year's physical examination report, which was sent from Quanzhou. She carefully read through it and noted that her father showed a slight tendency towards hypertension, while her mother had a low bone density value. She began searching online and in baking books for recipes that were [low in salt] and [high in calcium]. She initially took a liking to a recipe for whole wheat walnut bread and planned to try it out in a few days.

events.name: Preparing a Welcome Home Banquet
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing personally prepared a sumptuous welcome dinner, featuring steamed fish that her parents loved, stir-fried seasonal vegetables, and her signature Minnan-style braised pork. The family gathered around the table, with her parents praising her culinary skills, and the meal was filled with laughter and cheerful conversation.

events.name: An Evening Stroll with Father
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing accompanied her father, Song Minghui, for a 20-minute walk in the residential area. They maintained a slower pace to accommodate his ankle condition, engaging primarily in light conversation.

起始状态.心情: Busy but happy, preparing for the first day of my parents' official move-in.

结束状态.心情: Warm and content, feeling gratified to see parents adapting well.

state.今日运动: 20 minutes of brisk walking in the morning (at a reduced pace), and a 20-minute evening walk with my father.

2025-04.daily_overview: Friday serves as a bridge connecting work and the weekend. Song Yajing conducted a successful team-building activity in the store, and her lunchtime heart-to-heart talk with the shop assistant Xiaomei deepened their mutual trust. Meanwhile, she actively expanded her parents' social circle and began making preparations for the upcoming weekend family fun time, ensuring everything was arranged in an orderly manner.

events.name: Adjustment of Visiting Arrangements
events.description: Due to a tax training session scheduled for Thursday evening, Song Yajing communicated with her parents in advance and rescheduled the originally planned evening visit and chat to Friday night. Her parents expressed full understanding and encouraged her to focus on her studies.

events.name: An In-Depth Working Lunch with Staff Member Xiaomei
events.description: During the quieter midday hours with fewer customers, Song Yajing invited the staff member Xiaomei to have lunch together at a casual dining restaurant near Zhongshan Road. She proactively inquired about Xiaomei's work experience and listened to her observations on recent sales. Song Yajing also shared the challenges and interesting anecdotes from her own early days of entrepreneurship, encouraging Xiaomei to set small career goals for herself. This lunch allowed the two to move beyond their employer-employee relationship, becoming partners who could confide in each other.

events.name: Propose a Home Cinema Night
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing suggested to her husband and daughter that they hold a [Family Movie Night] on Saturday evening to watch animated films and enjoy snacks together. The proposal was immediately met with cheers from her daughter and approval from her husband. They began discussing which movie to watch and what snacks to buy, filled with anticipation.

events.name: Accompanying parents to attend a health lecture
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing accompanied her parents to attend the [Spring Health Preservation for the Elderly] lecture held at the community health service center. After the lecture, her parents took the initiative to chat with several elderly residents living in the same community, exchanged WeChat contacts, and began to establish a new social circle in Xiamen.

events.name: Contact suppliers to discuss the new model.
events.description: Just before the lunch break, Song Yajing contacted Susan, a supplier in Guangzhou, via WeChat. Drawing on her recently acquired knowledge of Rococo style, she inquired about new spring clothing items featuring soft prints such as small floral patterns and vines, or those with lightweight and smooth textures. Her communication demonstrated a higher level of professionalism compared to previous interactions.

events.name: Attempting light brisk walking due to ankle recovery.
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing attempted 15 minutes of light brisk walking, and her ankle felt improved, but she still took care to avoid excessive strain.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, looking forward to the arrival of the weekend.

结束状态.心情: Pleasure, feeling quite good due to the in-depth conversation with Xiaomei and the anticipation for the weekend.

2025-04.daily_overview: A vibrant and fruitful Saturday. The store received appreciation and patronage from regular customers, the family's environmental initiatives gained recognition in the community, and communication with suppliers became smoother. In the evening, the first [Family Movie Night] was successfully held, bringing the week to a warm and happy conclusion.

events.name: Participate in community waste sorting publicity
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing took her daughter to participate in a waste sorting promotion event organized by the community. She shared her family's practical experiences with the neighbors, while her daughter Xuanxuan actively assisted on-site as a [little supervisor]. For her excellent performance, she was praised by the community staff, which made her very proud.

events.name: Regular Customers Visiting the Store and Afternoon Tea Invitations
events.description: In the afternoon, Vivian, a regular customer, arrived at the shop as scheduled and was full of praise for the refreshed spring display. After trying on several pieces, she promptly purchased a number of new outfits. After settling the bill, Vivian took the initiative to invite Song Yajing to a nearby café for afternoon tea. The two chatted about fashion and baking, and Vivian also offered her some suggestions for improving the shop's fragrance and background music. The conversation was pleasant and engaging.

events.name: Implement the Home Theater Night
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing went to the supermarket to purchase snacks such as chips, juice, and fruit. In the evening, the family of three changed into comfortable homewear and settled on the living room sofa to watch an animated movie chosen by their daughter. They snacked while discussing the plot, with laughter filling the room, creating an exceptionally warm and cozy atmosphere.

events.name: Contact the supplier to reissue the invoice.
events.description: During the process of improving financial documentation, Song Yajing discovered that several earlier purchases lacked invoices. She contacted suppliers such as Susan via WeChat, politely yet firmly explaining the need for tax compliance, requesting the issuance of supplementary invoices, and emphasizing the principle that future collaborations must include invoices with goods. The suppliers all expressed their willingness to cooperate.

events.name: Praising My Daughter's Environmental Protection Actions
events.description: Song Yajing noticed that after finishing her milk, her daughter took the initiative to flatten the paper carton and placed it in the recycling bin. She immediately praised her daughter: "Xuanxuan is amazing, you're already a little expert at waste sorting!" and rewarded her with a homemade cookie. Her daughter was overjoyed.

events.name: Resume morning brisk walking
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing resumed her 30-minute brisk walk at a moderate pace. Her ankle has largely recovered, but she still pays attention to warming up.

起始状态.心情: Relax and enjoy the weekend morning

结束状态.心情: Happy and relaxed, immersed in family joy and the small achievements of the day.

2025-04.daily_overview: On the Sunday before Easter, faith life is the theme. Song Yajing experiences the solemnity and joy of the festival through the hymns and services at the church. Meanwhile, new family habits have quietly taken root, and the shop's financial system has begun to take shape. She guides her parents in integrating into the church community, enriching their life in Xiamen.

events.name: Garbage sorting has become a household habit.
events.description: After nearly two weeks of practice, Song Yajing observed that even without specific reminders, her parents and husband were able to accurately sort waste when discarding it. When cleaning up after meals, everyone naturally collaborated to complete the sorting process, and this new habit has smoothly integrated into daily life.

events.name: Attend the Special Pre-Easter Rehearsal
events.description: As a member of the choir, Song Yajing attended the final rehearsal for the special Easter Mass next week after the Sunday Mass. The choir practiced Easter hymns and the parts that required coordination with handbells, creating an atmosphere that was both solemn and enthusiastic.

events.name: Complete the trial operation of the store financial system.
events.description: Song Yajing filed the supplementary invoice and conducted a trial recording and categorization of the daily cash flow for April up to the present, based on the newly established electronic ledger. The entire process proceeded smoothly, and the accounts and formulas she designed largely met the requirements, which boosted her confidence in the financial management of the store.

events.name: Lead parents to attend Sunday Mass
events.description: On Sunday, Song Yajing took her parents to Siming Catholic Church to attend Mass. She introduced her parents to Father Wang and fellow parishioner Auntie Lin. After the Mass, her parents joined the parishioners' tea gathering. Her mother, Lin Xiuying, quickly struck up conversations with other elderly parishioners, while her father, Song Minghui, showed great interest in the architectural style of the church.

events.name: Consolidate the Achievements of Family Cinema Night
events.description: During Sunday breakfast, the family was still reminiscing about the previous night's movie night. Song Yajing took the opportunity to propose making it a monthly family tradition, to which both her husband and daughter gave their enthusiastic approval, and they began looking forward to deciding what to watch the following month.

events.name: Morning brisk walking slightly reduced due to social gatherings.
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing only did 20 minutes of brisk walking due to the tight schedule for preparing the church event.

起始状态.心情: Pinghe, preparing to attend church activities

结束状态.心情: Fulfillment, tranquility, and a sense of satisfaction derived from both faith and family.

2025-04.daily_overview: As the new week begins, the focus shifts to the growth of the next generation and the health management of the family. Song Yajing makes final preparations for attending her daughter's open day at school and starts delving into healthy dietary plans based on her parents' medical checkup reports. Meanwhile, her personal study and exercise routines continue to progress steadily, and she updates her husband on important financial developments.

events.name: Confirm the Arrangements for Parents' Open Day
events.description: Song Yajing checked the calendar on her phone and the notification from the kindergarten teacher once again to confirm the specific time and schedule for tomorrow morning's parent open day. She and Xiaomei finalized the shift arrangement for tomorrow morning, ensuring that she could arrive at the kindergarten punctually at 9 a.m.

events.name: Explore New Routes for Brisk Walking
events.description: To add more fun to her exercise routine, Song Yajing explored a new brisk walking route from her residential community to Yundang Lake today. She walked a full lap along the lakeside, which took about 45 minutes. Enjoying the shimmering reflections on the water and the sight of people doing morning exercises, she felt refreshed and invigorated. Her heart rate monitor showed an average of 140 beats per minute.

events.name: Synchronize Financial System Progress with Husband
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing presented the initially established electronic financial system for the store to her husband Chen Zhiqiang, explaining the operational concepts of the two specialized accounts: [Tax Withholding] and [Development Fund]. Chen Zhiqiang offered several suggestions from an IT perspective to optimize spreadsheet formulas and back up data, and the two engaged in a discussion.

events.name: In-depth research on healthy diets for parents
events.description: Based on her parents' medical examination reports, Song Yajing delved more specifically into a low-sodium, high-calcium diet. Not only did she search for recipes, but she also began documenting her parents' daily salt intake. She discussed with her mother about gradually replacing some salt with spices for seasoning, and her mother gladly agreed to give it a try.

events.name: Simple Attempts at Healthy Baking

2025-04.daily_overview: This was a day of intensive interaction and deep reflection. In the morning, Song Yajing immersed herself in her daughter's world, observing attentively and actively engaging during the parent open day. In the afternoon and evening, she translated her observations into action, conducting detailed parenting discussions with her husband and initiating a concrete response plan for her parents' health concerns. Family has always been her central concern and source of motivation.

events.name: Attending the Kindergarten Parent Open Day
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing arrived at her daughter's kindergarten on time. She quietly observed the morning activities, thematic lessons, and collaborative craft sessions from the back of the classroom. Seeing her daughter Chen Lexuan actively raising her hand and enjoying cooperation with her peers filled her heart with pride. During breaks in the activities, she proactively communicated with the homeroom teacher, who affirmed Xuanxuan's cheerful nature while gently noting that she sometimes showed a slight lack of patience. Song Yajing also chatted with several other mothers, exchanging parenting insights.

events.name: Accompany parents to complete a systematic physical examination.
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing took leave to accompany her parents to the community health service center. Under the arrangement of family doctor Wang Mingyuan, they completed a systematic geriatric health check-up, including blood pressure, blood sugar, blood lipids, electrocardiogram, and B-ultrasound examinations. She accompanied them throughout the process, assisting in communication between her parents and the medical staff. Based on the preliminary results, Dr. Wang provided daily health advice and informed them that the detailed report would be issued in a few days.

events.name: In-depth Discussion with Husband on Parenting Feedback
events.description: During dinner, Song Yajing gave her husband a detailed account of their daughter's performance at the open day and relayed the teacher's feedback regarding her [need to improve focus]. After the meal, the couple had an in-depth discussion in the living room and decided that, during their subsequent family time, they would consciously cultivate their daughter's focus and perseverance through longer sessions of parent-child reading, playing with puzzles, and bead-stringing games, while continuing to encourage her social strengths.

events.name: Launch the Healthy Baking Adjustment Program
events.description: Following the doctor's advice during the afternoon physical examination and based on previous research, Song Yajing officially incorporated healthy baking into her plan. She compiled detailed recipes and preparation steps for [Whole Wheat Sesame Bread] and [Low-Sugar High-Calcium Walnut Cake], planning to try making them this weekend and gradually adjust her family's snack choices.

events.name: Interaction and Practical Reflection in Online Courses
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing took some time to study the module on [circulation design] in her visual merchandising course. She saw related discussions on the course forum and replied based on her own store experience. At the same time, while looking at some old clothes at home, she came up with the idea of organizing a sharing session on old clothes upcycling for her neighbors. She thought it would not only allow her to share skills but also foster neighborhood relationships, so she noted down this idea.

events.name: An Evening Stroll with My Father
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing accompanied her father, Song Minghui, for a 30-minute walk in the residential area at a moderate pace. They discussed recent family matters, and her ankle has largely recovered.

events.name: Morning Brisk Walk
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing engaged in a 40-minute brisk walk at Egret Island Park, maintaining a heart rate between 130 and 140 beats per minute, with a slightly slower pace to avoid ankle discomfort.

In the evening, she led her family in trying out a new parent-child yoga session, exploring a novel approach that combines exercise with parent-child interaction, and made thorough preparations for the weekend activities.

events.name: Reviewing the Fixed Interaction Patterns with Parents

events.name: Purchase and prepare food for the weekend parent-child picnic.

events.name: Concrete Steps for Designing a Community Old Clothes Upcycling Course

events.name: Family Discussions Expand Environmental Awareness
events.description: The dinner discussion on garbage classification was successful, with a proposal to extend efforts to water conservation. Family members expressed support, creating a harmonious atmosphere.

events.name: First Attempt at Family Parent-Child Yoga
events.description: Try parent-child yoga for 20 minutes, with the whole family imitating the movements from the video, filled with laughter, and my daughter loves it.

events.name: Discuss establishing parent-child yoga as a regular weekend activity.
events.description: Post-practice discussions are scheduled as a regular Saturday activity, with a decision made to try new positions next time. Song Yajing feels content due to family interactions.

2025-04.daily_overview: This Sunday is a day for family reunion and health practice. Song Yajing returned to her parents' home in Quanzhou with homemade healthy baked goods, providing on-site instruction in healthy baking techniques and transforming her hobby into tangible care for her parents' health.

events.name: Morning Brisk Walk (Due to Schedule Adjustment)

events.name: Driving back to my parents' home in Quanzhou
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing drove back to Quanzhou with healthy baked goods. Her husband did not accompany her as he was working overtime, and she felt slightly tired from driving alone.

events.name: Present Healthy Snacks and Analysis Results to Parents
events.description: Upon arriving home, she presented the pastries and shared key dietary considerations. Her parents were pleased, and Song Yajing fulfilled their satisfaction through her caring gestures.

events.name: On-site Health Baking Instruction with Mother
events.description: In the afternoon, I taught my mother baking techniques. She studied earnestly, and our interaction was heartwarming.

events.name: Family Gatherings and Health Topic Discussions
events.description: During dinner, they enjoyed a healthy meal and exchanged updates on their recent lives. The father praised his daughter for her hard work, creating a harmonious atmosphere.

events.name: Returning to Xiamen and Agreeing with Mother to Maintain Continuous Attention
events.description: On the way back in the evening, Song Yajing felt relieved after fulfilling her responsibility, having agreed with her mother via WeChat to continue sharing recipes.

events.name: Evening Rest and Reading
events.description: Returning home exhausted in the evening, I read a novel to unwind and went to bed early to restore my energy.

2025-04.daily_overview: The success of yesterday's community class generated positive follow-up responses. Song Yajing's recognition among the neighbors increased, and she seized the opportunity to more systematically analyze the store's autumn inventory strategy while preparing a summary for the end-of-month business operations.

events.description: I walked briskly for 40 minutes in the Egret Island Park in the early morning, with my heart rate dropping to 132 beats per minute. The distance increased, and I enjoyed the results of my exercise.

events.name: Maintaining course community interaction through WeChat groups
events.description: Sharing photos and inspiration images in the course group sparked lively discussions among neighbors, enhancing approachability.

events.name: Analyze last autumn's sales data within the store.
events.description: Analyze sales records in the afternoon, assess market preferences, and prepare for autumn stock replenishment with a focus on efficiency.

events.name: Conduct an in-depth interview with regular customer Vivian.
events.description: In the evening, Vivian was invited for an interview to gather insights from young white-collar professionals. The conversation was pleasant and yielded valuable information.

events.name: Start preparing the monthly business briefing
events.description: In the evening, I organized this month's cash flow and feedback, started working on the briefing, and planned a weekend review, feeling that the direction is clear.

events.name: Unpack and read the newly arrived picture books.
events.description: Return home to open and read the courage-themed picture book, organize the bookshelf, and look forward to parent-child reading.

events.description: Before going to bed, I had a video call with my sister to discuss the specific use of the fund, received suggestions, and felt at ease to sleep early due to family planning.

2025-04.daily_overview: On the last day of April, Song Yajing purchased ingredients for the family's outdoor activity the next day, while her husband took charge of checking the equipment, demonstrating family collaboration. Meanwhile, she continued conducting market research and engaged in in-depth conversations with regular customers to gather information for the development of her store. In the evening, she routinely inspected the family's eco-friendly habits, bringing a successful conclusion to the efforts made in habit cultivation throughout the month.

events.name: Morning Brisk Walking (End-of-Month Summary)
events.description: I did a 45-minute brisk walk in Egret Island Park early in the morning, with my heart rate steadily maintained at 130 beats per minute. The distance covered increased significantly, and I am satisfied with my exercise progress this month.

events.name: Procurement of Family Picnic Ingredients for Labor Day
events.description: In the morning, purchase fruits, whole wheat bread, etc., to make sandwiches and lemonade. Prepare thoroughly and maintain a calm mood.

events.name: The husband checks the outdoor cycling equipment.
events.description: Chen Zhiqiang inspected the bicycle and equipment, with good family coordination. Song Yajing felt reassured due to orderly planning.

events.name: Daily Store Operations and In-depth Customer Communication
events.description: In the afternoon, I had an in-depth discussion with Vivian at the store regarding autumn trends, gathered market information, and noted that sales remained stable.

events.name: Study Autumn Fashion Trends
events.description: Browse fashion reports, save inspiration images, develop preliminary ideas for purchasing, and focus on efficiency.

events.name: Mother temporarily came to the store to help.
events.description: Song Yajing was grateful that her mother came to help look after the shop and warmly received customers, which alleviated the pressure.

events.name: Check Household Waste Sorting Habits
events.description: After dinner, I checked the trash bins. The sorting was correct, and the habit has been thoroughly integrated, bringing a sense of relief and satisfaction.

events.name: Evening Relaxation and Planning
events.description: Before bed, I discussed tomorrow's cycling route with my husband, listened to English music while reflecting on April, and looked forward to May with a harmonious mood.

events.name: Adhere to the skincare routine
events.description: After completing the evening skincare routine, my skin feels hydrated, and I have a strong sense of self-care and value recognition.

2025-05.daily_overview: Today is Labor Day. Song Yajing arranged a half-day closure for the shop and went on a cycling trip along the island ring road with her family, followed by a seaside picnic. After the ride, she experienced slight soreness in her legs but felt joyful and began planning for regular healthy exercise.

events.name: A Couple Secretly Plans a Birthday Surprise
events.description: In the evening, after his daughter Chen Lexuan fell asleep, husband Chen Zhiqiang quietly noted down in his phone memo the idea of celebrating his wife Song Yajing's birthday. He also began to conceptualize a surprise plan involving a greeting card and a cake, intending to start executing it with his daughter the next day.

events.name: Store Arrangements for Labor Day and Family Travel Preparations
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing posted a "Closed in the Afternoon on Labor Day" notice at the entrance of the shop and carefully briefed the shop assistant Xiaomei on the morning's precautions and closing procedures. She returned home punctually at noon and, together with her husband Chen Zhiqiang, loaded the pre-prepared picnic basket, folding chairs, and their daughter's small bicycle into the car. The family was ready to set off.

events.name: Parent-Child Cycling on the Ring Island Road
events.description: In the afternoon, the family of three chose a scenic coastal loop to begin their cycling journey. Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang rode side by side, watching their daughter Chen Lexuan excitedly pointing things out from the back seat. As the couple admired the sea view, they chatted about the recent situation of their shop and their daughter’s amusing anecdotes, enjoying a rare moment of relaxation.

events.name: Healthy Seaside Picnic
events.description: After cycling about 10 kilometers, they spread out a picnic blanket on a seaside lawn. Song Yajing took out the prepared Minnan-style meat-stuffed rice dumplings, fruits, sandwiches, and homemade cake. While their daughter played in the sand nearby, the couple chatted as they ate, discussing topics ranging from family plans to the development of their shop, all in a relaxed and pleasant atmosphere.

events.name: Organizing the Home and the Emergence of Exercise Awareness
events.description: After the picnic, the family carefully packed up all the trash and belongings before driving home. While washing the dishes and organizing the equipment, Song Yajing said to Chen Zhiqiang, "Cycling today felt wonderful—it really lightened my mood. Perhaps we should plan more activities like this." She began seriously considering incorporating regular exercise into their lives.

events.name: Formulate the May Store Operation Plan
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing sat by the coffee table in the living room, opened her tablet, and reviewed the sales data for April. Considering the upcoming summer season and the demand for seasonal changes, she outlined the key business priorities for May: strengthening online interactions with regular customers (especially VIPs like Vivian), planning end-of-summer clearance events, and beginning to gather information on autumn merchandise.

events.name: Selecting Picture Books for Parent-Child Reading
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing browsed an online picture book platform on her phone, selecting several picture books about courage and emotions, such as "The Brave Little Elephant" and "My Emotional Little Monster," for the parent-child reading activity planned for May, and added them to her shopping cart.

events.name: Labor Day Staff Care
events.description: As the shop owner, before leaving the shop at noon, Song Yajing not only paid the daily wages but also gave an additional holiday red envelope to the staff member Xiaomei, thanking her for her dedication during the holiday and advising her to rest well in the afternoon. This aligns with the caring nature characteristic of her ESFJ personality.

events.name: Slight leg soreness after cycling
events.description: During the evening rest, Song Yajing felt some soreness in her thigh and calf muscles, which is a normal reaction after not having engaged in long-distance cycling for an extended period. She decided to reduce her exercise intensity the next day to allow her body to recover.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with anticipation for the holiday arrangements

结束状态.心情: Feeling pleasant and relaxed, with a positive drive to plan for the future, though the body is slightly fatigued.

state.今日运动: Approximately 10 kilometers of cycling on the Ring Island Road, light activity

date_attribute.weather: Xiamen, cloudy turning overcast with scattered light rain in the afternoon.

2025-05.daily_overview: On the second day of the Labor Day holiday, Song Yajing mainly stayed at home to handle store reviews and family matters, deciding to rest due to muscle soreness from cycling the previous day. Her husband secretly arranged a birthday surprise, and as the weather was rainy, outdoor activities were reduced, allowing the family to enjoy a cozy indoor time together.

events.name: The idea of having parents move in together began to take shape.
events.description: After a video call with her mother Lin Xiuying in the morning, Song Yajing was moved by the slightly weary look on her mother’s face on the other end of the screen. That evening, while chatting casually with her husband Chen Zhiqiang, she tentatively brought up the topic: "Zhiqiang, I’ve been thinking—Mom and Dad are getting older. Although the Quanzhou-Xiamen high-speed railway is convenient, it still doesn’t mean they’re right by our side. What do you think about possibly bringing them to live in Xiamen?" Chen Zhiqiang expressed understanding but suggested that the matter needed careful consideration.

events.name: Adhere to parent-child reading time
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing fulfilled her plan by accompanying her daughter Chen Lexuan in her room to read the newly arrived picture book "The Brave Little Elephant." She narrated the story with vivid expression and emotion, guiding her daughter to reflect on "how the little elephant handled its fear." The daughter listened attentively and imitated the brave actions of the little elephant.

events.name: Review the Effectiveness of April Display Updates
events.description: During the holiday, Song Yajing conducted a detailed analysis of the store's sales data for April at home. She found that after adjusting the display at the entrance, the click-through rate and try-on rate of the season's main products had significantly improved. She recorded the successful experience in her notebook and considered how to apply this visual guidance to other areas.

events.name: Inspired by Viewing Health Data
events.description: Song Yajing checked the health app on her phone and found that since consciously increasing her walking, her average resting heart rate in April had decreased, and her total monthly step count had also risen. This small progress strengthened her determination to continue maintaining regular, light exercise.

events.name: The husband secretly ordered a birthday cake.
events.description: During the lunch break, Chen Zhiqiang made a special trip to a boutique bakery that Song Yajing had once praised. He placed an order for a tiramisu cake, her favorite, and specifically requested elegant decorations. He confirmed the pickup for the evening of May 4th.

events.name: Plan the menu for a birthday home banquet
events.description: When there were few customers in the shop in the afternoon, Song Yajing began drafting the birthday dinner menu in her phone's memo app. She planned to prepare her signature Minnan-style satay noodles and poached shrimp, along with a newly learned lemon roast chicken, with her own baked goods serving as dessert.

events.name: The husband scheduled a vehicle annual inspection.
events.description: Chen Zhiqiang scheduled the annual safety inspection for his family car on May 5th through the traffic management app. He also checked whether the vehicle license and insurance policy were valid to ensure a smooth process.

events.name: Preliminary Planning for Autumn Procurement Direction
events.description: Based on her review of fashion information and customer feedback, Song Yajing noted down her procurement ideas for the fall of 2025 in her notebook: focusing on gentle-style knitwear, sharply tailored trench coats, and versatile skirts, while beginning to pay attention to relevant supplier information.

events.name: Handling Online Customer Inquiries
events.description: Although it was a holiday, Song Yajing still responded to inquiries from several regular customers via WeChat regarding new products and sizes, maintaining client relationships, which reflects the daily routine of her self-employed status.

events.name: Morning exercise postponed due to muscle soreness.
events.description: Due to leg soreness from yesterday's cycling, Song Yajing decided to skip her morning walk today to allow her body to rest and recover. Instead, she engaged in light activities at home, handling household chores and store-related matters.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed and content due to the holiday, though experiencing slight physical discomfort.

结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled, as family planning and store review bring a sense of order, with muscle soreness alleviated.

2025-05.daily_overview: On Saturday, Song Yajing arranged a parent-child art trip, taking her daughter to visit an immersive light and shadow art exhibition. In the evening, she organized photos to share on her social media, fulfilling her social needs. With her physical recovery, she began considering resuming exercise.

events.name: Pre-Travel Preparations
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing arranged for Xiao Mei to take care of the shop and selected a comfortable yet photogenic dress for her daughter Xuanxuan. She checked the ticket reservation details, prepared a water bottle, wet wipes, and some snacks. After lunch, she drove her daughter to the art gallery.

events.name: Immersive Art Exhibition Experience
events.description: In the afternoon, the mother and daughter arrived at the art gallery. The exhibition featured flowing light and shadow, filled with interactive installations. The daughter, Xuanxuan, excitedly ran and touched exhibits in themed halls such as the starry sky and ocean. Song Yajing followed closely behind, using her phone to capture every moment of her daughter’s amazed expressions and interesting interactions, while patiently answering her endless stream of questions.

events.name: Purchasing Souvenirs and Tea Break
events.description: After the visit, Song Yajing bought her daughter a glowing planet night light as a souvenir at the art gallery shop. Subsequently, they ordered a small cake and some milk at the café inside the gallery. While eating, her daughter was still reminiscing about the "flying flowers" she had just seen. Watching her daughter's joyful expression, Song Yajing felt immensely content.

events.name: Sharing Parent-Child Moments on Moments
events.description: After her daughter fell asleep in the evening, Song Yajing selected the nine most satisfying photos and videos taken in the afternoon, meticulously splicing and color-grading them. She captioned the post, "Putting aside the trivialities of the shop, today I am Xuanxuan’s exclusive tour guide. May your world forever be filled with stars and oceans [heart]," and shared it on her social media feed. Soon, she received likes and warm comments from family, close friends, fellow church members, and customers.

events.name: Brief Communication with Suppliers
events.description: During her daughter's nap break, Song Yajing replied to a WeChat message from supplier Susan regarding a batch of summer clearance inventory. She quickly reviewed the images and prices, deciding to inspect the items more carefully at the store the next day, thus maintaining essential business communication.

events.name: Begin light exercise
events.description: In the evening, I took a 15-minute walk near home to test the recovery of my leg. The soreness has mostly subsided, and I plan to officially resume my morning brisk walks starting tomorrow.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to it, ready to start an interesting parent-child day, feeling better.

结束状态.心情: Happiness, joy, a sense of fulfillment after sharing, and restored confidence in sports.

2025-05.daily_overview: Song Yajing celebrated her 32nd birthday on Sunday, with the shop remaining open for business. Her husband and daughter secretly prepared a surprise for her. In the evening, a warm birthday celebration took place, accompanied by remote blessings from family members. Due to slightly increased food intake during the celebration, her weight rose, prompting a formal plan to incorporate morning walks into her routine.

events.name: Daughter making a birthday card
events.description: After picking up his daughter from kindergarten in the afternoon, Chen Zhiqiang accompanied Chen Lexuan in the living room to make a birthday card for her mother using colored pens, glitter, and stickers. Xuanxuan drew three little figures and asked her father to help write "Happy Birthday, Mom, I love you."

events.name: Purchase ingredients for birthday dinner
events.description: After closing the shop in the evening, Song Yajing did not go directly home. Instead, she first went to the supermarket to purchase fresh ingredients for dinner. She carefully selected satay sauce, prawns, chicken, and seasonal vegetables, and also bought a bouquet of flowers to decorate the dining table.

events.name: The store operates as usual on Sundays.
events.description: As it was Sunday, Zhongshan Road saw a steady flow of customers. Song Yajing and her assistant Xiaomei were busy in the shop all day, attending to several groups of customers. Song Yajing was in high spirits and mentioned to regular customers that it was her birthday.

events.name: The husband picks up the cake and completes the surprise with their daughter.
events.description: In the afternoon, Chen Zhiqiang took his daughter out under the pretext of buying snacks, but actually went to pick up the pre-ordered tiramisu cake. On the way home, he rehearsed the "secret mission" of presenting the greeting card and singing the birthday song with his daughter once again. Xuanxuan felt both nervous and excited.

events.name: Preparing a Birthday Family Feast
events.description: Song Yajing returned home, tied on her apron, and began bustling in the kitchen. Her husband, Chen Zhiqiang, assisted by preparing ingredients and setting the table, while their daughter supervised nearby. Soon, the aroma of dishes like satay noodles, poached shrimp, and lemon roast chicken filled the air.

events.name: A Warm Birthday Celebration
events.description: As dinner began, the daughter eagerly presented a greeting card, and Song Yajing, deeply moved, picked her up and kissed her repeatedly. Her husband lit the candles and turned off the lights, and the family of three sang the birthday song together. After making a wish for "family safety and health, and stable development of the shop," Song Yajing blew out the candles and shared the cake.

events.name: Accept blessings from distant family members.
events.description: After dinner, Song Yajing connected via WeChat video call with her parents in Quanzhou and her sister in Shenzhen simultaneously. On the other end of the screen, her parents smiled and wished her a happy birthday, while her sister Song Yawen playfully asked what gifts she had received. The lively online gathering lasted for nearly an hour.

events.name: Formally Plan a Morning Walk
events.description: Before going to bed, recalling the relaxation from holiday cycling and the happiness of her birthday, Song Yajing said to Chen Zhiqiang, "I've decided to start getting up early tomorrow to take walks by Yundang Lake, as a healthy birthday gift to myself." She marked the route and duration on her map app.

events.name: Participate in online Sunday sharing
events.description: As a Catholic, Song Yajing took time in the evening to participate in an online Sunday sharing session organized by the parish's WeChat group. She listened to the priest's brief sharing on "Gratitude and New Life" and offered a prayer of thanksgiving in her heart for her birthday.

events.name: Slightly excessive food consumption during birthday celebrations
events.description: Due to the birthday dinner and cake, Song Yajing consumed more calories than usual. She noticed a possible slight weight gain but decided to adjust through exercise tomorrow.

起始状态.心情: Calmness tinged with birthday anticipation

结束状态.心情: Happiness, moved, filled with gratitude and love, and full of anticipation for the health plan.

state.今日运动: Daily movement within the store, with no specialized exercise.

date_attribute.holiday: Day Off (Make-up Work Day)

2025-05.daily_overview: On the adjusted workday, the shop operates as usual. The husband handles the vehicle's annual inspection and maintenance. Song Yajing is busy during the day and reviews household expenses in the evening. Community activity planning is implemented, with a first attempt at morning walks, though the duration is brief. Weight remains slightly elevated due to yesterday's celebrations.

events.name: Organize Birthday Memories
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing carefully placed the greeting card drawn by her daughter into a keepsake box in the study. She then shared several heartwarming photos from last night's birthday dinner in the family WeChat group and on her social media feed, with the caption, "The simplest happiness is having loved ones by your side. Thank you all for your blessings."

events.name: Annual Vehicle Safety Inspection
events.description: Chen Zhiqiang drove his private car to the scheduled inspection station, where he queued up and completed the tests for exterior appearance, lighting, braking, exhaust emissions, and other items. While waiting for the results, he felt somewhat anxious. Fortunately, all the vehicle's indicators met the standards, and he successfully obtained the annual inspection sticker.

events.name: Regular Vehicle Maintenance
events.description: After the annual inspection, Chen Zhiqiang drove the car to his usual repair shop, where he had the engine oil and oil filter replaced. He also requested a comprehensive check of the tires, brake pads, and other components. The mechanic reported that the vehicle was in good condition, which put his mind at ease.

events.name: Both spouses jointly confirm household expenditures.
events.description: In the evening, Chen Zhiqiang presented Song Yajing with the vehicle inspection certificate, maintenance list, and an estimate for the upcoming insurance renewal, totaling approximately 3,500 yuan. After reviewing the documents together, they confirmed that the amount fell within their annual household budget. Song Yajing expressed understanding and support, acknowledging it as a necessary expense for maintaining the normal functioning of their household.

events.name: Refine the Community Activity Plan
events.description: After dinner, Song Yajing continued discussing the details of the community's old clothes upcycling workshop with her neighbor, Aunt Zhang, on WeChat. They ultimately settled on the theme of "Transforming Old T-Shirts into Eco-Friendly Bags." Drawing on her knowledge of clothing, Song Yajing prepared a detailed materials list (old T-shirts, scissors, sewing kits) and simple instructional diagrams, which she then sent to Aunt Zhang for confirmation.

events.name: First Attempt at Morning Walking
events.description: Song Yajing got up 20 minutes earlier than usual this morning and took a brisk 15-minute walk in the residential garden near her home. Though brief, the fresh air left her feeling refreshed and invigorated, strengthening her resolve to stick with the routine.

events.name: Daily Store Operations and Preparation for Summer Collection Clearance
events.description: In the store, Song Yajing and Xiaomei began organizing the inventory, selecting some summer styles to plan for a seasonal clearance sale later. Meanwhile, she attended to several regular customers and recommended lightweight pieces suitable for early summer.

events.name: Temporary overtime work for handling online orders
events.description: In the afternoon, due to an urgent request from a regular customer to alter the size of a garment, Song Yajing stayed an extra half hour after closing the shop to handle the matter, which delayed her dinner time and left her feeling somewhat fatigued.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a small determination to carry out the new plan.

结束状态.心情: Steady, satisfied with handling family affairs, but slightly fatigued.

state.今日运动: 15-minute brisk walk in the residential area in the morning

2025-05.daily_overview: Tuesday marked a return to routine, with Song Yajing officially launching her morning walking plan. After her walk, she purchased baking ingredients. In the afternoon, she experimented with a fruit tea-flavored cake. The autumn procurement plan was initiated, and suppliers were contacted. Her husband completed the car insurance renewal. Her weight showed a slight decrease due to exercise.

events.name: Complete vehicle insurance renewal.
events.description: During his lunch break, Chen Zhiqiang compared the commercial insurance quotes from several insurance companies on his mobile phone. He ultimately selected the plan with a good service reputation and high cost-effectiveness. With a single click in the app, he completed the renewal payment and sent the electronic policy to Song Yajing for archiving.

events.name: Organize Family Vehicle Documents
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing affixed the freshly issued annual inspection sticker to the car window and organized documents such as the annual inspection form, maintenance records, and both old and new insurance policies. She then placed them into the family's dedicated 'vehicle file' folder for easy future reference.

events.name: Morning Walk at Yundang Lake
events.description: Today, Song Yajing officially began implementing her plan. She woke up at 6:40 a.m., walked to the Yundang Lake Trail near her home, and completed a full 30 minutes of brisk walking. With a gentle breeze brushing across the lake and the soft morning light, she contemplated her work schedule for the day as she walked, feeling that her thoughts had become much clearer.

events.name: Procurement of New Baking Ingredients
events.description: On her way home from a brisk walk, Song Yajing stopped by her usual baking supply store to purchase low-gluten flour, light cream, as well as some fresh seasonal mangoes and peaches. She plans to experiment with incorporating the flavors of fruit tea into her cakes.

events.name: Try the fruit tea flavored cake.
events.description: In the afternoon, as the store's customer flow entered the off-peak period, Song Yajing asked Xiaomei to look after the shop while she began experimenting at the small workbench in the back room (occasionally used for altering clothes). She substituted some of the milk in the batter with steeped peach oolong tea, carefully proceeding and documenting each step. During the baking process, a faint aroma of tea and fruit filled the store.

events.name: Proactively contact suppliers for price inquiries.
events.description: During a break in the morning, Song Yajing contacted Susan, a supplier in Guangzhou, via WeChat voice message. She not only inquired about the prices of the remaining summer stock but, more importantly, shared her procurement intentions for autumn items such as knitwear and trench coats. She also asked Susan to share some forward-looking style information when she had time.

events.name: Feeling more energetic due to brisk walking
events.description: After power walking, Song Yajing felt more energetic throughout the day and experienced improved work efficiency, leading her to decide to stick to daily power walking.

起始状态.心情: Positive, with the drive to execute new plans.

结束状态.心情: Enriched and creative, excited to try new things, with a sense of fulfillment derived from sports.

state.今日运动: 30-minute brisk walk at Yundang Lake in the early morning

date_attribute.weather: Xiamen, cloudy, sultry in the afternoon

2025-05.daily_overview: A typical Wednesday involves balancing family, shop management, and personal hobbies. Continued parent-child reading and optimized in-store displays. Received feedback on the baked cake. The supplier sent the autumn new product catalog. Weight continues to decrease due to a healthy diet and exercise.

events.name: Parent-Child Emotional Cognition Reading
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing read "The Color Monster" with her daughter. Using the book's vivid illustrations, she helped her daughter identify that "happiness is yellow" and "sadness is blue." Xuanxuan listened with great interest and even pointed at the book, saying, "Mom, this part of me is yellow today!"

events.name: Optimize Corner Display in Stores
events.description: In the afternoon, based on the previous review, Song Yajing decided to reorganize a slightly cluttered accessory area in the store. Together with Xiao Mei, she rearranged the shelves, categorizing the accessories by color and style, and added warm-toned spotlights, instantly transforming the corner into an elegant and appealing space.

events.name: Collect Feedback on Baked Goods
events.description: Song Yajing shared the peach oolong chiffon cake she baked yesterday with her family for breakfast, and cut a piece to give to her neighbor, Aunt Zhang. In the afternoon at the shop, she also invited the staff member Xiaomei and a regular customer, Vivian, who was visiting, to try the cake. Everyone generally found the tea aroma refreshing and the taste unique. Vivian even jokingly asked if they were planning to introduce store-sold desserts.

events.name: Received the Autumn New Product Catalog
events.description: After closing for the night, Song Yajing received the electronic catalog and quotation for the autumn product line from Susan via WeChat. She eagerly browsed through it on her home tablet, and the wide variety of knitwear and trench coats immediately caught her eye. Using a stylus, she preliminarily circled over a dozen styles that interested her.

events.name: Online Communication with Fellow Baking Enthusiasts
events.description: Song Yajing shared photos of the cake and her thoughts in a baking group chat with Mrs. Liu and others. Mrs. Liu, who is in Hangzhou, immediately replied, praising the creativity and sharing her own experience of making milk pudding with grape jasmine tea. The two discussed for a while how the concentration of the tea infusion affects the flavor.

events.name: Handle daily accounts for the store
events.description: As the shop owner, Song Yajing verified the day's turnover before closing and settled the previous month's fees for several part-time clothing alteration masters via mobile banking. This is a routine financial task she handles every week.

events.name: Adjustment for Morning Walk Due to Rain
events.description: While out for a morning brisk walk, Song Yajing encountered scattered light rain and switched to a 20-minute fast-paced walk in the residential complex's underground garage, maintaining her exercise routine.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, ready to embrace a routine day.

结束状态.心情: Satisfying, with both the warmth of family and the joy of career progress and interest exchanges.

state.今日运动: A 20-minute brisk morning walk (indoors), followed by organizing and tidying up work in the store.

2025-05.daily_overview: The store saw sparse customer flow due to the showery weather. Song Yajing held a video conference with her family to discuss the issue of her parents' elderly care, which left her feeling anxious and staying up late. Community activities and autumn procurement progressed as planned. Her weight increased slightly due to stress.

events.name: Family Video Conference Discussing Parental Elderly Care
events.description: In the evening, the family of three had a four-way video call with their parents in Quanzhou, Song Minghui and Lin Xiuying. Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang sincerely proposed the idea of bringing them to live in Xiamen, analyzing the pros and cons (such as healthcare, companionship, and adapting to a new environment). The parents were both touched and hesitant upon hearing this, stating that they needed time to consider and expressing concerns about burdening their children. The conversation ended in a candid yet somewhat heavy atmosphere.

events.name: A relaxed dinner exchange after the meeting.
events.description: After the video conference, the family had dinner together. The atmosphere became much more relaxed, and everyone chatted about the convenience of life in Xiamen and Quanzhou, as well as the amusing stories of their granddaughter Xuanxuan in kindergarten. Song Yajing's mother, Lin Xiuying, talked about the churches and parks in Xiamen, showing a noticeably increased interest. Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang once again expressed their full support for whatever decision their parents ultimately make.

events.name: Community Activity Venue Secured
events.description: Aunt Zhang excitedly informed Song Yajing that she had successfully applied to the community residents' committee for the use of the activity room on the afternoon of May 15. Song Yajing promptly designed a lively electronic version of the activity notice, posted it in the community owners' group, and asked Aunt Zhang to print several copies to put up on the bulletin board.

events.name: Establish the Autumn Procurement Budget Framework
events.description: Based on the quotation provided by Susan and the forecast for autumn sales, Song Yajing drafted a preliminary procurement budget allocation in her notebook, roughly dividing the funds among categories such as knitwear, trench coats, and skirts, and began planning the collection cycle.

events.name: Formally Requesting Samples from Suppliers
events.description: From the selected styles, Song Yajing chose eight of the most representative ones (covering different categories and colors) and formally requested Susan via WeChat to send samples. Both parties confirmed the shipping address and logistics method, and Susan agreed to arrange the shipment as soon as possible.

events.name: Analysis of Store Foot Traffic on Rainy Days and Online Maintenance
events.description: Due to the rain, there were fewer customers in the store today. Song Yajing and Xiao Mei organized the inventory together and posted "Rainy Day Benefits" or new product previews on WeChat Moments and customer groups. They actively maintained online customer engagement to compensate for the lack of offline foot traffic.

events.name: Sleeplessness and late nights due to anxiety
events.description: After the family meeting, Song Yajing was in a complex mood. Lying in bed, she repeatedly pondered the issue of her parents' elderly care, which led to insomnia and caused her to fall asleep very late.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a slight unease about the family meeting.

结束状态.心情: Relieved yet somewhat complicated, family issues have been formally raised, but anxiety has led to exhaustion.

state.今日运动: A 30-minute brisk walk in the morning (with an umbrella)

2025-05.daily_overview: Received the autumn samples on Friday and evaluated the selections with the store staff. Daily operations at the store are running smoothly. Weight has recovered due to a healthy diet.

events.name: Evaluate Autumn Procurement Samples
events.description: In the afternoon, the courier delivered the sample package sent by Susan. Song Yajing and Xiaomei eagerly unpacked it, carefully examining the fabric texture, stitching craftsmanship, and pattern tailoring of each garment. They took turns trying on the clothes, discussing in front of the mirror whether the colors complemented their skin tones and whether the styles suited Xiamen’s climate and target customer base. Xiaomei also boldly offered suggestions from her youthful perspective.

events.name: Screen and determine the preferred styles
events.description: After nearly two hours of trying on and discussing, Song Yajing preliminarily selected five styles from eight samples that met her criteria of "good quality, distinctive features, and easy to match." She documented the selection results and revision suggestions (such as requesting additional sizes for certain colors) for further in-depth communication with Susan.

events.name: A brief exchange with my best friend about recent updates
events.description: While evaluating the samples, Song Yajing received a WeChat message from her close friend Li Meiling, asking if she was free to meet up over the weekend. Song Yajing replied that she had been feeling a bit tired lately and had some things on her mind to talk about. The two agreed to meet again on Sunday.

events.name: Stay updated on your daughter's kindergarten activities.
events.description: When picking up her daughter in the evening, Song Yajing learned from the teacher that the kindergarten was about to start preparing for the June 1st graduation ceremony. She kept it in mind and planned to talk with her daughter over the weekend to see if she would like to perform in the program.

events.name: Adhere to morning brisk walking.
events.description: Although she went to bed a little late last night, Song Yajing still persisted with her morning walk. She found that this habit had already begun to integrate into her life, becoming an essential ritual to start the day.

events.name: Casual Friends Gathering Invitation
events.description: In the evening, Wu Xiaoli, a high school classmate who had not been in touch for a long time, suddenly sent a WeChat message inviting Song Yajing to a weekend dinner. Song Yajing politely declined due to prior arrangements but agreed to meet up next time.

起始状态.心情: Smooth

结束状态.心情: Focused and with a sense of accomplishment, substantial progress has been made in product selection work.

state.今日运动: 30-minute morning walk

2025-05.daily_overview: I took my parents back to Quanzhou over the weekend. The journey was warm-hearted, yet tinged with reluctance. After returning to Xiamen, I maintained client relationships and proactively reached out to my close friend to share the stress I was feeling. Due to exhaustion, I canceled my morning walk, and my weight decreased slightly.

events.name: Sending my parents back to Quanzhou
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing and her husband Chen Zhiqiang drove her parents back to Quanzhou. During the ride, her mother Lin Xiuying held her hand and urged her to reconsider moving to Xiamen, while her father reminded her not to overwork herself in managing the shop. Upon arrival, they left the Xiamen-style pastries and the cakes and snacks made by Song Yajing, and after a brief reunion, they set off on their return journey to Xiamen.

events.name: Maintaining VIP Customer Relationships
events.description: After returning to Xiamen in the afternoon, Song Yajing immediately opened her computer and sent carefully crafted birthday greetings and exclusive coupons to several regular customers celebrating their birthdays this month via WeChat. For important clients like Vivian, she also included a few newly arrived autumn sample images featuring styles suitable for them as a pre-launch promotion.

events.name: Actively Seek Support from Close Friends
events.description: In the evening, feeling physically and mentally exhausted, Song Yajing proactively sent a WeChat message to her close friend Li Meiling: "Meiling, are you free tomorrow afternoon? I've been feeling really down lately and want to have a good talk with you." Li Meiling immediately replied with concern, and the two quickly arranged to meet at a quiet tea restaurant in Huli District on Sunday afternoon.

events.name: Family Dinner Conversation Insights
events.description: In the evening, while the family of three was having dinner, Song Yajing talked about her feelings after sending her parents home. She also mentioned some recent rumors she had heard about possible municipal renovations on Zhongshan Road (a vague reminder from their landlady, Sister Li), expressing a faint concern about the future of their shop. Chen Zhiqiang comforted her, advising her not to overthink it for now and to wait until there was definite news.

events.name: Preparing for the Next Day's Confession
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing sorted through the recent issues troubling her mind: the dilemma of her parents' elderly care, potential changes facing her shop, rumors of business contraction at her husband's company... She realized these pressures needed an outlet.

events.name: Canceling morning walk due to fatigue
events.description: Feeling particularly exhausted from getting up early to see her parents off this morning, Song Yajing decided to cancel her morning walk and rest a bit longer.

起始状态.心情: With a touch of parting melancholy

结束状态.心情: Fatigued, with a backlog of emotions, yet looking forward to tomorrow's conversation.

state.今日运动: (Spent most of the time in the vehicle)
