2025-07.daily_overview: Today is Financial Consultation and Customer Service Day. In the morning, a jog helped clarify the confusion regarding autumn orders. In the afternoon, professional financial planning advice was obtained at the bank. Subsequently, an important client, Vivian, was successfully received at the store, where not only a sale was completed but also valuable operational suggestions were gained. By the end of the day, the direction for both family finances and store operations has become clearer.

events.name: Reflections on Management Decisions During Morning Runs
events.description: Faced with the differing product styles and cost pressures from suppliers Susan and Zheng Kai, Song Yajing weighed her options repeatedly during her morning run. Amid the steady rhythm of her steps and breathing, she gradually clarified her thoughts: Susan's products were high-volume with mass-market designs, forming the foundation of the store's revenue; Zheng Kai's unique designs could elevate the store's image and were suitable as standout pieces. She decided to maintain the bulk of her orders with Susan while experimenting with small batches of Zheng Kai's collaborative designs, balancing risk and innovation.

events.name: Prepare financial consulting materials
events.description: After returning home from her run, Song Yajing quickly organized the household income and expenditure records and shop transaction details from the past three months. She calculated the family's average monthly basic expenses (approximately 15,000 yuan) and noted these figures on a memo, planning to bring it to the bank for consultation in the afternoon.

events.name: Bank Consultation on Family Emergency Reserve Fund Plan
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing visited the Siming Sub-branch of the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China to meet with the client manager, Lin Xiaofeng. She provided a detailed explanation of her family situation, the goal of covering six months of expenses, and her monthly savings plan of 5,000 yuan. Based on her conservative preferences and liquidity needs, Manager Lin recommended a portfolio solution: part of the funds would be deposited in high-liquidity demand-based wealth management products, while another portion would be allocated to short-term fixed deposits. Song Yajing carefully listened to the advice and took away the product brochures.

events.name: Welcomed regular customer Vivian and successfully made a sale.
events.description: Shortly after returning from the bank, Vivian arrived at the store as scheduled. Song Yajing enthusiastically showcased several early autumn new arrivals that had just arrived. After trying them on, Vivian was very satisfied with a beige lightweight trench coat and a lotus-pink knit dress, and decided to purchase them immediately. Song Yajing processed a membership discount and packaging for her.

events.name: Obtain customer feedback and exchange baking insights
events.description: During Vivian's fitting break, the two chatted casually. Vivian mentioned that she really liked the photos on the store's social media feed but suggested including more close-up shots of details and dynamic videos of the outfits being worn. They also discovered that both had recently been experimenting with new baking recipes. Vivian shared her experience of failing to make a Basque cheesecake, and the two had a delightful conversation, agreeing to exchange their finished creations for tasting next time.

events.name: Organize Consultation Suggestions and Customer Feedback
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing reviewed Manager Lin's financial advice and noted down Vivian's suggestions regarding photo shooting. She felt that this consultation was quite valuable and that the client feedback was practical. She decided to finalize the plan with her husband tomorrow and attempt to improve the quality of the online images for the store.

起始状态.心情: Start the morning run with an unresolved question in mind, feeling slightly contemplative.

结束状态.心情: Clear and delightful, both financial and operational confusions have received beneficial inputs and made clear progress.

state.今日运动: Morning run for 40 minutes

2025-07.daily_overview: Today is the day for decision implementation and sharing preparation. During the day, when the store was not busy, Song Yajing thoroughly researched several financial products recommended by Manager Lin using her phone. In the evening, she and her husband made a joint decision and finalized the storage plan for their family emergency fund. At the same time, she began preparing a simple speech outline for the community sharing session and put her exploration of online operations into practice by attempting sales guidance on Xiaohongshu. Due to her busy schedule, she went to bed slightly later than usual.

events.name: Research on Low-Risk Financial Instruments
events.description: During the morning and afternoon off-peak hours, Song Yajing used her mobile banking app and wealth management platforms to carefully compare the recent yields, minimum purchase amounts, and redemption rules of several money market funds and short-term bank wealth management products recommended by Manager Lin. She took brief notes and specifically highlighted two products with good liquidity and relatively stable returns.

events.name: Create a Community Sharing Outline
events.description: During her lunch break, Song Yajing opened a PowerPoint presentation on her computer. Based on her career journey and personal reflections organized over the past few days, she created a simple sharing outline. She divided the content into four parts: "Career Starting Point: Learning from a Sales Assistant Role," "Entrepreneurial Journey: Opportunities and Challenges," "Operational Experience: Insights from Running My Own Store," and "Work-Life Balance: The Symphony of Family and Career." For each section, she only listed a few keywords and the titles of the short stories she planned to share.

events.name: Try Xiaohongshu Sales Guidance
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing photographed the trench coat and dress purchased by Vivian the previous day. Applying the composition and lighting techniques learned from earlier courses, she deliberately captured several close-up shots of the buttons and fabric texture. When posting the Xiaohongshu note, she added for the first time at the end of the caption: "Customers in Xiamen can visit the store for try-ons. DM for inquiries—there might be a surprise!" She also began researching the process of opening a Xiaohongshu shop.

events.name: Work with the husband to finalize the emergency fund plan.
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing discussed in detail with Chen Zhiqiang the financial management information she had researched during the day and Manager Lin's proposal. Considering potential major future household expenses (such as their daughter's education and vehicle replacement), the two decided to divide the emergency reserve into two parts: ¥30,000 would be deposited into a money market fund that allows redemption at any time, while the remaining portion would be deposited monthly into a one-year fixed deposit on a rolling basis. They decided to visit the bank within the week to open accounts and make the initial transfers.

events.name: Received shipping notification from supplier
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing received a WeChat message from Susan, informing her that the first batch of new autumn products had been shipped from the Guangzhou warehouse, along with the logistics tracking number. She noted down the tracking number, feeling a more concrete sense of anticipation for the autumn sales season.

events.name: Temporary handling of urgent customer orders
events.description: In the evening, a regular customer urgently ordered a product via WeChat. Song Yajing spent extra time coordinating the shipment, which resulted in her resting slightly later that night.

起始状态.心情: Calm and ready to handle specific matters.

结束状态.心情: Steady and fulfilling, the family financial plan has been implemented, and new attempts have been made in sharing outlines and online operations.

2025-07.daily_overview: Today, Song Yajing focused on friendship and personal health. She carefully prepared gifts to visit her close friend who had just given birth and maintained her morning jogging routine. In terms of store management, she began to apply a more professional perspective in product selection, balancing her personal life with career pursuits. Due to experimenting with a new baking recipe, she rested slightly earlier.

events.name: Morning Running Practice for Breath Adjustment
events.description: During her morning run, Song Yajing deliberately tried to adjust her breathing rhythm to match her cadence. It felt awkward at first, but she gradually found her rhythm in the latter half of the run, making it much smoother. After the run, she carefully checked the heart rate data on her app and noticed that her recovery speed was faster than last month, which delighted her.

events.name: Preparing gifts to visit a close friend
events.description: Before closing the shop in the morning, Song Yajing baked a box of red date and walnut cakes in her home kitchen, symbolizing "early birth of a precious child" and "family happiness." At the same time, she sorted out several soft and adorable infant bodysuits that her daughter wore as a baby, carefully washed and ironed them, and packaged them together with the cakes in a beautiful gift box, ready to bring to her close friend Li Meiling tomorrow.

events.name: Conduct online product selection with a professional perspective.
events.description: That afternoon in the store, while browsing new arrivals on the online wholesale market, Song Yajing no longer relied solely on what "looked good." Instead, she consciously applied the color coordination theories she had previously learned (such as the suitability of Morandi color palettes for autumn) and her knowledge of clothing silhouettes. She filtered out several designs that were simple in style, featured subtle yet distinctive details, and aligned with mainstream aesthetics, adding them to her selection list.

events.name: Confirm the Visit Arrangements
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing contacted Li Meiling via WeChat to inquire about her and the baby's condition, and confirmed the specific time and ward number for the hospital visit the following afternoon. Li Meiling replied that she was looking forward to her visit very much.

events.name: Attempted new baking recipe failed
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing attempted to make a low-sugar macaron, but the attempt failed due to improper proportions in the recipe. She decided to try again tomorrow and went to rest early to adjust her state.

起始状态.心情: Full of care and expectation

结束状态.心情: Warm and fulfilling, the process of preparing gifts for friends itself brings joy.

state.今日运动: 35-minute morning run, focusing on breathing adjustment

2025-07.daily_overview: Today was a day of friendship support, budding personal interests, and the completion of a financial plan. In the morning, she visited her postpartum best friend to offer emotional support. In the afternoon, she handled logistics for her shop and developed an interest in learning the piano. During her evening jog, she felt the positive changes brought about by consistent exercise. In the evening, she and her husband reviewed the process of planning their emergency fund, marking the successful completion of this important family decision. Due to exhaustion from the visit, she canceled her workout.

events.name: Visiting Postpartum Friend Li Meiling
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing arrived at the hospital with carefully prepared gifts. In the hospital room, she presented Li Meiling with red date and walnut cakes and baby clothes, and gently held the newborn. The two engaged in a deep conversation lasting about an hour, during which Song Yajing shared her own experiences of being overwhelmed when raising her daughter, while Li Meiling confided about the various physical discomforts after childbirth, as well as the anxieties and joys of becoming a mother for the first time. Song Yajing's companionship and empathy provided great comfort to her close friend.

events.name: Track Logistics for Autumn New Products
events.description: On the way back from the hospital, Song Yajing checked the tracking number provided by Susan on her phone, which showed that the goods had arrived at the Xiamen Distribution Center. She informed Susan via WeChat that she had retrieved the logistics information and also inquired about the estimated shipping time for the second batch of goods.

events.name: Develop an interest in learning the piano.
events.description: While picking up her daughter Chen Lexuan for piano lessons in the evening, Song Yajing chatted with the piano teacher and learned about the adult beginner classes. Watching her daughter’s focused expression while playing the piano, Song Yajing recalled her love for English music and her long-held, vague yearning for the instrument. Considering it both a personal interest and a way to relieve stress, she immediately decided to enroll in a two-month adult piano beginner course and scheduled her first lesson for mid-August.

events.name: Experience the positive changes brought by sports.
events.description: During her morning run today, Song Yajing no longer needed to consciously think about how to persevere; instead, she naturally enjoyed the dopamine release brought by running itself and the tranquility of the early morning. She clearly felt that her physical stamina and energy levels had improved significantly compared to the beginning of the month, and her sense of control over her busy life had strengthened. Her inner self had become calmer and more confident.

events.name: Complete the closed-loop planning for emergency funds
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang briefly reviewed the entire process from car maintenance to bank consultation, and finally to finalizing the plan. They confirmed that going forward, they only needed to follow the plan for automatic transfers and conduct regular reviews. Both felt reassured and in sync, pleased with the smooth launch of this plan to enhance their family's sense of security.

events.name: Canceling the evening walk to visit a close friend.
events.description: Due to the extended hospital visit, Song Yajing canceled her originally planned evening walk and opted to rest at home instead.

起始状态.心情: Filled with goodwill and anticipation, ready to support a good friend.

结束状态.心情: Abundant and serene, friendships are nurtured, personal goals are renewed, and family plans are successfully realized.

state.今日运动: A 38-minute morning run, enjoying the running process.

2025-07.daily_overview: On the weekend, Song Yajing's life revolved around family rituals and the execution of plans. In the morning, she conducted final rehearsals for her community sharing session; in the afternoon, the whole family went out to formally open an emergency reserve fund account at the bank and completed the first fund transfer. A warm family dinner in the evening brought July to a perfect close, and her parents' suggestions further broadened her business perspective. Due to the joy of the gathering, she retired to rest a little earlier.

events.name: Final Rehearsal for Community Sharing Content
events.description: Before the store opened in the morning, Song Yajing conducted a complete mock presentation in front of the mirror inside the shop. She strictly controlled the time to around 10 minutes and deliberately practiced the tone and expressions for several key stories. Based on the rehearsal, she adjusted the order of the two stories, "Difficulties in the Early Stages of Entrepreneurship" and "Balancing Family Life," to make the overall flow smoother and more compelling.

events.name: Greeting My Best Friend Again and Sharing the Joy
events.description: During a break in the drill, Song Yajing sent a message via WeChat to Li Meiling, asking if she and the baby had settled in well after returning home from the hospital. At the same time, she shared several heartwarming photos (with Li Meiling's consent) taken during her visit the previous day in their three-person close friends' group chat. Wang Jia, who is far away in Shenzhen, also sent her blessings, filling the group with joy.

events.name: Open a dedicated account for family emergency reserve funds
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang, carrying the necessary documents, went together to the Siming Sub-branch of the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China. With the assistance of their account manager, Lin Xiaofeng, they opened a new savings account in the name of their family, specifically designated for storing emergency reserves. They also signed an agreement on the spot to set up an automatic monthly transfer of 5,000 yuan from their main account.

events.name: Completed the first transfer of emergency reserve funds
events.description: After the account was opened, Song Yajing immediately transferred the first 30,000 yuan as startup capital from the family savings into this new account via mobile banking. Simultaneously, she updated the family ledger, listing "Emergency Reserve Fund Savings" as a fixed monthly expense item and adjusted the other disposable budgets accordingly.

events.name: End-of-Month Family Dinner and Planning
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing's parents came from Quanzhou to stay in Xiamen for a short visit. She prepared a table full of sumptuous Minnan cuisine, especially making the satay noodles her father loved. At the dinner table, her father, Song Minghui, offered advice on the operation of her shop, suggesting she "seek progress while maintaining stability and serve regular customers well." Meanwhile, her mother expressed concern about her granddaughter's summer vacation plans. Amid laughter and cheerful conversation, the family discussed the possibility of a road trip around the area next month. After the meal, Song Yajing packed some of the desserts she had made over the past few days for her parents to take back with them.

events.name: New Family Swimming Trial Preparation
events.description: During dinner, the family discussed and decided to start trying family swimming activities from next weekend to cope with the summer heat. Song Yajing began researching the opening hours of the community swimming pool.

起始状态.心情: Slightly nervous but well-prepared, making the final sprint for the presentation.

结束状态.心情: Perfect and relaxed, with all important matters completed, the family reunion brings profound happiness.

2025-07.daily_overview: A tranquil and fulfilling Sunday. The morning mass and family time nourished Song Yajing's spirituality and family bonds; the afternoon was spent receiving and inventorying goods at the shop, making tangible preparations for the upcoming autumn sales; the evening's practice speech boosted her confidence for the upcoming community sharing in a few days; and the final scheduled morning run of the month inspired her to start planning her fitness goals for the next month. The first attempt at a new family swimming activity was also experienced.

events.name: Sunday Mass and Family Faith Sharing
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing and her family attended Mass at the church as usual. On the way home, she shared her understanding of the day's scripture readings with her husband and daughter, particularly the parts about "faith" and "daily responsibilities." She felt this resonated with her recent efforts in financial planning for the family. The family enjoyed a pleasant lunch together in harmony.

events.name: Receive the first batch of new autumn products
events.description: In the afternoon at the shop, Song Yajing received a call from the logistics delivery personnel. She and Xiaomei together signed for several large boxes shipped from Guangzhou. After opening the boxes, they conducted a preliminary inventory check based on the order, inspected the clothing for any noticeable shipping stains or damages, and temporarily stored the goods in the warehouse area. Upon seeing the actual items, Song Yajing was very satisfied with the texture and colors of the autumn clothing.

events.name: Rehearsal Sharing with Husband
events.description: After closing the shop and returning home in the evening, Song Yajing asked her husband Chen Zhiqiang to act as an audience for a complete rehearsal of her sharing session. After listening, Chen Zhiqiang felt that the story was very authentic and the timing was well-controlled. He suggested that she could adopt a more relaxed tone when discussing the "balancing family" section. Song Yajing adjusted several expressions based on the feedback.

events.name: The Last Planned Morning Run and Summary for July
events.description: Today marks the last scheduled morning run of the month. Song Yajing has meticulously recorded all the data and reflected on her journey of using morning runs to relieve stress, clarify her thoughts, and ultimately establish a routine. She feels that both her physical fitness and mental state have improved positively. She has decided not only to persist with the practice next month but also to try increasing the distance or frequency slightly.

events.name: First Family Swimming Attempt
events.description: In the afternoon, the entire family went to the community swimming pool for their first family swimming attempt. Song Yajing and her daughter played in the shallow water, while her husband Chen Zhiqiang provided guidance on basic swimming techniques. Although Song Yajing was not a strong swimmer, she enjoyed the parent-child interaction and planned to make it a regular activity twice a month.

起始状态.心情: Anning, get ready to enjoy family and faith time.

结束状态.心情: Calm and content, faith is nourished, affairs proceed smoothly, and there is a clear plan for the future.

state.今日运动: 40 minutes of morning jogging, 1 hour of family swimming.

2025-07.daily_overview: The new week began with busy shop operations. Song Yajing devoted her full energy throughout the day to handling the autumn new arrivals: counting, quality checking, ironing, and displaying them, while also applying newly learned skills to shoot promotional materials. Simultaneously, she evaluated the sample garments for the collaboration line and finalized the production order. The efficient and pragmatic day laid a solid foundation for the autumn sales. Due to the heavy workload, she rested a bit later than usual.

events.name: A Chance Encounter During Morning Run and Insights Sharing
events.description: At the end of her morning run, Song Yajing encountered her close friend Li Meiling in the park, who had also resumed her morning exercise routine (having completed postpartum confinement and was now walking for recovery). The two had a brief conversation, during which Song Yajing shared her recent experience of alleviating anxiety and achieving clearer thinking through running. Li Meiling expressed that she felt inspired by this, and the two agreed to exercise together once Li Meiling’s physical condition improved further.

events.name: Inventory and Warehousing of New Autumn Products
events.description: As soon as the store opened in the morning, Song Yajing and the sales assistant Xiaomei began formally counting the new autumn arrivals received the previous day. They checked each item for style, color, size, and quantity, inspected for loose threads and workmanship, and set aside any defective pieces to be returned. After confirming everything was correct, they attached the store's price tags to all the merchandise and entered the items into the inventory management system.

events.name: Utilize new skills to shoot promotional materials.
events.description: Taking advantage of the best lighting in the shop during the afternoon, Song Yajing meticulously arranged a corner and applied the photography techniques she learned last week to capture multiple sets of high-quality photos and several short videos for several key autumn new arrivals. She paid special attention to composition and detail presentation, resulting in significantly improved image quality, which she prepared for WeChat promotion.

events.name: Evaluate the co-branded sample garments and place an order
events.description: Meanwhile, Song Yajing received the sample of the co-branded knitwear sent by Zheng Kai. She carefully inspected the craftsmanship and fit, and invited Xiaomei to try it on. After a comprehensive evaluation, she found the design unique and the fabric comfortable, deciding to place a small initial order. She communicated with Zheng Kai over the phone to confirm the final modifications and the quantity for the first batch.

events.name: New Product Ironing and Display
events.description: Before leaving work, Song Yajing ironed some of the newly inventoried autumn items. Based on her aesthetic sense and sales experience, she meticulously arranged them in prominent positions in the shop window and at the entrance, replacing some of the summer products. The store instantly took on an autumnal atmosphere.

events.name: Confirm Piano Course Registration
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing confirmed the time, location, and fee for the first adult beginner piano lesson on August 16 with the piano teacher via WeChat and completed the registration and payment through an online transfer. She is filled with anticipation for the new learning journey that is about to begin.

events.name: Handling Online Customer Complaints
events.description: In the evening, a customer complained about a logistics delay. Song Yajing spent extra time communicating to resolve the issue, which resulted in an extension of her work into the night.

起始状态.心情: Full of drive, ready to tackle the backlog of store operations.

结束状态.心情: Exhausted yet immensely fulfilled, the refreshed store displays and high-quality promotional materials have greatly boosted confidence in the autumn sales.

2025-07.daily_overview: Today marked the shining debut of Song Yajing's personal brand in the community. During the day, she operated her store as usual while finding time to make final preparations for the evening event. In the evening, she delivered a sincere and moving speech as a representative of female entrepreneurship at the community neighborhood festival, not only earning applause but also gaining new community connections and potential clients, taking a new step toward her career goals. Excited by the event, she went to bed a little later than usual.

events.name: Daily Store Sales and Pre-Sharing Preparation
events.description: During the day, Song Yajing kept the shop running as usual while mentally rehearsing the key points she would share that evening. She changed into a suit from her own store—one that appeared both professional and approachable—and touched up her makeup, preparing to attend the event with a positive and energetic demeanor.

events.name: Community Neighborhood Festival Entrepreneurship Theme Sharing
events.description: In the evening, at the neighborhood festival held in the community activity center, Song Yajing, as an invited representative of female entrepreneurs, took the stage and delivered a 10-minute speech titled "From Sales Assistant to Shop Owner: My Ten-Year Journey in Fashion." Drawing from her personal experiences, she candidly shared the highs and lows of entrepreneurship, her attempts to balance family and career, and her understanding of small yet charming brick-and-mortar stores. Her story, authentic and down-to-earth, resonated deeply with many residents in attendance, especially young mothers.

events.name: Communicate with community residents after sharing.
events.description: After the sharing session concluded, several young mothers and full-time homemakers from the community proactively approached Song Yajing to engage in conversation. They inquired about the specific details of opening a store, how to find reliable suppliers, and techniques for daily time management. Song Yajing enthusiastically answered each question one by one and exchanged WeChat contacts with several neighbors she had particularly good conversations with, creating a very harmonious atmosphere. This sharing session significantly enhanced her visibility and favorability within the local community.

events.name: Plan joint promotions with newly added neighboring businesses.
events.description: During the conversation, a neighbor who runs a coffee shop proposed collaborating on a joint promotional event. Song Yajing readily agreed and arranged to discuss the details next week.

起始状态.心情: Slightly nervous but more so filled with anticipation, ready to deliver an important self-presentation.

结束状态.心情: Excited and inspired, the shared successes and newly established connections made her feel that her personal value was recognized and that new possibilities had opened up for her career.

2025-07.daily_overview: The afterglow of the sharing event still lingers. Song Yajing focused today on post-event social maintenance and a monthly review of online operations. She proactively reached out to newly acquainted neighbors, transforming community influence into potential client relationships. Simultaneously, she began systematically summarizing the gains and losses of the online promotional efforts in July and set new operational goals for August. Due to the time invested in the review, she rested slightly earlier.

events.name: Strengthen the newly established community connections
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing organized the WeChat contacts of several neighbors newly added during last night's event. She sent thank-you messages to each of them, along with a brief introduction and address of her shop, expressing her welcome for them to visit when they had time. Two neighbors replied that they would like to visit over the weekend. Song Yajing felt that the follow-up effect of this sharing activity was very positive.

events.name: Monthly Online Operations Review for July
events.description: When the shop was not busy in the afternoon, Song Yajing opened her phone and computer to conduct a comprehensive review of the online operations for the entire month of July. She examined the interaction data from WeChat Moments, customer groups, and Xiaohongshu notes, comparing them with the goals set at the beginning of the month: "improving the quality of online images" and "increasing interactions." She concluded that after enhancing the image quality, the number of inquiries had increased significantly, but the sales conversion guidance on Xiaohongshu was still in the experimental stage. She began to formulate a preliminary plan for August, focusing on either hosting an in-store livestream or inviting a local lifestyle blogger for a store visit.

events.name: Preliminary discussion on cooperation with neighboring cafes
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing had a brief exchange via WeChat with the café neighbor she met yesterday, preliminarily confirming the idea of a joint promotion: setting up a clothing display area for the store in the café and recommending customers to each other.

events.name: Morning run canceled due to hot weather.
events.description: Due to the high-temperature warning in the morning, Song Yajing canceled her morning run and switched to light indoor stretching instead.

结束状态.心情: The thinking has become clearer, leading to a more data-driven understanding of online operations, and new plans have been formulated for the next month.

2025-07.daily_overview: On the last day of July, Song Yajing completed her monthly review and outlook on personal health habits during her morning run. During the day, she efficiently handled end-of-month tasks such as updating inventory data for the store. In the evening, she conducted a brief review of family and store affairs with her husband, reflecting on a fulfilling and challenging yet rewarding July, and setting a tone for a stable start to life in August.

events.name: End-of-Month Morning Running Summary and Habit Establishment
events.description: During her morning run, Song Yajing reflected on the past month: what began as an experiment had evolved into a solid habit, helping her release financial stress, clarify her ordering strategies, and even become a topic of social conversation. She summarized the positive changes brought by exercise—improved physical fitness, a clearer mindset, and a greater sense of control over life. She decided to adopt morning running as a long-term health management practice to tackle various challenges in the future.

events.name: Store End-of-Month Inventory and Data Organization
events.description: During the day, Song Yajing conducted a final verification of all sales and purchase data for July in the system and updated the accurate inventory list. She reviewed the revenue for the month. Although progress on family savings had slowed due to car maintenance and insurance expenses, the store's cash flow remained stable. With the autumn new arrivals already in place, she held expectations for the sales performance in the coming month.

events.name: End-of-Month Review of Family and Store Affairs
events.description: In the evening, after their daughter had fallen asleep, Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang sat in the living room, brewed a pot of tea, and conducted a simple end-of-month review. They reflected on the major events of July: successfully hosting their daughter's birthday party, smoothly establishing a family emergency fund, completing autumn orders, and achieving success in the community sharing event. They also discussed areas for improvement, such as spending higher-quality time with their daughter. Finally, the two outlined a general outlook for August: maintaining stable operations, enjoying family time during the summer vacation, and beginning preparations for Song Yajing's piano lessons.

events.name: Family Parent-Child Yoga Recovery
events.description: In the evening, the whole family participated in this week's parent-child yoga session. The daughter was actively involved, and Song Yajing felt that the sprain in her left ankle had fully recovered, with improved flexibility.

起始状态.心情: Starting the morning run with a sense of summary and anticipation.

结束状态.心情: Calm, content, and full of hope. Looking back on July, despite unexpected challenges, her family has grown stronger, her career has seen breakthroughs, and she has experienced personal growth. She is filled with anticipation for the upcoming August.

2025-08.daily_overview: On the first day of August, Song Yajing began the new month with pragmatic financial actions while maintaining healthy habits. In the morning, she focused on building family financial security, and in the afternoon, she dedicated herself to daily operations and future planning at her store, marking the official launch of the store's exploration into online transformation.

events.name: Morning Walk and Stroll with Father
events.description: At 5:30 in the morning, Song Yajing engaged in a 25-minute brisk walk at Yundang Lake, followed by warm-up stretches. In the evening, she took a 30-minute stroll with her father in the residential garden, discussing recent ideas for store operations. Her father reminded her to pay attention to cash flow management.

events.name: Launch a Family Emergency Fund Plan
events.description: In the morning at home, Song Yajing operated via mobile banking to transfer 2,000 yuan from the family joint account to the newly established Industrial and Commercial Bank emergency reserve fund dedicated account. She repeatedly verified the account information and, upon seeing the prompt indicating a successful transfer, felt a sense of reassurance that she had added an extra layer of security for the family's future.

events.name: Daily Store Operations and Account Reconciliation
events.description: At 10 a.m., Song Yajing arrived punctually at the boutique clothing store on Zhongshan Road. Together with Xiaomei, she organized the shelves and welcomed customers. The foot traffic was steady that day, and she patiently recommended end-of-summer clearance styles to several regular customers. After closing, she and Xiaomei carefully reviewed the day's sales and expenses to ensure the accounts were clear and accurate.

events.name: Preliminary Exploration of Online Transformation Possibilities
events.description: During the relatively quiet afternoon hours at the shop, Song Yajing used her phone to search online for "building a small online store" and "costs of opening a WeChat Mini Program store." She sent WeChat messages to her college classmate Zhao Min and her close friend Wang Jia to seek advice on online channels. Zhao Min suggested starting with WeChat communities as a trial.

events.name: Temporary Baking Attempt Failed
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Song Yajing attempted to make a low-sugar fruit tea cake, but an error in the recipe proportions caused the cake to collapse. She felt somewhat frustrated but decided to adjust it again tomorrow and recorded the lesson learned.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with anticipation for the implementation of the new month's plan.

结束状态.心情: Enriched with some reflection, a more concrete beginning has taken shape for future plans, though the baking failure brought a slight sense of frustration.

2025-08.daily_overview: The store experienced high customer traffic on Saturday, with Song Yajing busy with sales work. She closed early in the evening to prepare for a warm Qixi Festival night with her husband. Mutual support within the family serves as an important source of strength for her in coping with pressure.

events.name: Skipped the morning run due to staying up late baking the previous night.
events.description: Having stayed up late for baking the night before, Song Yajing felt tired and canceled her planned early morning seaside run, opting to sleep an extra half hour instead.

events.name: Create a Qixi Festival atmosphere in the store
events.description: Before opening the shop in the morning, Song Yajing and Xiaomei used pre-prepared pink ribbons, heart-shaped decorative stickers, and small string lights to give the store entrance and window a simple Qixi Festival-themed decoration.

events.name: Busy Saturday Sales Day
events.description: As expected, foot traffic surged on Zhongshan Road Pedestrian Street on Saturday. Song Yajing and Xiaomei were almost constantly attending to customers, with a line forming outside the fitting rooms. Drawing on her experience, Song Yajing quickly styled outfits for different customers, while Xiaomei skillfully handled cashier duties and packaging.

events.name: Early Closing and Procurement
events.description: For the evening family celebration, at five in the afternoon, Song Yajing and Xiaomei sped up to complete the inventory and cleaning, closing the shop on time. On her way home, Song Yajing stopped by the community supermarket to purchase dinner ingredients such as steak and broccoli, and selected a small, exquisite red velvet cake from the neighboring boutique bakery.

events.name: Preparing the Qixi Festival dinner
events.description: Upon returning home, her husband Chen Zhiqiang had already picked up Xuanxuan, who had been playing at their neighbor Aunt Zhang's house. Song Yajing tied on her apron and began preparing dinner, while Chen Zhiqiang assisted by handling the ingredients and setting the table.

events.name: A Warm Qixi Festival Celebration
events.description: The dinner was a simple Western meal, yet the atmosphere was exceptionally warm. The two raised their glasses to wish each other a happy holiday. After the meal, Song Yajing brought out the cake, and Chen Zhiqiang expressed clear support and encouragement for her recent considerations and efforts in transforming the store.

events.name: Temporary Neighbors Visiting Each Other
events.description: After the celebration, neighbor Aunt Zhang brought homemade pastries. Song Yajing had a brief chat with her, sharing the joy of the festival. Aunt Zhang encouraged her to relax and not worry too much.

结束状态.心情: Warm and content, feeling the solid support from both partner and neighbors, yet slightly fatigued.

events.name: Emotional fluctuations lead to binge eating of snacks.

2025-08.daily_overview: Sunday is a day for action and friendship. During the day, I shared my learning insights with close friends and finalized the details for a birthday gathering. In the evening, Xiaomei and I worked together to give the shop a fresh new look, marking the beginning of the autumn sales season. Amidst the busy schedule, there was a joyful sense of creativity.

events.name: Sharing learning gains with close friends
events.description: Song Yajing chatted with her close friend Li Meiling on WeChat, sharing insights from online marketing, discussing store aesthetics, and confirming the location for the birthday dinner on Tuesday evening.

events.name: Comprehensively update the autumn display of the store.
events.description: After closing the shop in the evening, Song Yajing and Xiaomei worked together to remove the summer decorations, hang up warm-toned background cloth, adjust the lighting, rearrange the autumn clothing, and embellish the space with artificial plants, staying busy for over two hours.

events.name: Having dinner with the temporary staff member Xiaomei
events.description: After the display renovation, Song Yajing treated Xiao Mei to a simple meal at a nearby snack shop to thank her for her help. They discussed the future of the store and fashion trends.

events.name: Begin the three-day online course learning.
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing started the first lesson of her three-day online advanced French pastry course, learning new recipe techniques and planning to study for one hour each day.

起始状态.心情: Relax and enjoy the leisure of a Sunday morning.

结束状态.心情: Physically exhausted yet mentally exhilarated, the completion of the store renovation brings a profound sense of satisfaction, while the launch of online courses enhances motivation for learning.

events.name: Adjust the display and officially launch the autumn collection.

events.name: Making a Birthday Cake for My Best Friend

events.name: Day Two of Online Course Learning
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing attended the second lesson of an online French pastry course, learning decorating techniques and taking notes to apply to tomorrow's cake.

events.name: Temporary Anxiety-Induced Insomnia
events.description: Due to contemplating the transformation of her store and the pressure from orders, Song Yajing had difficulty falling asleep, tossing and turning in bed for nearly an hour before finally dozing off, resulting in poor sleep quality.

2025-08.daily_overview: This day was filled with warmth and support. In the morning, she meticulously prepared a birthday cake. During the day, she handled shop affairs. In the evening, at her best friend's birthday party, she shared her stress and received valuable emotional comfort and advice, with friendship serving as a crucial buffer for coping with pressure.

events.name: Complete the cake decoration and packaging
events.description: Before opening the shop in the morning, Song Yajing took the tiramisu cake out of the refrigerator, dusted it with cocoa powder, wiped the edges of the container, placed it in an exquisite cake box, and tied a ribbon.

events.name: Online Promotion and Order Confirmation
events.description: During the daytime business hours, Song Yajing photographed the shop's autumn ambiance and new collection outfits, posting them on her social media feed for promotion. She also formally sent the first batch of autumn orders to the supplier Susan via WeChat.

events.name: Attending a birthday dinner for my close friend
events.description: After closing the shop in the evening, Song Yajing returned home to retrieve the cake and drove to the restaurant. In the private room, she presented the tiramisu cake she had made herself to Li Meiling, receiving praise. During the dinner, she shared her anxieties, and her friends offered comfort and advice.

events.name: The Return Journey and Reflection After the Gathering
events.description: After driving home from the dinner gathering, Song Yajing reflected on her friends' sincere encouragement, feeling that the burden on her heart had been somewhat lightened and her emotions had eased.

events.name: Day Three of Online Course Learning
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing completed the third lesson of the online French pastry course, summarized her learning gains, and planned to try a new dessert next week.

2025-08.daily_overview: After the emotional release of the previous night, Song Yajing returned to rational decision-making. She carefully reviewed insurance plans with her husband and strengthened her friendship with her close friend. Although external pressures (such as the pedestrian street renovation) remained unresolved, the construction of the family's internal financial safety net was steadily progressing.

events.name: Attempted a morning walk but gave up midway.
events.description: At 6:00 in the morning, Song Yajing attempted to take a brisk walk by Yundang Lake, but due to fatigue from the previous night's gathering, she gave up after only 10 minutes and returned home to rest.

events.name: Study the insurance proposal and discuss it with my husband.
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang took out the insurance proposal and carefully reviewed it clause by clause, discussing the coverage amount, payment period, and exemption terms, while listing questions to consult with their advisor.

events.name: Reconnecting with My Best Friend
events.description: During the day, Song Yajing sent a WeChat message to Li Meiling to thank her for the invitation the previous night. Li Meiling replied, advising her not to be too anxious and to talk more if anything was on her mind.

events.name: Addressing Potential Operational Pressures
events.description: During the day at the shop, Song Yajing heard more discussions about the renovation and began consciously observing changes in customer flow, assessing the cash flow support capacity.

events.name: Temporary Baking Failure Emotional Outlet
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing attempted to make a new dessert but failed. She became somewhat angry, threw away the unsuccessful creation, and later calmed down, deciding to study further.

2025-08.daily_overview: Substantial progress has been made in building family financial security—insurance policies have been completed. Meanwhile, in the face of cash flow constraints caused by the transformation of the shop, Song Yajing demonstrated strong financial discipline by steadfastly implementing the emergency reserve fund plan, thereby reinforcing another line of defense for the family.

events.name: The Evening Walk with Father Was Cut Short
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing took a 20-minute walk with her father. Due to lack of energy, their conversation was brief. Her father noticed her poor condition and advised her to get more rest.

events.name: Confirm the final plan with the insurance advisor.
events.description: During the day, Song Yajing communicated with the insurance advisor via WeChat to raise questions, received clear answers, and the couple decided to adopt the proposed plan.

events.name: Formally submit the insurance application materials and pay the first premium.
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing submitted her ID card, income proof, and health declaration questionnaire online. In the evening, she transferred the initial premium via mobile banking and received an electronic policy confirmation notice.

events.name: Evaluate cash flow and adhere to monthly savings.
events.description: After closing the shop and reconciling the accounts in the evening, Song Yajing reviewed the August transaction records and the household ledger, deciding to allocate 3,000 yuan from the daily contingency fund to deposit into the emergency account the next day.

events.name: Soaking feet before bed for relaxation
events.description: To cope with insomnia, Song Yajing insisted on soaking her feet for 15 minutes before bed and reducing mobile phone usage in an effort to improve sleep quality.

2025-08.daily_overview: The anxiety accumulated over half a month peaked on this day and transformed into clear directives for action. The morning brought some reassurance through steadfast savings, while the afternoon delivered a significant shock with an official renovation notice. In the evening, an in-depth discussion with my husband formally advanced the concept of online transformation into the execution phase of family team collaboration. Under the pressure, insomnia emerged for the first time.

events.name: Adhere to depositing monthly emergency reserves
events.description: Before opening the shop in the morning, Song Yajing transferred 3,000 yuan to the emergency reserve account via mobile banking. After confirming the successful transaction, she checked the accumulated balance and felt a sense of reassurance.

events.name: Official Notification Received for Pedestrian Street Renovation
events.description: In the afternoon, the Zhongshan Road Merchants Alliance officially issued a renovation notice, specifying that the project would commence in March of the following year, with a duration of 6 to 8 months. All of Song Yajing's hopes for a reprieve were shattered, and her sense of urgency and crisis reached its peak.

events.name: Optimize store display details
events.description: Feeling upset, Song Yajing forced herself to focus on work, adjusting the display corner with Xiaomei and adding scarves and hat accessories to make the scene more vivid.

events.name: Engage in in-depth discussions with the husband regarding the online transformation concept
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing had a serious conversation with Chen Zhiqiang at home, formally proposing the idea of building a WeChat mini-program e-commerce platform. She analyzed its necessity, functions, and target customer groups. Chen Zhiqiang assessed its feasibility and expressed willingness to take charge of the technical development.

events.name: First occurrence of significant difficulty falling asleep
events.description: Lying in bed, with the daytime notifications and evening discussions of details swirling in her mind, Song Yajing tossed and turned, unable to fall asleep. It was not until late at night that she drifted into a fitful slumber, her sleep shallow and restless.

起始状态.心情: A routine calmness, preparing to start the day after completing the savings.

结束状态.心情: Highly anxious and with a mind in turmoil, yet there is also a resolute determination of "having no choice but to fight." The formation of the family team has brought new hope and greater pressure.

2025-08.daily_overview: Saturday morning began with handling store purchase orders to prepare for the upcoming week's operations. In the afternoon, family matters and preliminary thoughts on digital transformation formed the main focus. In the evening, a significant change occurred as she attended her first adult piano lesson, opening up a new personal space for relaxation amid a high-pressure life. Meanwhile, signs of insomnia began to emerge, and she started trying her mother's suggestions to address it.

events.name: Process Clothing Orders
events.description: In the morning, before the store opened, Song Yajing checked the order confirmation email and payment notice sent by her supplier Susan via her phone at home. After carefully verifying the order details and total price, she completed the deposit payment through online banking. She then reconfirmed the logistics arrangements and estimated delivery date with Susan via WeChat to ensure that the autumn clothing launch plan for the following week would not be affected.

events.name: Attend Saturday Mass at the church
events.description: As a devout Catholic, Song Yajing took time in the morning to attend the Saturday anticipatory Mass at Siming Catholic Church, offering prayers to seek spiritual tranquility for the upcoming weekend and the work life of the week ahead.

events.name: The First Adult Piano Lesson
events.description: On Friday evening, Song Yajing arrived punctually at the adult piano beginner class located in Siming District, feeling both nervous and expectant. The teacher started with the most basic elements: the staff, proper sitting posture at the piano, and finger placement. For Song Yajing, who had no prior experience, everything felt entirely unfamiliar, and her fingers seemed stiff and clumsy. However, under the teacher's patient and meticulous guidance, she gradually began to grasp the basics. She developed an initial interest in the sounds produced by the black and white keys and managed, albeit haltingly, to complete simple fingering exercises.

events.name: Share New Experiences
events.description: After finishing her first piano lesson, Song Yajing returned home with a touch of excitement. She eagerly shared her experience and feelings from the class with her husband Chen Zhiqiang and their daughter Chen Lexuan. [I found it so difficult—my fingers just wouldn’t obey me—but the sound of Do Re Mi was really beautiful.] Their daughter Xuanxuan curiously asked her mother to demonstrate the hand posture she had just learned and even imitated tapping on the table. The family enjoyed a warm and joyful moment over this new topic.

events.name: Seek advice and try to improve sleep
events.description: During a video call with her mother Lin Xiuying in the evening, Song Yajing unintentionally mentioned her recent difficulties in falling asleep and experiencing light sleep. Concerned, her mother suggested she relax by soaking her feet in hot water before bed and reduce the time spent looking at her phone before sleeping. That same night, Song Yajing earnestly followed the advice, soaking her feet in hot water for 20 minutes before bed and placing her phone in the living room to charge half an hour earlier. While soaking her feet, she felt the tension in her nerves and the fatigue in her feet ease. Although it still took her some time to fall asleep after lying down, she felt both physically and mentally more relaxed than in the previous days.

events.name: Start recording sleep
events.description: After trying the foot-soaking method, Song Yajing realized she needed to understand her sleep patterns more systematically. Before going to bed, she created a simple sleep log in her phone's memo, planning to start recording her bedtime, sleep onset time, number of nighttime awakenings, and mental state upon waking in the morning from that night onward.

起始状态.心情: Calmness accompanied by plans for the day's affairs.

结束状态.心情: There is the excitement of learning new things, yet also a hint of underlying concern due to the initial emergence of sleep issues, along with a slight sense of anticipation after trying new methods.

state.今日运动: Walk to the church and piano classroom for light activity.

2025-08.daily_overview: Today is the Lord's Day, with life centered around family and faith. Attending Mass in the morning provided spiritual support and sparked interest in the church's retreat camp. The afternoon was a thoughtfully arranged family day, where a visit to the science museum allowed the entire family to relax through interactive activities, effectively alleviating recent stress. In the evening, the idea of an online transformation was formally proposed within the family, marking the beginning of a strategy to address the ongoing crisis.

events.name: Sunday Mass and Spiritual Communion
events.description: On Sunday morning, Song Yajing went to the Siming Catholic Church in Xiamen as usual to attend the Sunday Mass. During her prayers, she silently entrusted her inner anxieties and sleep issues to God. After the Mass, she specifically sought out Aunt Lin Xiuying, a familiar fellow parishioner, and briefly exchanged updates on their recent lives. With the wisdom of an elder, Aunt Lin shared her experiences of relying on faith to navigate difficult times and encouraged Song Yajing to participate more in the church's Bible study group, finding support within the faith community. This conversation left Song Yajing feeling understood.

events.name: Learn about the information of the retreat camp.
events.description: In front of the church bulletin board, Song Yajing saw a poster for the upcoming autumn seaside retreat. Aunt Lin, who was also present, introduced the event, explaining that it aimed to help participants step away from daily pressures and seek spiritual growth in nature. Faced with the ongoing stress of managing her shop and family life, Song Yajing developed a strong interest in the activity. A thought of attending began to take root in her mind, as she considered it might be a good opportunity to recharge her spirit.

events.name: Preparations for Family Travel
events.description: After the Mass, Song Yajing returned home and had breakfast with her husband Chen Zhiqiang and their daughter Chen Lexuan. She quickly prepared the necessary items for going out, such as snacks, a water bottle, a camera, and her daughter's sun hat. The family briefly discussed the day's itinerary, and their daughter Xuanxuan was full of anticipation for the science and technology museum.

events.name: Science Museum Family Day
events.description: A family drove to the Xiamen Science and Technology Museum. In the interactive exhibition area, their daughter Xuanxuan was filled with curiosity about various scientific installations and excitedly tried them out herself. Chen Zhiqiang patiently explained simple scientific principles beside her, while Song Yajing used her phone to take photos and videos, capturing her husband's focus and her daughter's laughter. During lunch at the museum's restaurant, they shared their experiences from the morning. This pure parent-child time allowed Song Yajing to temporarily forget the pressures of her shop.

events.name: Return and Exchange
events.description: After the visit, the family drove back home. Their daughter fell asleep in the car, exhausted. Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang exchanged their thoughts on this family outing in low voices, both agreeing that it was an effective way to alleviate the work-related stress they had been experiencing recently. They also made plans to arrange more such family activities in the future.

events.name: Share Happy Moments
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing sorted through the photos and videos taken during the day, selected the most wonderful family portraits and moments of her daughter playing, and shared them in the family WeChat group [Happy Little Home]. She also sent them separately to her parents in Quanzhou to share the day's joy with them.

events.name: Preliminary Proposal for Online Transformation
events.description: After dinner, while their daughter was watching cartoons, Song Yajing took the opportunity to share her thoughts with her husband Chen Zhiqiang in detail—specifically, her idea of expanding online business in response to the pressure from the pedestrian street renovation. She brought out her notebook, which contained preliminary market observations and questions, and focused on asking Chen Zhiqiang about the feasibility and approximate difficulty of technical implementation, such as setting up a simple mini-program store, as well as the technical support he might be able to provide. After listening, Chen Zhiqiang thought carefully and indicated that it was technically feasible but would require more detailed planning and discussions on division of labor.

events.name: Verify the electronic policy for home insurance
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing received the formal electronic insurance policy sent by her insurance advisor. She carefully reviewed the personal information of all family members, the types of insurance, coverage amounts, policy terms, and payment details on the policy. After confirming that everything matched the previously discussed plan, she saved the electronic document in the family cloud drive and backed it up on her phone, feeling an added sense of security about her family's financial well-being.

events.name: Late return from an impromptu gathering with friends.
events.description: In the evening, her close friend Li Meiling invited her out for late-night tea on short notice. Song Yajing gladly accepted the invitation, venting about recent pressures, and returned home quite late.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, filled with anticipation for religious activities and family plans.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and heartwarming, the joy of Family Day effectively alleviated anxiety, and the proposal of the online concept gave her a renewed sense of direction for the future, leaving her slightly fatigued after the gathering.

state.今日运动: Walking tour inside the science museum, light activity

2025-08.daily_overview: The workday on Monday was fully centered around the core theme of [digital transformation]. From securing support from key employees, to consulting on professional payment solutions, and even studying operational knowledge late into the night, Song Yajing steadily advanced the vision toward implementation with a pragmatic approach. Meanwhile, piano practice served as a brief respite amid the high-pressure work.

events.name: Daily Store Operations and Communication
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing opened the shop as usual to handle customer inquiries and sales matters accumulated over the weekend. During a lull in customer traffic, she had a formal conversation with the shop assistant, Xiaomei. Song Yajing candidly shared the transformation pressures the shop faced due to the pedestrian street renovation, as well as the online plans. She invited Xiaomei, as a core member of the team, to participate in online customer service and content creation in the future, promising additional incentives based on business development. After hearing this, Xiaomei expressed her support and willingness to learn new things.

events.name: Consult online payment solutions
events.description: Realizing that the payment process was crucial to her online business, Song Yajing contacted Lin Xiaofeng, a client manager at the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (ICBC), via WeChat. After Manager Lin replied, the two held a roughly half-hour voice call on WeChat in the afternoon. Song Yajing provided a detailed introduction to her transformation plan and expected transaction volume, while Manager Lin primarily recommended an aggregated payment collection code suitable for individual businesses. He explained in detail the required application materials, fee rates, settlement cycles, and other relevant information. Song Yajing took careful notes and raised several questions regarding security and fund arrival times, all of which were clearly addressed.

events.name: Consolidate Piano Practice
events.description: During a brief moment of free time after her lunch break, Song Yajing took out the notes from last night’s piano lesson and tried to recall and practice the knowledge of musical staff and basic hand positions taught by her teacher at home. Although her fingers were still clumsy, being able to independently recognize a few notes and adopt the correct posture gave her a small sense of accomplishment, and she thoroughly enjoyed the process.

events.name: Organize the framework of online projects
events.description: In the shop's office, Song Yajing further outlined the project framework for the online mall in her notebook based on the previous day's discussion with her husband and Manager Lin's suggestions. She supplemented the payment solutions and preliminarily listed core elements such as target customers, main products, platform selection, and financial and human resource requirements. Her train of thought had become much clearer than before.

events.name: Monthly Review and Employee Motivation Conversation
events.description: After the shop closed for the evening, Song Yajing had a more in-depth conversation with Xiaomei in the store. She first acknowledged Xiaomei’s positive performance during the summer sales, specifically mentioning the repeated praise from the regular customer Vivian. Then, building on their earlier communication during the day, she shared more detailed plans for the online transformation and clarified the initial tasks Xiaomei would assist with, including online customer service and organizing product materials. Feeling trusted by her boss, Xiaomei adopted an even more proactive attitude.

events.name: Online Operations Course Learning
events.description: Late at night, Song Yajing studied the first module of the online mall operations course through a mobile app in her shop. The content covered topics such as applying for a WeChat Mini Program store and basic storefront customization. As she learned, she took notes by comparing the material with her own shop's situation, and whenever she encountered something she didn't understand, she made annotations beside it, demonstrating a very serious attitude toward learning.

events.name: Discuss banking solutions with husband.
events.description: After returning home, Song Yajing discussed the key points of the payment solution provided by Manager Lin with her husband, Chen Zhiqiang. From the perspectives of technical integration convenience, fee costs, and fund security, both agreed that the bank's aggregated payment solution was the most reliable choice and decided to adopt it.

events.name: Staying up late due to academic commitments.
events.description: Due to focusing on online courses, Song Yajing stayed up late, resulting in a delayed bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Stay focused and be prepared to tackle the challenges of the week.

结束状态.心情: Tired yet driven, feeling that the path to online transformation has taken another solid step forward, while finding some comfort in Xiaomei's support, though slightly drowsy from staying up late.

2025-08.daily_overview: Tuesday was spent in a busy and multi-threaded manner. On the family front, preparations were made for my daughter's return to school. Regarding health, I consulted the family doctor for the first time due to insomnia issues and scheduled a comprehensive health check-up for the entire family, demonstrating a significant improvement in health management awareness. Professionally, data preparation for rent negotiations, preparation of online payment materials, and ongoing course studies were carried out simultaneously. Despite the considerable pressure, everything was handled in an orderly manner.

events.name: Shop Operations and Reception of Regular Customers
events.description: During the morning business hours, regular customer Vivian visited the store. Song Yajing warmly received her and took the opportunity to inform her about the store's potential launch of an online mini-program in the future. Vivian expressed great anticipation for this development, noting that it would allow her to browse the store anytime, even when busy. This interaction strengthened Song Yajing's confidence in pursuing online business operations.

events.name: Consult a Family Doctor
events.description: In the morning, after attempts at self-regulation proved to have limited effect, Song Yajing contacted her family doctor, Wang Mingyuan, via WeChat. She provided a detailed description of her recent insomnia symptoms, their duration, and potential stressors. Dr. Wang conducted an online consultation and determined that the issue was primarily related to psychological stress. He offered behavioral adjustment suggestions, such as establishing a regular sleep schedule, avoiding screens before bedtime, and trying mindful breathing exercises. He also advised that she schedule an in-person appointment if the symptoms persisted or worsened. This consultation prompted Song Yajing to begin viewing her health issues from a more scientific perspective.

events.name: Discussing preparations for daughter's school opening
events.description: After dinner, Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang discussed the items needed for their daughter Xuanxuan's new semester. Song Yajing listed the items based on the kindergarten's notice, while Chen Zhiqiang added suggestions about adjusting the room lighting and preparing new story audio. With clear division of tasks, they efficiently completed the planning.

events.name: Prepare rental negotiation data
events.description: After closing the shop for the night, Song Yajing stayed alone in the office, carefully exporting and reviewing key operational data from the past year, including sales records and profit reports. At the same time, she searched online to gather publicly available information about the renovation plan for Zhongshan Road Pedestrian Street, assessing its potential impact on customer flow. This preparation aimed to provide objective and compelling evidence for the upcoming rent negotiations in a few days.

events.name: Prepare online payment application materials
events.description: Based on the outcome of yesterday's communication with Manager Lin, Song Yajing began preparing the application materials. She photocopied the business license and ID card, filled out the application form provided by the bank, and sent the electronic version to Manager Lin via WeChat for preliminary review. Following the feedback received, she revised two unclear sections.

events.name: Continue online operations learning
events.description: She continued studying the subsequent modules of the online course, focusing on product photography and enhancement, detail page copywriting, and inventory management. While learning, she contemplated how to apply these techniques to the products in her own store and noted down tasks such as [purchasing simple photography lights] and [learning to use photo editing software] in her notebook.

events.name: Schedule an annual family health check-up
events.description: Following Dr. Wang's advice and out of concern for her family's health, Song Yajing reviewed the physical examination packages offered by the community health center. Based on the different needs of her husband, daughter, and herself, she selected appropriate items. She then scheduled staggered appointment times for the three of them via phone and online platforms, planning to complete the check-ups in early September.

events.name: First Attempt at Mindful Breathing Relaxation
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing followed Dr. Wang's advice and tried a simple mindfulness breathing exercise. Leaning against the headboard, she focused on her breath, gently bringing her attention back whenever her thoughts drifted to the shop or negotiations. Although she practiced for only ten minutes and was frequently distracted during the process, she did feel her heartbeat slow down a bit afterward.

events.name: Went to bed early due to a headache.
events.description: Due to staying up late the previous night and accumulated stress, Song Yajing experienced a mild headache and decided to rest early to regain energy.

起始状态.心情: Slightly fatigued due to poor sleep, but with a clear task list.

结束状态.心情: Thoughts are complex yet orderly; health concerns have eased somewhat after receiving professional guidance; there is a sense of pressure and responsibility coexisting regarding the upcoming multiple challenges; and a slight sense of relief after going to bed early.

2025-08.daily_overview: Wednesday maintained an efficient and pragmatic pace. During the day, I balanced store operations (organizing data, making purchases, and attempting photography) with family matters (shopping for my daughter’s school start). The evening was dedicated to the crucial [external brain assistance] session, where I sought advice from my classmate Zhao Min, who has extensive e-commerce experience. This provided invaluable practical insights and significantly advanced my knowledge reserves for the online transition.

events.name: Organize store sales data
events.description: Before the morning business hours, Song Yajing spent time organizing and summarizing the sales data and expenses before mid-August, checked the accounts, and prepared for the month-end reconciliation and financial analysis. This process also gave her a clearer grasp of the store's cash flow.

events.name: Purchasing school supplies for daughter's new semester
events.description: During her lunch break, Song Yajing went to a nearby stationery store and supermarket to purchase learning supplies for her daughter according to the list, including pencils, erasers, drawing books, and watercolor pens. Looking at these colorful stationery items, she imagined her daughter using them to draw and write, and a gentle sense of anticipation welled up in her heart.

events.name: Initial Attempt at Product Photography
events.description: During the afternoon when the shop had few customers, Song Yajing attempted to take photos of several new autumn clothing items with her phone, applying what she had learned from her course. She adjusted the lighting in the store and looked for clean backgrounds, but found the results unsatisfactory—either the lighting was too dim or the clothing appeared noticeably wrinkled. This made her realize that professional photography might require more learning and preparation.

events.name: Organize the thinking process for online products
events.description: Drawing on her daytime shooting attempts, Song Yajing began to more systematically organize the existing merchandise in the store, considering which styles would be suitable as the main online offerings. She also started to think about how to coordinate online and offline inventory in the future to avoid conflicts. In her notebook, she jotted down preliminary ideas such as [focusing online on designs with strong appeal and full size ranges] and [retaining some limited-edition items offline to attract in-store visits].

events.name: Seeking Online Experience Advice from University Classmates
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing contacted her university classmate Zhao Min, who works in e-commerce operations in Hangzhou, via a video call. She detailed the current situation of her store, the challenges it faces, and her ideas for transitioning online. Drawing on her own experience, Zhao Min shared several approaches to building a mini-program, how to leverage existing customers for a cold start in the initial phase, and practical tips for maintaining customer relationships, such as including handwritten thank-you notes with orders. Song Yajing listened attentively and took detailed notes in real-time, filling three full pages in her notebook.

events.name: In-depth Discussion on Rent Negotiation Strategies
events.description: After concluding the call with Zhao Min, Song Yajing presented the compiled rental negotiation data and preliminary strategy to her husband Chen Zhiqiang for review. The two engaged in a more in-depth discussion in the living room, jointly deliberating and establishing the bottom-line objective for the negotiation (a rent increase not exceeding 5%), alternative options (such as securing a lower increase in exchange for a longer lease term), and how they would coordinate on-site. Chen Zhiqiang was assigned primary responsibility for providing supplementary explanations from the perspectives of [long-term tenant stability] and [cooperation with property modifications].

events.name: Learning Online Marketing Campaign Setup
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing continued studying the module on marketing campaigns in her online course, learning about the applicable scenarios and key setup points for different types of activities such as coupons, spend-and-save offers, and group buying. She noted down insights like "[Spend-and-save coupons are suitable for new store openings]" and "[Group buying is ideal for end-of-season clearance sales]" for future application.

events.name: Temporary cancellation of piano practice
events.description: Due to being occupied with online courses and preparing for negotiations, Song Yajing set aside her piano practice for the day and focused on work matters.

起始状态.心情: Clear objectives, prepared to handle multiple specific tasks

结束状态.心情: Encouraged by the practical suggestions obtained from Zhao Min, the anxiety about online transformation being an unrealistic goal has somewhat diminished, but the brain remains excited due to excessive information input.

state.今日运动: Walking procurement, light activity
