2025-08.daily_overview: Thursday's actions were more in-depth and specific. From wrapping up family preparations for the start of the school year, to concretizing online ideas into actionable task divisions and timelines, and further integrating all learning outcomes into an [Action Guide], Song Yajing's transformation strategy became increasingly clear. Simultaneously, she began systematically learning and experimenting with [Progressive Muscle Relaxation], adopting a multi-pronged approach to manage stress.

events.name: Check and prepare the daughter's kindergarten uniform.
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing took out her daughter's kindergarten uniform from last year, carefully checked if it still fit, and found that the pant legs were a bit short. She washed and ironed it, and planned to buy a larger set as a spare over the weekend. After work, Chen Zhiqiang inspected and adjusted the brightness of his daughter's desk lamp and bedside lamp.

events.name: Conduct inventory check with store staff
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing and Xiaomei conducted a comprehensive inventory check of the store's stock. They meticulously counted and recorded items by style, color, and size. This task was tedious but essential, serving both the upcoming autumn collection launch and providing an accurate data foundation for subsequent online product selection.

events.name: Specify the division of labor for online projects
events.description: Building upon the preliminary discussions, Song Yajing reconvened with her husband Chen Zhiqiang to concretize their online concept. Together, they outlined the initial stages of the mini-program development (requirements, design, development, testing, and launch), defined key milestones (with the goal of launching a beta version by the end of the year), and drafted a list of priority tasks for each to complete next.

events.name: Integrate knowledge and compile an action guide
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing systematically integrated Zhao Min's suggestions, online course content, and her own reflections. She opened a computer document and began drafting a well-structured "Preliminary Action Guide for Store Online Transformation," which included market analysis, platform selection, technical implementation pathways, operational strategies, team division of labor, and risk assessment. This marked the shift of her thinking from fragmented to systematic.

events.name: Learn Progressive Muscle Relaxation
events.description: While browsing health information, Song Yajing learned that progressive muscle relaxation can help alleviate anxiety. She used her free time in the evening to search for instructional videos online. Following the guidance in the videos, she started from her feet and learned to tense and then relax the muscle groups in various parts of her body in sequence.

events.name: Try muscle relaxation exercises.
events.description: After completing her pre-sleep foot soak, Song Yajing lay in bed and followed the muscle relaxation steps she had learned during the day. Starting from her toes, calves, and thighs, then moving to her hands, arms, and shoulders... she diligently followed the instructions. Although her thoughts occasionally drifted to the unfinished *Action Guide* during the process, after completing the full set of exercises, she felt as if a heavy burden had been lifted from her body. She was more relaxed than after the foot soak alone, and it seemed she fell asleep a little faster.

events.name: Video chatting with mother, concerned about parents' health
events.description: During a video call with her mother Lin Xiuying before bed, Song Yajing learned that her father Song Minghui's blood pressure had been somewhat unstable recently, and her mother herself was suffering from her chronic back pain. Song Yajing felt extremely worried and wished she could return to Quanzhou immediately to check on them, but her mother persuaded her to stay, saying these were just old ailments and that she should focus on handling her own matters first.

events.name: Staying up late to handle urgent orders.
events.description: Due to receiving a large order on short notice, Song Yajing stayed up late handling logistics arrangements, which delayed her bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Slightly fatigued, but aware that there is a lot of planned work to complete today.

结束状态.心情: After completing the framework of the "Action Guide," there is a sense of control, but news about my parents' health has added new worries. After trying relaxation techniques, my body feels more comfortable, and my mood is complex but generally leans toward the positive side of [actively coping]. I feel slightly tired due to staying up late.

state.今日运动: Conducting inventory checks in the store, involving light physical labor.

date_attribute.weather: Showers turning to overcast, with the weather becoming slightly cooler.

2025-08.daily_overview: Friday is a crucial day for stress relief and team formation. The morning was spent handling daily store operations. The afternoon tea with a close friend served as both an emotional outlet and provided practical advice on communication skills. In the evening, a landmark [Family Team Meeting] was held, marking the transition of the online transformation from a personal concept to the collaborative implementation stage within the family. Meanwhile, piano lessons continued with persistence.

events.name: Daily Store Operations
events.description: The morning proceeded with business as usual, handling WeChat inquiries and reservation requests from regular customers. During a break, Song Yajing printed out a copy of the "Action Guide" written the previous night, preparing it for use in the evening meeting.

events.name: Afternoon tea heart-to-heart with my best friend
events.description: On Friday afternoon, Song Yajing met her close friend Li Meiling in Xiamen for afternoon tea. She confided her recent multiple anxieties stemming from the transformation of her shop, rent negotiations, and her parents' health issues. Li Meiling listened patiently, offered comfort, and drew from her experience in teacher communication to provide some advice on how to conduct rent negotiations clearly, amicably, and firmly. They also discussed family insurance, with Li Meiling sharing details about the medical insurance her family had arranged. This conversation greatly helped Song Yajing relieve her emotional stress.

events.name: Communicate the renovation plan with the decorator
events.description: In preparation for the upcoming pedestrian street renovation and to provide a better filming environment for the online business, Song Yajing arranged for a contractor to visit the store. They initially discussed a renovation plan that included replacing some outdated lighting fixtures, repainting the walls, and making minor adjustments to the shelf layout. A small deposit was paid, with the construction scheduled to begin during the off-season in September.

events.name: Preparing for a Family Team Meeting
events.description: After afternoon tea, Song Yajing returned to the shop and briefly discussed the evening meeting with Xiaomei, asking her to also prepare some thoughts on the online business. Meanwhile, she reminded her husband Chen Zhiqiang via WeChat to attend the meeting on time in the evening.

events.name: Adult Piano Lessons
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing closed her shop early and went to her piano class. The teacher focused on explaining the structure of the C major scale and guided her in practicing ascending and descending C major scales with her right hand. Compared to the first lesson, she felt her fingers had become more flexible, and she was fully engaged in the practice.

events.name: Brief Post-Class Practice
events.description: After returning home, while her daughter was still awake, Song Yajing practiced the C major scale she had just learned on the electronic keyboard for ten minutes. Although her playing was slow and not very smooth, she managed to complete it, and her daughter applauded and cheered beside her.

events.name: Formally establish a family entrepreneurship team.
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing convened her husband Chen Zhiqiang and shop assistant Xiaomei at home to hold a formal [Online Transformation Project Kick-off Meeting]. She shared the "Action Guide" and discussed the project objectives and timeline in detail. The meeting clarified the core division of responsibilities among the three: Chen Zhiqiang was appointed as the overall technical lead, responsible for the development of the mini-program and backend maintenance; Song Yajing was in charge of overall planning, product selection, content, and marketing; Xiaomei assisted with product photography, material organization, and future online customer service. At the end of the meeting, the three reached a consensus on the goal of launching a beta version by the end of the year, officially forming a small [Family Entrepreneurship Team].

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the gathering with my best friend, while also feeling a hint of nervousness about the important meeting tonight.

结束状态.心情: Feeling both relieved and hopeful, the smooth convening of the family meeting made her feel she was no longer fighting alone. The team's support greatly alleviated her sense of isolation and pressure, leaving her with unprecedented clarity and determination about the future direction.

state.今日运动: Walk to the afternoon tea venue and piano classroom for light activity.

date_attribute.weather: Clear and sunny, the weekend weather is pleasant.

2025-08.daily_overview: Saturday is a day of relaxation that balances family, personal growth, and career preparation. The morning is dedicated to quality time with the children. In the afternoon, she conducts a final review of key points and data verification for an important rent negotiation. The evening piano lesson brings her peace through art, but a late-night conversation with her husband reveals her accumulated fatigue and concern for her parents.

events.name: Weekend Family Time
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing did not rush to the store. Instead, she stayed home to play with her daughter Chen Lexuan, reading picture books and building blocks together. Her husband Chen Zhiqiang took charge of preparing breakfast, creating a relaxed and pleasant family atmosphere.

events.name: Brief Communication During Landlord's Visit
events.description: Around noon, the landlady, Sister Li, came to Zhongshan Road for shopping and stopped by the shop. Song Yajing engaged in a brief and friendly conversation with her, providing an overview of the recent business operations and autumn plans. The monthly utility fees were also smoothly settled, thereby maintaining a solid foundation for subsequent formal negotiations.

events.name: Adjusting the daughter's bedtime routine
events.description: After lunch, the couple consciously began adjusting their daughter's schedule for the start of school. Chen Zhiqiang downloaded new bedtime story audio. They guided their daughter to take a half-hour earlier nap, with Song Yajing accompanying her by reading nearby to create a quiet atmosphere.

events.name: Prepare Final Key Points for Rent Negotiation
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing conducted the final preparations for the negotiation in her home study. She reviewed all the data reports, renovation news analyses, and the list of negotiation points once again, and rehearsed various questions the landlord might raise along with her corresponding responses. She also prepared a concise data summary to present during the negotiation.

events.name: Adult Piano Lessons
events.description: On Friday evening, Song Yajing continued her piano lesson. The teacher taught her new notes and a short excerpt from the practice piece "Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star," while also correcting her rhythm issues. She felt more comfortable than in previous lessons, and although her playing was still a bit hesitant, she was able to keep up with the teacher's tempo.

events.name: Show learning achievements to family members
events.description: After returning home from the class, Song Yajing took advantage of her fresh memory and practiced the excerpt of "Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star" several times on the electronic keyboard. She then excitedly played it for her husband and daughter. Although the tempo was slow and there were some wrong notes, the melody was recognizable. Her daughter found it novel and interesting, and her husband offered words of encouragement.

events.name: Confiding stress to one's husband
events.description: Late at night, after their daughter had fallen asleep, Song Yajing confided in her husband Chen Zhiqiang about the physical and mental exhaustion she had been feeling from days of preparing for the store renovation, coping with the transition, and worrying about her parents' health, leaving her somewhat downcast. Chen Zhiqiang put his arm around her shoulders to comfort her and proactively suggested, "How about I drive this weekend, and we take Xuanxuan back to Quanzhou to visit Mom and Dad?" This proposal made Song Yajing feel deeply warmed and supported.

events.name: Start preparing for a family short trip
events.description: Deciding to return to Quanzhou over the weekend to visit her parents, Song Yajing began preparing her luggage and gifts, feeling eager and expectant.

起始状态.心情: Relax and enjoy the slow pace of a weekend morning.

结束状态.心情: The daytime preparations and piano practice brought a sense of control and joy, but the late-night confessions released deep-seated exhaustion and worries. With her husband's support, her mood shifted from low spirits to the comfort of being understood, and she looked forward to the family visit with anticipation.

state.今日运动: Walking to the store and piano classroom for light activity.

2025-08.daily_overview: Sunday was a day that highlighted emotional support and community mutual aid. Within the family, final preparations for the start of school continued, with husband Chen Zhiqiang completing research on an online technical solution. In the afternoon, a chance encounter with a neighbor brought crucial care and practical assistance. Neighbor Auntie Zhang proactively offered to pick up and drop off the children, significantly alleviating Song Yajing’s daily pressures and strengthening the community support network.

events.name: Continue adjusting the family schedule
events.description: In the morning, the family continued to solidify their routine adjustments. Today, Chen Zhiqiang was responsible for telling his daughter a new bedtime story, while Song Yajing quietly organized the shop's accounts nearby. The couple softly discussed their daughter's anticipation for the start of school and possible separation anxiety, deliberating on how to guide her.

events.name: Organize school supplies for daughter's new semester
events.description: Song Yajing carefully packed all the purchased school supplies, freshly ironed kindergarten uniform, and the adorable name tags she had sewn into her daughter’s small backpack. During dinner, the whole family chatted about the new teachers and friends at the kindergarten, using light-hearted topics to ease the little girl’s nervousness.

events.name: Chen Zhiqiang completed the technical solution investigation.
events.description: Chen Zhiqiang utilized his weekend time to conduct preliminary research on the technical solutions for the online mall in his home study. He compiled a comparison table detailing the advantages, disadvantages, costs, and timelines of different SaaS platforms and independent development. In the evening, he presented the research findings to Song Yajing and suggested initially adopting a mature SaaS platform (such as Youzan) for a quick launch with controllable costs. Later, based on the development progress, a decision could be made on whether to pursue customized development. Song Yajing agreed with this practical approach.

events.name: Encountering a Neighbor and Receiving Critical Assistance
events.description: On Sunday afternoon, while taking a relaxing walk in the community garden, Song Yajing unexpectedly met her neighbor, Aunt Zhang Xiuying. Aunt Zhang keenly noticed the weariness between Song Yajing's brows and warmly invited her to her home for a visit. At Aunt Zhang's house, while drinking mung bean soup, Song Yajing couldn't help but pour out the multiple pressures she had been facing recently, such as the renovation of her shop and her parents' health issues. Drawing on her experience as a retired teacher, Aunt Zhang patiently listened and advised her to [break down big problems into smaller steps]. She also proactively offered, [I can take Xuanxuan to kindergarten in the morning and pick her up in the afternoon from now on. After all, I'm retired and have nothing to do at home, and it will also make things easier for you]. This timely offer instantly brought tears to Song Yajing's eyes.

events.name: Accept assistance and plan a visit to parents
events.description: After speaking with Aunt Zhang, Song Yajing felt a great weight had been lifted from her shoulders. Gratefully accepting Aunt Zhang’s help, she arranged the pick-up and drop-off schedule starting the following week. That evening, upon returning home, she shared the news with her husband. Both were deeply moved and decided together that, the very next weekend, Chen Zhiqiang would drive the whole family back to Quanzhou to visit their parents.

events.name: Family Short Trip: Visiting Relatives in Quanzhou
events.description: In the afternoon, the whole family drove to Quanzhou to visit the parents, enjoying the reunion time, savoring hometown delicacies, and easing the feeling of homesickness.

起始状态.心情: Relatively calm, focused on family affairs

结束状态.心情: Filled with gratitude and warmth, the substantial help from her neighbor Aunt Zhang shone like a ray of light into her busy and weary life, making her feel the strong support of the community. This gave her more confidence and strength to face the upcoming challenges, and she returned from her family visit in a joyful mood.

state.今日运动: Take a 20-minute walk in the residential community garden, then travel by car.

2025-08.daily_overview: Monday marked the beginning of a new chapter in life—the day my daughter started school. The morning was a blend of hectic moments and heartwarming scenes. During the day, Song Yajing continued to manage her store while pushing forward with the payment application for the online transformation. In the evening, she conducted a mock negotiation with her husband over rent, making final preparations for tomorrow’s crucial confrontation. The confirmation of the technical plan also brought greater clarity to the online project.

events.name: My daughter's first day of school
events.description: On the first day of school, Song Yajing got up early and prepared a hearty breakfast for her daughter. The couple accompanied their daughter to the kindergarten together. At the entrance, they encouraged their slightly nervous daughter and had a brief exchange with the homeroom teacher. Watching her daughter’s small figure disappear into the classroom, Song Yajing felt both reluctant to part and relieved—a regular routine was finally about to return.

events.name: Store Operations and Payment Application Follow-up
events.description: After dropping off her child, Song Yajing went directly to the shop to open for business. In the morning, she sent the final version of the revised and improved payment application materials to the bank account manager Lin Xiaofeng via WeChat. In the afternoon, Manager Lin replied that the materials had been submitted for review, and results were expected within 3-5 business days.

events.name: Conduct a simulated negotiation with the husband.
events.description: In the evening, after her daughter fell asleep, Song Yajing asked her husband Chen Zhiqiang to play the role of the landlady, Sister Li, and conducted a realistic simulated negotiation. She practiced how to start with data, clearly state her demands, and respond to questions and counteroffers. Chen Zhiqiang deliberately raised various challenging questions, such as, "If your business is slow during the renovation period, how can I trust that you’ll pay the rent on time?" After several rounds of practice, Song Yajing’s delivery became increasingly fluent, and her on-the-spot reactions and confidence were significantly enhanced.

events.name: Finalize the online technical solution
events.description: After the simulated negotiation, the couple finalized the technical solution for the online store based on Chen Zhiqiang's research: they chose a well-regarded SaaS platform (Youzan) as a starting point, with Chen Zhiqiang responsible for registration, basic setup, and integration with the store’s payment system. This decision provided a clear technical pathway for launching the online project.

events.name: The child has a slight cold and went home early.
events.description: After her daughter showed mild cold symptoms after school, Song Yajing ended work early to go home and care for her, adjusting their daily routine accordingly.

起始状态.心情: Getting up early and busy due to the first day of school, feeling nervous yet filled with a sense of ceremony.

结束状态.心情: After completing the mock negotiation, I feel well-prepared. Although I am still somewhat nervous about tomorrow's formal negotiation, I am more filled with a sense of certainty that [I am ready]. My daughter's smooth start to the school term has also lifted a weight off my mind, though I feel a bit tired from taking care of the children.

2025-08.daily_overview: On Tuesday, the online transformation entered the stage of substantive advancement. The newly arrived autumn collection was put on display, refreshing the store's appearance. Together with the staff, we conducted an inventory check and selected the first batch of products for online sales, turning the concept into reality. After discussing with my husband, we decided to sign up for a church retreat, planning an important opportunity for spiritual renewal. Additionally, consulting with a former colleague provided new insights into product sourcing.

events.name: Autumn Collection Launch and Display Updates
events.description: Some of the pre-ordered autumn clothing has arrived. Before opening for business in the morning, Song Yajing and Xiao Mei adjusted the store display, placing warm-colored new arrivals such as knitwear and trench coats in the window and prominent positions. They also took high-quality photos to prepare for online promotion and social media previews.

events.name: Customer Reception and Online Promotion
events.description: A regular customer praised the new product highly. Seizing the opportunity, Song Yajing informed the customer that the store was preparing an online mini-program, which would allow early previews and pre-orders of new arrivals in the future. The customer showed great interest and proactively requested to add the store's dedicated customer service WeChat account.

events.name: Take stock of inventory and screen online products.
events.description: During the afternoon when customer traffic was low, Song Yajing and Xiaomei conducted a secondary check of all the store's inventory. Together, they selected approximately 50 items suitable as the first batch of key products for online promotion, based on factors such as style, seasonality, offline sales data, and potential for online display. They recorded detailed information for each item, taking a crucial step in the online product selection process.

events.name: Consult former colleague and buyer Zheng Kai
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing contacted her former colleague Zheng Kai in Hangzhou via WeChat voice call to seek advice on product sourcing and photography for online business. Zheng Kai shared the currently popular [vibe dressing] photography style, recommended several affordable photography prop purchasing channels suitable for boutiques, and reminded her to pay attention to pricing strategies for both online and offline operations.

events.name: Discussing with my husband about participating in a meditation retreat.
events.description: After speaking with Zheng Kai, Song Yajing and her husband Chen Zhiqiang carefully discussed the plan to attend the autumn retreat. She explained the significance of the event in helping her relieve stress and seek inner peace. Chen Zhiqiang expressed his full support and confirmed that he could adjust his work schedule during her two-day absence to take care of their daughter, ensuring she could attend without any worries.

events.name: Start the habit of evening brisk walking.
events.description: To cope with stress, Song Yajing started taking 20-minute brisk walks on Monday and Wednesday evenings. Today was her first attempt, and she felt relaxed.

起始状态.心情: Calmly focused on the daily operations of the store and the launch of new products.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and productive, the selection of online goods and the planning of the retreat camp made her feel that she was actively [building] her life rather than merely [coping] with problems, giving her a stronger sense of direction. After brisk walking, she felt both physically and mentally refreshed.

state.今日运动: Organizing shelves and moving clothing in the store, moderate physical activity, brisk walking for 20 minutes in the evening.

date_attribute.weather: Light rain, overcast and cool weather.

2025-08.daily_overview: On Wednesday, meticulous preparations were carried out in the drizzle. This included analyzing competitors for online products and setting preliminary prices, confirming arrangements and formally registering for the retreat camp with fellow believers, as well as paying a deposit for potential purchasing agency services. Each task laid the groundwork for future changes, and life, like a tapestry, became clearer stitch by stitch.

events.name: Analyze competitors and formulate online pricing
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing browsed through similar high-end women's clothing stores on Taobao and Xiaohongshu from her office in the shop. She carefully analyzed the pricing strategies, main image styles, and marketing language of competitors. Based on the cost of her own products and the selected online list, she preliminarily formulated competitive online price ranges and membership discount strategies for the first batch of approximately 30 products.

events.name: Learn Simple Image Processing
events.description: During her lunch break, Song Yajing used a mobile app to learn the basic operations of a simple image processing software. She mastered how to adjust brightness, contrast, and crop images, and attempted to perform simple enhancements on the product photos she took yesterday. The results were noticeably better than the original images.

events.name: Confirming Retreat Registration with Fellow Church Members
events.description: Song Yajing communicated in detail with fellow church member Aunt Lin via WeChat, confirming that both had decided to attend the retreat and agreeing to register together and look out for each other. They discussed the items to bring and transportation arrangements. Aunt Lin also shared her experiences from previous retreats, which heightened Song Yajing’s anticipation.

events.name: Payment of deposit for purchasing agency business
events.description: Based on recent communication with her university classmate Zhao Min, Song Yajing attempted to launch a small-scale pre-sale trial of Japan-exclusive stationery. After confirming the procurement details and prices with a reliable purchasing agent recommended by Zhao Min, she paid the deposit via online banking. She carefully verified the receiving account, retained the transfer receipt, and officially initiated this small-scale cross-border procurement attempt.

events.name: Check the deposit payment voucher.
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing organized and archived the payment screenshot of the deposit for the overseas purchase and the communication records, then noted down the estimated arrival time and the next steps for the pre-sale promotion plan in her notebook.

events.name: Evening brisk walking for relaxation
events.description: Continue the evening brisk walking routine by taking a 20-minute brisk walk on the paths around the residential area to help relieve the day's stress.

起始状态.心情: The slight quietness brought by the rainy weather is suitable for meticulous desk work.

结束状态.心情: Calm and steady, multiple specific preparatory tasks have been completed. Although all of them are behind-the-scenes work, it feels like the project is progressing steadily. There is also a strong anticipation for the registration of the retreat camp, and a sense of relaxation after brisk walking.

state.今日运动: Take a 20-minute brisk walk in the evening.

2025-08.daily_overview: Multiple confirmation actions were completed on Thursday. The initial list of products to be launched online was finalized, a phased review and evaluation of the nearly two-week sleep management efforts was conducted, and formal registration and payment for the autumn meditation retreat were completed. In the evening, the pre-sale campaign for Japanese purchasing agency products went live, marking the beginning of the first practical exercise for the online business.

events.name: Finalize the first batch of online product list
events.description: Based on previous screening and analysis, Song Yajing ultimately streamlined and finalized the first batch of online products to 30 items. She categorized these products into three thematic groups: [Classic Commute], [Gentle Date], and [Unique Design Niche]. For each category, she devised simple marketing copy, such as [Effortless Elegance for Autumn Commutes].

events.name: Discuss pre-sale promotion with Xiaomei.
events.description: Song Yajing informed Xiaomei about the pre-sale plan for Japanese stationery and asked her to help brainstorm promotional copy for social media. Xiaomei proposed several lively and cute ideas, and the two discussed them happily, creating a positive atmosphere of teamwork.

events.name: Review sleep status and evaluate.
events.description: Song Yajing reviewed her sleep records from the past two weeks and found that although fluctuations still existed, the difficulty in falling asleep had decreased. On days when she consistently practiced foot soaking and relaxation exercises, her sleep quality showed noticeable improvement. She concluded that self-regulation was effective and decided to continue with these practices. Following Dr. Wang's advice, she planned to schedule an in-person consultation if her condition relapsed by mid-September.

events.name: Official Registration for the Autumn Meditation Retreat
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing and Aunt Lin went to the church office together, found the church member in charge of the activity, filled out the registration form for the autumn seaside retreat, and paid the activity fee via mobile payment. When she received the detailed schedule and packing list, she could almost feel the sea breeze already, and her mood lightened.

events.name: Launch and promote the pre-sale campaign.
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing listed the canvas bags and stationery series from Japanese purchasing agents on the test backend of the mini-program initially set up by her husband, Chen Zhiqiang. She meticulously took detailed photos, crafted compelling pre-sale copy, and established pre-sale rules. Subsequently, she shared the pre-sale link through her social circle, store customer groups, and personal social media accounts, with special recommendations to regular customers such as Vivian.

events.name: Check the status of pre-sale orders
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing couldn't help but check the backend of the mini-program. In just a few hours, there were already over a dozen pre-sale orders, mostly from regular customers and friends who supported her. Although the amounts were not large, this breakthrough from zero to one excited her greatly and significantly boosted her confidence in the online business.

events.name: Returning late from a gathering with a close friend.
events.description: Had a video gathering with my best friend Wang Jia in the evening, chatted happily, and stayed up a bit late.

起始状态.心情: I am looking forward to it, as there are several important matters to confirm and complete today.

结束状态.心情: Feeling excited and accomplished, the self-affirmation of improved sleep, the confirmation of retreat registration, and especially the [auspicious start] of pre-sale orders have all brought strong positive feedback, significantly alleviating the sense of pressure, leaving a pleasant feeling after the gathering.

state.今日运动: Walk to the church to register, light activity.

2025-08.daily_overview: Friday is a day for efficient progress before the weekend. Xiaomei began learning professional photography to build skills for her online transition. Song Yajing prepared for weekend family baking and a retreat camp trip. Evening piano lessons have become her regular [flow time]. Meanwhile, the success of the pre-sale campaign has prompted her to seriously plan a larger-scale new business.

events.name: Follow up on pre-sale orders and payment applications
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing logged into the backend system to compile the pre-sale order information. At the same time, she received a notification from the bank: the online payment collection QR code had been approved and was ready for signing. She immediately shared the good news with her husband and Xiaomei.

events.name: Shop assistant Xiaomei learns product photography.
events.description: Under the guidance of Song Yajing, Xiaomei began attempting to photograph the selected online products using the simple photography equipment available in the store (a mobile phone and a fill light). She learned to adjust angles, composition, and lighting. Although the photos she took initially still appeared somewhat stiff, her attitude remained highly positive.

events.name: Prepare ingredients for weekend baking
events.description: Song Yajing decided to try making a new cream cake roll over the weekend. She checked the ingredients at home and found that she was short of whipping cream and a specific type of fruit jam, so she took advantage of her free time in the afternoon to go to the supermarket for shopping, and also bought some fresh fruits. After returning home, she cleaned and prepared tools such as the egg beater and baking tray in advance.

events.name: Adult Piano Lessons
events.description: On Friday evening, Song Yajing went to her piano lesson as usual. The teacher focused on guiding her to practice the continuity of the entire piece "Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star" and corrected the excessive tension in her right wrist. At the end of the lesson, the teacher praised her for making significant progress, which greatly encouraged her.

events.name: Preparing for the Retreat Trip
events.description: After returning home from her piano lesson, Song Yajing began making preliminary preparations for her upcoming retreat camp next week. She gave Xiaomei detailed instructions on the shop's work arrangements for the two days she would be away, and confirmed with her husband the plans for their daughter's pick-up, drop-off, and meals during those two days (Aunt Zhang would handle transportation, and Chen Zhiqiang would take care of dinner). She also retrieved her suitcase, planning to pack more specifically over the weekend.

events.name: Planning a Japanese Apparel Purchasing Agency Business
events.description: Based on the positive response to the stationery pre-sale, Song Yajing engaged in more in-depth communication with her university classmate Zhao Min via WeChat. She initially proposed the idea of leveraging Zhao Min’s connections in Japan to attempt small-scale purchasing of distinctive clothing items as differentiated products for the online mall. Zhao Min agreed to help keep an eye out and make introductions.

events.name: Adjust the morning running schedule
events.description: To improve her sleep, Song Yajing began adjusting her morning run to an earlier time, and today she attempted to get up at 5:00 for a short-distance run.

起始状态.心情: Feeling cheerful due to the smooth payment activation and presale, and looking forward to the weekend.

结束状态.心情: Content and at peace, the team is making progress (Xiaomei is learning photography), the individual is growing (making strides in piano), family matters are well arranged, and there is optimism about the upcoming weekend family time and future business expansion. Feeling energetic after the morning run.

state.今日运动: Walking to the supermarket for shopping and to the piano classroom, light activity, 20-minute morning jog.

2025-08.daily_overview: Saturday was a day filled with tension and warmth. In the morning, final preparations were made for the negotiations. In the afternoon, the rent negotiation with the landlord, Sister Li, achieved unexpected success, securing valuable breathing room for offline operations. After the negotiation, she immersed herself in parent-child baking with her daughter. The successful cake roll and cozy afternoon tea allowed her to fully unwind after the intense professional efforts, savoring the sweet rewards of family life.

events.name: Weekend Family Cleaning
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang conducted a simple household cleaning together, tidying up the living room and their daughter's room to create a neat and comfortable weekend environment.

events.name: Final Review of Negotiation Materials
events.description: Before lunch, Song Yajing conducted a final review of all negotiation materials, data reports, and key point lists, placing them into a dedicated folder. She had one last brief discussion with her husband, confirming the final strategy of [holding the line at 5%, aiming for 3%], and mentally prepared herself.

events.name: Key Rent Negotiations Achieve Success
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing arranged to meet with her landlady, Ms. Li, at a quiet café near Zhongshan Road. Based on meticulously prepared data, she clearly outlined the stable contributions of her shop, the challenges it would face during the renovation period, and her confidence in its future operations. Faced with the landlady's initial expectation of a 5% rent increase, Song Yajing responded calmly and ultimately succeeded in negotiating the increase down to 3%. Additionally, she secured a clause allowing for a rent reduction in the event of a municipal renovation causing seven consecutive days of business closure. The outcome of the negotiation far exceeded expectations.

events.name: Parent-Child Baking: Making Swiss Rolls
events.description: The joy of a successful negotiation had not yet faded when Song Yajing returned home with a light heart and began making cream cake rolls with her daughter, Xuanxuan. The little girl brought over a small stool to watch, and with her mother's encouragement, she carefully helped stir the batter and spread cream on the baked cake base. The kitchen was filled with laughter and the sweet aroma.

events.name: Creative Decor and Family Afternoon Tea
events.description: After the cake roll had chilled and set, Song Yajing gave full play to her creativity, decorating it beautifully with strawberries, blueberries, and powdered sugar. In the afternoon, her husband Chen Zhiqiang returned home, and the family gathered around the dining table to enjoy the delicious cake roll along with the fruit tea brewed by Song Yajing. Chen Zhiqiang praised the achievements of his wife and daughter, and the warm family time filled Song Yajing with immense satisfaction and happiness.

events.name: Sharing Achievements and Relaxation
events.description: After afternoon tea, Song Yajing packed a portion of the leftover cake roll to give to her neighbor Aunt Zhang the next day. In the evening, she shared photos of her creation in the baking hobby group on WeChat, receiving likes from her friends. Her long-tense nerves finally relaxed completely, nourished by both the successful negotiation and the warmth of family.

events.name: Family Weekend Swimming
events.description: In the evening, the whole family went to the community swimming pool for a swim. Song Yajing practiced basic swimming strokes, which proved to be quite relaxing.

起始状态.心情: Slightly tense, primarily focused on the afternoon negotiations, yet also carrying a sense of weekend relaxation.

结束状态.心情: Extremely joyful and filled with a sense of accomplishment, the successful rent negotiation was a significant victory in managing this month's stress, while the subsequent parent-child baking and family time served as the perfect emotional release and reward, making life feel balanced and wonderful.

state.今日运动: Light household chores and baking activities, one hour of family swimming.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy, turning overcast in the evening.

2025-08.daily_overview: On the last day of August, I spent it peacefully in reflection and planning. In the morning, I attended the Sunday Mass, giving thanks for the gains and growth of the past month. In the afternoon, I handled the month-end settlement for the shop and reviewed my sleep management and family financial planning, making arrangements for the next steps. Overall, my state shifted from the anxious and passive mood at the beginning of the month to a proactive, well-planned, and more empowered one by the end.

events.name: Sunday Mass and Thanksgiving
events.description: On Sunday morning, Song Yajing went to church as usual to attend Mass. During her prayers, she expressed particular gratitude for the growth she had experienced under pressure over the past month, the support of her family, the help from her neighbors, and the favorable turn in her career. This Mass left her feeling more peaceful and fulfilled within.

events.name: Giving a cake to thank the neighbors.
events.description: After returning home from Mass, Song Yajing gave the cake rolls she had packed yesterday to her neighbor, Aunt Zhang, thanking her once again for offering to help pick up and drop off the children. Aunt Zhang was delighted and praised her cooking skills repeatedly. The two chatted warmly at the doorway for a while.

events.name: End-of-August Store Settlement
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing went to the store and conducted the final day of business for August alongside Xiaomei. After closing, she completed the day's sales settlement. She conducted a preliminary tally of the total revenue for the entire month of August. Although affected by the preparations for the business transformation, the results largely met expectations through promotional efforts and online pre-sale trials, which brought her a sense of relief.

events.name: Reviewing the Effectiveness of Sleep Management
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing reviewed her sleep records for the entire month of August and the various methods she had tried (foot soaking, relaxation techniques, adjusting her routine). She realized that actively managing stress was more effective than passively enduring it. Although her insomnia had not been completely eradicated, it had shifted from being [uncontrollable] to [manageable]. She decided to incorporate these effective methods into her daily habits.

events.name: Contact the landlord to schedule the signing of the contract.
events.description: Song Yajing contacted the landlord, Sister Li, via WeChat to politely express gratitude for the successful negotiation the previous day and proposed formally signing the lease renewal contract early next week (September 1st or 2nd). Sister Li promptly replied to agree.

events.name: Plan the key tasks for next week
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing listed the key tasks for early September in her notebook: 1. Sign the new lease; 2. Complete the online payment agreement and conduct testing; 3. Begin creating the product detail pages for the first batch of online merchandise; 4. Prepare luggage for the retreat camp; 5. Return to Quanzhou to visit her parents over the weekend. The clear plan filled her with confidence for the upcoming September.

events.name: Persist in practicing meditation before sleep.
events.description: Engage in a 10-minute meditation practice before sleep to help consolidate the improvements in sleep quality.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with thoughts of the month-end summary

结束状态.心情: Satisfied, calm, and full of anticipation. After successfully navigating the multiple challenges of August, she has gained a renewed understanding of her own and her family's resilience. Although uncertainties still lie ahead, her heart has grown firmer and more powerful, ready to embrace the new month.

state.今日运动: Walking to the church and shops, light activity

2025-09.daily_overview: On the first workday of September, Song Yajing simultaneously launched two important fronts: one was negotiating the renewal of her shop's lease to ensure stable future operations, and the other was systematically learning online operational knowledge to build capabilities for business transformation. Her actions were pragmatic and well-planned, from data preparation to contract signing and financial planning, each step was meticulous and detailed, demonstrating her growth as an individual entrepreneur.

events.name: Online Learning Mini-Program Operation
events.description: In the morning, with light customer traffic in the shop, Song Yajing seized the time to systematically study the backend operations of WeChat Mini Programs through online tutorials, following the learning plan she had formulated the previous night. She focused on interface layout and basic settings, taking detailed notes to lay the groundwork for subsequent online business operations.

events.name: Preparation and Communication for Contract Renewal Negotiations
events.description: At noon, Song Yajing used her lunch break to once again organize the store's transaction data from the past year and information related to the pedestrian street renovation. At 3 p.m., she met with her landlord, Ms. Li, at a quiet café near Zhongshan Road. She first expressed her gratitude for Ms. Li's long-term support, then presented the customer flow data in a clear and organized manner, and tactfully requested a rent buffer due to the anticipated decline in foot traffic.

events.name: Renew the contract and sign a new agreement
events.description: After nearly an hour and a half of friendly negotiations, both parties reached a consensus based on data and practical circumstances. Song Yajing accepted the proposal for a modest 3% rent increase, while Sister Li agreed to include a supplementary clause in the contract: if operations are suspended for more than a week due to municipal renovations, a portion of the monthly rent may be reduced. After reviewing the terms, both parties signed the new one-year lease contract on the spot.

events.name: Update family members on business developments.
events.description: Upon returning home in the evening, Song Yajing promptly showed the new contract to her husband, Chen Zhiqiang. She provided a detailed explanation of the negotiation process and the specific terms, particularly the newly added risk buffer clause. Together, the couple assessed the impact of the 3% rent increase on their shop's operating budget for the coming year and concluded that it was within an acceptable range.

events.name: Update Household Financial Budget
events.description: After dinner, Song Yajing opened her computer in the study, entered the precise rental amount confirmed in the new contract into the annual financial budget sheet for the household and the shop, adjusted the fixed expenditure section, and ensured that the accounts were clear.

events.name: Simulating Risks and Reviewing Experiences
events.description: After the budget update, Song Yajing, exercising due caution, conducted scenario simulations specifically targeting the risk clauses in the new contract. She calculated the exact amount the exemption clause could save the store under the worst-case scenario of "suspending operations for a consecutive month." Upon completing the calculations, she recorded the core lesson from this negotiation—"support demands with data and strive for risk hedging"—in her financial notebook as an important reference for business operations.

events.name: Pay the remaining balance for the purchase on behalf
events.description: During a break in organizing contract documents, Song Yajing recalled the Japan purchasing agency cooperation she had finalized with her university classmate Zhao Min the previous week. She contacted the Japanese purchasing agent introduced by Zhao Min via WeChat. After confirming that the first batch of goods was ready, she paid the remaining balance as agreed and obtained the international logistics tracking number.

events.name: Schedule an Insurance Consultant Consultation
events.description: Considering the need for family protection, Song Yajing contacted bank client manager Lin Xiaofeng in the evening and asked him to recommend a professional insurance advisor. She had a brief communication with the advisor via WeChat and scheduled a preliminary consultation on family protection plans for later this week.

events.name: Morning Routine: Taking My Daughter to School
events.description: At seven thirty in the morning, Song Yajing, as usual, took her daughter Chen Lexuan to the kindergarten. Along the way, the little girl chattered about the fun things in her new class. Song Yajing listened attentively and reminded her to obey the teacher.

events.name: Daily Store Operations
events.description: In addition to her studies and negotiations, Song Yajing still had to handle the daily affairs of the shop: receiving occasional customers, checking the previous day's accounts with the shop assistant Xiaomei, and inspecting the display effect of the new autumn collection. Before heading out for negotiations in the afternoon, she reminded Xiaomei to take good care of the shop.

events.name: Evening brisk walk for relaxation
events.description: After work, to cope with stress and improve sleep, Song Yajing took a 20-minute brisk walk on the trail around her residential community, focusing on breathing and rhythm to help relax her mind.

起始状态.心情: Calm, yet with a hint of focus and anticipation for today's negotiations.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilled and with a slight sense of accomplishment, the smooth negotiations and completed planning left her feeling reassured.

state.今日运动: Take a 20-minute brisk walk in the evening.

2025-09.daily_overview: Song Yajing spent her day preparing for community activities and enhancing her personal skills. While planning a heartwarming upcycling workshop with her neighbor Aunt Zhang, she continued to deepen her knowledge of online operations and began to prioritize insurance planning. Her life is filled with both the warmth of the present and thoughtful preparations for the future.

events.name: Preparing a Community Workshop on Upcycling Old Clothes
events.description: After dropping off her daughter in the morning, Song Ya stopped by the community activity center on her way, where she met with the enthusiastic neighbor, Aunt Zhang Xiuying. Over tea, the two discussed the theme for the third-quarter upcycling workshop. Considering the approaching autumn season, they ultimately decided on the theme "New Life for Old Jeans," planning to teach participants how to make denim bags, coasters, and hair accessories. Based on the discussion, Song Yajing compiled a detailed list of required materials.

events.name: Procurement of Handmade Materials
events.description: In the afternoon, taking advantage of a break in the showers, Song Yajing went to the fabric and accessories market near Zhongshan Road. Following her list, she purchased various colors of sewing thread, buttons, zippers, and some small decorative accessories. She carefully compared prices at several shops to get the best deal.

events.name: Learning Online Product Listing
events.description: At home in the evening, after putting her daughter to sleep, Song Yajing continued her online learning. The focus tonight was on the product listing process. She watched instructional videos to learn how to take and edit product photos, write appealing titles and detailed descriptions, as well as how to set prices and manage inventory.

events.name: Preliminary Screening of Japanese Purchasing Agent Products
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing turned on her computer and began conducting online market research based on the collaboration direction agreed upon with Zhao Min. She browsed several Japanese fashion e-commerce websites and social media platforms, initially selecting around 20 canvas bags, stationery items, and small accessories with a fresh style that aligned with the store's positioning. She compiled these into a document with images and brief descriptions, ready to send to Zhao Min for further confirmation.

events.name: Review Preliminary Insurance Proposal
events.description: In the evening, the insurance consultant sent electronic copies of preliminary proposals from several different insurance companies via WeChat. Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang spent some time before bed quickly reviewing them, gaining a general impression of the coverage, sum insured, and premiums. They agreed to discuss the details over the weekend.

events.name: Store Closing and Inventory
events.description: Before closing the shop in the evening, Song Yajing and Xiaomei counted the day's revenue together, ironed several newly arrived autumn coats until they were smooth, and hung them on the display racks. She felt that the customer flow on Tuesday evening was somewhat lower than expected.

events.name: An Evening Stroll with My Father
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing accompanied her father for a 35-minute walk in the residential community garden. The pace was relaxed, with the focus on companionship and conversation, covering topics such as health and daily life matters.

events.name: Late return from an impromptu gathering with friends.
events.description: After studying in the evening, her close friend Li Meiling spontaneously arranged a video chat with her. They talked about parenting and recent updates, and the conversation did not end until 23:30, which led to her staying up late.

起始状态.心情: Proceed smoothly and advance all matters according to plan.

结束状态.心情: Slightly tired yet content, community activities are taking shape, studies are progressing, but staying up late has left me feeling somewhat fatigued.

state.今日运动: A 35-minute evening walk with my father.

2025-09.daily_overview: The focus of online learning shifted to closing the transaction loop, while the cooperation with her old classmate Zhao Min on purchasing agency entered the substantive stage of finalizing details. Song Yajing switched between the virtual world of e-commerce and real-life partnership negotiations, returning to family life in the evenings to plan her daughter’s study space together with her husband.

events.name: Learning Online Order and Logistics Management
events.description: In the afternoon, there were not many customers in the shop. Song Yajing used her phone to learn the entire process of handling online orders: from viewing and confirming orders, to coordinating with courier companies, printing electronic waybills, tracking logistics information, and handling potential after-sales issues. She deliberately noted down the cooperation policies and price ranges of several mainstream courier companies.

events.name: In-depth Discussion on the Framework for Purchasing Agent Cooperation
events.description: At 8 p.m., Song Yajing had a lengthy video call with her university classmate Zhao Min, who was in another city. They conducted an in-depth discussion on the feasibility of collaborating on a Japanese purchasing agency business, preliminarily deciding to focus on niche designer brands and unique lifestyle goods. Zhao Min will be responsible for contacting friends in Japan for procurement and quality inspection, while Song Yajing will handle domestic sales, customer service, and promotion. The profits have been initially agreed to be split equally.

events.name: Finalize the first batch of products and details
events.description: After the first video call, Song Yajing sent the product list she had organized in the afternoon to Zhao Min. Half an hour later, they reconnected to confirm and finalize key business details one by one, including the procurement costs of specific products, domestic pricing strategies, deposit payment methods, international logistics timelines, and the division of after-sales responsibilities. The framework of their collaboration was largely established.

events.name: Planning a Study Corner for My Daughter
events.description: At half past nine in the evening, after the phone call with Zhao Min, Song Yajing and her husband Chen Zhiqiang sat down in the living room. While eating fruit, they discussed the planning of their daughter's study corner for the new semester. They measured the space in one corner of the living room and, based on their daughter's height and needs, determined the items to be purchased: a desk, an eye-protecting desk lamp, storage shelves, and decorative stickers. They also briefly assigned the procurement tasks.

events.name: Check the logistics status of the purchasing agent
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing checked the international logistics status of the group of purchased goods for which the final payment was made on September 1st. Seeing that the packages had cleared customs and entered the domestic delivery stage, she breathed a sigh of relief and planned to notify the customers who had placed orders as soon as the goods arrived.

events.name: Chatting with Vivian, a regular customer
events.description: In the afternoon, regular customer Vivian came to the store for a casual visit and tried on a newly arrived trench coat. While helping her coordinate the outfit, Song Yajing chatted about her ongoing studies in online operations and her preparations for a Japanese purchasing agency service. Vivian showed great interest, expressing that she would definitely support the initiative once it launched, and also offered some suggestions regarding the preferences of younger customer groups.

events.name: Evening brisk walking for relaxation
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing took a 20-minute brisk walk around the neighborhood, but felt slightly rushed due to the heavy academic workload.

events.name: Start an online French pastry course
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing found time to begin the first lesson of her three-day online advanced French pastry course, focusing on the basics of macaron making with concentration but limited time.

起始状态.心情: Focus and prepare for a productive day of communication.

结束状态.心情: Busy yet efficient, cooperation is progressing smoothly, and family plans are also on the agenda, creating a sense of fulfillment from advancing on both fronts.

state.今日运动: Take a 20-minute brisk walk in the evening.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny turning to cloudy, with light rain in the evening.

2025-09.daily_overview: Song Yajing began putting her recent learning into practice by setting up an online purchasing column. Meanwhile, the confirmation of the cooperation memorandum marked the formal establishment of her partnership with Zhao Min. On the family front, she efficiently completed the procurement of items for the study corner, with the gears of life and career turning in sync.

events.name: Learn Online Customer Communication Skills
events.description: After the shop closed in the evening, Song Yajing studied online customer service knowledge at home. She focused on researching how to handle product inquiries, after-sales issues, and maintain customer relationships. By drawing on some excellent case studies, she optimized the communication scripts she planned to use on WeChat.

events.name: Confirmation of Purchasing Agency Cooperation Memorandum
events.description: Based on the previous evening's discussion, Zhao Min drafted a concise electronic version of the cooperation memorandum and sent it over. During her lunch break, Song Yajing carefully reviewed the document and proposed two amendments regarding the profit settlement cycle and the force majeure clause. The two parties quickly reached an agreement through text communication on WeChat, which means the details of the purchasing agency cooperation have been formally finalized.

events.name: Create an Online Purchasing Agent Column
events.description: In the afternoon, during the shop's idle hours, Song Yajing created a column titled "Yajing · Japanese-style Good Finds" in the backend of her WeChat mini-program store. She enhanced the images of the first batch of products confirmed by Zhao Min, meticulously crafted copy that highlighted the product features and storytelling elements, and set up pre-order links and deposit payment rules.

events.name: Procurement of Learning Corner Items
events.description: Before heading home in the evening, Song Yajing used a mobile e-commerce app to compare prices and placed an order for a children’s desk, an eye-protection desk lamp, a cartoon storage box, and a set of pinyin wall charts that she had previously selected. She specifically confirmed the delivery time with customer service, hoping the items would arrive over the weekend.

events.name: Release Pre-sale Notice for Purchasing Agent Products
events.description: After the basic setup of the product column was completed, Song Yajing began to warm up for the official launch. She posted a notice in the store's WeChat group of regular customers, announcing the upcoming pre-sale for purchasing niche Japanese brands on behalf of customers. The post included several exquisite product preview images, which sparked interest and inquiries from several frequent customers in the group.

events.name: Routine call with mother
events.description: At ten o'clock in the evening, Song Yajing had her daily routine video call with her mother, Lin Xiuying, who lives in Quanzhou. She shared with her mother the news of successfully renewing the shop lease and starting a side business as a purchasing agent. Her mother was delighted to hear this and reminded her not to overwork herself, adding that she would teach her how to make a new Minnan-style sweet soup the next time she visited Xiamen.

events.name: Adjusted Seaside Morning Run
events.description: At 5:00 AM, Song Yajing completed a 5-kilometer jog along the seaside promenade of Xiamen's Island Ring Road, using an app to record the activity, with her condition gradually recovering.

events.name: Continue the online dessert course
events.description: In the evening, I continued with the second lesson of the online French pastry course, learning how to make macaron fillings, but progress was slow due to fatigue.

起始状态.心情: Full of drive and ready to put the plan into action

结束状态.心情: A sense of accomplishment is growing, the online column is taking shape, and household purchases have been completed. Things are progressing step by step.

state.今日运动: 5-kilometer morning run by the seaside

2025-09.daily_overview: Friday's rhythm became varied. In the morning, Song Yajing designed posters for the vibrant community activities; in the afternoon, she temporarily stepped away from her daily routine to attend a serene seaside faith retreat. On this day, she found balance between practicality and spirituality, between community and self.

events.name: Design Community Activity Poster
events.description: In the morning, the store had just opened, and customer traffic was sparse. Song Yajing took advantage of this time to design a graphic-rich promotional poster for the "Old Clothes Upcycling Workshop" on the computer behind the cash register, incorporating autumn maple leaf elements and the texture of denim fabric. She clearly specified the event time, location, theme, and the requirement for participants to bring their own old jeans. After completing the design, she sent the digital version to Aunt Zhang for review and printed several physical copies.

events.name: Departing for a church retreat camp
events.description: After noon, Song Yajing entrusted the shop to her assistant Xiaomei and returned home to pack her luggage. At two o'clock in the afternoon, she traveled with fellow church member Auntie Lin and others by car to a seaside retreat camp located near the Ring Road in Xiamen. On the way, everyone conversed softly, creating a tranquil atmosphere.

events.name: Retreat Camp Opening and Check-in
events.description: Upon arrival at the camp, everyone checked in. The rooms were simple and quiet, with a view of the sea from the windows. In the evening, all camp participants attended the opening Mass and welcome ceremony presided over by Father Wang Mingde of the parish. Father Wang elaborated on the theme of this retreat, "Finding Peace Amidst Busyness," and introduced the upcoming schedule.

events.name: Learn online marketing tools
events.description: During the free activity time in the evening at the retreat camp, Song Yajing did not participate in the group singing activity. Instead, she chose to stay in the dormitory, intermittently studying a short section about online marketing tools on her phone. She learned the basic setup logic of coupons and spend-and-save promotions, contemplating how to integrate offline community activities with online traffic generation in the future.

events.name: The First Silence and Self-Reflection
events.description: After the opening ceremony, there was a suggested period of personal silence. Song Yajing walked alone to the camp's terrace, gazing at the deep blue sea under the night sky, with only the sound of waves in her ears. She reflected on her recent self, busy with store transformation and family chores, and for the first time actively acknowledged the overlooked fatigue and inner anxiety, seeking peace through prayer.

events.name: Complete online dessert courses
events.description: At the retreat, I took time to complete the third lesson of the online French pastry course, summarized my learning insights, and planned to practice over the weekend.

events.name: Exercise was postponed due to a tight schedule.
events.description: Due to the retreat schedule, Song Yajing temporarily suspended her regular exercise routine and only engaged in light walking.

起始状态.心情: Calmness tinged with a touch of anticipation for the life of retreat.

结束状态.心情: My thoughts were untangled, and my heart felt a long-lost sense of tranquility and emptiness.

state.今日运动: Approximately 30 minutes of walking around the campsite.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with a gentle sea breeze.

2025-09.daily_overview: This is a Sunday entirely dedicated to faith and self-reflection. Song Yajing immerses herself in the rhythm of the retreat, engaging in deep introspection through morning prayers, sharing sessions, and solitude. Meanwhile, her long-prepared Japanese purchasing agency business quietly launches on this tranquil day, symbolizing a new venture set in motion amidst serenity.

events.name: Morning Prayer by the Sea and Theme Sharing
events.description: At six in the morning, Song Yajing and her fellow campers attended morning prayers by the seaside, with the sea breeze gently blowing and the sun rising. In the morning, everyone listened to Father Wang Mingde’s thematic sharing on "Integrating Faith into Daily Life and Career." Using simple examples, the priest explained how to maintain integrity in business and practice charity within the family. Song Yajing felt that many of his words resonated deeply with her.

events.name: Group Sharing and Exchange
events.description: The afternoon was dedicated to group discussions. Song Yajing and Aunt Lin were assigned to the same group. Summoning her courage, Song Yajing shared the pressures of being a small business owner and her struggles in balancing family and career. Several other group members, who were also mothers and working women, shared their own experiences and coping strategies. They offered mutual encouragement and prayers for one another, making her feel understood and supported.

events.name: Personal Silence and Profound Reflection
events.description: After the group activity, Song Yajing arranged for a longer period of personal quiet time. Carrying her notebook, she walked to a secluded beach, sat down, and began recording her reflections from the past two days while listening to the waves. She reflected on the sources of anxiety behind her "career-oriented" mindset and re-evaluated the true weight of "family" in her heart, gaining a clearer prioritization for the focus of her future life.

events.name: Japan Proxy Shopping Service Officially Launched
events.description: Before the afternoon personal quiet time began, Song Yajing logged into the mini-program backend on her phone. With a calm and resolute mindset, she officially launched the first batch of pre-sale products for the "Yajing · Japanese-style Goods" column. Subsequently, she posted a sincere and non-promotional announcement in her social media circle and regular customer group, briefly introducing these carefully selected overseas quality items, and quietly awaited interested customers.

events.name: Family Parent-Child Yoga
events.description: In the evening at the camp, we engaged in a 35-minute family parent-child yoga session via video call, combined with meditation, to help alleviate anxiety.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, ready to embrace a spiritually fulfilling day.

结束状态.心情: Clear and powerful, the pent-up pressure within is released, making the path ahead clearer and more serene.

state.今日运动: A 40-minute walk along the seashore and a 35-minute family parent-child yoga session.

2025-09.daily_overview: The retreat concluded with gratitude and fulfillment. Song Yajing returned home with inner peace, sharing this spiritual nourishment with her family. In the afternoon after resuming her daily routine, she began addressing backlogged shop matters and received the furniture for her daughter's study corner. The trajectory of her life smoothly transitioned from spiritual rejuvenation to practical rebuilding.

events.name: Retreat Closing and Return
events.description: In the morning, all camp participants attended the closing thanksgiving Mass presided over by Father Wang Mingde, during which everyone shared their gains from the past two days. After the Mass, Song Yajing and fellow parishioners such as Aunt Lin had lunch together, exchanging blessings. In the afternoon, everyone packed their luggage and returned to Xiamen city by bus. Song Yajing arrived home around three o'clock.

events.name: Sharing Insights from Meditation Retreat with Family
events.description: Returning home and seeing her husband and daughter, Song Yajing felt an extraordinary warmth. During dinner, she described her experience at the retreat to her husband, Chen Zhiqiang, sharing the inspirations she had heard and the new insights she had gained within. She said she felt as though she had "recharged her soul," and now viewed the pressure of transforming her shop with greater ease. Although her daughter did not fully understand, seeing her mother happy made her smile along.

events.name: Check Online Orders and Learning Corner Furniture
events.description: Returning to her daily routine, Song Yajing first checked her phone and discovered that the pre-sale section for her purchasing agent service had received three deposit orders, which gave her a small boost of encouragement. At the same time, the study corner desk and desk lamp she had ordered arrived. In the evening, she and Chen Zhiqiang unpacked the parcels together, checked that the items were intact, and temporarily stored the larger components in a corner of the living room, planning to assemble them over the weekend.

events.name: Handle Store Pending Matters
events.description: After arriving home in the afternoon, Song Yajing communicated with Xiao Mei via phone and WeChat regarding the store's performance over the weekend. She reviewed the sales revenue and addressed customer complaints (one customer reported a loose button on a shirt, which was properly resolved). She also handled the backlog of miscellaneous tasks that had accumulated during her retreat.

events.name: Community Badminton Practice Registration
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing saw a badminton activity notice in the community WeChat group, signed up for the practice session next Sunday, and began planning for this new sport.

events.name: Suspending sports activities due to returning to family responsibilities.
events.description: Due to travel fatigue, Song Yajing did not engage in additional exercise and only performed light household activities.

起始状态.心情: Filled with gratitude and peace, ready to return to family.

结束状态.心情: Steady and warm, connecting spiritual fulfillment with family affection, replenishing energy.

state.今日运动: Light household chores

2025-09.daily_overview: In the new week, Song Yajing advanced on two fronts simultaneously: on one hand, she actively promoted the upcoming community events to maintain neighborhood relations; on the other hand, she systematically organized her online operations study notes from the past week, transforming fragmented knowledge into a structured system. On the family front, she officially launched the renovation project for her daughter’s study corner.

events.name: Posting and Publishing Community Activity Notices
events.description: After sending her daughter to school in the morning, Song Yajing met up with Aunt Zhang Xiuying and posted posters for the weekend clothing upcycling workshop on the community bulletin board, at the entrances of each residential building, and in the shop window of her own store. At the same time, she shared digital announcements and sign-up forms in her social media moments, the community WeChat group, and the customer group for her store. By noon, she had already received registrations from seven or eight neighbors and regular customers.

events.name: Organize Online Operations Study Notes
events.description: During the afternoon lull in customer flow, instead of learning new content, Song Yajing took out all her study notes from the past week on the mini-program backend, product listing, order processing, customer communication, and marketing tools. She reorganized and summarized them on her computer, creating a simple "Online Store Operation Manual," and marked the sections she was still unfamiliar with, which required her husband's assistance or further practice.

events.name: Assemble daughter's study desk
events.description: In the evening, Chen Zhiqiang was responsible for assembling the children's desk according to the instructions. Song Yajing assisted by handing tools, holding the boards in place, and clearing the corner of the living room, moving away clutter to make full space for the soon-to-be-finished study area. The couple worked in perfect coordination, and within an hour, the main structure of the desk was assembled.

events.name: Preliminary Arrangement of the Learning Corner
events.description: After assembling the desk, the two of them placed it in the predetermined spot together. Song Yajing adjusted the angle of the desk lamp, while Chen Zhiqiang fine-tuned the height of the chair to ensure it was suitable for their daughter’s stature. Although the setup was not yet fully complete, the rudimentary form of the study corner had already taken shape, making the living room appear more orderly.

events.name: Focus on online purchasing agent orders
events.description: During the day, Song Yajing checked the mini-program backend from time to time and found that two more orders for purchasing agents had been added. She updated Zhao Min on the sales situation via WeChat and urged for an update on the logistics progress of the first batch of paid goods.

events.name: Evening brisk walk for relaxation
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing took a 20-minute brisk walk around the neighborhood, but it felt a bit rushed due to her busy schedule.

events.name: Returned late from a gathering with my best friend.
events.description: In the evening, her close friend Li Meiling invited her for coffee on short notice. They chatted until 23:40 before returning home, resulting in staying up late and a slight weight gain.

起始状态.心情: Full of action, ready to embrace the challenges of the new week.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied, the community activities have received positive feedback, and family building has made substantial progress, but staying up late has caused slight fatigue.

state.今日运动: Take a 20-minute brisk walk in the evening.
