2025-09.daily_overview: Song Yajing began to deepen her studies, seeking help from her husband—an "expert" by her side—for technical challenges. Her mother's health advice opened up new perspectives on wellness management for her. A simple attempt at foot soaking brought unexpected relaxation, prompting her to start planning more proactive exercise routines.

events.name: Consulting Husband on Technical Issues
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing took her organized study notes and asked her husband Chen Zhiqiang, who works in IT, about several technical concepts she didn't fully understand, such as online system data security and server stability. Chen Zhiqiang explained the general principles in plain language and assured her that he could help if her store's mini-program encountered any technical issues, which put Song Yajing's mind at ease.

events.name: Receiving Health Preservation Advice from a Phone Call with Mother
events.description: During a routine video call with her mother Lin Xiuying, the mother keenly detected a hint of fatigue in her daughter's voice and asked with concern if she was having trouble sleeping. Song Yajing admitted that she had been overthinking lately, which made it a bit difficult for her to fall asleep. Her mother then suggested she try soaking her feet in hot water before bed, explaining that it could promote blood circulation, calm the mind, and improve sleep quality.

events.name: First attempt at soaking feet before bedtime.
events.description: After the call, Song Yajing decided to adopt her mother's simple suggestion. She boiled a pot of water, filled a regular plastic basin at home, adjusted the temperature to warm but not scalding, and then sat by the living room sofa to soak her feet for about 15 minutes. During the process, she felt warmth in her feet, and a wave of heat seemed to spread upward. The tension in her nerves from the day gradually eased away.

events.name: Plan a morning jogging workout
events.description: The sense of physical and mental relaxation after soaking her feet, combined with a renewed focus on health following the retreat, inspired Song Yajing to consider starting a regular exercise routine. Before going to bed, she used her phone to search for parks near her home and ultimately chose the lakeside trail at Nanhu Park as her morning running route. She downloaded a running-tracking app and made a preliminary plan to run three to four times a week, starting with light jogging.

events.name: An Evening Stroll with My Father
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing accompanied her father for a 35-minute walk in the park, discussing health-related topics.

events.name: Continuous weight gain due to social gatherings
events.description: Due to the increased food and drink consumption at the gathering the night before, there has been a slight increase in body weight.

起始状态.心情: Usually, adopt a problem-solving attitude.

结束状态.心情: Relaxed yet with new expectations, the comfort of foot soaking and her exercise plan have given her more confidence in self-management.

state.今日运动: A 35-minute evening walk with my father.

2025-09.daily_overview: This was a day of harvest and validation. The first batch of goods purchased through Japanese proxy shopping arrived smoothly. Song Yajing personally completed the exquisite packaging and delivery, and received enthusiastic praise from her first customer, which greatly encouraged her. Meanwhile, she began to explore more in-depth online traffic generation methods, while the ritual of soaking her feet before bed brought her a better sleep experience.

events.name: Learning Online Traffic Generation and Content Marketing
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing read numerous articles on her phone and computer about how to leverage WeChat Moments and Xiaohongshu to drive traffic to offline small shops. She focused on learning how to target the intended customer base, craft compelling copy, and use popular hashtags to increase exposure. She also pondered how to incorporate the shop's "curated selection" and "personal touch" features into the content.

events.name: Second Foot Soak Before Bed
events.description: A little after eight in the evening, Song Yajing once again boiled water to soak her feet. Drawing from her experience the night before, she was more composed this time, adjusting the water temperature just right. While soaking her feet, she scrolled through her phone and replied to some client messages. Fifteen minutes later, she felt her entire body warm and thoroughly relaxed.

events.name: Receipt and Inspection of Purchased Goods
events.description: In the afternoon, the long-awaited package of Japanese proxy-purchased goods finally arrived at the shop. Song Yajing personally signed for it and, with eager anticipation yet in an orderly manner, proceeded to unpack. Following the pre-sale order list, she meticulously verified the types and quantities of the items, carefully inspecting the quality of each canvas bag and stationery product. She confirmed that there was no shipping damage or incorrect shipments, and the quality met expectations.

events.name: Hand-packing and shipping orders
events.description: After verifying everything was correct, Song Yajing began the heartfelt packaging process. She selected wrapping paper with minimalist patterns and ribbons in matching colors, personally gift-wrapping each order and attaching handwritten thank-you cards. Once the packaging was complete, she promptly notified the customers who had placed the orders. For local customers, she coordinated pickup times; for out-of-town customers, she carefully filled out the courier forms and scheduled pickups with the delivery personnel.

events.name: Received the first customer's positive review
events.description: In the evening, a regular local customer from Xiamen who had received a parcel sent Song Yajing a positive review via WeChat, highly praising the exquisite products and thoughtful packaging. The customer also attached "beautiful unboxing photos" taken on her balcony and shared them on her Moments. Seeing this, Song Yajing was deeply moved and gratified, as it was the first positive feedback she had received for her new business. She took a screenshot to save the message and sincerely replied with her gratitude.

events.name: Attempt the first morning run
events.description: At six thirty in the morning, Song Yajing followed her plan, changed into her sportswear and old running shoes, and arrived at South Lake Park to begin her first morning run. She had only jogged for less than ten minutes before she was out of breath, her legs feeling heavy, forcing her to switch to brisk walking. Although the process was challenging, the fresh morning air in the park and the sense of accomplishment from taking the first step of "starting" left her in a good mood.

events.name: Evening brisk walk for relaxation
events.description: In the evening, engage in a 20-minute brisk walk to help with relaxation.

起始状态.心情: Refreshing, carrying an exploratory desire for the new day

结束状态.心情: Joyful and full of a sense of accomplishment, the successful delivery of the first batch of the purchasing agency business and the positive feedback from customers serve as tremendous motivation, while foot soaking also heralds the promise of high-quality sleep.

state.今日运动: Morning jog (alternating between slow jogging and brisk walking) for approximately 20 minutes, and brisk walking for 20 minutes in the evening.

2025-09.daily_overview: After achieving initial success, Song Yajing did not pause but immediately immersed herself in review and in-depth learning. She began analyzing data, formulating a detailed online launch plan, and maintained her morning run the following day. The philosophy of balancing health and career became more deeply integrated into her daily life through practices such as foot soaking feedback and consistent exercise.

events.name: Learning Data Analysis and Business Review
events.description: After closing the shop in the evening, Song Yajing learned how to view basic sales data reports on the mini-program backend. At the same time, she conducted a brief review of her first purchasing agent business, documenting the entire process duration from pre-sale to delivery, packaging material costs, and key customer feedback keywords. She also reflected on how to optimize product selection and promotion strategies for the next time.

events.name: Develop an Online Store Implementation Plan
events.description: Based on post-project reviews and recent learning, Song Yajing has drafted a detailed launch plan for the online store (Mini Program + WeChat Moments + Xiaohongshu), integrating the shop's autumn inventory. The plan includes the first batch of five selected in-store apparel items to be featured, supporting marketing activities (such as opening coupons), and a two-week promotion schedule.

events.name: Foot Soaking Experience Feedback and Deepening
events.description: After soaking her feet for several consecutive days, Song Yajing clearly felt that she fell asleep faster and her sleep quality improved. She also felt more energetic upon waking up in the morning. She shared this positive experience with her mother via WeChat and thanked her for the good advice. Her mother was delighted and taught her a few simple foot massage techniques.

events.name: Adhere to morning running.
events.description: Despite the muscle soreness, Song Yajing forced herself to get up early and returned to Nanhu Park once again. She still had to alternate between running and walking, but she persisted in exercising for 20 minutes. After the run, she was drenched in sweat and felt exhausted, yet there was a sense of triumph over her own laziness. She recorded the data from this session using an app.

events.name: Create an Insurance Plan Comparison Table
events.description: During the afternoon lull at the shop, Song Yajing created a detailed comparison table of insurance plans on her computer. She systematically entered key information from several preliminary proposals sent by the insurance advisor—such as coverage scope, premiums, payment terms, waiting periods, and cash values—into the table. This made the complex policy terms clear at a glance, preparing her for in-depth discussions with her husband later.

events.name: Consulting relatives and friends about insurance experience
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing sent WeChat messages to her well-informed elder sister Song Yawen in Shenzhen and her university classmate Zhao Min, who works in the e-commerce industry, regarding insurance purchase matters. She consulted them on their experiences with buying insurance and their views on different insurance companies, obtaining a considerable amount of practical third-party reference information.

events.name: An Evening Stroll with My Father
events.description: In the evening, accompanied my father for a 35-minute walk and exchanged insights on recent health management practices.

起始状态.心情: Slightly fatigued (with muscle soreness), yet resolute in will.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and steadfast, learning, exercise, and planning are all progressing steadily, with a growing sense of control over life.

state.今日运动: Morning jog (interval running) for about 20 minutes, and an evening walk with my father for 35 minutes.

2025-09.daily_overview: Friday was exceptionally busy. With the weekend approaching, business at the store was booming, requiring Song Yajing to devote her full attention to in-store operations. At the same time, she needed to prepare for the weekend community classes and continue advancing her online content creation. In the evening, she accompanied her husband for his annual health check-up, and later that night, she embarked on a new adult piano course, making her schedule both packed and vibrant.

events.name: Store Busyness and Simplified Skincare
events.description: On Friday, Zhongshan Road Pedestrian Street was bustling with activity, and Song Yajing's shop also experienced its peak customer flow of the week. She and her assistant Xiao Mei were so busy they barely had a moment to rest, and it wasn't until 10 p.m. that they finally closed the shop. Exhausted upon returning home, she only performed the most basic skincare routine—cleansing and applying a hydrating serum—before skipping the rest of her more elaborate steps, eager to rest as soon as possible.

events.name: Lesson on Upcycling Old Clothes in the Lesson Preparation Community
events.description: To ensure the smooth teaching of the Saturday community class, Song Yajing stayed up late the night before to prepare her lesson. She found an old pair of jeans of her own and, according to the course design, made complete samples of a denim tote bag, coasters, and hairbands in advance. She also meticulously documented the key points of each step, potential difficulties (such as the sewing machine struggling with thick fabric), and corresponding solutions, ensuring she could clearly demonstrate the process the next day.

events.name: Consult Classmates on Online Operations Practice
events.description: During the lunch break, Song Yajing had a brief video call with her university classmate Zhao Min, focusing on seeking practical tips for product photography when starting an online small shop. Zhao Min shared how to take appealing photos using natural light, a smartphone, and simple props, as well as insights on detail page layout. Song Yajing listened attentively and took notes.

events.name: Brainstorm and draft the first Xiaohongshu post copy
events.description: Using the techniques shared by Zhao Min, Song Yajing spent the afternoon in the store taking several outfit photos featuring a trench coat from the autumn collection. After returning home in the evening, she began drafting her first Xiaohongshu recommendation post, combining the photos to brainstorm how to describe the trench coat’s silhouette advantages and styling possibilities in everyday language.

events.name: Accompanying husband for annual physical examination
events.description: As scheduled, Song Yajing temporarily left the shop in the afternoon to accompany her husband Chen Zhiqiang to the community health center for his annual physical examination. The checkup included routine internal medicine and surgical examinations, complete blood count, cervical spine X-ray, among other items. Song Yajing assisted with the procedures and queuing. During the waiting intervals, she discussed their respective work updates from the week with her husband and reminded him to pay more attention to his cervical spine in the future, advising him not to constantly look down at his phone.

events.name: First Adult Piano Lesson
events.description: At eight o'clock in the evening, Song Yajing went to a music studio in Siming District and began her first piano lesson in life. The teacher started by teaching her to recognize the keys and middle C, guiding her on the correct sitting posture, hand shape, and how to play single notes in a relaxed manner. Song Yajing felt both nervous and excited. Although her fingers were stiff, the moment she pressed the keys and produced a crisp sound, she experienced a long-lost, pure joy unrelated to work. The teacher assigned basic fingering exercises.

events.name: Book a badminton court
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing saw a message in the community WeChat group from Aunt Zhang organizing a badminton activity. Recalling her own plan to exercise, she mustered the courage to send a private message to Aunt Zhang to sign up and confirmed the practice time and location for Sunday afternoon.

events.name: Slight weight gain due to eating out.
events.description: Due to the busyness of the shop, I have been eating out for lunch and dinner, resulting in a slight weight gain.

events.name: Skipping the morning run due to staying up late.
events.description: Due to staying up late preparing lessons, I did not go for a morning run and only performed light stretching.

起始状态.心情: Prepare for a busy day, with a slight sense of tension.

结束状态.心情: Extremely exhausted yet spiritually fulfilled, with high-intensity work, family responsibilities, and the pursuit of new hobbies intertwined, feeling tired but happy.

state.今日运动: Light Stretching

2025-09.daily_overview: The weekend unfolded with a self-directed and enriching rhythm. Song Yajing published her first carefully prepared online fashion content and purchased more professional athletic gear for it. In the afternoon, she attended her second piano lesson, where her fingers began attempting simple coordination on the keys. Morning runs remained a struggle, but her body was subtly signaling signs of adaptation.

events.name: Post Your First Xiaohongshu Outfit Copy
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing posted the trench coat outfit copy and images she had written and revised the previous night on her Xiaohongshu account and WeChat Moments. She carefully added tags such as "Xiamen Exploration," "Autumn Outfits," and "Trench Coats for Petite Figures," actively engaging with the first users who liked and commented on her posts. At the same time, she nervously monitored the initial changes in view counts and interaction data.

events.name: Purchasing Badminton Equipment
events.description: Realizing she needed more professional equipment, Song Yajing took some time during her lunch break to visit a sporting goods store. Following the clerk’s recommendation, she purchased a pair of professional badminton shoes, a set of breathable and sweat-wicking sportswear, and a lightweight badminton racket suitable for beginners, making full material preparations for the next day’s activity.

events.name: Second Piano Lesson: Learning Basic Chords
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing arrived at the music studio on time for her second lesson. After the teacher checked her fingering exercises, they introduced the concept of the primary chords in C major (C, F, G) and taught her to play simple chord roots with her left hand. In the latter part of the lesson, she began clumsily attempting to coordinate the single-note melody played by her right hand with the chord roots played by her left hand. Although she often made mistakes, she felt immense joy when her hands managed to synchronize for the first time, even if only barely keeping up with the beat.

events.name: Persist in the third morning run.
events.description: Despite the lingering soreness in her thighs and calves, Song Yajing forced herself to get up early and completed her third morning run. This time, she was still only able to run for 15 minutes at a slow pace, but she felt her breathing was slightly smoother than during the previous two runs, no longer as breathless as before. She persisted in recording the activity with an app and performed some simple stretches afterward.

events.name: Community Old Clothes Upcycling Workshop
events.description: In the morning, I taught an upcycling workshop at the community center, interacted with neighbors, and received positive feedback.

events.name: Family Parent-Child Yoga
events.description: In the evening, engage in 35 minutes of family parent-child yoga, incorporating meditation.

起始状态.心情: The sense of relaxation on weekends, coupled with the excitement of trying new things.

结束状态.心情: Pleasant and creative, the release of content, new equipment, and small progress in piano lessons have all brought positive feedback.

state.今日运动: 15 minutes of morning jogging, 35 minutes of family parent-child yoga.

2025-09.daily_overview: Sunday is the day for sports and social activities. Song Yajing stepped onto the badminton court for the first time and, under the guidance of her neighbor partner, experienced the sweat and joy of exercise. In the evening, she and her husband had their first formal and in-depth discussion about family insurance plans, placing financial security at the core of their agenda. Meanwhile, to solidify her health maintenance habits, she placed an order for an electric foot-soaking tub.

events.name: Learning to analyze online data
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing checked the data of the Xiaohongshu note she posted yesterday. It had garnered several hundred views, over ten likes and saves, along with two comments inquiring about the price of the trench coat. Through her studies, she gained a preliminary understanding of how to use this data to assess whether the content had reached the target audience and began contemplating how to improve her next piece of content.

events.name: First Community Badminton Practice Session
events.description: At three in the afternoon, Song Yajing arrived at the community badminton hall with her new equipment, partnering with Ms. Li, who was introduced by her neighbor Aunt Zhang. Ms. Li, with some foundational skills, patiently guided Song Yajing in learning the basic movements of serving, receiving, and simple footwork. Song Yajing’s movements were clumsy, and her reactions were slow, leaving her quickly breathless and drenched in sweat. Nevertheless, she persisted through nearly two hours of practice. The mix of exhaustion and exhilaration after the workout gave her a sense of satisfaction distinct from the achievements she experienced at work.

events.name: Share the latest sports news with family.
events.description: Returning home in the evening, Song Yajing excitedly showed her husband and daughter the newly purchased badminton racket, sharing the amusing incidents and "mishaps" from her afternoon practice session (such as frequently missing the ball). Her daughter giggled as she listened, and her husband encouraged her to persist, saying that exercise is beneficial. The relaxed atmosphere at home filled her with a profound sense of warmth.

events.name: Post-Piano Lesson Practice
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing took out her electronic keyboard to review the single notes and simple left-hand and right-hand coordination she had learned in her piano class. She practiced for about half an hour. Although her progress was slow and her fingers remained uncoordinated, she reminded herself that perseverance was key.

events.name: Selecting an Electric Foot Spa
events.description: To persist with and enhance the experience of foot soaking as an effective relaxation method, Song Yajing spent her evening carefully browsing and comparing various electric foot soaking tubs on a shopping app. She focused on products with massage functions, temperature control, and good safety features, ultimately selecting a mid-priced model to purchase.

events.name: First In-depth Discussion on Family Insurance
events.description: After their daughter fell asleep, Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang held their first formal family meeting regarding insurance in the study. Using the comparison table prepared by Song Yajing, they focused on discussing the critical illness insurance products from two companies, weighing the sense of security provided by high coverage against the financial pressure of long-term premium payments. They also preliminarily outlined the portion of the family’s annual budget that could be allocated to insurance.

events.name: Purchase professional running shoes for morning runs.
events.description: After experiencing foot discomfort following several consecutive days of morning runs, Song Yajing realized that she might need better running shoes. She took time to visit a shopping mall to try on several models and ultimately purchased a pair of professional cushioned running shoes, hoping they would protect her knees and make her morning runs more sustainable.

events.name: Family Weekend Swimming
events.description: In the evening, we engage in our monthly family swimming activity, relaxing for one hour at the community pool.

起始状态.心情: Feeling relaxed and looking forward to socializing and activities over the weekend.

结束状态.心情: Physically exhausted yet mentally content, sports and socializing have brought new experiences, and discussions on family finances have taken a pragmatic step forward, making life feel more expansive in its dimensions.

state.今日运动: Badminton practice for approximately 2 hours, family weekend swimming for 1 hour.

2025-09.daily_overview: In the new week, Song Yajing progressed through optimization. She adjusted her online content strategy based on data feedback and published her second recommendation article. In the afternoon, she took her daughter for an annual physical check-up, fulfilling her responsibilities as a mother. In the evening, a dull reading experience prompted her to reflect and decide to abandon an outdated entertainment habit, symbolizing the proactive iteration of personal interests.

events.name: Optimize and Publish the Second Online Copy
events.description: Based on the data feedback from the first Xiaohongshu note, Song Yajing conducted targeted research on the high-performing content of other local fashion bloggers. She adjusted her strategy and wrote and published a second promotional copy in the afternoon, this time focusing on a best-selling dress in the store. She experimented with different posting times and actively engaged with potential customers in the copy, encouraging them to place orders online or visit the store for try-ons.

events.name: Take my daughter for an annual physical examination.
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing took her daughter Chen Lexuan to the community health center for the child's annual physical examination. The procedures included height and weight measurements, vision screening, and a complete blood count. The daughter was extremely afraid of having her blood drawn and began crying and fussing. Song Yajing patiently held her, using a gentle tone to tell stories and promising to buy her favorite cake after the check-up. She eventually soothed her daughter's emotions, and all examinations were successfully completed.

events.name: Sharing My First Exercise Experience with My Best Friend
events.description: On her way home from the physical examination, Song Yajing shared with her close friend Li Meiling on WeChat her "unprecedented" experience of playing badminton the previous Sunday, describing the exhaustion during the process and the sense of refreshment afterward. Li Meiling was quite surprised and teased her by saying she had "finally come to her senses." The two agreed to catch up on each other's recent lives during their next gathering.

events.name: Complete the order for the foot soaking tub.
events.description: After careful comparison over the weekend, Song Yajing finally confirmed her preferred model of electric foot soaking bucket around 9 p.m. She completed the payment on the shopping app, looking forward to upgrading her pre-sleep relaxation ritual after receiving the product.

events.name: Reflect and decide to stop following the novel updates.
events.description: Before going to bed at night, Song Yajing habitually opened the latest chapter of the urban romance novel she had been following for years. However, during the reading process, she felt not relaxation but rather a sense of weariness and detachment. The character entanglements and values in the novel seemed out of sync with her current concerns, such as managing her shop, health maintenance, and family planning. This dull reading experience prompted her to reflect deeply, ultimately leading her to cancel the automatic subscription and actively abandon this old habit that no longer brought her joy, making room for more meaningful activities.

events.name: Continue to maintain the morning running routine.
events.description: In the morning, wearing her newly purchased professional running shoes, Song Yajing returned to Nanhu Park once again. As her body began to adapt, she completed a 20-minute jog with improved breathlessness and an increased pace. As usual, she recorded the data, feeling that her athletic ability was gradually improving.

events.name: Pre-Sleep Foot Soaking Ritual
events.description: In the evening, soak your feet for 20 minutes before bed, using the newly learned foot reflexology techniques to further relax your body and mind.

起始状态.心情: The customary vigor and planning of Monday

结束状态.心情: Calm yet resolute, after fulfilling her maternal duties, she achieved a small self-renewal by abandoning old habits, gaining a stronger sense of control over time.

state.今日运动: 20-minute morning run at Nanhu Park

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy, turning cooler with a light breeze in the evening.

2025-09.daily_overview: Tuesday, the shop operated as usual. Today, Song Yajing was fortunate to have a quiet moment after closing, free from the usual household chores, which prompted her to sit down and engage in deep reflection on a long-standing habit. Her proactive nature was evident that very day, as she began formulating initial plans for change. Meanwhile, despite the difficulty, she persisted with her morning run.

events.name: Deep Reflection on Reading Habits
events.description: After closing the shop for the night and returning home, Song Yajing settled her daughter before retreating to her study to reflect on her habit of binge-reading online romance novels. She checked the records on her mobile reading app and calculated that she had spent nearly two hours daily on this activity over the past week. Considering her goals of "improving shop operations" and "learning French pastry-making," she realized that this time, aside from providing brief sensory entertainment, contributed almost nothing to her personal growth, family interactions, or career advancement. Instead, it encroached on the time she could have spent researching fashion trends, bonding with her daughter, and acquiring new skills. A strong sense of wasted time and a desire for change welled up within her.

events.name: Preliminary Planning Habit Alternatives
events.description: The sense of urgency brought about by reflection prevented Song Yajing from procrastinating. She immediately took out her notebook and began planning how to make changes. She initially identified alternative reading materials: prioritizing fashion industry public account articles related to store operations, browsing e-commerce platform analysis reports, and baking recipe books she was interested in. At the same time, she also outlined specific steps: tomorrow, she would remove the novel app from her phone's home screen and cancel all push notifications.

events.name: The Resolve to Bid Farewell to Old Hobbies
events.description: After completing her plan, Song Yajing leaned back in her chair, gazing at the night outside the window, her thoughts becoming clearer. She understood that letting go of this long-standing hobby was about making room for more meaningful pursuits. She began to consider how to utilize the fragmented time she used to spend on her phone—listening to English music during her commute to practice listening skills, reading an in-depth industry analysis during lunch breaks, and sharing picture books with her daughter in the evenings. This decision brought a tinge of reluctance, but even more so, it filled her with anticipation for the new chapter ahead.

events.name: Challenge of Extending Morning Running Duration
events.description: At 6:15 in the morning, Song Yajing arrived at Nanhu Park to continue her morning running routine. Today, she attempted to extend her running time from the previous 15 minutes to 18 minutes. During the last three minutes, she clearly felt shortness of breath and heaviness in her calves, but she gritted her teeth and persevered, repeatedly telling herself, "Just run another hundred meters." After finishing, she was drenched in sweat, panting with her hands on her hips. She then opened her fitness app to check the detailed data. She noticed that her average heart rate was higher than last time, but her post-run recovery speed seemed slightly faster. This small positive sign made her feel that her persistence was worthwhile.

events.name: Temporary Handling of Store Inventory Issues
events.description: In the afternoon, a regular customer reported slight fraying on a shirt purchased the previous week. Song Yajing promptly apologized and offered complimentary repair service, while also checking the inventory of items from the same batch to ensure no other issues existed. This minor incident made her realize the importance of quality control, prompting her to spend an additional half-hour organizing the merchandise.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a faint anxiety about changing habits.

结束状态.心情: After rational reflection and planning, one feels clear and resolute internally, experiencing a sense of grounded control over life.

state.今日运动: 18-minute morning jog at South Lake Park

date_attribute.weather: Sunny with a large temperature difference between morning and evening

2025-09.daily_overview: Wednesday was a day of concentrated action. Song Yajing swiftly translated her reflections from the previous night into multiple concrete steps: during the lunch break at the shop, she began subscribing to industry updates; after work, she thoroughly cleaned up her novel app and shared this decision with her husband. Meanwhile, her online operations learning yielded phased results, and health investments (a foot-soaking bucket) and financial planning (consulting on loans) were simultaneously initiated, reflecting the pragmatic and well-planned nature of her ESFJ personality.

events.name: Organize Online Learning Outcomes
events.description: Taking advantage of the quiet period before the shop opened in the morning, Song Yajing systematically organized her notes on online operations, which she had recently gathered from consulting her university classmate Zhao Min over the past half-month, along with key points she had researched and studied on her own. She compiled a document titled "Key Points for Launching Online Operations for a Boutique Store," which clarified several critical steps and considerations, such as setting up a mini-program, listing products, and initial promotion. Looking at this document, which embodied her hard work, her confidence in the shop's online transformation significantly increased, and she felt her goals had become clearer.

events.name: Install and Experience an Electric Foot Soaking Tub for the First Time
events.description: In the evening, the electric foot-soaking tub purchased online was delivered to the home. After dinner, Song Yajing unpacked the packaging and carefully read the instructions. Following the guidelines, she cleaned the inside of the tub, then added warm water and the mugwort packs her mother had previously sent. She set the water temperature to 42 degrees Celsius and the massage mode for 20 minutes. As her feet sank into the warm water and felt the massage from the rollers at the bottom, the fatigue from a day of standing seemed to begin melting away. Leaning back on the sofa with her eyes closed, she felt this investment in her health was well worth it.

events.name: Strengthen the determination to change
events.description: On her way to the shop and during her lunch break, Song Yajing continued to deepen her reflections from the previous day. She took out her phone’s memo app and listed "reading novels for 2 hours" alongside "learning online operations for 1 hour," "researching new baking desserts for 45 minutes," and "dedicatedly playing games with her daughter for 30 minutes," comparing their respective values. She clearly realized that each of the latter activities offered far greater long-term benefits and contributions to her family and career than the fleeting pleasure brought by the former. This comparison strengthened her resolve to abandon her old habit.

events.name: Uninstall the novel app to physically eliminate temptation.
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Song Yajing did not hesitate and immediately picked up her phone. She first opened her commonly used reading app and canceled all automatic subscriptions and update notifications for the novels she had been following. Then, she long-pressed the app icon, watching the familiar icon tremble on the screen. Taking a deep breath, she tapped "Delete." Once the uninstallation was complete, she felt a sense of relief, as if she had cleared away an energy-draining "time sink." This was a crucial step in refocusing her energy on meaningful pursuits.

events.name: Sharing the Decision to Change with Husband
events.description: During dinner, Song Yajing proactively brought up to her husband Chen Zhiqiang, "I've decided to stop reading those online novels from now on. They take up too much time and aren't really useful." Chen Zhiqiang was somewhat surprised, but seeing his wife's serious expression, he quickly expressed understanding and support: "That's fine. You've been managing the shop and learning new things lately, so your time is indeed tight. Just let me know if there's anything I can help with." Her husband's support made her feel even more reassured.

events.name: Subscribe to Industry Insights, Take the First Step Toward Alternatives
events.description: During the afternoon lull when customer traffic was low, Song Yajing used her break time to search for keywords such as "women's fashion trends," "independent store owners," and "retail operations" on her phone. She filtered and followed five or six public accounts that appeared to offer high-quality content, such as "Fashion Guide" and "Niche Brand Research Institute." After browsing several historical articles, she found the analyses on autumn color coordination and fabric trends particularly enlightening. She immediately noted down the useful insights in the store's work notebook.

events.name: Schedule an Appointment with a Bank Relationship Manager for Consultation
events.description: Considering the potential uncertainties arising from the possible renovation of the pedestrian street and the possible need for financial support for the online transition, Song Yajing felt it necessary to explore alternative financing channels. In the afternoon, she contacted Lin Xiaofeng, a customer manager at the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China, via WeChat. She briefly explained her status as an individual business owner and her need to inquire about business loans, and scheduled a meeting at the bank for the following afternoon.

events.name: Complete the first week's morning running plan.
events.description: Today marks the final session of the first week of the morning running plan, with the goal still set at 15 minutes. Although the muscles remain somewhat sore, breathing has become much smoother compared to the beginning. After finishing the run, Song Yajing reviewed the data from this week: from panting heavily after just five minutes initially to now barely completing a 15-minute slow run. Although the progress is modest, having personally carried out the plan has given her initial confidence in the concept of "perseverance."

events.name: Second Discussion on Family Insurance Plan
events.description: After their child fell asleep in the evening, Song Yajing and her husband Chen Zhiqiang once again took out the several insurance plans provided by their advisor for an in-depth discussion. Based on their research from the previous day, they had essentially ruled out one product with overlapping coverage but higher premiums. Among the remaining two plans, which emphasized different aspects, they had formed a preliminary preference. However, they also listed several questions regarding the exemption clauses and future premium adjustment mechanisms, deciding to compile these inquiries and consult their advisor together the next day.

events.name: Overtime work to handle online orders
events.description: Due to an increase in promotional pre-sale inquiries, Song Yajing spent an extra half hour in the evening replying to WeChat messages and handling test orders on the mini-program, which caused her to go to bed later than planned. However, she gained some valuable customer feedback.

起始状态.心情: Clear objectives, full of drive

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and somewhat accomplished, with multiple plans initiated, yet slightly fatigued.

state.今日运动: A 15-minute morning jog

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy, turning to light rain in the afternoon

2025-09.daily_overview: On Thursday, the rainy weather slightly reduced foot traffic in the store. Song Yajing took advantage of this opportunity to go out and handle bank consultations, obtaining important financial planning information for the store's future. The newly arrived foot-soaking tub provided tangible relaxation in the evening. Meanwhile, she further implemented the time substitution plan and successfully stabilized and increased her morning running time. Today was a day spent steadily in practical planning and self-care.

events.name: Receive and inspect the electric foot spa
events.description: At noon, the courier delivered the electric foot soaking tub that Song Yajing had purchased to her home. After signing for it, she unpacked the box and checked whether the main unit, accessories, and instruction manual were complete, as well as whether there was any visible damage to the exterior. Once everything was confirmed to be in order, she placed the foot soaking tub in the living room near the sofa for convenient use.

events.name: Enjoy a foot soak before bedtime.
events.description: After closing the shop for the evening and returning home, Song Yajing had finished her household chores by nearly ten o’clock. She felt some swelling in her feet. She filled the foot-soaking tub with water, added an artemisia pack, and turned on the constant-temperature massage function. Twenty minutes later, not only were her feet relaxed, but the tightness in her calves had also disappeared. Her whole body felt warm and drowsy, and she decided to make this a regular habit.

events.name: Planning New Uses for Fragmented Time
events.description: On the subway to the bank, Song Yajing realized that this was exactly the kind of "fragmented time" she used to spend catching up on novels. She put on her headphones and started playing her favorite English playlist, while silently planning in her mind: from now on, such time would be dedicated to relaxing with music or listening to business podcasts; lunch breaks would be reserved for browsing the fashion public accounts she subscribed to in the morning; and evenings spent with her daughter would be for reading picture books or playing puzzles together. A clear blueprint for time substitution took shape in her mind.

events.name: Remove Reading Distractions on Your Phone
events.description: After returning to the shop in the afternoon, Song Yajing took advantage of Xiao Mei's time attending to customers to perform a "deep clean" on her phone. She not only ensured that the novel app had been uninstalled but also went into the notification management settings to disable all notifications from associated platforms that might push novel advertisements or updates. At the same time, she pinned several newly subscribed fashion public accounts to the top, completing the transition from "reducing temptations" to "actively guiding interests."

events.name: Handle daily store deposits
events.description: At 2:00 p.m., Song Yajing first drove to the Siming Sub-branch of Industrial and Commercial Bank of China Xiamen Branch to deposit the shop's recent daily cash revenue into the corporate account. This was one of her routine financial operations conducted several times each month.

events.name: Inquiry on Business Loan Solutions
events.description: After making the deposit, Song Yajing met with the bank's client manager, Lin Xiaofeng, in the financial advisory room. She elaborated on the potential risks her store might face due to rumors about the pedestrian street renovation, as well as her plans to transition online and explore expanding her business by introducing Japanese purchasing agent services. Manager Lin patiently listened to her situation and, based on the store's corporate account transaction records from the past year and her strong personal credit history, recommended two inclusive financial business loan products suitable for individual businesses. He explained in detail the application requirements, interest rates, loan amounts, and repayment methods, and provided a list of application materials that needed to be prepared in advance.

events.name: Organize Loan Consultation Information
events.description: After the consultation concluded, Song Yajing returned to her shop. While her memory was still fresh, she immediately created a new document on her computer, recording the loan product information recommended by Manager Lin, interest rate comparisons, the list of required materials, as well as her preliminary thoughts on when she might need to utilize these funds. This document became her backup plan for addressing future financial needs, providing her with greater peace of mind.

events.name: Morning running time extended to 25 minutes.
events.description: The rain stopped in the early morning, leaving the air fresh. Song Yajing arrived at Nanhu Park and decided to challenge herself with a 25-minute jog. She started at a slower pace, paying attention to adjusting her breathing. By the 20-minute mark, although she still felt tired, it was no longer as unbearable as it had been in the previous days. She ultimately persisted and completed the 25 minutes. During her post-run stretching, she felt light and agile, and the persistent muscle soreness she had experienced earlier had almost completely disappeared—a clear sign of her improved physical fitness.

events.name: Evening dinner with close friend Li Meiling
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing and Li Meiling met for dinner at a Minnan cuisine restaurant in Xiamen. They chatted about each other's recent updates and parenting experiences, enjoyed dishes such as satay noodles and rice dumplings, and savored their social time together, though this led to a higher calorie intake.

起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to handle established matters.

结束状态.心情: Relaxed and at ease, with a clearer plan for the future, feeling joyful after social interactions.

state.今日运动: Morning jog for 25 minutes at South Lake Park

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with cool and comfortable weather.

2025-09.daily_overview: On Friday, as the weekend approached, the shop became busy. In addition to managing the business, Song Yajing efficiently completed preparations for the community’s old clothes upcycling workshop. She continued to deepen her habit substitution, focused on more professional industry information sources, and began organizing potential loan materials. The new method she tried during her morning run made her exercise routine more effortless. Today demonstrated her ability to balance community activities, personal development, and health management.

events.name: Setting up the venue for the community clothing upcycling workshop
events.description: Before the shop opened in the morning, Song Yajing and her neighbor Aunt Zhang Xiuying went to the community activity room to prepare for the third-quarter old clothes upcycling class scheduled for the next afternoon. They rearranged the tables and chairs into a U-shaped layout to facilitate teaching and interaction, distributed shared tools such as scissors, needles and thread, tailor's chalk, and tape measures to each seat, and hung step-by-step diagrams and a finished sample of the "old jeans transformed into storage baskets" project on the whiteboard at the front. Song Yajing also carefully checked the lighting in the activity room and the wall power outlets to ensure that the projector and electric sewing machine (if needed) would function properly during the class.

events.name: Hosting a Community Workshop on Upcycling Old Clothes
events.description: At two o'clock on Friday afternoon, the old clothes upcycling workshop began on time. Song Yajing, as the main instructor, provided a detailed explanation and demonstration to over ten community aunties and young mothers on how to cut and sew an old pair of jeans into a practical storage basket. Aunt Zhang Xiuying assisted by helping individual participants thread needles or answer questions. The atmosphere in the workshop was lively, with everyone learning by doing and exchanging ideas on upcycling techniques. Two hours later, most participants had completed their own creations, feeling a strong sense of accomplishment. After the event, Song Yajing and Aunt Zhang led everyone in cleaning up the venue.

events.name: Follow professional fashion information sources
events.description: During the lulls in customer flow at the store during the day, Song Yajing used her phone to further filter the public accounts she had subscribed to in the morning. She unfollowed several accounts with superficial content and instead searched for and followed professional accounts operated by well-known domestic fashion designers, experienced buyers, or industry analysis institutions. She pinned the two most informative public accounts and decided to spend 15 minutes each day during her lunch break carefully reading one article and taking notes.

events.name: Organize Business Loan Application Materials
events.description: After closing for the night, Song Yajing remembered the list of materials Manager Lin had given her. She opened the file cabinet at home, retrieved the original and duplicate copies of the shop's business license, as well as the copy of last year's tax payment certificate. She then logged into her online banking account, exported the shop's corporate account statements for the past year, and began organizing the purchase contracts and invoices from the recent months. She gathered all these materials into a single folder, keeping them on hand for any potential needs.

events.name: Adjust Morning Running Strategy
events.description: During today's morning run, Song Yajing adopted an interval strategy of "jogging for five minutes, then brisk walking for one minute" to complete her 30-minute exercise. This variation in pace allowed her cardiovascular system to experience intermittent relief, making the entire process feel much more relaxed and fluid compared to her previous continuous jogging. After finishing, she no longer felt exhausted but rather invigorated and refreshed throughout her body.

events.name: My daughter has a slight cold and is resting early.
events.description: In the evening, Chen Lexuan showed mild symptoms of a runny nose. Song Yajing put her to bed early and took care of her, which resulted in her own earlier bedtime than usual and the cancellation of some evening plans.

起始状态.心情: Positive, looking forward to community activities.

结束状态.心情: Enriched with a strong sense of community belonging, the mutual growth in teaching and learning brings joy, yet there is slight concern for the daughter's health.

state.今日运动: 30 minutes of interval running (jogging + brisk walking) in the morning

2025-09.daily_overview: Saturday, the prime business hours for the store, is also a family day. Today, Song Yajing's life was full and diverse: at the store, she enjoyed tea and conversations with regular customers while carefully preparing for the evening family movie night; in the afternoon, she planned an important Mid-Autumn Festival promotion strategy; in the evening, she cherished a warm time for both the couple and parent-child bonding. Meanwhile, new social opportunities (the shop owner salon) and healthy habits (foot soak sharing) also intertwined throughout the day.

events.name: Enjoying tea and discussing fashion with regular customer Vivian.
events.description: In the afternoon, Vivian, a regular customer, came to the shop to select autumn outfits. Song Yajing spotted her and warmly invited her to sit in the shop's rest area. She specially brewed a pot of soothing autumn pear black tea using the shop's staple black tea, freshly sliced pears, and a touch of honey. As they sipped the tea, they discussed the newly arrived knitwear and trench coat styles. Vivian tried on several pieces and offered plenty of styling inspiration. They also chatted about the baking recipes they had recently tried, with Vivian praising Song Yajing's tiramisu effusively.

events.name: Go to the piano classroom for class.
events.description: The shop closes at six in the evening. Song Yajing hurried home for dinner, then took her piano textbooks and notebook and drove to the piano classroom. On the way, she nervously reviewed the notes she had learned in the previous lesson, worried that she hadn’t practiced enough and might fall behind.

events.name: Learn the Complete Version of "Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star"
events.description: At seven in the evening, the piano lesson began. The teacher first reviewed the homework from the previous lesson and acknowledged Song Yajing's practice. Then, the teacher started teaching the complete score of "Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star," introducing new notes and rhythms. Song Yajing found it somewhat challenging, as her fingers often seemed uncooperative. During the break, she chatted with several other adult learners and discovered that they all faced similar struggles with "uncoordinated fingers" and "insufficient practice time." This brought her some relief, making her feel she was not fighting alone.

events.name: Post-Class Reflection and Determination
events.description: The class ended at 8:30. Song Yajing chatted for a few more minutes outside the classroom with another mother who was also a student, encouraging each other. On her way home, she reflected on the class content, deeply aware that "skills grow rusty without practice." She made up her mind that, in order not to waste the tuition fees and to truly master this skill, she would set aside at least 15 minutes every day to practice the piano, no matter how busy she might be.

events.name: Consolidate the basic finger techniques of piano playing.
events.description: (Continuing from the previous lesson) After learning the melody of "Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star," the teacher began systematically teaching the C major scale, explaining the fingering rules for ascending and descending passages (thumb-under and finger-over techniques), and emphasizing relaxed wrists and even rhythm. Song Yajing followed along with the practice, while the teacher patiently corrected her issues with tense wrists and inconsistent tempo.

events.name: Register for the Community Badminton Tournament
events.description: After dropping her daughter off at kindergarten in the morning, Song Yajing saw a notice for the upcoming "National Day Community Badminton Friendship Tournament" on the community bulletin board. Having recently started exercising and wanting to interact more with her neighbors, she was inspired to participate. She immediately contacted her neighbor, Aunt Zhang Xiuying, who is passionate about community activities, and invited her to form a women's doubles team. Aunt Zhang readily agreed.

events.name: Deep Foot Soaking Alleviates Weekend Fatigue
events.description: On Saturday evening, after finishing her home theater time, Song Yajing felt the accumulated busyness of the week turn into deep exhaustion. She carefully performed her pre-sleep foot soak, extending the time to 25 minutes, and experimented with different massage modes on the soles of her feet, focusing on relaxing the sore muscles in her calves. The warm water and the rolling pressure of the massage gradually eased her tense nerves.

events.name: Sharing the Benefits of Foot Soaking with Your Husband
events.description: While soaking her feet, her husband Chen Zhiqiang was also reading in the living room. Song Yajing said to him, "This foot-soaking bucket was really a good purchase. After soaking, my feet feel light, and I sleep more soundly. You spend all day in front of the computer, and your neck and shoulders must be tired. Would you like to give it a try?" Chen Zhiqiang responded with a smile, "Seeing how much you're enjoying it, I'll give it a try tomorrow."

events.name: Purchasing physical books at a bookstore
events.description: After closing the shop in the afternoon, Song Yajing took some time to visit the Xiamen Foreign Language Bookstore. She went directly to the lifestyle and literature sections, carefully selecting a richly illustrated and step-by-step guide titled "Classic French Dessert Recipes," as well as a collection of award-winning short stories called "The Submarine at Night." She plans to replace some of her mobile reading with physical books, especially during the evening before bed.

events.name: Purchased a French dessert recipe online
events.description: After seeing that dessert book in the bookstore, Song Yajing discovered that there was a more favorable discount available online. Upon returning home, she placed an order for the book through a book-purchasing app on her phone, looking forward to creating more professional and complex French desserts through systematic learning, which was also one of her annual goals.

events.name: Plan the Mid-Autumn Festival Promotion Campaign
events.description: During the relatively quiet afternoon hours at the shop, Song Yajing sat at the computer behind the cashier counter, retrieving and analyzing sales data from around the Mid-Autumn Festival of the previous year. She found that elegant gift sets and modernized Chinese-style cheongsams, both possessing gift attributes, had sold the best. Taking into account this year's festive atmosphere centered on "the full moon symbolizing family reunion," she ultimately decided to feature these two categories of products as the main focus of the current promotion. She also conceived the unified theme "Full Moon, Splendid Attire; Reunion, Thoughtful Gifts" for the integrated online and offline promotional campaign.

events.name: Purchasing home theater snacks
events.description: Before closing the shop in the afternoon, Song Yajing stopped by the supermarket on her way to buy snacks for the planned family movie night. She purchased plain-flavored potato chips that her husband enjoys, yogurt melts favored by her daughter, as well as preserved plums and nuts that she prefers, and also picked up two bottles of sugar-free sparkling water.

events.name: Evening Parent-Child Washing and Bedtime Routine
events.description: Around eight o'clock in the evening, Song Yajing and her husband Chen Zhiqiang bathed their daughter Chen Lexuan together. The bathroom was filled with the child's laughter and the sound of splashing water. After the bath, Song Yajing dressed her daughter in pajamas, carried her to bed, and told a bedtime story about the moon and a little rabbit, gently patting her until she drifted off to sleep.

events.name: Setting up a home theater environment
events.description: After their daughter fell asleep, Song Yajing and her husband began setting up the living room. They moved the coffee table aside, took out several soft cushions and a blanket from the sofa, adjusted the angle and focus of the projector, and dimmed the lights to create a cozy and warm private cinema atmosphere.

events.name: Spending a movie night together
events.description: The two snuggled on the sofa and selected a lighthearted domestic comedy on a streaming platform. While enjoying snacks and watching the film, they occasionally laughed at the plot and exchanged quiet comments about a particular joke or character. This was a rare, completely shared moment of relaxation for them in recent times.

events.name: Deep Heart-to-Heart Talk Before Sleep
events.description: After the movie ended, the two did not immediately clean up but continued leaning on the sofa to chat. Song Yajing shared with her husband her idea of trying an online mini-program for the store, along with the subtle pressures she felt. Chen Zhiqiang also discussed the technical challenges he encountered at work and some career considerations. They listened to each other, offered advice and support, feeling that their hearts had grown closer.

events.name: Tidying Up and Resting
events.description: After the heart-to-heart talk, the two of them tidied up the snack wrappers and cups together, turned off the projector, and then each went to freshen up. They embraced and fell asleep a little after eleven o'clock, bringing this warm and relaxing evening to a close.

events.name: Weekend Parent-Child Morning Run
events.description: On Saturday morning, Song Yajing took her daughter Xuanxuan to Nanhu Park. She completed her 30-minute morning run, while Xuanxuan happily played on the slides and in the sandpit in the park's children's play area. After finishing her run, Song Yajing was slightly sweaty. Watching her daughter laughing in the sunlight, she felt immense happiness and contentment.

events.name: Learn about industry salon information and register
events.description: While having tea in the shop, Vivian, a regular customer, mentioned to Song Yajing, "Yajing, I heard there's a small-scale salon for local independent clothing store owners next Wednesday evening at Shapowei. It's just a casual gathering over tea to discuss business management. Would you like to join? I have a friend who is one of the organizers." Upon hearing this, Song Yajing thought it was a great opportunity to expand her professional network and learn from others' experiences, so she immediately expressed her interest. Vivian promptly shared the WeChat contact of the event organizer with her. After adding the contact, Song Yajing quickly confirmed the event details and registered.

events.name: Final Questions on Organizing the Insurance Plan
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing clearly compiled a written list of the points that remained unclear during her recent discussions with her husband about insurance plans, such as the definition scope of specific surgical methods in a critical illness insurance clause and whether premiums could be adjusted for inflation in the future. She prepared to contact the insurance advisor the next day for final confirmation.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed and joyful, looking forward to the weekend family time.

结束状态.心情: Warm, content, with a deepened emotional connection to my husband, and looking forward to the coming week.

state.今日运动: 30-minute parent-child morning run at Nanhu Park in the early morning

2025-09.daily_overview: Sunday is a designated day for religious observance and family time. In the morning, Song Yajing and her family attend Mass, seeking guidance for inner balance through their faith. In the afternoon and evening, she dedicates her energy to upcoming industry exchanges and store-related matters, preparing for the workweek ahead. This reflects her pragmatic approach to integrating faith into everyday life.

events.name: Fulfill the commitment to practice piano.
events.description: To fulfill her commitment to "practice the piano for 15 minutes every day," Song Yajing found time to sit in front of the electronic keyboard after her daughter fell asleep for her afternoon nap. Following her notes, she repeatedly practiced the newly learned segment of "Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star." Although her playing was still somewhat halting, her fingering had become slightly more proficient compared to her lesson the previous day, which gave her a sense of small progress.

events.name: Organize badminton equipment
events.description: Thinking of the community badminton match next week, Song Yajing found her long-unused racket at home and checked if the strings were intact. She also prepared her sportswear, towel, water bottle, and a pair of sneakers with good anti-slip performance, gathering all the equipment into a gym bag.

events.name: Go to the badminton hall for practice.
events.description: At three o'clock in the afternoon, Song Yajing arranged to practice with her best friend and partner Li Meiling at the community badminton hall. She drove there and bought sports drinks at a convenience store on the way.

events.name: Pre-match Warm-up and Communication
events.description: Upon arriving at the gymnasium, Song Yajing and Li Meiling first engaged in ten minutes of jogging and full-body stretching to loosen their joints and prevent sports injuries. During the warm-up, they briefly discussed the key focus of today's practice: primarily to regain a feel for the ball, practice basic serves and returns, and work on simple positioning coordination.

events.name: Simulated Competition Practice
events.description: After warming up, the two began practicing simulated match drills. They agreed not to keep score, focusing instead on rehearsing defensive positioning, handling net shots, and quickly returning to defense after an attack. Li Meiling, with more playing experience, occasionally pointed out details to Song Yajing, such as "pay attention to footwork" and "prepare your racket earlier."

events.name: Targeted Multi-Ball Practice
events.description: In the latter half of the practice session, the two engaged in a multi-ball movement drill. Li Meiling was responsible for feeding balls to different positions, while Song Yajing worked hard to move around, receive, and return the shots, aiming to improve her reaction speed and endurance during matches. After several rounds, Song Yajing was panting heavily but felt thoroughly invigorated.

events.name: Post-Practice Relaxation and Summary
events.description: After the practice session, the two of them performed thorough stretching and relaxation exercises by the court, focusing particularly on their legs and arms. As they stretched, they reflected on the session. Song Yajing remarked, "I still feel my reactions are a bit slow, but it's better than when I first started." Li Meiling encouraged her, saying, "You'll get the hang of it with more practice. The main thing in a competition is to enjoy participating." This practice session significantly alleviated Song Yajing's nervousness about the upcoming match.

events.name: Return home and share with family
events.description: After finishing practice and returning home, Song Yajing changed her shoes while describing the practice session to her husband, who was playing with their daughter: "I'm exhausted, but it was quite interesting. Meiling said I still have huge room for improvement!" The whole family laughed upon hearing this, and during dinner, they continued chatting about the competition.

events.name: Contact the supplier to confirm the Mid-Autumn Festival stock preparation.
events.description: Based on the promotional product list, Song Yajing contacted the main supplier Susan via WeChat. She informed Susan about the main styles for the Mid-Autumn Festival promotion and the estimated demand, discussed the replenishment pricing and delivery timeline, and ensured sufficient inventory in the store during the promotional period to avoid stockouts.

events.name: Preparation Before Sunday Mass
events.description: Every Sunday at nine in the morning is Song Yajing’s unwavering time to attend church. Today, after getting up, she selected an elegant and appropriate dress and reminded her husband and daughter to change into neat clothes as well. She checked her small bag to ensure that the Bible, rosary, and offering money were all prepared, then the family set off for Siming Catholic Church.

events.name: Attend Sunday Mass
events.description: In the solemn and dignified church, Song Yajing participated in the Sunday Mass presided over by Father Wang Mingde together with her family. She attentively listened to the scripture readings, joined in the prayers, followed the choir in singing hymns, and found inner peace and strength during the Holy Communion. This was an important moment for her to reset her heart and receive spiritual nourishment each week.

events.name: Daily Communication with Fellow Believers
events.description: After the Mass, in the courtyard outside the church entrance, the sunlight was pleasant. Song Yajing encountered a familiar parishioner, Aunt Lin Xiuying, and the two naturally struck up a conversation. Aunt Lin inquired with concern about the business of her shop and the recent situation of her child, while Song Yajing also asked after Aunt Lin's health. This kind of daily small talk, rooted in shared faith, was simple yet heartwarming.

events.name: Confiding in the priest about the dilemma of balancing business and family.
events.description: Taking advantage of the ample time today, Song Yajing stayed behind after the crowd dispersed and specifically sought out Father Wang Mingde. She briefly shared with the priest her recent anxieties and pressures stemming from juggling multiple roles—managing her boutique, attempting a business transformation, and caring for her family—seeking guidance from a faith perspective. Father Wang listened patiently, offered encouragement by quoting passages from the Bible, and provided practical advice: "Entrust your burdens to the Lord, while also wisely planning your time. Your family is your support and one of the meanings behind your efforts." This conversation made Song Yajing feel understood and brought her much inner peace.

events.name: Preparing for the Industry Salon
events.description: In the evening, thinking about the clothing store owner salon she would attend on Wednesday, Song Yajing felt she should make some preparations. She organized the customer feedback data from the recent trial of Japanese purchasing services in her store, as well as the key points of the Mid-Autumn Festival promotional plan currently being developed, considering how to share them effectively during the exchange session. At the same time, she also listed several questions she wanted to ask her peers, such as how to launch an online community at a low cost and how to cope with the impact of large e-commerce platforms.

events.name: Dining with fellow church members after a church event
events.description: After Mass, Song Yajing and several fellow parishioners gathered for a meal at a nearby restaurant, where they shared their faith and life experiences. The late return led to a delay in her sleep time.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful and tranquil, preparing to begin the Lord's Day.

结束状态.心情: Spiritually comforted, with an enhanced sense of inner balance, there is both anticipation and preparation for the upcoming communication activities, feeling slightly fatigued after social interactions.

state.今日运动: Afternoon community badminton court practice for approximately 1.5 hours (including warm-up, practice, and stretching)

2025-09.daily_overview: A new week begins. During her morning run, Song Yajing felt a tangible improvement in her physical fitness. Throughout the day, she efficiently advanced the design and production of promotional materials for the Mid-Autumn Festival campaign, and during her commute, she officially replaced novels with industry-related reading. In the evening, she attended a long-anticipated industry salon, where she gained fresh insights and expanded her professional network, returning home with a broader perspective.

events.name: Collect feedback on the old clothes upcycling workshop
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing sent a brief online feedback questionnaire via the WeChat group for community activities established the previous week to neighbors who participated in the old clothes upcycling workshop. She quickly received over a dozen responses. After compiling the feedback, she found that participants generally praised this practical skills workshop, but many expressed a desire to learn more personalized decorative techniques in the future, such as embroidery or adding lace to upcycled items. This provided valuable insights for optimizing her future event planning.

events.name: Practice piano scales and rhythms
events.description: After the child fell asleep in the evening, Song Yajing took out the electronic keyboard. Tonight's focus was repeatedly practicing the C major scale. She made an effort to press each key accurately and tried turning on the metronome on her phone, practicing along with the steady "tick-tock" sound to achieve even rhythm. The process was somewhat monotonous, but it was a necessary step in building a solid foundation.

events.name: Reading industry articles during the commute
events.description: While waiting at a red light on her way to the shop in the morning and on her way to the printing store in the afternoon, Song Yajing consciously picked up her phone and opened the top fashion industry public account. She read a trend analysis article about "the return of velvet fabric in autumn" and an operational article on "how small brick-and-mortar stores can build a personal brand through social media," taking note of several key points from the latter and planning to try them out.

events.name: Develop a detailed promotional implementation plan
events.description: In the store, Song Yajing meticulously formulated the Mid-Autumn Festival promotion plan on her computer. She clearly defined the in-store rule of "gifting a brand silk scarf with purchases over 688 yuan," designed a "new customer discount coupon" exclusive to the mini-program mall, and scheduled the timeline for the event from preheating, climax, to wrap-up (preheating on September 24, climax from September 25 to 27, and wrap-up on September 28). She also assigned specific tasks such as customer service inquiries, gift packaging, and online order processing to the shop assistant, Xiao Mei.

events.name: Design promotional campaign visual materials
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing used design software to personally create the main visual poster for the Mid-Autumn Festival promotion. She chose a soft moonlight and a silhouette of a cheongsam as the background, highlighting the theme "Full Moon, Elegant Attire, Reunion with Gifts." She also designed blessing cards to be included with orders. After completing the initial draft, she called Xiaomei over to review it. Xiaomei offered a minor suggestion regarding the colors, which Song Yajing adopted before finalizing the design.

events.name: Systematic Stretching and Nutritious Breakfast After Morning Run
events.description: After completing a 28-minute morning run, Song Yajing did not head home immediately. Instead, she performed a systematic stretch for about 10 minutes on a park bench, focusing on relaxing the muscles in her thighs, calves, and glutes. Upon returning home, she prepared a hearty breakfast for herself: a glass of milk, a boiled egg, and two slices of whole-wheat bread, replenishing her energy for the morning's work.

events.name: Sharing the Gains of Morning Running with Neighbors
events.description: While taking an evening stroll in the residential garden, Song Yajing ran into her neighbor, Aunt Zhang. She initiated the conversation, saying, "Aunt Zhang, I've been sticking to morning runs for almost two weeks now. I feel much more energetic during the day, and I've even lost a little weight." Aunt Zhang smiled and praised her, "You're really persistent, Xiao Song! Exercise is good for your health—look at how much better your complexion is now." Feeling recognized by an elder, Song Yajing was delighted.

events.name: Go to the Clothing Store Owner Salon
events.description: After closing the shop at six in the evening, Song Yajing returned home, quickly changed into a fresh outfit, and paired it with a stylishly designed scarf that showcased her taste without being overly formal. She then drove to a niche café located in the Shapowei Art Zone, which was the venue for tonight's salon.

events.name: Participate in peer exchange and sharing
events.description: The salon was held in a quiet private room of a café, attended by about ten local independent clothing store owners and boutique proprietors from Xiamen. Everyone sat in a circle and took turns sharing. Song Yajing listened attentively to others' experiences on coping with declining foot traffic, successfully organizing pop-up stores, and leveraging Xiaohongshu for customer acquisition. When it was her turn, she shared her approach to sourcing products through Japanese purchasing agents (relying on classmates' resources and focusing on unique small items), as well as the Mid-Autumn Festival promotional event she was planning. She also candidly expressed her concerns about the impact of online competition.

events.name: Free Communication and Building Connections
events.description: During the subsequent free exchange session, Song Yajing proactively exchanged WeChat contacts with two store owners whose presentations had greatly inspired her. One of them runs a homestay and clothing store on Gulangyu Island, and they discussed the possibility of cross-industry collaboration. The other is very familiar with niche Japanese brands and provided several new websites for sourcing products. The atmosphere on-site was friendly and open.

events.name: Returning home after the salon
events.description: Around 9:30 p.m., the salon concluded with a lingering sense of satisfaction. Song Yajing bid farewell to several newly acquainted colleagues and drove home. On the way, she reflected on the various ideas she had heard that evening, feeling that her horizons had broadened considerably and gaining a more diverse understanding of independent store management.

events.name: Signing a Mini Program Development Contract
events.description: (Based on a progress event from long-term planning) After previously comparing several development teams with her husband Chen Zhiqiang, Song Yajing ultimately selected a local team with both a reasonable quotation and suitable case studies. Today, she met with the team's business representative at her store to discuss in detail the functional requirements, development timeline, costs, and post-launch maintenance of the mini-program. After reaching an agreement, a formal contract was signed, and Song Yajing paid a 30% initial deposit.

events.name: Confirm Mini Program Functional Requirements
events.description: (Related Event) After signing the contract, Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang held an online meeting with the product manager and designer of the development team. They thoroughly outlined the essential functions required for the store's mini-program: product category display, detail pages, shopping cart, WeChat Pay, order management, a simple membership system, and more. Following the meeting, the development team will begin creating interactive prototypes and visual design drafts based on the discussion outcomes.

events.name: Temporary handling of water pipe leakage in the store
events.description: In the morning, a water pipe in the shop suddenly leaked. Song Yajing urgently contacted the property management for repairs, which delayed some work time and resulted in slight stress.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the work this week and the evening salon.

结束状态.心情: Excited and deeply inspired, the industry salon brought new insights and motivation, though handling miscellaneous tasks left me somewhat fatigued.

state.今日运动: 28 minutes of morning jogging, 10 minutes of systematic stretching in the evening.
