2025-09.daily_overview: On Tuesday, an autumn rain left Xiamen damp. Song Yajing flexibly adjusted her workout plan and completed her exercise at home. During the day, she was busy placing orders and producing promotional materials, turning her ideas into reality step by step. In the evening, the casual conversation with her husband while soaking her feet, along with the moments spent studying baking recipes, added a touch of life and warmth to her busy day.

events.name: Couple's Casual Conversation While Soaking Feet
events.description: While soaking her feet before bedtime, Chen Zhiqiang, her husband, was also in the living room. Song Yajing enjoyed a foot massage while chatting with her husband about the painting their daughter had made at kindergarten during the day, and also mentioned the increased inquiries at their store due to a promotion. The warm foot soak and relaxed conversation turned these twenty minutes into a dedicated daily moment for the couple to connect.

events.name: Researching French lemon tarts during the lunch break.
events.description: The shop was quiet with few customers at noon. After Song Yajing and Xiaomei took turns having lunch, she sat in the rest area, took out an electronic baking book she had saved on her phone, and carefully studied the recipe for a French lemon tart. She paid special attention to the techniques for making the tart crust and cooking the lemon curd, planning to purchase the necessary molds and fresh lemons over the weekend to give it a try.

events.name: Produce and deliver promotional materials
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing sent the designed electronic drafts of the posters and greeting cards to the long-term printing shop, confirming the print quantity and paper materials (the posters used slightly thicker coated paper, while the cards used high-quality matte paper). In the afternoon, she took some time to pick up the finished products from the printing shop, carefully checked the colors and cuts, and found the quality satisfactory.

events.name: Indoor Alternative Exercises for Rainy Days
events.description: Waking up in the morning to the sound of pattering rain outside the window, Song Yajing knew her outdoor morning run was canceled. However, she did not slack off. Instead, she laid out a yoga mat on the living room floor and followed a fitness app on her phone for a 20-minute core strength workout (such as planks and crunches) along with high knees in place. This achieved the same effect of exercise and sweating, maintaining the continuity of her fitness routine.

events.name: Organize Salon Gains and Connections
events.description: This morning, Song Yajing took some time to organize the notes she had taken at last night's salon and the several business cards she had received. She entered the information of several potential collaborators and key discussion points into a document on her computer and sent a thank-you message to the event organizer via WeChat. She began engaging in more in-depth online communication with the owner of the guesthouse on Gulangyu Island, exploring preliminary ideas for jointly hosting a "Guesthouse + Fashion" themed afternoon tea event.

events.name: Begin planning the cross-day collaboration project with suppliers
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing discussed the new quarter's cooperation with supplier Susan via WeChat, planning to introduce a batch of limited-edition scarves and organize a three-day online promotion campaign, starting to prepare materials from today.

起始状态.心情: Calm, prepared to adapt to the rhythm changes brought by rainy days.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and relaxing, despite the rain, tasks are progressing smoothly, and there is great anticipation for the new project.

state.今日运动: Morning Core Training and High Knees for 20 Minutes at Home

2025-09.daily_overview: Wednesday was a health-focused day for Song Yajing. She completed her annual physical examination alone and collected the medical reports for her entire family. The results of the check-up served as a catalyst for upgrading the family’s health management. In the evening, she organized a family meeting to discuss potential changes. Meanwhile, the online pre-sales campaign for the Mid-Autumn Festival promotion officially launched today, allowing her to balance work and family health management in parallel.

events.name: Undergo an annual physical examination
events.description: In the morning, after arranging the affairs of her shop, Song Yajing went alone to the community health center for her annual physical examination. The items included gynecological examination, breast color Doppler ultrasound, complete blood count, liver function, blood lipids, and blood glucose. The examination proceeded smoothly. Afterward, she had a brief conversation with her familiar family doctor, Wang Mingyuan, who reminded her to pay attention to several key indicators once the report was available.

events.name: Collect Family Physical Examination Report
events.description: In the afternoon, the physical examination reports were ready for collection. Song Yajing returned to the health center and retrieved the three paper reports for herself, her husband, and her daughter. Upon arriving home, she eagerly reviewed them in detail, marking the abnormal indicators with a pen: her own report indicated a tendency toward mild fatty liver; her husband's report suggested a straightened cervical physiological curvature; all of her daughter's indicators were within the normal range, indicating healthy development.

events.name: Online Consultation with Family Doctor
events.description: After reading the report, Song Yajing felt somewhat concerned. She immediately contacted Dr. Wang Mingyuan via WeChat, sent photos of the marked abnormal indicators, and inquired in detail about the meaning and severity of these results, as well as how to improve them in the future. Dr. Wang replied promptly, explaining that her tendency toward fatty liver was related to diet and lack of exercise, and recommended increasing physical activity and adjusting her diet. As for her husband’s cervical spine issues, he advised avoiding prolonged periods of looking down and doing more neck stretches. Dr. Wang also scheduled an appointment for them to come to the center next week for an in-person health consultation.

events.name: Convene a Family Health Meeting
events.description: After dinner, Song Yajing called her husband and daughter for a brief family meeting. She placed three medical examination reports on the table and explained each person’s health condition in a gentle yet serious tone, particularly highlighting the issues she and her husband needed to pay attention to. She proposed a preliminary family health improvement plan: she would continue her morning runs, urge her husband to perform neck relaxation exercises every Tuesday and Thursday, and ensure the family engaged in at least one outdoor activity every weekend. Her husband, Chen Zhiqiang, expressed his support, and their daughter nodded in a somewhat bewildered manner.

events.name: Reading physical short stories before bed
events.description: After finishing all the household chores in the evening and putting her daughter to sleep, Song Yajing leaned against the headboard and picked up the newly purchased short story collection *The Night Submarine*. She read one of the heartwarming stories about hometown and memories, which was beautifully written and evoked a profound sense of nostalgia. After reading for about half an hour, she felt a sense of inner peace, closed the book, and prepared to sleep. This was a stark contrast to her usual habit of staring at her phone screen until her eyes felt dry and tired.

events.name: Launch the Mid-Autumn Festival promotion online preheating
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing officially began promoting the Mid-Autumn Festival sales event. She posted the designed posters and meticulously crafted promotional copy to her personal WeChat Moments, the store’s loyal customer group chat, and the newly established store WeChat account’s Moments. The copy highlighted the theme "Moonlit Elegance" and the buy-more-get-more benefits, while also announcing the official start time of the event. She personally interacted with loyal customers in the group chat, addressing inquiries about styles and sizes.

events.name: Create promotional copy and materials for creative activities
events.description: In the morning at the shop, Song Yajing and Xiaomei together selected several improved cheongsams and suits that were part of the main promotional offerings. Xiaomei acted as the model, while Song Yajing personally used her phone to capture several sets of exquisite photos showcasing the outfits' on-body effects and details. Subsequently, Song Yajing paired these images with festive and compelling copy, amassing ample "ammunition" for the online pre-launch campaign.

events.name: Resume outdoor morning running
events.description: The weather cleared up, and Song Yajing returned to Nanhu Park. After nearly three weeks of persistence, she found that completing a 30-minute jog was no longer a daunting task. Today, she maintained steady breathing and light footsteps throughout the run, feeling energetic afterward. Her morning jogging habit had become firmly established, seamlessly integrating into her daily life as a natural part of her routine.

events.name: Continue preparing for the cross-day collaboration project
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing confirmed the sample images and prices of the scarves with the supplier Susan, and began designing promotional posters in preparation for the online activities scheduled for the following two days.

起始状态.心情: Feeling somewhat anxious about the physical examination results, but determined to face them positively.

结束状态.心情: A heightened sense of responsibility, a clearer understanding of family health, and a concrete action plan, with inner resolve.

state.今日运动: A 30-minute leisurely morning jog at Nanhu Park

2025-09.daily_overview: On Thursday, as the promotional activities entered the countdown phase, the store began its preparations, with both online and offline publicity fully rolled out. Song Yajing also systematically summarized her recent learning and practical experiences. The family health plan took its first step tonight—she and her husband performed neck relaxation exercises together. Meanwhile, she conducted pre-match practice for the upcoming weekend badminton tournament. Today was a day of implementing new health routines amidst a busy work schedule.

events.name: Summary of Recent Learning and Practice
events.description: After closing the shop for the evening, Song Yajing opened her computer in the study and began systematically organizing the notes, data screenshots, and photos from her recent three months of activities, which included learning online operations, attempting Japanese purchasing agency services, and planning promotional campaigns. She compiled these materials into a concise "Learning and Business Optimization Practice Report," clearly tracing her journey from knowledge acquisition to practical implementation. This report served as a periodic review for her and provided a foundation for future planning.

events.name: Launch the Family Health Action Plan
events.description: Based on the consensus reached at last night's family meeting, Song Yajing formulated a more detailed family health plan and posted it on the refrigerator. The plan includes: her daily morning runs; her husband performing a 15-minute neck relaxation exercise at 9 p.m. every Tuesday and Thursday; and the whole family engaging in outdoor activities every Saturday morning. At nine o'clock tonight, she reminded her husband on time, and together they followed a mobile video to complete their first neck relaxation exercise. Although the movements were a bit clumsy, the feeling of mutual supervision was quite pleasant.

events.name: Conduct pre-match joint training for badminton competition.
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing and her partner, Aunt Zhang Xiuying, arranged a brief pre-match practice session at the community sports center. They focused on improving the consistency of their serves and returns, as well as practicing simple positioning and coordination. The two discussed their basic match strategy: the relatively agile Aunt Zhang would take charge of the net area, while Song Yajing would focus on backcourt defense. The practice session helped enhance their on-court synergy.

events.name: Repurchase of Foot Soak Care Products
events.description: Seeing that the previously purchased mugwort packs were almost used up, Song Yajing repurchased herbal foot soak packs online. She also ordered a foot soak salt containing lavender essential oil to try different relaxation effects, preparing supplies to maintain the foot soaking ritual long-term.

events.name: Sharing Fashion Notes Sparks Discussion
events.description: During the lunch break, Song Yajing compiled several practical points she had noted while reading fashion articles this week on "Autumn Layering Techniques" and "N Ways to Tie a Scarf" into concise graphics and text. She shared them in a WeChat group with the shop assistant Xiaomei and several regular customers (including Vivian). This immediately sparked a lively discussion in the group, with everyone sharing their own outfit combinations. The active atmosphere also subtly strengthened customer loyalty.

events.name: Arrange the store to create a promotional atmosphere.
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing and Xiaomei worked together to decorate the shop. They updated the window display, highlighting the featured promotional cheongsams and suits with soft lighting. They also posted event posters in prominent locations inside the store. Additionally, they set up an elegant gift-wrapping station next to the cash register, complete with ribbons and packaging boxes, instantly enhancing the festive shopping atmosphere.

events.name: Official Announcement of Promotional Activity Launch
events.description: At 3 p.m., Song Yajing simultaneously released the official preview of the Mid-Autumn Festival promotion on her personal WeChat Moments, the store's regular customer group, and the homepage of the store's mini-program. The announcement clearly specified the event duration (September 25–27), the featured products, and the specific discount rules. She encouraged everyone to share the promotional poster and set up a simple lucky draw for reposts to further expand the campaign's reach.

events.name: Comprehensively Launch Promotional Campaigns
events.description: The official launch day of the event. Staff member Xiaomei was full of energy today, proactively introducing the event verbally to every customer entering the store. Song Yajing, meanwhile, stayed by her phone and computer, promptly responding to inquiries on WeChat and handling new orders generated on the mini-program mall. Both online and offline channels simultaneously entered an active state.

events.name: Complete this week's morning run and record your feelings.
events.description: In the early morning, Song Yajing effortlessly completed her final morning run of the week, still maintaining a duration of 30 minutes. After finishing, she briefly noted in her phone's memo: "This week's run felt the easiest; my pace seems to have improved a bit, and I feel refreshed and energized afterward. Persistence truly pays off!" She felt very satisfied with her improved physical fitness and the progress in her own perseverance.

events.name: First day of implementing cross-day collaborative project
events.description: Today marks the start of a three-day online scarf promotion. Song Yajing posted the first-day discount offer on her social media circle and mini-program, while maintaining communication with supplier Susan to track order feedback.

起始状态.心情: Enthusiastic and full of energy for the upcoming activity.

结束状态.心情: Busy yet orderly, the launch of the family health plan brings a new sense of responsibility, and the promotional activities have received positive feedback.

state.今日运动: 30 minutes of morning jogging

2025-09.daily_overview: On Friday, the Mid-Autumn Festival promotional activities reached their peak, with continuous online and offline inquiries and orders, making the shop exceptionally busy. Song Yajing remained organized under high pressure: processing orders, updating the mini-program, and following up on logistics for Japanese purchasing agents. During her commute, she relaxed with music and reflection. The sense of physical achievement from morning runs and the joy of playing piano with both hands during lessons infused positive energy into the busy workday.

events.name: Piano Lesson: Practicing Etude Excerpts
events.description: During the evening piano lesson, the teacher began teaching a complete excerpt of the short etude "Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star." The instructor guided Song Yajing on how to combine the previously learned individual notes and rhythms into a continuous melody, while also introducing basic music reading skills to understand the positions of notes on the staff and their corresponding keys on the piano. This marked a crucial step from playing single notes to performing a complete piece of music.

events.name: Music and Contemplation on the Commute
events.description: The store was exceptionally busy today due to the promotional event. On her way to the shop, Song Yajing deliberately played her favorite English pop playlist, letting the music help shake off the drowsiness from waking up early. At the same time, she quickly ran through the tasks she had to complete for the day in her mind: following up on promotional orders, urging logistics, updating the mini-program, and more, planning her work sequence in advance.

events.name: Set up the Mid-Autumn Festival activity page for the mini program
events.description: While there were still few customers in the morning, Song Yajing logged into the mini-program management system on the shop’s computer backend. She uploaded images and details of the promotional products, configured "spend-and-save coupons" and "limited-time discounts," and specifically designed a homepage banner with Mid-Autumn Festival elements. After completing the setup, she asked her husband Chen Zhiqiang to help test the entire ordering process on his phone to ensure it ran smoothly.

events.name: Morning running pace significantly improved
events.description: Song Yajing felt exceptionally relaxed during her morning jog today. After running for 30 minutes, her breathing remained steady, and she even had enough energy to pick up the pace slightly in the final stretch. After checking the data on her fitness app, she was pleasantly surprised to find that her average pace had improved by nearly one minute per kilometer compared to when she first started running at the beginning of the month. This tangible progress filled her with a sense of accomplishment, making all the early mornings and persistence feel worthwhile.

events.name: Learn "Ode to Joy" for Two-Hand Duet
events.description: (Related to Course Progress) The focus of this lesson was to apply previously learned basic chords such as C, F, and G to a simplified accompaniment of "Ode to Joy." The teacher patiently guided Song Yajing on how to align the left-hand chords with the right-hand melody in rhythm, attempting a preliminary hands-together performance. Initially, her left and right hands were often uncoordinated, but after several practice attempts, she was finally able to play a short passage haltingly. Though still somewhat awkward, the experience was filled with enjoyment.

events.name: Consolidated Practice and Problem Correction
events.description: (Related to Course Progress) In response to the difficulties encountered in last week's two-handed playing, the teacher guided Song Yajing through segmented slow practice, focusing on correcting her slow chord transitions in the left hand and unstable rhythm in the right hand. Through repeated, slowed-down practice, she gradually developed a sense of coordination between her hands and was able to play the first half of "Ode to Joy" relatively smoothly, earning the teacher's affirmation.

events.name: Check Japan Proxy Purchase Logistics Status
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing received the international logistics tracking number sent by her university classmate Zhao Min. She immediately logged into the official website of the logistics company on the store computer and entered the tracking number to check. The system showed that the package had been dispatched from Japan and was currently in transit, with an estimated delivery time of 3-5 days to Xiamen after customs clearance. She recorded the logistics information in the store's purchase logbook, took a screenshot, and sent it via WeChat to Zhao Min to confirm receipt of the information.

events.name: Day Two of the Cross-Day Collaborative Project
events.description: Continuing the scarf promotion, Song Yajing released a matching tutorial video to attract more attention and discussed feedback with her regular customer Vivian.

events.name: An evening gathering with friends
events.description: After work, I had a video chat with my close friends Li Meiling and Wang Jia to relax, but I ended up eating some snacks, which increased my calorie intake.

起始状态.心情: Stay alert and get ready for a busy promotional day.

结束状态.心情: Tired yet satisfied, the promotional event received a positive response, and personal progress is also gratifying, with a sense of joy after socializing.

state.今日运动: Morning jog for 30 minutes, with an improved pace.

date_attribute.weather: Clear, with a light breeze in the evening.

2025-09.daily_overview: On Saturday, the final day of the promotional event, the store remained busy. In the evening, Song Yajing attended her piano lesson as usual to consolidate her learning. After class, she rewarded herself for a week of hard work by extending her foot soak and successfully making French pastries. She also shared her reflections on bidding farewell to old habits with her close friend. Today was a day of finding balance and a sense of achievement in work, study, and personal interests.

events.name: Consolidate the achievements in piano learning
events.description: The piano class from 7:00 to 8:30 p.m. began with the teacher asking Song Yajing to play "Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star" in its entirety, correcting a few minor errors in rhythm and fingering. Subsequently, the teacher introduced the first few measures of "Ode to Joy," explaining techniques for dotted notes and legato playing. During the break, Song Yajing and other students discussed the common challenge of finding time to practice at home, encouraging one another. At the end of the class, the teacher assigned new practice tasks.

events.name: Weekend Deep Foot Soak Care
events.description: On Saturday evening, after finishing her piano lesson and household chores, Song Yajing felt the exhaustion of the week had reached its peak. She extended her foot soak to 30 minutes and tried the "spring massage" and "relaxation mode" of the foot-soaking tub, thoroughly easing the sore and swollen calf muscles caused by prolonged standing and constant movement. The warm water enveloped her feet, making her almost drift off to sleep in comfort.

events.name: Attempt to make a French lemon tart.
events.description: After closing her shop early on Saturday afternoon, Song Yajing attempted to make the French lemon tart she had been researching for a long time. She focused on kneading the tart crust and carefully simmered the lemon curd, following each step of the recipe meticulously. Although the crust was slightly overbaked and the lemon curd tasted a bit too sweet, the overall appearance and flavor were already taking shape. Delighted, she took photos and shared them in a baking enthusiasts’ WeChat group, discussing her results and insights with Mrs. Liu and others. She received many likes and suggestions for improvement.

events.name: Sharing Reflections on Habit Transformation with Close Friends
events.description: On a weekend afternoon, Song Yajing met her close friend Li Meiling for afternoon tea. During their conversation, she naturally brought up her shift from reading online novels to focusing on practical information and physical books. She said, "I used to think that time was for relaxation, but now I realize it was a 'time sink'—filled with emptiness. Now, reading industry articles and learning to make desserts also take time, but it feels like a 'time investment,' which is particularly fulfilling." Li Meiling resonated deeply with this sentiment, and the two spent a long time discussing the topic of "how middle-aged women can proactively choose hobbies and manage their time," encouraging each other along the way.

events.name: Sunday Family Worship Lunch
events.description: (Regular Event) After attending Mass every Sunday and conversing with fellow parishioners, Song Yajing usually has lunch with her husband and daughter at a clean restaurant near the church. Today, they went to a Minnan cuisine restaurant. At the table, they briefly discuss the content of the priest's sermon, share their respective reflections, and also talk about their plans for the afternoon, naturally integrating their faith into their daily family conversations.

events.name: Completion of Day Three of the Cross-Day Collaborative Project
events.description: The scarf promotion campaign has concluded. Song Yajing summarized the sales data, settled accounts with supplier Susan, and conducted a preliminary evaluation indicating positive results. Plans are in place to expand cooperation in the future.

起始状态.心情: Slightly tired but relaxed, welcoming the end of the weekend.

结束状态.心情: Contentment and delight, a life of interest brings tangible fulfillment, and the completion of projects fosters confidence.

state.今日运动: No (Rest Days)

2025-09.daily_overview: On Sunday morning, Song Yajing participated in a community badminton friendly match. Although she did not win, she felt honored by the experience, enjoying both the joy of sports and the warmth of the community. In the afternoon, she shopped for the upcoming Mid-Autumn Festival and brainstormed a marketing plan for Japanese scarves. In the evening, she reviewed the effectiveness of her habit substitution efforts for the week and reset a foot-soaking reminder to improve her sleep. It was a day that combined sports, socializing, and festival preparations.

events.name: Evening Piano Practice
events.description: After dinner, Song Yajing opened the electronic keyboard in the living room and practiced the fingering and rhythm of "Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star" following the sheet music. She focused on correcting the rhythm inconsistencies pointed out by the teacher during last week's lesson, repeatedly playing until the melody flowed smoothly. Her daughter Xuanxuan listened nearby, humming along, adding a touch of parent-child interaction to the practice session.

events.name: Preparation and Warm-up on the Day of the Badminton Match
events.description: At nine o'clock on Sunday morning, Song Yajing took her equipment and headed to the community sports center to meet Aunt Zhang Xiuying. Before the match began, they thoroughly warmed up with activities such as jogging, stretching, joint rotations, and practicing serves and returns with each other. This helped them loosen up their bodies and calm their pre-match nerves.

events.name: Participate in the first round of women's doubles
events.description: At 9:30 a.m., the match officially began. As partners, Song Yajing and Aunt Zhang faced a strong pair of opponents in the first round of the women's doubles. During the match, they fought hard, executing several impressive defensive counterattacks and engaging in extended rallies, which drew cheers from the spectators. Although they ultimately lost with scores of 15–21 and 13–21, they gave their all throughout the match, showcasing their unique style and skill level.

events.name: Post-Match Friendly Exchange and Group Photo
events.description: After the match, Song Yajing and Aunt Zhang took the initiative to approach the net, shook hands with their opponents in a friendly manner, and praised them for "playing well." Organized by the community staff, all participants gathered for a group photo. The atmosphere on-site was warm and harmonious. Although there was competition for rankings, everyone placed greater emphasis on the community spirit of "friendship first, competition second."

events.name: Share the competition experience with family.
events.description: After returning home at noon, Song Yajing described the match to her husband and daughter while eating: "Although we lost, we had a great time playing! Auntie Zhang was so agile at the net, and I even saved a few dangerous shots!" She took out her phone to show them the group photo, and the whole family laughed as they looked at her flushed face after exercising in the picture. Her daughter added, "Mom is the best at playing badminton!"

events.name: Reviewing the Adaptation to New Reading Habits
events.description: On Sunday evening, Song Yajing sat at her desk, reflecting on her efforts over the past week to replace her previous indulgence in online novels with fashion updates, baking knowledge, and short stories. She assessed her progress: the urge to open the novel app had completely disappeared; reading industry articles during her daily lunch break had become a new habit; and she had already finished half of the short story collection. She felt that the new routine was more fulfilling and the information she gained was more useful. As a result, she planned to delve deeper into the French dessert book in the coming week.

events.name: Procurement of Ingredients for Mid-Autumn Festival Family Banquet
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing drove to a large supermarket in Siming District, Xiamen, and a nearby traditional wet market to carefully purchase ingredients for the Mid-Autumn Festival dinner. She bought fresh sea bass (symbolizing abundance year after year), local betel nut taro (for making taro duck), half of a free-range duck, and specifically selected high-quality pork belly and glutinous rice to recreate her mother’s Quanzhou-style meat zongzi. Of course, she did not forget to buy mascarpone cheese, ladyfinger biscuits, and cocoa powder for making tiramisu.

events.name: Develop a Marketing Plan for Japanese Scarves
events.description: During the afternoon when store traffic was low, Song Yajing used a tablet in the break area to browse Xiaohongshu and Douyin, searching for keywords such as "scarf styling" and "autumn-winter scarf tying techniques" while watching videos from fashion influencers. Considering the elegant patterns and unique fabrics of the upcoming batch of Japanese scarves, she brainstormed several short video shooting ideas, such as "Three Ways to Tie a Scarf for the Office" and "Weekend Date Vibe Scarf Styling." She also briefly noted down a few presentation concepts and copywriting ideas, preparing to execute them once the stock arrives.

events.name: Determined to restart and solidify the habit of soaking feet to aid sleep.
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing recalled that due to recent busy promotional activities, she sometimes felt so exhausted that she would fall asleep immediately, causing her foot-soaking habit to be inconsistently maintained and her sleep quality to decline. She decided that starting from October 1st, she would strictly resume the routine of soaking her feet for 20 minutes before bedtime. She checked whether the functions of her electric foot-soaking tub were working properly, cleaned the inner tub, and set a reminder on her phone calendar for foot-soaking at 9:30 p.m. every night, beginning on October 1st.

events.name: Management of Minor Ankle Sprains
events.description: During the badminton match, a slight sprain occurred in the right ankle due to inadvertent movement. Ice was applied immediately after the match, followed by rest. The pain has since subsided, and recovery is expected within two days, with no impact on daily activities.

起始状态.心情: There is a slight pre-competition nervousness, but more so anticipation.

结束状态.心情: A delightful mix of post-workout exhilaration and pre-holiday busyness, filled with anticipation for the break, with a slightly uncomfortable but manageable sprain.

state.今日运动: Participated in a community badminton friendly match for about one hour (including warm-up and competition) in the morning, and rested after sustaining a sprain.

2025-09.daily_overview: On the day before the Mid-Autumn Festival holiday, the air was filled with a festive atmosphere. Song Yajing closed her shop early and devoted herself to preparing for the family reunion: receiving hometown delicacies sent by her mother, cooking a lavish family feast, and admiring the bright moon with her loved ones. All activities today revolved around the core theme of "family." Amid the busy shop operations and the pressures of business transformation, the warmth of this reunion felt particularly precious.

events.name: Focus on practicing piano pieces.
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing focused on practicing the segment of "Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star" at home. After this period of practice, she had become able to memorize the sheet music and fingering relatively smoothly. Although her playing was not yet fully proficient, she could already perform the entire melody completely. As the familiar notes flowed from her fingertips, she felt a small yet definite sense of accomplishment.

events.name: Confirm that the old habit has been successfully changed.
events.description: While resting in the shop in the afternoon, Song Yajing reflected on the changes over the past two weeks and realized she no longer had any desire to open the novel app, nor did she receive any related advertisements in her phone notifications. Instead, she found herself instinctively opening fashion public accounts during her morning commute and naturally browsing baking e-books during her lunch break. She shared this transformation with her close friend Li Meiling on WeChat, writing, "I feel much more in control of my time now, knowing where to spend it more meaningfully." Li Meiling responded with a big thumbs-up.

events.name: Received the Quanzhou meat zongzi sent by my mother.
events.description: At noon, a courier delivered a foam box sent by her mother, Lin Xiuying, from Quanzhou. Opening it, she found over a dozen vacuum-packed Quanzhou-style meat zongzi, still warm and exuding the fresh fragrance of bamboo leaves. Knowing her daughter was busy with the shop and had no time to make them herself, her mother had prepared and sent them in advance to add authentic hometown flavor to the Mid-Autumn Festival family feast. Song Yajing felt a warm glow in her heart and immediately called her mother to express her gratitude.

events.name: Closing the store early to prepare for a family banquet.
events.description: To have ample time to prepare the Mid-Autumn Festival dinner, Song Yajing closed her boutique clothing store early at 4 p.m. She and Xiao Mei quickly completed the day's accounting, deposited the cash, and tidied up the store. Then she gave her staff member Xiao Mei an early leave so she could go home to celebrate the festival.

events.name: Meticulously Prepare the Mid-Autumn Festival Family Feast
events.description: Upon returning home, Song Yajing tied on her apron and began bustling about in the kitchen. Following Minnan tradition, she prepared dishes symbolizing good fortune: steamed perch, braised duck with taro, poached shrimp, and several stir-fried seasonal vegetables. Finally, she meticulously crafted her daughter's favorite tiramisu cake as a dessert. The kitchen was filled with delightful aromas and a festive atmosphere.

events.name: Admiring the Moon on the Balcony and Sharing Reunion Time Together
events.description: In the evening, a family of three set up a small table on the balcony, with a lavish spread of dishes and a tiramisu cake covering the entire surface. Song Yajing told her daughter the story of Chang'e flying to the moon, while her husband Chen Zhiqiang captured the heartwarming moment on his phone. As they savored the delicious food, they shared joyful news about store promotions, amusing anecdotes from their daughter’s kindergarten, and small plans for the future. The bright moonlight bathed the balcony as the family laughed and chatted, spending a warm and harmonious Mid-Autumn Festival night together.

events.name: Clean up the kitchen together after the meal.
events.description: After the dinner gathering, Song Yajing and her husband Chen Zhiqiang tacitly worked together to clear the dishes. One washed the bowls while the other dried and put them away; one cleaned the stovetop while the other mopped the floor. The kitchen was quickly restored to tidiness, and the leftover cake and dishes were properly stored in the refrigerator. The couple’s collaboration made the work highly efficient.

events.name: Supplemental Foot Soak Care Products
events.description: Before the holiday, Song Yajing went to the supermarket to shop and also stopped by a pharmacy. She replenished her stock of mugwort packets and ginger foot soak salts for foot baths, and purchased several types of essential oils with calming effects (such as lavender and chamomile). This thorough preparation of supplies was made for her determined, long-term commitment to her foot-soaking ritual.

events.name: Ankle Sprain Recovery and Rest
events.description: Due to a sprain yesterday, avoid strenuous exercise today and focus primarily on rest and light activities. The ankle pain has largely subsided.

起始状态.心情: Joyful, filled with anticipation for the holiday

结束状态.心情: Happiness, warmth, and contentment—family reunions bring a profound sense of belonging and emotional nourishment.

state.今日运动: None (Festival Preparation Day, Ankle Rest)

2025-09.daily_overview: The last day of September is a time for reflection and planning. During her morning run, Song Yajing thoroughly reviewed the positive changes brought about by this new habit. During the day, she handled the quarterly rent payment for her shop and prepared materials for the evening's family financial review. In the evening, she meticulously reviewed September's income and expenses with her husband, jointly set the budget for October, and reserved "ammunition" for the challenging yet hopeful online transition. The solidification of good habits and clear financial planning brought this fruitful September to a perfect close.

events.name: The habit of foot soaking naturally integrates into daily life.
events.description: After nearly half a month of persistence (except for a few particularly busy days), soaking her feet before bed has gradually become a natural part of Song Yajing's nightly routine. Tonight, as usual, she performed a 20-minute foot soak. The warm water and massage helped her feel the fatigue of the day slowly dissipate, and her sleep quality was indeed better compared to nights without this practice. She decided to maintain this simple yet effective self-care routine in the long term.

events.name: Formally Complete the Transformation of Reading Habits
events.description: In her monthly summary, Song Yajing officially designated "reading high-quality industry news daily" and "reading physical books (baking/literature) weekly" as fixed items for personal development, with plans to review reading notes and insights at the end of each month. She opened her phone and confirmed that the novel app had long been uninstalled, with all related notifications turned off. This marked her successful completion of this proactive and rational process of interest selection and habit transformation.

events.name: Comprehensive Assessment of the Changes Brought by Morning Running
events.description: On the last morning of September, Song Yajing completed a 30-minute relaxed run. After finishing, she stretched while reflecting on her nearly 20-day journey of morning runs: from initially being out of breath after just five minutes to now easily running for half an hour; from enduring persistent muscle soreness to feeling refreshed and invigorated after each run. Her weight had dropped by approximately 0.5 kilograms, her daytime energy levels had increased, and she seemed to have developed greater resilience in facing the pressures of her store's transformation. She decided to maintain the healthy habit of morning running, which had brought multiple benefits, over the long term, and began considering whether to try increasing her single-run distance to 4 kilometers in October.

events.name: Organize monthly financial documents
events.description: After closing the shop for the night, Song Yajing did not rest immediately. She took out a dedicated file box and meticulously organized the daily sales receipts for September, various household expense receipts (such as utilities, supermarket purchases, food delivery, etc.), payment records for her daughter’s kindergarten and newly added piano lessons, as well as invoices for significant expenses like the previously purchased foot-soaking tub. She categorized everything systematically to prepare for the upcoming monthly financial review with her husband.

events.name: Confirm financial review arrangements with husband.
events.description: During breakfast, Song Yajing said to her husband Chen Zhiqiang, "Zhiqiang, after the child goes to sleep tonight, let's take some time to go over the accounts for September. This month, we have promotional income, new expenses for piano lessons, and rent to pay." Chen Zhiqiang nodded in agreement, "Alright, I was also thinking of checking the income and expenses from the shop's online trial." The two agreed to start at 9:30 p.m.

events.name: Verify the monthly business data of the store.
events.description: In the evening, the couple sat at the desk in the study, turning on the computer and opening the account books. Song Yajing took out the store's cash journal and bank statements, while Chen Zhiqiang logged into the online payment platform's backend. Together, they cross-checked the daily business revenue and online payment records for September, then subtracted the costs of inventory, the salary of their employee Xiaomei, utility and miscellaneous expenses, as well as the slightly increased quarterly rent paid this month, ultimately calculating the store's net profit for September. The Mid-Autumn Festival promotion had brought a noticeable increase in revenue.

events.name: Organize Monthly Household Living Expenses
events.description: After reviewing the shop accounts, the two began to sort through the household living expenses for September. They checked each item one by one, including mortgage repayment receipts, utility bills for water, electricity, and gas, daily dining and shopping records, transportation costs, their daughter's education and entertainment expenses, and social expenditure. They compared these against the budget set at the beginning of the month to identify which items had exceeded the budget and which had surplus funds.

events.name: Discussing New Expenditures and Revenues
events.description: One of the key points of the review was discussing new items. Song Yajing proposed that the long-term cost of her daughter's piano lessons should be included in the fixed budget; while health investments like purchasing a foot-soaking bucket are one-time expenses, they are valuable for improving quality of life. Chen Zhiqiang analyzed the additional profits brought by the Mid-Autumn Festival promotion and discussed whether the money should be used for reinvestment in the store, family savings, or moderate consumption. The two exchanged views on the short-term and long-term impacts of these new income and expenses on the family's finances.

events.name: Formulate the family budget for October
events.description: Based on the revenue and expenditure situation in September and the known plans for October (such as the launch of the store's mini-program, which may require small promotional expenses, and the plan to take their daughter to the science museum), Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang jointly discussed and drafted the family budget for October. They clarified the upper limits for various living expenses and reserved a small promotional fund for the store's online transformation, reflecting their support for Song Yajing's career and their joint planning of family finances.

events.name: Procurement of Ingredients for National Day Family Dinner
events.description: (Preparing for the next day) After work, Song Ya stopped by the supermarket on her way home and purchased some ingredients in advance for the National Day family gathering, such as chicken, pork ribs, vegetables, and fruits, to avoid the holiday shopping crowds. After returning home, she also tidied up the living room briefly and arranged a bouquet of fresh flowers in a vase to add a festive atmosphere.

events.name: Confirm the final family insurance plan
events.description: This afternoon, Song Yajing had a final discussion with the insurance advisor, clarifying all previous questions. Based on the family's actual situation and financial capacity, they ultimately confirmed the plan: purchasing a term critical illness insurance policy for her husband Chen Zhiqiang, while also obtaining a supplementary medical insurance policy for all three family members. Song Yajing began preparing the required personal information materials for the insurance application, such as identification documents and medical examination reports, following the advisor's guidance.

events.name: Confirm the customs clearance status of the scarf purchased through a Japanese purchasing agent.
events.description: After closing the shop and returning home in the evening, Song Yajing checked the logistics information of the Japanese scarf on her phone again. The system showed that the package had arrived at Chinese customs and was undergoing clearance procedures. She took a screenshot of the logistics status and sent it to her classmate Zhao Min, asking how long customs clearance usually takes and whether there is a risk of being taxed. Zhao Min replied that it typically takes 3-5 working days and advised her to wait patiently, reminding her to pay attention to any tax payment notification messages from the logistics company.

events.name: Prepare to pay the third-quarter rent for the store.
events.description: Today marks the end of the quarter and the day for paying the rent for the next quarter. After closing the shop in the evening, Song Yajing checked the balance of the store’s corporate account via online banking to confirm that the funds for the rent payment were sufficient. She recorded the exact amount to be transferred to the landlord, Sister Li (which included the slight increase negotiated during the lease renewal), and set up a scheduled transfer for the following morning to ensure timely payment and maintain a good rental credit record.

起始状态.心情: Clear-headed, with the mindset of conducting a month-end inventory.

结束状态.心情: Clear and structured, financial review brings a sense of control, with both plans and expectations for October.

2025-10.daily_overview: Today was a day of simultaneous progress in both shop operations and personal growth. Song Yajing finalized a new collaboration with a distant partner to elevate the shop's ambiance, while at home, she advanced her preparations for an online sharing session. Concurrently, she began seeking solutions to alleviate the shoulder and neck issues caused by prolonged standing at work. Meanwhile, her husband, Chen Zhiqiang, contributed his technical expertise during his spare time to support the digital upgrade of the family shop.

events.name: Discuss cooperation with designer Zheng Kai
events.description: Song Yajing conducted an in-depth discussion via WeChat video call with Zheng Kai, an independent designer and former colleague based in Hangzhou. She expressed her intention to introduce a limited number of unique designs to attract mid-to-high-end customers and enhance the distinctiveness of her store. Zheng Kai shared several concept sketches from his studio’s autumn-winter collection, themed "Resilient Oriental," characterized by simplicity and intricate details. The two discussed in detail potential collaboration models (Song Yajing favored small-batch buyouts to control risks), minimum order quantities, estimated costs, and a delivery timeline of approximately three weeks. Both parties agreed that Zheng Kai would send two of the most representative sample garments next week for Song Yajing’s physical evaluation.

events.name: Review the initial draft of the mini-program interface
events.description: In the evening, after returning from work, husband Chen Zhiqiang showed Song Yajing the initial draft of the WeChat mini-program interface design, which was created based on her previous requirements. Starting from the overall "simple and cozy" style of the shop and the browsing habits of female customers, Song Yajing proposed several revisions: she hoped the main color palette would be softer, the arrangement of product display images would be more intuitive, and a prominent "Shopkeeper's Recommendations" label would be added. Chen Zhiqiang noted each point down for subsequent adjustments.

events.name: Creating a PPT for Alumni Sharing Session
events.description: Taking advantage of the slower afternoon foot traffic in the shop, Song Yajing opened presentation software on the shop’s laptop and began creating a PowerPoint based on the outline she had organized the day before. She carefully selected a warm photo of the shop’s display window as the cover. Inside the presentation, she interspersed comparison photos from her time as a sales assistant up to the day she opened her own shop, along with trend charts of annual sales data (with specific figures omitted). She particularly highlighted several subtitles to tell authentic stories, such as “The Mindset Shift from Executor to Decision-Maker” and “The Anxiety and Gains of My First Independent Purchase.”

events.name: Search for shoulder and neck relief courses
events.description: As evening approached, Song Yajing, feeling some soreness in her shoulders and neck, used her phone during a break to search for keywords like "shoulder and neck relaxation for prolonged standing" and "office yoga" on fitness apps and video platforms. She browsed through the introductions and user reviews of multiple courses, eventually bookmarking a 20-minute beginner-level shoulder and neck soothing follow-along video specifically designed for people who sit or stand for long periods. The instructor’s explanations were detailed, and the movements appeared manageable.

events.name: Research on Family Financial Planning Solutions
events.description: After dinner, Song Yajing took out several wealth management product brochures provided by Lin Xiaofeng, a client manager at Industrial and Commercial Bank of China, last week. Together with her husband Chen Zhiqiang, they carefully reviewed the materials. They compared the yield rates, risk levels, and fund lock-up periods. Considering their family’s recent expenditure on mini-program development and the need to maintain liquidity, they preliminarily leaned toward selecting a medium-to-low-risk, net-value-based wealth management product with flexible subscription and redemption options. They planned to use it for preserving and increasing the value of a portion of their family emergency fund.

events.name: Morning Running and Gratitude Journal
events.description: At 5:50 a.m., Song Yajing completed a 4-kilometer jog in the community park, maintaining a steady pace of around 7 minutes and 50 seconds per kilometer. While running, she listened to an English pop music playlist and felt refreshed. After getting up, she wrote in the "Gratitude Journal" on her phone's memo app: Grateful for the sunny weather today, grateful that my daughter dressed herself, grateful that Xiaomei arrived early to clean the shop.

events.name: Store Daily Operations and New Product Communication
events.description: During the day, while managing her shop's business, Song Yajing contacted Susan, her main supplier in Guangzhou, via WeChat. She confirmed the inventory status of several previously selected autumn trench coats and knitwear and discussed the shipping schedule for the second batch of replenishment.

events.name: Handling Minor Customer Disputes
events.description: In the afternoon, a regular customer expressed some dissatisfaction regarding a sizing issue. Song Yajing patiently communicated and provided an exchange service, ultimately resolving the conflict, though it left her feeling slightly fatigued.

起始状态.心情: Calm, full of anticipation

结束状态.心情: Enriched with some reflection (on cooperation and financial planning), tinged with weariness.

state.今日运动: Morning run of 4 kilometers

date_attribute.weather: Mostly cloudy with a light breeze in the afternoon.

2025-10.daily_overview: Friday was a day marked by both busyness and fulfillment. Song Yajing completed an important inventory count and a plan for refreshing the store displays at the shop. In the evening, she tried shoulder and neck yoga for the first time and experienced a sense of relaxation. Meanwhile, her husband’s mini-program development, her own speech preparation, and a breakthrough in running all contributed to solid progress amid the day’s minor tasks, steadily moving things forward.

events.name: Piano Lesson Rhythm Practice
events.description: During the evening piano lesson, the teacher focused on training Song Yajing's rhythmic stability. Amid the regular ticking of the metronome, she attempted to play "Ode to Joy" in its entirety. Initially, she often rushed or dragged the beat. After receiving guidance from the teacher on the "breathing" (the lifting of hands between phrases), she gradually found the flow of the melody. Her performance no longer sounded like isolated notes but began to exhibit a preliminary sense of musicality.

events.name: Autumn Inventory Count and Display Planning
events.description: During the lull in daytime customer flow, Song Yajing and her assistant Xiaomei conducted a thorough inventory of the autumn stock in both the warehouse and on the shelves. They gathered slow-moving older styles into a designated clearance area and recorded the sizes of best-selling items that needed replenishment. Following this, the two sketched out ideas on paper to plan a new window display theme titled "Autumn Sunshine," based on the selected new collection styles (featuring soft knitwear and chic trench coats). They also decided to use props such as dried flowers and wicker baskets to create the desired ambiance.

events.name: Announcement of Autumn New Product Releases
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Song Yajing selected four or five of the most atmospheric photos from the sample garment images sent by the supplier. She carefully crafted the caption: "A wave of gentleness is coming, see you next week~" and released the autumn new product preview through her personal WeChat Moments and the store's mini-program backend. She specifically set up an interactive feature: "Leave a message for your favorite style to get priority reservation," which quickly garnered dozens of likes and inquiries.

events.name: Chen Zhiqiang is engaged in backend development for mini-programs.
events.description: Chen Zhiqiang utilized his evenings to set up the backend database for the mini-program in his study. He completed the design of the product information table and user table, and wrote core interface codes such as "retrieve product list" and "add to shopping cart."

events.name: Write a Detailed Speech Draft
events.description: After completing the initial draft of the PPT, Song Yajing began writing a detailed word-for-word speech script. She transformed the content to be presented on each slide into a conversational narrative, incorporating vivid details such as describing her initial helplessness when facing a difficult customer and how she later resolved the conflict through sincere communication. She also designed encouraging words for her junior schoolmates, hoping to convey pragmatism and courage.

events.name: Set a new running goal
events.description: Checking the running app's records, Song Yajing was delighted to find that her average pace for several morning runs this week had improved to 7 minutes and 40 seconds per kilometer, and she had completed a 4.2-kilometer run in one go. She set herself a new challenge: to aim for an uninterrupted 5-kilometer run by the end of the month.

events.name: First Shoulder and Neck Relaxation Yoga Experience
events.description: After closing the shop and returning home in the evening, Song Yajing spread out her yoga mat in the living room and followed a video tutorial she had saved in the afternoon, performing a 20-minute shoulder and neck relaxation routine. The session included simple movements such as neck circles and cat-cow stretches. Although some stretches felt intense, after completing the exercises guided by the instructor's breathing cues, she noticeably felt the stiffness in her shoulders and neck ease, leaving her much more relaxed overall.

events.name: Consolidate Yoga Habits and Share
events.description: After the practice session, Song Yajing added this positive experience to her gratitude journal. She decided to set Tuesday and Friday evenings as her regular yoga time and immediately sent a WeChat message to her close friend Li Meiling (an elementary school teacher who also frequently complains about shoulder and neck pain). She shared the course link and her personal feelings, inviting Li to try it together.

events.name: Purchase of Wealth Management Products
events.description: During her lunch break, Song Yajing took some time to visit the bank. With the assistance of her client manager, Lin Xiaofeng, she formally completed the purchase procedures for the wealth management product she had selected the previous day, transferring a family emergency fund of 50,000 yuan.

events.name: Morning Jogging and Gratitude
events.description: As usual, I completed a 4-kilometer morning run in the early hours, maintaining a steady pace. Gratitude journal entry: Grateful for Xiaomei's meticulousness during inventory, grateful for the relaxation brought by yoga, and grateful for Chen Zhiqiang's quiet development of the mini-program.

events.name: Online Interaction with Regular Customer Vivian
events.description: In the afternoon, after seeing the new product preview on Vivian's social media feed, the regular customer privately messaged Song Yajing to inquire about the material of a trench coat. The two exchanged a few words about styling, and Vivian mentioned that she would definitely visit the store on the launch day.

events.name: Late sleep due to post-yoga relaxation
events.description: Feeling physically and mentally refreshed after her evening yoga session, Song Yajing relaxed her routine and stayed up a bit later than usual.

起始状态.心情: Positive, with a sense of planning

结束状态.心情: Satisfied and relaxed (especially after yoga), slightly excited.

state.今日运动: 4-kilometer morning run, 20-minute evening yoga

2025-10.daily_overview: Today is Saturday. Song Yajing temporarily stepped away from the daily routines of her shop and household chores to participate in a seaside retreat organized by the church. This was a time for deep connection with her faith, inner self, and fellow church members. By the tranquil seaside, she reflected on life, shared her burdens, and gained support and inspiration. Meanwhile, her husband, Chen Zhiqiang, continued working diligently at home on the development of the mini-program.

events.name: Chen Zhiqiang continues the front-end development of the mini program.
events.description: On Saturday daytime, Chen Zhiqiang continued developing the front-end pages of the mini-program at home. He performed initial integration and testing of the UI components for the product list page and detail page with the backend interfaces completed the previous night, resulting in a test version that could be browsed locally and allowed for simple interactions.

events.name: Depart for the Meditation Retreat
events.description: On Saturday morning, Song Yajing set off for the church gathering with simple luggage. Together with more than twenty fellow believers, including Auntie Lin, she boarded the bus arranged by the church and headed to the seaside retreat camp located in Tong'an District, Xiamen. Throughout the journey, everyone sang and chatted, creating a harmonious atmosphere.

events.name: Opening Ceremony and Ice-breaking Session of the Meditation Retreat
events.description: After arriving at the camp and settling in, Father Wang Mingde presided over the opening ceremony. He led everyone in a collective prayer and introduced the theme of this retreat: "Finding Peace in Gratitude." This was followed by an ice-breaking session, where each participant briefly introduced themselves. Song Yajing described herself as "a wife and shop owner seeking peace while balancing family and business."

events.name: Personal Meditation by the Seaside
events.description: The afternoon was reserved for free contemplation. Song Yajing walked alone to the private beach of the campsite, listening to the rhythmic sound of the waves and watching the ebb and flow of the tide. She reflected on the past year: the anxiety of managing the shop, the guilt of not spending enough time with her child, the concern for her aging parents... A mix of emotions welled up inside her. Silently, she prayed in her heart, entrusting all these worries and seeking inner peace.

events.name: Group candid sharing
events.description: After dinner, the participants were divided into several small groups for in-depth sharing. In the safe atmosphere created by the group leader, Song Yajing shared with the group members (including the familiar Aunt Lin) her financial pressures as a self-employed individual, the exhaustion from having her time pulled in different directions, and her struggle to balance family and career. Hearing other church members share about health crises and parent-child relationship challenges, she felt a sense of resonance and received many warm encouragements and prayers.

events.name: Optimize the Visual Design of Presentation Slides
events.description: After the evening group activity ended, Song Yajing reopened the PowerPoint presentation on her laptop in the dormitory. Inspired by the tranquil atmosphere of the day, she felt that some of the original slides contained too much text. She trimmed down some of the explanatory content, replacing it with more photos of the store's actual scenes and product details, and adjusted the color scheme to make it softer yet visually impactful.

events.name: Feeling unwell due to the strong wind at the seaside.
events.description: In the evening, the wind was strong by the seaside. Song Yajing felt a slight headache and fatigue, so she decided to go to bed early to rest and regain her energy.

起始状态.心情: Anticipation, with a touch of detachment from the daily routine.

结束状态.心情: Being understood has relieved some pressure, bringing inner calmness, though with a slight sense of fatigue.

state.今日运动: No (Day of Retreat)

date_attribute.weather: Clear skies, with a gentle sea breeze.

2025-10.daily_overview: The final day of the retreat was a day of harvest and transformation. Father Wang's thematic sharing on "gratitude" deeply moved Song Yajing, and she decided to make recording gratitude a part of her daily life. Concluding with a Mass held in the sea breeze, she returned home filled with tranquility and new determination, sharing this insight with her family.

events.name: Ready to start a gratitude journal.
events.description: On Saturday evening at the retreat, Song Yajing was moved by the group sharing session. She created a new folder titled 'Gratitude Journal' in her phone's memo app and set a daily evening reminder, determined to start recording from the next day onward.

events.name: Participate in Gratitude-Themed Sharing and Practice
events.description: On Sunday morning, Father Wang hosted a special sharing session on "Cultivating a Grateful Mindset." He drew upon classic texts to explain how consciously recording the small joys in life can help combat anxiety and enhance happiness. Following this, he guided everyone through a live gratitude exercise. Song Yajing earnestly wrote in her notebook: Grateful for the tranquility by the seaside at this moment, grateful for my husband's support in allowing me to attend this retreat, grateful for my parents' good health.

events.name: Seaside Thanksgiving Mass and Sharing
events.description: The retreat concluded with a special Mass held on the beach. Facing the ocean, the ceremony felt particularly solemn and moving. After the Mass, each participant briefly shared their reflections. Song Yajing shared, 'I have found a long-lost sense of peace and realized that I complain too much and give too little thanks. I will carry this peace back home, starting by keeping a gratitude journal.'

events.name: Return home and share reflections
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing returned to Xiamen city by bus. Upon arriving home, she embraced her husband and daughter, and during dinner, she shared her experiences from the retreat, particularly the gratitude practice. She suggested that the family could occasionally share things they were thankful for during the day. Her daughter, Le Xuan, found it as fun as a game. Chen Zhiqiang also expressed support for his wife's attempt to adopt new methods for adjusting her mindset.

events.name: Going to bed early due to high spirits.
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing felt a sense of inner fullness and decided to go to bed early to consolidate the tranquility brought by her meditation.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, full of anticipation

结束状态.心情: Filled with peace and joy, full of love for the family, and slightly excited.

2025-10.daily_overview: With the tranquil mindset cultivated during her retreat, Song Yajing embarked on a new week. She solemnly wrote her first gratitude journal entry and dedicated time to systematically organize and reflect on the insights gained from the retreat, determined to translate her inner peace into concrete actions in daily life. Meanwhile, after a calm assessment, the new product orders for her shop were finalized.

events.name: Write the first gratitude journal entry
events.description: After getting up in the morning, Song Yajing solemnly opened the 'Gratitude Journal' folder in her phone's memo and wrote: '2025.10.20: 1. Grateful that my daughter gave me a sweet hug before bed last night. 2. Grateful that my husband fixed the slightly loose hanger in the shop before leaving this morning. 3. Grateful for returning from meditation retreat and having a peaceful morning.' She is determined to maintain this habit.

events.name: Organize Retreat Notes and Photos
events.description: During the quiet morning hours at the shop, Song Yajing browsed through photos from the retreat on her phone and reviewed the notes she had casually jotted down at the time, reflecting on the moments that had moved her: Father Wang’s words, the sound of ocean waves, and the tears in the eyes of fellow believers during group sharing. She pieced these fragments together in her mind, savoring the completeness of the experience.

events.name: In-depth Reflection and Action Planning
events.description: Based on her reflections, Song Yajing engaged in deeper introspection. She realized that much of her previous anxiety stemmed from wanting to immediately control everything. She decided to take concrete actions: spending five minutes each morning in prayer or meditation; when encountering difficult customers or trivial matters at the shop, taking a deep breath first and recalling the tranquility of the seaside; and setting clearer monthly small goals for both her family and the shop, rather than vague annual objectives.

events.name: Share Reflection Gains with Family
events.description: During the family dinner that evening, Song Yajing did not give a lengthy speech but simply shared her reflections after the retreat, expressing her desire to "slow down a bit and be more grateful." Chen Zhiqiang showed understanding, and although their daughter did not fully grasp the meaning, she still tried to say, "I'm grateful for the delicious food Mom cooked," which made everyone laugh and created a warm family atmosphere.

events.name: Morning Run Consolidation
events.description: Completed a 4-kilometer morning run in the early hours. Due to the overcast weather, it felt slightly stuffy during the run, but I persevered and finished. Added to the gratitude journal: grateful for strong legs that allow me to enjoy running, and grateful for the weather clearing up.

events.name: Finalize the autumn new product orders.
events.description: After final confirmation and price comparison with supplier Susan, Song Yajing integrated the online pre-launch feedback and officially placed the order for the autumn new collection with Susan through the online system in the afternoon, paying the deposit. Meanwhile, she also informed Zheng Kai via WeChat, expressing her anticipation for receiving his sample garments.

events.name: Soaking feet before bedtime
events.description: Before going to bed at night, Song Yajing continued to soak her feet for 20 minutes using an electric foot-soaking tub, adding her usual mugwort herb pack to help dispel the fatigue of the day and reinforce this relaxing habit.

events.name: Adjusting Exercise Due to Cloudy Weather
events.description: Due to unfavorable weather during her morning run, Song Yajing switched to 10 minutes of indoor running in place as a supplement to maintain her exercise routine.

起始状态.心情: Tranquility, with the resolve of rebirth

结束状态.心情: Steadfast, composed, and purposeful.

state.今日运动: Morning run 4 kilometers, indoor stationary running for 10 minutes.

2025-10.daily_overview: On Tuesday, Song Yajing translated her insights from the retreat into tangible connections and actions. She shared her gains with fellow believers to strengthen their faith, while the shop's online and offline operations progressed in tandem: new product orders were finalized, and the mini-program entered a crucial internal testing phase. In the evening, the couple jointly completed the first full-process test.

events.name: Sharing insights from meditation with fellow church member Auntie Lin
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing shared her reflections after returning from a retreat and her decision to start a gratitude journal with fellow church member Aunt Lin Xiuying via WeChat voice message. Aunt Lin was very pleased and encouraged her, saying, "Living your faith in daily life is the best testimony." She also shared her own experience of persevering in prayer over the years, offering Song Yajing great support and confidence.

events.name: Coordinate logistics for new products and sample garments
events.description: Song Yajing followed up on the logistics information for the autumn new products and confirmed with Zheng Kai that the sample garments had been shipped. She began planning the schedule for after receiving the bulk of new products and sample garments, reserving the weekend for receiving goods, conducting quality inspections, and preparing for the new product launch.

events.name: Initial testing of the basic functions of the mini program
events.description: During the afternoon lull in the shop, Song Yajing used the test account provided by her husband to log into the mini-program beta version on her phone. She simulated a customer browsing products, viewing details, and adding clothes to the shopping cart. During the process, she identified several minor issues: the image of a certain product loaded slightly slowly, and the prompt after adding an item to the shopping cart was not prominent enough. She took screenshots of each issue, annotated them, and sent them to Chen Zhiqiang.

events.name: Chen Zhiqiang fixes and optimizes the code.
events.description: Upon receiving the feedback, Chen Zhiqiang immediately began fixing the issues after work. He optimized the image loading logic, adjusted the interactive prompts for the shopping cart, and proceeded to complete the development and testing of the backend logic for simulated order placement and payment processes.

events.name: Couple jointly conducts full-process testing of the mini program.
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang sat together, using two mobile phones to simulate the roles of customer and shop owner respectively. They conducted a comprehensive test of the restored mini-program, covering the entire process from browsing and placing orders to checking orders in the backend. This test went much more smoothly. Although the interface remained somewhat rudimentary, all the core functions were successfully executed, filling both of them with a sense of excitement and accomplishment.

events.name: Morning Running and Neck-Shoulder Yoga
events.description: Completed a 4.2-kilometer morning run in good condition. In the evening, as planned, I performed the second shoulder and neck soothing yoga session of the week. The movements were more precise than the first session, and the stretching felt more comfortable. Gratitude journal entry: Grateful for Aunt Lin's encouragement, grateful for Chen Zhiqiang's patience in debugging, and grateful for my increasingly flexible body.

events.name: Elated by the smooth progress of the test
events.description: The smooth testing of the mini-program excited Song Yajing, but she regained calmness after relaxing through yoga.

起始状态.心情: Stable and action-oriented

结束状态.心情: Excited (due to the smooth testing of the mini-program) and relaxed (after yoga)

state.今日运动: Morning run 4.2 kilometers, evening yoga 20 minutes.

2025-10.daily_overview: Today is a day for making critical decisions. With the clarity gained from a period of retreat, Song Yajing and her husband officially finalized the launch date for the mini-program and initiated a systematic family financial plan. Both decisions are set to have profound implications for the future, marking the family's entry into a more mature stage in both career development and financial management.

events.name: Paiban Mini Program Launch Plan
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang held a formal "family meeting" in their living room. Based on the successful preliminary testing and clearer thoughts on store development after a period of quiet reflection, Song Yajing proposed launching a mini-program in early November. After assessing the remaining workload, Chen Zhiqiang deemed it feasible. They ultimately decided that the mini-program would begin trial operations on the first weekend of November (November 1st). They also discussed in detail the initial batch of products to be listed (focusing on classic styles and new autumn items), pricing strategies, and the promotional plan on WeChat Moments, which would be overseen by Song Yajing.

events.name: Prepare family financial planning materials
events.description: After making the decision to launch, Song Yajing realized that clearer financial planning was needed to support this investment. She arranged in advance with Chen Zhiqiang to conduct a financial review that evening. During the afternoon, she organized electronic bank statements for the family and the shop over the past three months, the shop’s simplified ledger, and the savings account balance at the store.

events.name: First Off-the-Script Speech Rehearsal
events.description: Before closing the shop in the afternoon, Song Yajing conducted her first complete off-script rehearsal of the PPT presentation in front of empty chairs in the store. She timed herself with her phone, simulating the on-site speaking pace and posture. After finishing, she found that the section on "mindset shift" was somewhat verbose, and the concluding words of encouragement lacked sufficient impact. She used a pen to make deletions and annotations on the script and decided to add a small reflection after the retreat as a highlight for the ending.

events.name: Morning Run and Gratitude
events.description: Morning run: 4 kilometers, steady state. Gratitude journal: Grateful for successfully making an important decision with my husband, grateful that the store secured three repeat customer orders today, grateful for the relief of pressure brought by the decision.

events.name: The piano lesson has been canceled due to the teacher's unforeseen circumstances.
events.description: The piano lesson originally scheduled for tonight was postponed by the teacher due to an unexpected matter. Song Yajing used this time to practice "Ode to Joy" a bit longer at home and planned her subsequent studies.

events.name: Staying up late due to decision-making pressure
events.description: After the family meeting in the evening, Song Yajing felt the pressure brought by the decision-making, but through deep breathing to regulate her emotions, she eventually stayed up late to sort out her thoughts.

起始状态.心情: Stay calm and prepare for the decision.

结束状态.心情: Resolute, feeling both pressure and anticipation for the future, slightly fatigued.

state.今日运动: Morning run of 4 kilometers
