2025-10.daily_overview: After making significant decisions, Song Yajing immersed herself in the implementation of various specific tasks: selecting products for the mini-program launch, engaging in final intensive practice for the piano graduation showcase, and achieving a personal breakthrough during her morning run—completing a 5-kilometer run. In the evening, she and her husband established a structured family budgeting system, making financial planning a tangible reality.

events.name: Overcoming the Difficulty of Coordinating Both Hands in Piano Playing
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing practiced the newly learned two-handed coordination etude from her piano lesson at home. With different rhythms for the left and right hands, she found it somewhat challenging. Therefore, she slowed down the tempo, first mastering the right-hand part alone, then the left-hand part alone, and finally combining both hands at an extremely slow pace. She repeatedly practiced the difficult measures until her coordination improved.

events.name: Try to play from memory.
events.description: During breaks in her practice, Song Yajing attempted to play the first half of "Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star" and "Ode to Joy" from memory without looking at the sheet music. Although she paused a few times to recall the notes, she eventually played the pieces in their entirety, which boosted her confidence for the upcoming graduation showcase the next day.

events.name: The final intensive rehearsal before the graduation showcase.
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing conducted her final concentrated practice. She ensured that both showcase pieces could be played smoothly and accurately, paying special attention to her sitting posture and facial expressions while performing, reminding herself to relax and smile the next day.

events.name: Select the first batch of products for the mini-program launch.
events.description: During the day at the store, Song Yajing carefully selected 20 items suitable for online sales based on sales data and inventory conditions. She chose classic styles, full-size ranges, and timeless basics along with bestsellers of the current season. Each item was checked for stock availability and quality to ensure that the first batch of products, serving as the "face" of the online store, was impeccable.

events.name: Establish a Monthly Household Budget Framework
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang opened their computer in the study and, based on the financial records reviewed the previous night, jointly created a structured monthly family budget Excel spreadsheet. It was primarily divided into several major categories: 'Household Living Expenses,' 'Shop Operating Expenses,' 'Daughter's Education,' and 'Savings and Investments.' Based on past data and future plans, the two of them set preliminary monthly limits for each category.

events.name: Establish two specific savings goals.
events.description: Building upon the budget framework, the two individuals focused their discussion and formally established two dedicated savings goals: the "Store Digital Upgrade Fund" (for subsequent maintenance of the mini-program and online marketing) and the "Family Health Security Fund" (for supplementary insurance and health-related expenses). They calculated the fixed amount that could be allocated monthly from the household income and decided to implement the plan starting from the next month.

events.name: Morning run breaks through 5 kilometers.
events.description: During her morning run today, Song Yajing felt in particularly good form. When she reached the usual 4-kilometer mark, she decided to challenge herself. Adjusting her breathing and slowing her pace slightly, she ultimately persevered and completed 5 kilometers! Though the last few hundred meters were exhausting, the immense sense of accomplishment after finishing left her exhilarated. She fully recorded this breakthrough in her app.

events.name: Gratitude and Foot Soaking
events.description: The gratitude journal highlights the joy of completing a 5-kilometer run and the sense of order brought by establishing a budget. While soaking my feet before bed, I felt a slight soreness in my calf muscles, which was greatly relieved after soaking in hot water.

events.name: Late bedtime due to budget establishment.
events.description: Establishing the budget system in the evening took a considerable amount of time, so Song Yajing stayed up late to complete all the records.

起始状态.心情: Full of drive

结束状态.心情: A sense of achievement coexists with a sense of order (due to running breakthroughs and budget establishment), with slight fatigue.

state.今日运动: 5km morning run (first personal breakthrough)

2025-10.daily_overview: Today has been a fruitful day. In the morning, Song Yajing successfully completed the graduation showcase for the piano introductory class. In the afternoon, she took exquisite product photos for the launch of the mini-program. In the evening, she made final refinements to the speech for the alumni sharing event this weekend. To prepare for Saturday's event, she closed the shop early and returned to her hometown, Quanzhou, to reunite with her parents.

events.name: Plan the Winter Display Scheme
events.description: After opening the shop in the morning, Song Yajing began conceptualizing the next wave of displays based on autumn sales trends and the approaching winter. Drawing on the knowledge she had acquired, she sketched a window display design themed "Warm Winter · Cozy Texture" in her notebook and planned the merchandise arrangement ideas for the warm-toned areas within the store.

events.name: Piano Course Graduation Recital
events.description: In the final session of the morning piano beginner class, Song Yajing performed "Ode to Joy" with slight nervousness but in a complete and fluent manner in front of the teacher and several classmates. After the performance, the teacher acknowledged her progress in rhythm and expressiveness, reviewed the core C major scales and chords of the semester with the class, and encouraged everyone to continue their studies. Song Yajing received her completion certificate, feeling a deep sense of accomplishment.

events.name: Invite regular customer Vivian to serve as the shooting model
events.description: Song Yajing contacted Vivian, a regular customer and friend, via WeChat, explaining that a batch of product try-on photos needed to be taken for the launch of the mini-program and that she felt Vivian’s temperament and figure were a perfect fit. Vivian readily agreed, and the two arranged to meet at the store for the shoot on Saturday afternoon.

events.name: Prepare for product photography
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing cleared a clean-background shooting area by the window where the light was best in the shop. She ironed 20 selected pieces of clothing one by one until they were smooth and, according to the pre-planned outfit combinations, hung the tops, bottoms, and accessories in complete sets for quick access during the shoot.

events.name: Collaborate with Vivian to shoot product photos.
events.description: In the afternoon, Vivian arrived as scheduled. Song Yajing personally selected outfits for her, and the two tried on clothes while discussing which angles would look best. Song Yajing used the professional mode on her phone for photography, focusing on showcasing the garment's silhouette, fabric details, and overall styling effect. The shoot was relaxed and enjoyable, much like a gathering between friends.

events.name: Initial Screening and Processing of Photos
events.description: After returning to her parents' home in Quanzhou in the evening, Song Yajing quickly reviewed all the photos she had taken that afternoon on her laptop. She initially selected thirty to forty of the best shots and used simple photo-editing software to adjust the brightness and contrast, making the images appear clearer and the colors more authentic, in preparation for uploading the products later.

events.name: Final Polishing of the Speech Manuscript and Rehearsal
events.description: In the quiet study at her parents' home, Song Yajing made final refinements to her speech based on feedback from the previous rehearsal, making the language more conversational and engaging. She conducted one last run-through, this time with greater confidence, specifically practicing how to break the ice at the beginning and the interactive Q&A session at the end, ensuring perfect timing.

events.name: Closed the store early and returned to Quanzhou.
events.description: Since the sharing session was scheduled for Saturday, Song Yajing closed her shop two hours early on Friday afternoon and took the high-speed train back to her hometown, Quanzhou. In the evening, she had dinner with her parents, Song Minghui and Lin Xiuying. She shared her nervousness and anticipation about the upcoming speech at her alma mater. Her parents were very proud upon hearing this and offered her a lot of encouragement and practical advice (such as speaking more slowly and making more eye contact with the students).

events.name: Gratitude Journal
events.description: On the bullet train, Song Yajing recorded her gratitude journal: Grateful for the successful completion of the piano course, grateful for Vivian's help with taking photos, grateful for my parents preparing a table of my favorite dishes, and grateful for the smooth journey.

events.name: No morning run due to a tight schedule.
events.description: Due to the early closure of the shop and her return to Quanzhou, Song Yajing did not go for her morning run today. Instead, she took a 10-minute walk in the evening at her parents' home.

起始状态.心情: Busy yet orderly

结束状态.心情: Enriched, with a slight pre-speech nervousness, yet enveloped in the warmth of family affection.

state.今日运动: Take a 10-minute walk in the evening.

2025-10.daily_overview: Saturday was a day of gaining recognition and rekindling friendships. Song Yajing's sharing session at her alma mater was a complete success, with her true story deeply moving the teachers and students present. After the event, she had an in-depth afternoon tea gathering with her childhood friend Li Meiling in Quanzhou, sharing joy and catching up on recent developments.

events.name: Entrepreneurship Sharing at My Alma Mater
events.description: On Saturday morning, Song Yajing returned to her alma mater to deliver an approximately one-hour sharing session for sophomore students majoring in fashion design. She delivered her speech without notes, combining it with a PowerPoint presentation. She recounted her journey from the confusion of working as a sales assistant after graduation to summoning the courage to open a store, facing the impact of the pandemic, and learning to operate online. She particularly shared her renewed understanding of "balance" and "gratitude" after a period of quiet reflection. The students listened with great interest, and the Q&A session was highly active, with questions covering topics such as startup funding, sourcing of goods, and how to maintain customer relationships.

events.name: Engage in in-depth exchanges with teachers and students
events.description: After the formal sharing session, several interested students and a professional teacher stayed behind to engage in a more in-depth discussion with Song Yajing. They exchanged contact information, and Song Yajing answered some specific questions about the Xiamen clothing market. She also encouraged students with ideas to start by sharing their outfits on social media.

events.name: Afternoon Tea with Childhood Friend Li Meiling
events.description: After the sharing session, Song Yajing contacted her childhood friend and close confidante Li Meiling, who was also in Quanzhou. They arranged to meet at a quiet café on West Street. Song Yajing recounted her experience and sense of accomplishment from the sharing session, while Li Meiling, as a teacher, praised her from the perspective of speaking skills. The two spent more time exchanging parenting tips, discussing the pressures of their respective jobs, and expressing concerns about their parents' health. It was a gathering that allowed for a deep emotional renewal.

events.name: Overeating at family dinners
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing had dinner with her parents and enjoyed local delicacies such as Minnan satay noodles and Quanzhou meat dumplings. She ate slightly more than usual, resulting in a slight weight gain.

events.name: Gratitude Journal
events.description: Gratitude Journal Entry: Grateful for the successful sharing session, grateful for Li Meiling's companionship, grateful for the bountiful dinner prepared by my parents, but reminding myself to pay attention to dietary control.

起始状态.心情: Slightly nervous, but well prepared.

结束状态.心情: Feeling a strong sense of worth, nourished by friendship, extremely joyful, and slightly satiated.

2025-10.daily_overview: Sunday is a day for returning home and initiating new plans. In the morning, Song Yajing returned from Quanzhou to her home in Xiamen. In the afternoon, she prepared at home for the baking gathering with her close friends scheduled for Monday. In the evening, she formally proposed the "Family Memory Preservation Project" to her parents, which received enthusiastic support. Meanwhile, she also contemplated the next steps in her piano studies.

events.name: Comprehensive Piano Exercises
events.description: In the morning at her parents' home in Quanzhou, Song Yajing conducted comprehensive practice on her mother's electronic keyboard, smoothly playing several learned pieces and scales to maintain her touch for potential further studies in the next stage.

events.name: Performing a Preview for Family
events.description: Before dinner, at her daughter Chen Lexuan's request, Song Yajing played excerpts of "Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star" and "Ode to Joy." Her daughter happily clapped along and hummed to the tunes. This relaxed and joyful "family concert" allowed Song Yajing to unwind completely, experiencing the happiness that music brings to the family.

events.name: Return to Xiamen
events.description: On Sunday afternoon, Song Yajing took the high-speed train from Quanzhou back to her home in Xiamen. Her husband, Chen Zhiqiang, brought their daughter to the station to pick her up, and the family enjoyed a joyful reunion.

events.name: Reflections on the Experience Sharing Session
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing reflected on her experience at the weekend sharing session and added notes to the WeChat contacts of several newly added teachers and students. She recorded her reflections on the event in her notebook, feeling that this experience not only served as a summary of the past but also provided her with new inspiration and a greater sense of responsibility for the future of the store.

events.name: Confirm the party details with Vivian.
events.description: Song Yajing confirmed the specific time for the home gathering the following afternoon with Vivian via WeChat and inquired if she had any particular tea preferences or dietary restrictions. Vivian expressed her anticipation for the tiramisu that Song would be making.

events.name: Procurement of Baking Ingredients
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing went to the supermarket and baking supply store near her home to purchase fresh mascarpone cheese, ladyfinger biscuits, cocoa powder, and other ingredients needed for making tiramisu, ensuring she could achieve the most delicious flavor the following day.

events.name: Launch the Family Memory Preservation Program
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing contacted her parents in Quanzhou via WeChat video call and formally proposed her long-conceived "Family Memory Preservation Plan": she would purchase a photo scanner, and during her next visit to Quanzhou, she would work with her parents to organize the family's old photo albums, scan them into digital copies, and create a digital photo album. Her parents were deeply moved and expressed immediate approval upon hearing the idea. They promptly began recalling which important old photos should be included and agreed to start the project together upon her next return home.

events.name: Gratitude Journal
events.description: Gratitude Journal: Grateful for the warm hospitality of the teachers and students at my alma mater, grateful for Meiling's companionship, grateful for my parents' support of my new plan, and grateful for the warmth of family reunion.

events.name: Soaking feet before sleep
events.description: Soaking feet in a foot bath before sleep alleviates fatigue from weekend travels.

events.name: Going to bed early due to fatigue from traveling.
events.description: The weekend's busy schedule left Song Yajing feeling fatigued, so she decided to go to bed early to regain her energy.

起始状态.心情: Relaxation, satisfaction

结束状态.心情: Warm, filled with beautiful expectations for the family's future, slightly tired.

2025-10.daily_overview: In the new week, while consolidating her fitness achievements and preparing for online business, Song Yajing also enjoyed genuine offline friendships. In the morning, she completed her jog in good form. During the day, she trained the staff for the upcoming launch of the mini-program. In the evening, she spent a warm and pleasant baking-themed afternoon tea time at home with her friend Vivian.

events.name: Testing the Newly Purchased Scanner
events.description: The home photo scanner purchased online arrived. In the evening, Chen Zhiqiang helped her unpack it and connect it to the computer. They tested it with an old photo, and the result was clear with simple operation. Song Yajing was very satisfied and looked forward to starting the old photo scanning project as soon as possible.

events.name: Training Store Clerk Xiaomei to Handle Online Business
events.description: Song Yajing gathered the staff member Xiaomei and provided a detailed explanation of the potential new tasks following the launch of the mini-program: how to view and process online orders in the mini-program backend, how to respond to inquiries from online customers, and most importantly, how to ensure timely deduction of offline inventory after online sales to avoid overselling. The two also conducted a simulation exercise for handling orders.

events.name: Consolidate Running Achievements
events.description: During her morning run, Song Yajing did not deliberately pursue distance. Instead, she completed 4.5 kilometers at a steady and comfortable pace of 7 minutes and 30 seconds per kilometer. She felt much more relaxed compared to the day she ran 5 kilometers, with even breathing and stable strides, clearly experiencing an improvement in her endurance.

events.name: Making snacks for the party
events.description: In the morning before the shop opened and during the lunch break, Song Yajing busied herself in her own kitchen, meticulously preparing the tiramisu she had promised Vivian and also attempting to bake a tray of cranberry cookies. She carefully decorated the surface of the tiramisu, tidied up the living room, and prepared the tea set.

events.name: Spending the afternoon tea time with Vivian at home.
events.description: On Sunday afternoon, Vivian visited as scheduled. The two sat in the living room, chatting while enjoying freshly baked tiramisu and cookies. The conversation ranged from baking techniques (Vivian also enjoys baking) to recent fashion trends, amusing and troublesome work anecdotes, and newly opened hotspots in Xiamen. The atmosphere was relaxed and intimate, filled with continuous laughter.

events.name: Share leftover snacks
events.description: After Vivian left, Song Yajing packed up some of the leftover cookies, planning to share them with the shop assistant Xiaomei and her neighbor Aunt Zhang the next day.

events.name: Gratitude Journal
events.description: Gratitude Journal: Grateful that running is becoming easier, grateful for Vivian bringing a pleasant afternoon, grateful that Xiaomei learns new things quickly, grateful that the scanner arrived smoothly.

events.name: Control dessert intake
events.description: During afternoon tea, Song Yajing consciously controlled her dessert intake, eating only a small piece of tiramisu to maintain her dietary discipline.

起始状态.心情: Pleasure, looking forward to gathering with friends

结束状态.心情: Relaxed and content (due to friendship and good food), with slight restraint.

2025-10.daily_overview: Tuesday's work focus was fully shifted towards the launch of the mini-program. Song Yajing began creating countdown promotional materials and held a family financial meeting to plan the funding for the launch. At the same time, she integrated her morning runs with work-related thinking, making her exercise time yield additional value.

events.name: Learn scanning software functions
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing studied the advanced features of the scanner's accompanying software by referring to the instruction manual and online tutorials, such as how to set up batch scanning, adjust the colors of faded photos, and save scanned files in formats suitable for digital photo albums, in preparation for the upcoming large-scale project.

events.name: Produce promotional materials for the mini-program launch countdown.
events.description: During her spare time, Song Yajing used a design app on her phone to create a promotional poster titled "Countdown: 4 Days," which highlighted the core feature of convenient shopping on the mini-program. She also filmed and edited a 15-second short video with her phone, showcasing the cozy atmosphere of the store and a few selected products, intended for promotional use on WeChat Moments and Xiaohongshu.

events.name: Review October Household and Store Income and Expenditure
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing organized and summarized the various financial data for October at the shop, including daily household expenses, the shop's revenue and costs, and her daughter's extracurricular class fees, preparing a clear data summary for the evening's financial meeting.

events.name: Convene the October Family Financial Review Meeting
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang held a monthly financial meeting in the study. They reviewed each item of October's expenditures to check for any budget overruns and were pleased to find that, due to effective cost control, their savings target had been largely achieved. The meeting focused on discussing the marketing and contingency funds to be reserved for November due to the launch of the mini-program, and it was decided to allocate the first tranche of funds from the "Store Digitalization Upgrade Fund."

events.name: Record Financial Resolutions
events.description: After the meeting, Song Yajing neatly recorded the mutually agreed resolutions in the family finance notebook—including the minor adjustments to the November budget, as well as the amount and timing of the initial funding allocation for the mini-program. She then confirmed with Chen Zhiqiang their respective responsibilities for implementation (Song Yajing was responsible for contacting the bank to arrange the transfer, while Chen Zhiqiang was tasked with paying the final installment for the development).

events.name: Reflecting on work while jogging in the morning
events.description: During her morning run, Song Yajing listened to upbeat music while planning her work for the day in her mind: releasing the countdown poster in the morning, contacting the bank manager in the afternoon, and testing the latest version of the mini-program in the evening. Combining exercise with work planning made her morning run more efficient.

events.name: Exchange thanks with Vivian.
events.description: Song Yajing sent a WeChat message to thank Vivian for her visit and the gift yesterday (Vivian brought a pack of fine tea). Vivian replied, once again praising the deliciousness of the snacks, and the two agreed that next time Vivian would share her newly acquired coffee beans.

events.name: Plan the Double 11 Online Event
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing browsed through some merchant case studies. Considering her store's inventory and profit margins, she preliminarily brainstormed promotional activities for the first major sales event, "Double Eleven," after the mini-program's launch. These included offers such as "Spend 199, Get 20 Off" and flash sales on selected items. She also set conservative sales targets.

events.name: Gratitude Journal and Neck & Shoulder Yoga
events.description: The gratitude journal recorded the smooth progress of the financial meeting and the completion of promotional materials. In the evening, shoulder and neck yoga was practiced. Due to prolonged sitting during the day while creating promotional materials, the sense of relaxation from this session was particularly noticeable.

events.name: Neck and shoulder discomfort due to prolonged sitting
events.description: Prolonged sitting while producing promotional materials during the day caused slight discomfort in the shoulders and neck, but it was alleviated through yoga.

起始状态.心情: Focus, be organized

结束状态.心情: Clear-minded, feeling reassured about financial matters and launch preparations, with slight neck and shoulder fatigue.

state.今日运动: 4 km morning run, 20 minutes of evening yoga

2025-10.daily_overview: The preparations for the launch have entered a white-hot stage. Song Yajing has completed the product copywriting and promotional launch, and visited the bank to finalize the special savings account and fund transfers. The completion of each specific task has made the November 1st launch feel increasingly tangible and real.

events.name: Design a Family Electronic Photo Album Directory
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing created a detailed electronic album folder structure for the 'Family Memory Preservation Project' on her computer. It was roughly divided into several main folders such as 'Parents' Youth Era,' 'My Childhood,' 'Before and After Marriage,' and 'Lexuan's Growth,' making it convenient to categorize and store scanned photos in the future.

events.name: Write copy for product detail pages of mini-programs
events.description: Song Yajing crafted compelling descriptive copy for each of the 20 selected products launched online. She not only detailed the fabric and sizing but also emphasized depicting styling scenarios and aesthetic impressions. For instance, "This knitwear paired with a skirt offers a gentle office look, while matched with jeans it embodies a relaxed weekend vibe," making the text more evocative.

events.name: Launch the first round of online promotion
events.description: At noon, Song Yajing posted the '4 Days to Go' countdown poster and the product preview short video she had created simultaneously on her Xiaohongshu account, WeChat Moments, and the store's customer group. The accompanying text officially announced the launch date of the mini-program mall and encouraged everyone to follow it. This garnered many likes and 'looking forward to it' comments from regular customers.

events.name: Open a special savings account
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing visited the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China. With the assistance of her account manager, Lin Xiaofeng, she officially opened dedicated fixed-term savings sub-accounts for the "Shop Digital Upgrade Fund" and the "Family Health Protection Fund." She also set up an automatic transfer function to be triggered after each payday, enabling automated budget planning.

events.name: Allocate start-up funds for the mini program
events.description: At the same bank, Song Yajing, in accordance with the resolution made the previous night, processed the transfer of a sum of money from the family savings account to the store's corporate account, to serve as the final payment for the mini-program development and the initial funding for its promotion.

events.name: Morning Run Encounter and Conversation with Neighbor
events.description: During her morning run, Song Yajing encountered her neighbor Aunt Zhang, who was also out for a walk. The two had a brief conversation. Song Yajing shared how she felt more energetic after sticking to her morning running routine. Aunt Zhang complimented her on her healthy complexion and mentioned that her own daughter was also thinking of opening a small shop. Song Yajing enthusiastically offered to share her experience.

events.name: Final Technical Handover with the Development Team
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang held a final critical online meeting with the technical lead of the mini-program development team before the launch. The three parties confirmed the upload process for product material packages, the final testing status of the payment interface, the usage method of the order management backend, and the technical support response mechanism after the launch, resolving all remaining issues.

events.name: Gratitude Journal
events.description: Gratitude Journal: Grateful to Bank Manager Lin for handling the business efficiently, grateful for Aunt Zhang's care, grateful to the development team for their professionalism and responsibility, and grateful that everything is progressing smoothly.

events.name: Staying up late due to technical integration.
events.description: The technical coordination meeting lasted late into the evening, and Song Yajing stayed up late to ensure all details were properly addressed.

起始状态.心情: Pragmatic, with strong execution capability

结束状态.心情: The reassuring sense of everything progressing according to plan, with a slight fatigue.

2025-10.daily_overview: On the eve of the launch, the preparatory work entered its final sprint. Song Yajing organized all the product materials, initiated internal testing invitations for the core customer base, and persisted with her morning run in the drizzle, her mindset growing increasingly calm. At the same time, she did not forget to plan for the continued learning of personal interests such as piano.

events.name: Prepare Storage Space for Photo Scanning
events.description: Song Yajing checked the storage space of the home NAS and cloud drives to ensure sufficient capacity for storing a large number of high-definition old photos to be scanned in the future. She also organized the external hard drive, preparing it for backup purposes.

events.name: Submit the packaged product materials bundle
events.description: Song Yajing named all the processed product images and their corresponding copy descriptions according to the rule of 'Product ID + Name', organized them into a clear folder, compressed it, and sent it via email to the mini-program development team. This was the final and most important material submission before the launch.

events.name: Invite Core Customers to Participate in Internal Testing
events.description: Song Yajing privately contacted five or six top-spending and most loyal customers, including Vivian, via WeChat. She sincerely invited them to become beta testers before the mini-program's official launch, allowing them to preview the platform and simulate orders in advance. As a token of appreciation, she promised to offer them exclusive coupons valid on the first day of the launch.

events.name: Spread the message in the best friends' group chat and seek advice.
events.description: Song Yajing shared the news about the mini-program launch and the countdown poster in the "Quanzhou Three Flowers" group chat (with Li Meiling and Wang Jia). She also privately messaged her close friend Wang Jia, who works as a product manager in Shenzhen, sending her the beta version link and asking for suggestions from a professional user experience perspective. Wang Jia quickly replied with some minor optimization points regarding button placement and process flow.

events.name: Mood Running in the Rain
events.description: In the early morning, a light drizzle began to fall. Song Yajing hesitated for a moment but still put on her windproof jacket and headed out. Jogging slowly in the fine rain, the park was sparsely populated, and the air was exceptionally fresh. She no longer focused on her pace, instead simply feeling the rhythm of her breath and the cool touch of the raindrops on her face. Within her, she felt a sense of tranquility unlike any she had experienced before.

events.name: Schedule a piano lesson for next month
events.description: Song Yajing contacted the piano teacher via WeChat, expressing her intention to continue learning and scheduling Wednesday evening classes for November. She also rearranged the electronic keyboard at home to ensure a comfortable practice environment.

events.name: Set up the Double 11 promotional event
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing set up a 'Spend 199, Save 20' coupon in the mini-program mall backend based on her previous plan, and selected two high-value single items to be designated as 'Double 11 Flash Sale items.' Together with her assistant Xiaomei, she filmed short videos for the flash sale products and drafted eye-catching promotional copy, preparing to release them simultaneously on November 1st.

events.name: Gratitude Journal
events.description: Gratitude Journal: Grateful for the fresh air brought by the drizzle, grateful for the enthusiastic response from our regular customers to the beta testing invitation, grateful for Wang Jia's professional advice, grateful that the preparation for the launch is basically completed.

events.name: Poor sleep due to pre-launch anxiety
events.description: On the eve of the launch, Song Yajing felt slightly anxious and experienced a decline in sleep quality, but she managed to regulate her mindset by keeping a gratitude journal.

起始状态.心情: Steady, with meticulous attention to the final details.

结束状态.心情: A state of readiness, calm yet tinged with excitement and anxiety.

2025-10.daily_overview: The last day of October is a time for reflection and looking ahead. Song Yajing reviewed her progress in piano learning and fitness data, released the final preview before the launch of the mini-program, and made arrangements for her family's spiritual life in November. In a state of fulfillment and tranquility, she brought this fruitful October to a close.

events.name: Reviewing the Journey of Piano Learning
events.description: The two-month adult piano introductory course has officially concluded. Song Yajing reviewed her practice videos, which documented her journey from learning the keyboard to being able to play simple tunes. Although her progress was slow, every step was steady and solid. She enjoyed the sense of flow and accomplishment brought by the process and decided to continue with the next phase of learning in November, with the goal of being able to play a segment of her favorite pop song.

events.name: Confirm the Memory Preservation Plan with Parents
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing once again spoke with her parents via WeChat video call, confirming the next step of the "Family Memory Preservation Project": she is expected to return to Quanzhou around the end of November, at which time she will bring a scanner to begin organizing and scanning the earliest old photos with her parents over the weekend. Her parents have already eagerly started searching through the photo albums.

events.name: Final Preview Release for the Mini Program
events.description: Song Yajing released the final countdown poster titled "1 Day Left," which directly stated, "See you tomorrow!" Meanwhile, she carefully edited and reposted the previously filmed viral product short videos, accompanied by copywriting full of anticipation. Throughout the day, she actively responded to comments and private messages across various platforms, addressing final questions about the mini-program’s features and building up the launch atmosphere to a climax.

events.name: Recording Reflections on Morning Running Mindset
events.description: After her morning run, while resting on a park bench, Song Yajing briefly wrote in her phone's memo: "Running has shifted from a task to an enjoyment, from focusing on numbers to focusing on feelings. Just like managing a shop, perhaps there should be less chasing after anxious numbers and more appreciation for the experience and gratitude for the process itself." This is a snapshot of her recent shift in mindset.

events.name: View the monthly fitness report and share the joy.
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing opened her fitness app to review the monthly data report for October: her total running distance had exceeded 50 kilometers, her average pace had improved, and her longest run was 5 kilometers. She felt genuinely proud of herself for overcoming inertia and making significant progress in her health. She took a screenshot of the report and shared it with her husband, Chen Zhiqiang, who responded with a big thumbs-up.

events.name: Confirm the November Church Activity Schedule
events.description: Song Yajing checked the November Mass and activity schedule posted on the church's official WeChat account, recorded important Sunday Mass times on the family calendar, and reminded her husband Chen Zhiqiang and daughter Chen Lexuan to arrange their schedules accordingly, ensuring the whole family could participate in November's faith activities.

events.name: Gratitude Journal (October Summary)
events.description: Today's gratitude journal entry by Song Yajing was exceptionally long: Grateful for the inner peace brought by the October retreat, grateful for breaking through the 5-kilometer mark, grateful for the upcoming launch of the mini-program, grateful for the support of family and friends, grateful for the peace and gains of each day. Ending October with gratitude, welcoming a new beginning.

events.name: Foot Soaking and Relaxation Before Sleep
events.description: Before bed, I will have my last foot soak of the month, adding the newly purchased ginger foot bath powder to experience deep warmth and relaxation, preparing myself for the major launch day tomorrow.

events.name: Adjust your mindset to embrace the launch.
events.description: Through gratitude journaling and foot soaking, Song Yajing adjusted her mindset, facing tomorrow's mini-program launch with a calm and confident state.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, with a mood of summarizing and looking ahead.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied, proud, filled with anticipation for tomorrow, calm and confident.

events.name: Regular morning jogging
events.description: Song Yajing went for a morning run in Nanhu Park, enjoying the tranquility of the early morning. She used an app to record her data, completed 3 kilometers with a steady pace, and felt good.

events.name: Store Preparation for Double 11 Pre-sale Activities
events.description: During the period of stable morning customer flow, Song Yajing designed Double Eleven posters and copy, highlighting discounts and winter new arrivals to prepare materials for the marketing campaign.

events.name: Family Monthly Financial Planning Meeting
events.description: In the evening, I reviewed the October income and expenses with my husband, set the November budget, deposited the emergency fund into the corresponding account, and completed the monthly financial ritual.

events.name: Final Testing Before Mini Program Launch
events.description: After the family meeting, Chen Zhiqiang launched the mini-program, and Song Yajing and Xiaomei conducted comprehensive testing of the entire process to ensure the proper functioning of the features.

events.name: Start a Gratitude Journal
events.description: Before going to bed, I recorded moments of gratitude, including encouragement from regular customers, my daughter's growth, and my husband's help. I am determined to persist with this practice.

events.name: The idea of taking a family photo was conceived.

events.name: Conceptualizing the Digitalization of Family Memories
events.description: The old photos of Lenovo are fragile, so a scanning project is planned. I need to learn about models of home scanners and prepare to discuss this with my parents.

events.name: Regular morning jogging
events.description: I ran 2.5 kilometers for my morning jog in the Hubin South Road residential area, monitored the pace comparison on the app, and felt my breathing was smooth.

2025-11.daily_overview: On the second day after the launch, Song Yajing handled the first batch of shipments, shared progress with suppliers, informed her parents about the filming plan, canceled her morning run due to fatigue, and began experiencing discomfort in her lower back.

events.name: Process the first batch of online orders
events.description: In the afternoon, processed orders with Xiaomei, located and inspected goods for quality, packaged them using custom packaging, handwrote thank-you cards, and arranged for courier pickup.

events.name: Share Progress with Suppliers
events.description: WeChat shares the online launch feedback with Susan and explores the possibility of collaborating on exclusive online styles.

events.name: Inform Parents of the Shooting Plan
events.description: In the evening, I informed my parents of the filming plan via video call. They were happy to cooperate, and my father reminded me not to spend too much money.

2025-12.daily_overview: On the first workday of December, Song Yajing began the new month by organizing her family's finances. During the day, she focused on the daily operations of her shop and preparations for online promotions. In the evening, she conducted an in-depth monthly financial review with her husband, Chen Zhiqiang, laying a solid foundation for the family's future planning.

events.name: Morning Adaptive Jogging
events.description: At 6 a.m., Song Yajing jogged for 30 minutes at Egret Island Park to maintain basic cardiopulmonary function and reserve energy for the busy December. The weather was slightly cool, so she paid attention to warming up and keeping warm.

events.name: Open a new account to establish a family travel fund
events.description: After processing the first batch of online orders in the morning, Song Yajing utilized her lunch break to transfer 30% of the November online sales profits into a newly established dedicated savings account via her mobile banking app. She named it the "Family Travel Fund," officially launching a savings plan for an overseas trip within the next three years. Looking at the account balance, she felt more confident about achieving her family's goal.

events.name: Contact the courier to ensure the shipment of promotional materials.
events.description: Anticipating a potential surge in order volume due to the upcoming online promotional event, Song Yajing contacted the head of the cooperating courier company during the afternoon when store traffic was stable. She confirmed the pickup schedule, frequency, and preferential shipping rate agreements for regular customers during the event period. Meanwhile, she inspected and organized the inventory of packaging materials in the back warehouse, such as bags and fillers, and discovered a shortage of bubble wrap. She promptly placed an order to replenish the stock through an online platform to ensure a seamless shipping process.

events.name: Review inventory to determine the promotion list.
events.description: Before closing in the evening, Song Yajing and her staff member Xiaomei conducted an inventory check together, selecting clothing styles suitable for online promotions. She determined the final promotional prices by comprehensively considering costs, sales data from previous seasons, and current market trends. She then prepared a detailed product list, including styles, sizes, inventory quantities, original prices, and promotional prices, to facilitate subsequent uploading and verification.

events.name: Monthly Family Financial Review Meeting
events.description: In the evening, after their daughter Chen Lexuan had fallen asleep, Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang sat down at the dining table in the living room. They took out the family ledger and the mobile banking app, comparing the budget from early November with the actual expenditures. They focused on analyzing the reasons for deviations in major categories such as shop operations and daily household expenses. They also reviewed the monthly deposits into the "Shop Digital Upgrade Fund" and the "Family Health Security Fund," confirming that both were proceeding as planned. Based on the discussion, they made minor adjustments to the December budget and reiterated the importance of maintaining consistent bookkeeping and budgeting, reinforcing this newly formed financial habit.

events.name: Bedtime Prayer and Faith Reflection
events.description: During her personal bedtime prayers and the thanksgiving segment of family dinners, Song Yajing briefly reflected on the insights gained from attending Mass in November and the sense of inner peace she experienced. She quietly integrated these spiritual reflections into her gratitude for family life and her mindset adjustments toward maintaining patience and integrity in managing her shop.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, with anticipation for the planning of the new month and the year-end sprint.

结束状态.心情: Feeling reassured with a comprehensive and well-structured family financial plan.

state.今日运动: Adaptive Morning Run for 30 Minutes

2025-12.daily_overview: Song Yajing's day revolves around the upcoming online and offline joint promotion, ranging from marketing budget planning to the preparation of specific visual materials, with meticulous and intensive work. She stayed up late due to unexpected overtime handling orders, and her weight increased slightly because of the delicious food sent by her mother.

events.name: Plan the Digital Marketing Budget
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing began to specifically plan the digital marketing budget for December's store operations, based on the decisions made during the previous night's family financial review meeting. She carefully assessed the funds available for online promotion, planning to allocate them toward in-app promotions on the mini-program store, targeted advertising on WeChat Moments, and limited content collaborations on platforms like Xiaohongshu. The goal was to further expand online sales and test the effectiveness of different channels.

events.name: Refine the workflow during the promotion period
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing sat at the small desk in the shop, refining the daily workflow schedule for the event period (December 3rd to 9th). The table detailed specific tasks and time points, from checking and processing online orders before opening in the morning, updating the mini-program inventory during the midday peak customer flow, to reconciling daily online and offline sales data after closing in the evening and preparing packages for the next day's shipments. This ensured that all tasks could proceed in an orderly manner during the busy week.

events.name: Take promotional product photos with shop assistant Xiaomei.
events.description: During the afternoon when there were fewer customers in the store, Song Yajing and Xiaomei set up a simple photography area in a corner, hanging a solid-colored backdrop. They carefully coordinated the selected promotional items and took multiple flat-lay shots as well as model-on shots from various angles. Throughout the shooting process, Song Yajing continuously adjusted the lighting and composition to strive for the best presentation of the clothing.

events.name: Received Quanzhou rice dumplings sent by my mother.
events.description: At noon, Song Yajing received a package from Quanzhou. Upon opening it, she found steaming Quanzhou-style meat zongzi and several sheets of runbing wrappers, which she loves, all handmade by her mother, Lin Xiuying. Her mother had sent a message on WeChat saying, "It's getting cold; have some home-cooked flavors." This warmed Song Yajing's heart amid her busy schedule, and she decided to share the food with her family that evening, which led to her eating a little more than usual.

events.name: Temporary overtime to handle the surge in online orders
events.description: After 10 PM, the sudden surge in orders due to online promotional preheating forced Song Yajing to stay up late into the night, handling order confirmations and customer service inquiries. She did not rest until 23:50, which affected her sleep.

events.name: Discussing financial planning with my husband in the evening.
events.description: During a break from overtime work, Song Yajing showed her husband Chen Zhiqiang a screenshot of the established "Family Travel Fund" account and a preliminary digital marketing budget proposal. Chen Zhiqiang carefully reviewed the proposal and offered several technical optimization suggestions, such as focusing on the ROI (Return on Investment) of advertising placements. The two reconfirmed the fund allocation plan and reached a high level of consensus on their financial goals for the upcoming year.

起始状态.心情: Focus, making final preparations for the upcoming event.

结束状态.心情: Tired yet driven, feeling slightly stressed from staying up late.

state.今日运动: None, working all day in the storefront and at the computer.

2025-12.daily_overview: The final preparation day before the promotional campaign began. Song Yajing completed all the online platform setups and conducted a mobilization meeting with the store staff. Taking advantage of the relatively quiet morning hours, she went for a morning run to build up energy for the busy week ahead, but retired early in the evening due to fatigue.

events.name: Morning Running Builds Energy Reserves
events.description: Considering that the promotional campaign is about to be fully launched and the upcoming week will be extremely busy, Song Yajing decided to take advantage of this relatively quiet morning to recharge her energy. She woke up twenty minutes earlier than usual and went for a 30-minute jog in the park near her residential community. The winter morning air was crisp and cold, but the run left her feeling refreshed and invigorated, injecting vitality into her workday.

events.name: Final Configuration of the Online Event Platform
events.description: Throughout the entire morning, Song Yajing logged into the backend of the store's mini-program mall, uploading the product images processed the previous night and the meticulously crafted promotional copy one by one. She carefully set the promotional prices and inventory quantities, and configured the "Spend 299, Save 30" coupon and the "Buy Two, Get 10% Off" discount rule for use during the event. She repeatedly checked the page redirects and price displays on each page to ensure there were no errors.

events.name: Pre-activity Mobilization and Inspection
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing once again checked with Xiaomei to ensure that all promotional clothing price tags and promotional posters in the store were correctly displayed, and they also took inventory of the small accessories prepared as giveaways. Before closing, she held a brief motivational session with Xiaomei, emphasizing the need for a more enthusiastic and attentive service attitude during the promotional period, as well as the flexible application of sales techniques. She also extended her best wishes for the success of the week-long promotional event.

events.name: Supplementary Event: Online Exchange with Fellow Baking Enthusiasts
events.description: In the evening, Mrs. Liu, a baking enthusiast from Hangzhou, shared photos of her newly attempted "Earl Grey Chestnut Cake" on WeChat. Song Yajing liked the post and commented, leading to a brief conversation between the two about how the aroma of black tea could be infused into the cream. They agreed to explore local bakeries together the next time Song Yajing visited Hangzhou. This lighthearted exchange provided her with a temporary respite from her work preparations.

events.name: Canceling evening exercise due to fatigue.
events.description: Due to staying up late the previous night and being busy all day, Song Yajing felt exceptionally exhausted. She canceled the originally planned indoor comprehensive training and opted to go to bed early to restore her energy.

起始状态.心情: Calmness tinged with a hint of pre-battle excitement.

结束状态.心情: Ready to go, but physically fatigued, so retiring early to conserve energy and build up strength.

2025-12.daily_overview: Song Yajing embarked on a packed business trip to Guangzhou. During the day, she mainly met with key supplier Susan, attended an ordering conference, and selected spring collections for the next season for her store. In her communication with Susan, she unexpectedly expanded new sourcing channels, bringing new possibilities to her career. However, due to the hectic schedule and irregular meals, she experienced a slight weight loss.

events.name: Travel to Guangzhou by high-speed rail.
events.description: In the early morning, Song Yajing bid farewell to her family and boarded an early high-speed train from Xiamen North Station to Guangzhou. During the nearly four-hour journey, she used her laptop to make final checks on the online setup for the promotional campaign while contemplating the key focus of this purchasing trip—to find some spring dresses and shirts with unique designs and comfortable fabrics.

events.name: Check into the hotel and meet with the supplier.
events.description: Upon arriving in Guangzhou in the afternoon, Song Yajing checked into the hotel she had booked in advance, located near the wholesale market. After a brief rest, she headed to Guangzhou's renowned clothing wholesale market to meet with her long-time supplier, Susan. Susan had already reserved the latest spring sample garments for her in the showroom.

events.name: Attend the ordering conference to select new models.
events.description: Accompanied by Susan, Song Yajing moved through various exhibition halls, carefully touching fabrics, observing cuts, and trying on garments to evaluate their effects. She made selections based on the customer demographics of her own store. With Susan, she engaged in in-depth discussions regarding styles, colors, minimum order quantities, prices, and delivery schedules. Ultimately, she completed the ordering and settlement for the main merchandise of the next season.

events.name: Proposing New Requirements to Suppliers and Obtaining Recommendations
events.description: During a tea break between ordering sessions, Song Yajing expressed to Susan her desire to expand her supply sources and seek out some uniquely designed, cost-effective light luxury brand overstock or independent designer pieces to increase the differentiation of her store's merchandise. Upon hearing this, Susan immediately recommended a senior buyer in Hangzhou who specializes in such sources and sent the contact information to Song Yajing via WeChat, which pleasantly surprised her.

events.name: Neglecting exercise due to frequent business trips.
events.description: Walked extensively throughout the wholesale market all day but did not engage in formal exercise, and went to bed early in the evening due to fatigue.

起始状态.心情: Hasty yet purposeful, preparing for a business trip.

结束状态.心情: Tired but with a full sense of accomplishment, having completed the core procurement tasks and obtained unexpected resources.

state.今日运动: None, mainly walking for extended periods within the wholesale market.

2025-12.daily_overview: On her second day in Guangzhou, Song Yajing arranged a purely personal aesthetic experience—visiting an independent fashion designer exhibition. This visit departed from the utilitarian mindset of her daily work, providing her with a strong artistic impact and inspiration. She shared and discussed the experience with her travel companions that evening, and her weight increased as she indulged in delicious food.

events.name: Visit the Independent Fashion Designer Exhibition
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing went alone to a gallery within an art district to visit a small yet brilliant joint exhibition of works by independent fashion designers. She slowed her pace, immersing herself in the experience, carefully admiring the creative tailoring of each piece, the bold use of unique fabrics, and the avant-garde design concepts behind them. From time to time, she used her phone to capture details and quickly jotted down fleeting inspirations and reflections in the notebook she carried with her. It was an experience entirely detached from commercial considerations, a pure appreciation moved by beauty alone.

events.name: Organizing Exhibition Insights and Applying Reflections
events.description: After viewing the exhibition, Song Yaxin sat down at a café near the exhibition hall and ordered a fruit tea and a tiramisu cake. She spent nearly two hours organizing the photos she had taken during the day and the scattered notes she had recorded, categorizing keywords such as "deconstructionism," "fabric reconstruction," and "color emotion." She began to contemplate how these artistic elements could be integrated into her own store's product selection, window displays, and even customer styling advice in a more down-to-earth and wearable way in the future, forming a preliminary "inspiration material library" of her own.

events.name: Online Communication with Fashion Industry Colleagues
events.description: Returning to the hotel in the evening, Song Yajing still felt exhilarated. She shared some non-copyrighted photos from the exhibition and her reflections via WeChat with former colleague Zheng Kai, who also follows fashion closely, and her close friend Wang Jia, who works in the internet industry in Shenzhen. The group engaged in a lively informal discussion on topics such as "design trends for the upcoming season" and "the balance between art and commerce." This exchange helped her deepen her understanding of the artworks she had seen during the day and provided her with different perspectives.

events.name: Proactively contact the new buyer in Hangzhou.
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing added the WeChat contact of the Hangzhou buyer recommended by Susan yesterday. She sent a brief self-introduction, explaining her situation of running a boutique clothing store in Xiamen and expressing her intention to seek cooperation on unique design overstock. The other party quickly accepted the friend request. Both sides exchanged polite greetings and agreed to have a more in-depth online discussion at a convenient time tomorrow.

events.name: Foot Soaking for Relaxation
events.description: Having walked a great deal during the day, Song Yajing soaked her feet in hot water in her hotel room that evening. Instead of reading a book or listening to music as usual, she simply closed her eyes to rest, allowing her body and mind to fully relax and alleviate the fatigue accumulated from consecutive days of business travel.

起始状态.心情: Filled with curiosity and anticipation, ready to enjoy a period of personal time.

结束状态.心情: Abundant inspiration and a rich inner world have sparked more imagination for the future style of the store.

state.今日运动: The exhibition tour takes approximately 2 hours.

date_attribute.weather: The weather changed on the way back to Xiamen from Guangzhou, with overcast skies and light rain in Xiamen.

2025-12.daily_overview: Saturday marked the first peak customer flow day of the promotional event. Song Yajing had already returned to Xiamen from Guangzhou and immediately immersed herself in the busy operations of the store. She and Xiao Mei collaborated effectively to handle the simultaneous influx of online and offline orders. In the evening, feeling deeply exhausted, she canceled her exercise plans, and her weight increased due to dining out.

events.name: Return to Xiamen by high-speed rail.
events.description: Song Yajing took the early high-speed train from Guangzhou back to Xiamen. During the journey, she reflected on this compact yet productive business trip: she had not only completed the scheduled spring procurement tasks but also gained valuable artistic inspiration through exhibition visits, and unexpectedly expanded her supply chain network. She began contemplating how to translate these inspirations into specific adjustments or experiments in her store operations.

events.name: Dealing with the Peak Customer Flow on the First Weekend of the Promotion
events.description: Upon arriving in Xiamen at noon, Song Yajing went directly to the store. Saturday afternoon saw the first peak in customer flow since the promotion began. She and Xiaomei quickly divided the work: Xiaomei was mainly responsible for in-store guidance and assisting customers with trying on clothes, while Song Yajing handled the cash register while also using her phone to swiftly process the continuous stream of new orders on the mini-program mall, and instructed Xiaomei to pack and ship orders during breaks. The atmosphere in the store was lively.

events.name: Dynamic Adjustment of Inventory and Sales Strategies
events.description: During the brief midday lull in customer traffic, Song Yajing quickly checked the inventory of several best-selling items. She noticed that the online displayed stock of a certain knitwear was nearly sold out, but there was still some remaining stock offline. She immediately transferred part of the inventory from the warehouse to the front display area to ensure that in-store customers could see the physical products. At the same time, she found that sales of several jackets were below expectations and began considering whether to adjust the promotional strategy in the future.

events.name: Evening Sales Review and Physical Fatigue
events.description: After closing for the night, Song Yajing and Xiaomei organized the impressive sales data for the day and briefly reviewed the sales performance. However, the consecutive business trips and a day of intense work left Song Yajing feeling sore and unusually exhausted. She canceled her originally planned morning run for the next day, deciding to ensure adequate sleep both that night and the following day.

events.name: Supplementary Event: Discussing Family Day Activities with Husband
events.description: After returning home in the evening, although tired, Song Yajing still discussed the activity arrangements for tomorrow (Sunday) afternoon with Chen Zhiqiang. They decided that if the weather was good, they would take their daughter to Wuyuan Bay Wetland Park for a hike, to get close to nature and relax. Chen Zhiqiang was responsible for checking the weather forecast and preparing the necessary items for the trip.

events.name: Dining out for dinner leads to dietary indulgence.
events.description: Due to being busy and not preparing dinner, the family dined out. Song Yajing consumed a relatively high amount of high-calorie food, resulting in a slight increase in weight.

起始状态.心情: Eager to return, ready to embrace the bustle of the shop.

结束状态.心情: Physically exhausted, but gratified by the excellent sales performance.

state.今日运动: None, working intensively in the store all day.

2025-12.daily_overview: Sunday is Song Yajing's rest and family day. In the morning, she attends church mass and engages in fellowship with other church members. In the afternoon, she goes on a family outdoor hiking activity with her husband and daughter, effectively balancing faith, family, and health. However, due to consuming a large amount of food during the picnic, her weight continues to increase.

events.name: Attend Sunday Mass at church
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing and her family of three attended the Sunday Mass at the church. In the sacred and serene atmosphere, she felt the busyness and stress of the week gradually ease. After the Mass, she went to a nearby tea restaurant with Aunt Lin Xiuying, a familiar church member, for afternoon tea. She proactively shared her recent efforts in family financial planning and the pressures she faced in managing her business. The devout Aunt Lin offered warm encouragement and support, reminding her to entrust everything to her faith.

events.name: Family Outdoor Hiking Activity
events.description: The shop was closed in the afternoon, so Chen Zhiqiang drove the family of three to Wuyuan Bay Wetland Park. Their daughter, Xuanxuan, was already excited during the ride. Upon arrival, they strolled along the winding wooden boardwalk, enjoying the rare warm winter sunshine and fresh air. Xuanxuan eagerly observed the egrets and ducks on the water, occasionally asking her parents questions. Song Yajing walked arm in arm with her husband, engaging in gentle outdoor exercise while chatting about their experiences over the past week.

events.name: Park Picnics and Family Communication
events.description: After hiking for a while, the family spread out a picnic blanket on an open lawn with a wide view to rest, sharing homemade sandwiches, fruit, and hot water. Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang discussed the progress of the store promotions and some new projects at his work, while their daughter happily ran around nearby. At this moment, away from work and the store, this pure family time allowed Song Yajing to feel completely relaxed both physically and mentally, though the picnic food resulted in a higher calorie intake.

events.name: Supplementary Event: Video Call with Parents to Share Family Day
events.description: In the evening, Song Yajing returned home and posted several heartwarming family photos taken at the wetland park to the family WeChat group. Soon after, her mother Lin Xiuying made a video call, happily gazing at her granddaughter’s rosy cheeks and reminding them to enjoy themselves while also being careful not to catch a chill. The brief conversation extended the warmth of family bonds.

起始状态.心情: Relax and look forward to spending time with family.

结束状态.心情: Pleasant, calm, and fully charged, the satisfaction derived from family bonds is profound.

state.今日运动: The hike at Wuyuan Bay Wetland Park takes about 1.5 hours.

2025-12.daily_overview: A new week begins, with promotional activities entering a stable phase and online order volume remaining steady. Song Yajing shifts her focus to order processing, inventory coordination, and online operations optimization. Meanwhile, she starts paying attention to the neck and shoulder health issues arising from her busy schedule, as reduced exercise due to discomfort has kept her weight unchanged.

events.name: Handling online orders and coordinating replenishment
events.description: On Monday, a typical workday, the in-store foot traffic was relatively steady, but the number of orders through the mini-program remained considerable. Song Yajing primarily focused on handling online inquiries, confirming orders, and arranging shipments. Based on sales data from the past few days, she noticed that several best-selling items were running low on stock. She promptly contacted her main supplier, Susan, to coordinate whether priority restocking could be arranged. At the same time, she adjusted the homepage recommendations on the mini-program mall, placing potential styles with sufficient inventory at the top to balance sales.

events.name: Obtaining Health Advice from a Close Friend
events.description: During the lunch break, Song Yajing casually mentioned in a WeChat chat with her close friend Li Meiling that she had been experiencing some soreness in her shoulders, neck, and waist recently due to long hours processing orders in front of the computer and organizing shelves in the store. Upon hearing this, Li Meiling immediately recommended a well-regarded traditional Chinese massage therapy center she frequents and shared her experience from her first visit.

events.name: Organize weekend family photos
events.description: During a quiet afternoon at the shop, Song Yajing used her phone to organize the family photos taken during yesterday's hike. She carefully selected a few pictures with a warm atmosphere and good composition, first sharing them in the "Happy Family" WeChat group for her parents to see. Then, she chose a photo of the three of them from behind and posted it on her social media feed with the caption "Weekend recharge, fully energized," to document this enjoyable family outing.

events.name: Supplementary event: Preparing Christmas-themed handicraft homework for my daughter.
events.description: In the evening, their daughter Xuanxuan brought back a task from kindergarten: to create a Christmas-themed handicraft with her parents. Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang accompanied their daughter in making a simple "Santa Claus and Snow House" using colored paper, cotton, and glue, enjoying a delightful moment of parent-child interaction.

events.name: Evening exercise cancelled due to neck and shoulder discomfort.
events.description: Due to intensified shoulder and neck soreness, Song Yajing canceled the originally scheduled comprehensive indoor training and opted for rest to alleviate the discomfort.

起始状态.心情: Calm and ready to tackle the work of the new week.

结束状态.心情: Feeling slightly fatigued with some discomfort in the shoulders and neck, but happy for the family time.

2025-12.daily_overview: Song Yajing began proactively managing the physical fatigue and family risks caused by her work. She booked physiotherapy services and initiated a family insurance policy review. Meanwhile, inspired by her visit to an exhibition in Guangzhou, she started systematically searching for and studying fashion design knowledge, transforming her interest into professional development. Due to indulging in food slightly after massage sessions for relaxation, she gained weight.

events.name: Book Chinese Massage Service
events.description: In the morning, Song Yajing looked up information about the Chinese-style massage therapy center recommended by her close friend Li Meiling through an online platform. She carefully reviewed user ratings, therapist qualifications, and pricing packages, finding it relatively reliable. She then successfully booked a massage appointment for the following afternoon via phone, hoping to alleviate her persistent shoulder and neck pain.

events.name: Initiate a Family Policy Review Appointment
events.description: Considering changes in the family's financial situation and the increasing age of her parents, Song Yajing felt it necessary to reassess the family's insurance coverage. She proactively contacted a previously acquainted insurance advisor via WeChat to schedule an online policy review meeting for the following afternoon. During the initial communication, she outlined several key issues she wished to discuss: whether her husband's coverage was sufficient, the continuity of insurance for her parents after their relocation to Xiamen, and the optimal timing to initiate an education fund insurance plan for her daughter.

events.name: Begin systematic learning of fashion design knowledge.
events.description: Deeply inspired by her visit to the Guangzhou exhibition, Song Yajing realized that she could not rely solely on experience and intuition when selecting goods; she needed systematic theoretical support. During her lunch breaks, she searched and filtered courses through mobile apps and online education platforms. Eventually, she chose two introductory courses: "Fundamentals of Fashion Design" and "Common Fabric Characteristics and Applications." She planned to study for 30–45 minutes each day during her lunch break or after her daughter fell asleep at night, and she prepared a dedicated notebook for this purpose.

events.name: Supplementary Event: Received the first batch of product information from the Hangzhou buyer.
events.description: In the evening, the new buyer from Hangzhou sent a PDF document via WeChat, containing images, fabric compositions, sizes, and quotations for over a dozen samples of leftover inventory from light luxury brands. Song Yajing carefully reviewed the materials and developed a strong interest in several shirts with unique cuts and a high-quality midi skirt. She replied that she needed some time to consider and inquired about the minimum order quantity.

events.name: Morning Brisk Walking Relieves Stress
events.description: At 6:50 a.m., Song Yajing engaged in a 20-minute brisk walk in the residential community to alleviate work-related stress, though the intensity was relatively low.

events.name: Enjoy a Relaxing Dinner After a Massage
events.description: In the evening, feeling relaxed after a successful massage appointment, I went out for a meal with my family and consumed a larger amount of food, resulting in a slight increase in weight.

起始状态.心情: Proactive, starting to address the two concerns of health and learning.

结束状态.心情: Enriched, I feel that I am not only dealing with immediate matters but also investing in the long term (health and knowledge).

state.今日运动: Take a brisk 20-minute walk in the morning.

2025-12.daily_overview: This is Health Management Day and Personal Relationship Maintenance Day. Song Yajing experienced professional physical therapy to alleviate physical fatigue and took the opportunity to provide personalized services for important regular clients, thereby strengthening customer relationships. In the evening, she shared her physical therapy experience with her husband, and together they explored the possibility of incorporating health management into their daily routine. Her weight returned to a lower level due to adjustments in health management.

events.name: Experience Chinese Massage to Relieve Fatigue
events.description: In the afternoon, Song Yajing arrived at the physiotherapy center at her scheduled appointment time. The environment was elegant and tranquil. She explained in detail to the therapist the stiffness in her shoulder, neck, and lower back muscles caused by prolonged standing, sitting, and frequent lifting of goods. During the nearly hour-long massage session that followed, she experienced a noticeable transition from muscle soreness and tightness to gradual relaxation and relief. The therapist demonstrated professional techniques and also pointed out several of her poor posture habits.

events.name: Provide exclusive services for important regular customers
events.description: After returning to the shop from the massage session, Song Yajing felt considerably more relaxed. Remembering that it was the day when her regular customer Vivian usually visited, she sent her an exclusive invitation via WeChat, informing her that she could enjoy an additional member discount if she came to the shop today. In the afternoon, Vivian arrived as expected. Song Yajing personally attended to her, recommending several newly arrived outfits based on Vivian’s daily style and recent preferences. The two also exchanged insights on the recently tried "Matcha Red Bean Mousse" recipe. This thoughtful and personalized service not only facilitated a successful sale but also elevated their relationship beyond a mere transactional one.

events.name: Discussing health management methods with husband
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Song Yajing shared her massage experience with Chen Zhiqiang, noting that her muscles felt much more relaxed. She suggested that occasional professional therapy like this could serve as an irregular health adjustment method to supplement the limitations of daily walks, especially for coping with fatigue after periods of intense work. Chen Zhiqiang expressed his support and joked that he would also like to try it next time his shoulders felt sore.

events.name: Prepare materials for the family financial meeting
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing and Chen Zhiqiang began preparing the foundational data for the annual family financial planning meeting scheduled for the weekend. Song Yajing organized the shop's annual transaction records, purchase invoices, and online sales spreadsheets on the computer; Chen Zhiqiang, meanwhile, sorted out his annual pay stubs, bonus details, electronic bills for daily household expenses, as well as receipts for major expenditures such as car maintenance and insurance.

events.name: Schedule a weekend gathering with my best friend
events.description: Before going to bed, Song Yajing contacted her close friend Li Meiling via WeChat, suggesting they meet up this weekend for a casual chat and relaxation. After discussing, they finally decided to meet at a newly opened, cozy café on Zhongshan Road on the afternoon of December 14th (Saturday).

events.name: Start trying shoulder and neck relaxation exercises.
events.description: During her spare time at the shop, Song Yajing tentatively tried simple shoulder and neck relaxation exercises learned online, such as neck lateral flexion and shoulder circles, for 5-10 minutes each time, but has not yet developed a consistent habit.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to hoping that physical therapy will bring improvement.

结束状态.心情: The body is relaxed, the mood is pleasant, and there is a new understanding of health.
